item.text: rgyud tsha pa bzhugs so/ /
@##/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
thub pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan
gyis yang dag par gzigs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su son
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
@##/ /phyug la bka' stsal pa/ mi dang 'byung po'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /sems
can rnams la rjes brtse bas/ /dkyil 'khor las can thams cad ni/ /sems dpa'
chen po smros shig smros/ /sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang / /phun tshogs thams
cad mngon par 'phel/ /sgrub po rnams la phan pa yi/ /don phyir 'dren pas rgyas par
smros/ /ngo mtshar rmad byung thams cad kyi/ /lus can bar mar gyur pa rnams/ /khyod kyi
tshig gi mchog gyur pa/ /'byung 'gyur de dag thos nas ni/ /myur du lha rnams sgrub pa la/ /sems can gang du rab zhugs
pa/ /de nyid du ni sngar bshad pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang / /sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams kyis/ /thams
cad de la rjes yi rang / /dkyil 'khor sdig pa kun 'joms pa/ /dngos grub kun byed dge ba ni/ /sems can rnams
kyi mgon pos smros/ /sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor khyod kyi tshig /sems can cho ga yang dag 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gang
'di thos nas ni/ /rab tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur/ /dpal min 'joms shing zhi ba dang / /de bzhin nad dang dgra 'phrog cing / /
dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi/ /gzi brjid stobs ni rnam par 'phel/ /mthong ngam thos nas de nas ni/ /
rab tu dad pa skyed par byed/ /gang yin de rnams bdag gis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni/ /thob
pa'i ched du'ang lung bstan to/ /ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ni/ /rjes su yi rang 'gyur
ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor phun tshogs 'phel byed pa/ /de bzhin yon tan kun sdud pa/ /sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba/ /sems
dpa' chen po 'jig rten mgon/ /yang dag bka' yis smros shig smros/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas
pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das
shAkya thub pa la tha mi dad pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa'i tshig gis mngon par bstod do/ /shAkya'i rgyal po lha yi rgyal/ /phun tshogs yon tan du ma can/ /rab bsngags rdzu
'phrul rab ma nyams/ /rgyun tu dkar ba'i gos dang ldan/ /mchod sdong zhal ni 'dam skyes dri/ /blo bzang snying po brtan pa 'dzin/ /gang phyir khyod ni phun tshogs nyin/ /'di ni 'gro
ba de dag gi /dga' bas dga' bar byed pa ni/ /mgon po lha rnams kyi ni ste/ /rang bzhin dran pas kun tu snang / /de yi tshig ni rab rig pa/ /dpa' de chags pa zad pa nyid/ /
'bras bu gsum nyid 'dzin par byed/ /de de bzhin du de yis ni/ /lha yi mdzes mas kun bsrungs pa/ /brgyad kyis 'di ni dbang zhal las/ /skyes pa'i dpa' bor rab
stobs dang / /g.yo ba'i spro dga'i dbang po dang / /kun nas gser gyi ri dang ldan/ /cod pa na yang ni lhan cig gdan/ /lha dang lha min lhar bcas pa'i/ /lhag pa'i theg
pa thams cad kyi/ /'jig rten par do'i srid pa dang / /skye ba khyod kyi srog la sogs/ /byung ba mdzes ldan rang nyid kyi/ /'di yi mig ni dga' ba ste/ /gang rnams zla ba lta
bur dkar/ /lha rnams kyis bzung ri bong can/ /kund du ku dkar po yi/ /gos ni mnabs nyid tsa ko ra/ /brgya byin 'dab brgya pa yi mig /sa srungs phrag par phyogs gcig
'gro /bla ma'i ri la ri bong can/ /rgyal po'i dpung ldan brgya byin ni/ /mig brgya brtson 'grus ma nyams pas/ /grangs dang chu gter chu 'byin
pa/ /tshogs kyi sgra ni dga' ba dang / /dri med spyan ni dga' ba la'ang / /nyi ma'i 'od zer dam pa ni/ /rnam pas bras dang dri 'khor ba/ /bum dkar gang ba so so yi/ /bum
pa de rnams dbang bskur zhing / /tsan+dan sa mchog yan lag bshad/ /gi wang thig le rnam par bkra /yan lag dam pa yongs 'du ba'i/ /dga' ba mchog gi
yan lag dang / /lus med gzhom pa'i ched du byas/ /yan lag chags pa byas mtha' las/ /khrus ni stug pos mi 'pho bas/ /gzhan du 'chi med legs pa
ni/ /de 'og thal mo sbyar ba yi/ /dug gis btab pa smad pa ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog brjod pa'i/ /char ldan khyod kyi zhal du ni/ /sngon las khyod ni
lam gyi mgo /dri ma bzhin du spangs pa yang / /me tog ldan pa'i zla ba la/ /rnam par cher phyin longs spyod ldan/ /bcings pa lta bur 'di rnams nyid/ /bcos nas
sngar med cho ga yis/ /bcu par khyod ni zhi ba ste/ mgon med 'gro ba mtha' yas las/ /gang phyir srid pa mtha' med cing / /dri mas lha dang lha min yang / /de yi brtul
zhugs phan tshun du/ /dam pa'i spyan gyi 'od kyis snang / /'khyil ba can yangs yan lag mchog /phyogs su lha rnams gnas pa dang / /mi rnams byang chub rnam sangs rgyas
rab tu byed 'gyur zhes pa ni/ /mi rnams 'byung dang sdud pa'i las/ /de phyir rnams pad chu skyes ni/ /lha yi yan lag dam por son/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag dkris chags
bral/ /'chi bzhin sa yi lus kyang 'khod/ /kun nas gtod dang kun nas sdud/ /yang dag sa dang phyogs dang ldan/ /rnam bzhi mnyam par byang chub ldan/ /byang chub shing
drung bdud dpung las/ /rnam par rgyal ba thob pa dang / /sangs rgyas go 'phang 'pho med dang / /klu yi shing gi rtsa ba ru/ /zhe sdang rtsub po'i nags rnams kyis/ /rkang pa
sdong bu me yi ched/ /rmongs mun dri ma snang byed pa/ /khro bo'i me ni 'bar ba la/ /mi g.yo rab tu sbyin par byed/ /phyag rgya rdo rje lta bu sgom/ /gzhal ba'i 'khri shing gzugs
brnyan brtan/ /dmar po'i me ni 'bar ba ni/ /'jigs pa'i nyi ltar rnam mdzes pa/ /yan lag stobs bskyed phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon par bstod nas rang gi stan la 'khod de byang chub sems dpa' chen
po'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sems dpa' chen po'i zhal gyi sgo
nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byung ste 'od zer de rnams kyis gang+gA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar byas par gyur to/ /dmyal
ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang / yud tsam de la sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rnams su bcom ldan
'das de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sems dpa' chen po chen po smros
shig/ mthu chen po/ sems can sdig pa can thams cad dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba smros shig /gang gis de lta bu de rnams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa mu med pa
rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba dang / sa chen po ri dang / nags dang / phug tu bcas pa 'di rab tu g.yos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sngags bshad
par brtsams so/ /dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon dam tshig mthong bas slob dpon dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob cing dad pas
byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ sems can rnams kyi stobs dang / stobs ma yin pa shes pa/ ser sna med cing g.yo sgyu med pas nag po med cing ha cang mi sbom/ ha cang mi
phra ba/ dri ngan pa med pas dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa/ mdzes pa/ snying stobs dang ldan pas sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
gtan dang / shes rab dang / snying rje dang / yang dag par ldan par gyur pa/ sems can gyi dgongs pa dang / bsam pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
'dun la mngon par dang pa/ cha mang po mngon par shes pa/ gsal zhing gsal bar smra ba/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la byang ba/ rig gsum gang yang rung ba'i rig pa
pa sogs pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa/ phyag dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu sbyor ba shes pa/ mchod rten gyi las byas pa/ ha cang mi rgan byis pa dang / rigs dma'
par skyes pa ma yin pa/ gzhon zhing lang tsho dang ldan pa dang / tshul bzang po'i sgrub pa pos gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /zhes so/ /de nas
'di lta bu'i slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga brtsam par bya ste/ nus med 'dul nyes ma yin pa/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag rab sbyar bya/ /rmongs
pa'i sems dang chags can la/ /dkyil 'khor bstan par yang mi bya/ /gang zhig bslab la yud tsam yang / /lhag par 'gro ba'i lus can des/ /mtho ris thar pa yang
dag 'grub/ /yid kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni rjes zhig pa'i/ /dngos grub dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /byang chub rtsa bar rig thob pa'i/ /sems
de las ni yang dag brtsam/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems can rnams/ /bdag nyid kho nar
rab rtogs bya/ /de la bstan bya'i dkyil 'khor bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/ /stobs kyis sngon 'dul si tha'i lus/ /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la/ /
grong dang grong khyer grong rdal dang / /ljongs rnams su ni byang shar gyi/ /phyogs kyi cha ru mchod yon byin/ /sa yi mthil du de ji ltar/ /sa phyogs sngags la sngags
'gyur ba/ /snum zhing ljon shing me tog bzang / /'bras bu yang dag mang po can/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa 'bab pa'i phyogs/ /dkar dang ser ba'i sa gzhi la/ /gyo mo bong ba gseg
ma bral/ /rnga bo che yi sgra dbyangs dang / /lam gyi bzhi mdo dur khrod dang / /lha gzhan yongs su bzung ba dang / /shes shing sdug bsngal rdzogs spangs la/ /gang du kun nas
rgyang grags lnga'i/ /tshad du chu klung lteng ka dang / /mtsho phran chu bo rab 'bab pa/ /ljon shing mchod rten lha khang dang / /me tog nyid ni dus rgyun tu/ /shin tu rgya chen yang dag
ldan/ /cho 'phrul phyogs ni gang rung la/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma yi/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon sa phyogs der/ /nyi ma gung la song nas ni/ /ral pa gcig ma'i snying po
yi/ /mngon par mdzes pa'i las bya'o/ /thog mar rab dag sems can kun/ /byams dang snying rje dang ldan pas/ /dkyil 'khor gnas der yid kyis dmigs/ /dge ba'i
rig pa gdon par bya/ /sgrol ma'i snying po dam pa dang / /de bzhin dbyangs ni rjes su gdon/ /'dir ni sangs rgyas mchod don du/ /dkyil 'khor lus can kun gyis bri/ /
phyogs kyis 'gro ba'i gnas su gnas/ /thog mar gtor ma byin byas nas/ /dri yi yam shing yang dag ldan/ /gnas su gnas pas kun zos nas/ /go rim bzhin
du spyan drangs pa'i/ /dbyangs kyis tshig 'di brjod par bya/ /slob dpon ming ni che ge bdag /bcom ldan 'phags ma sgrol ma yi/ /dkyil
'khor dag ni bri bar 'tshal/ /bdag dang sems can kun gyis gang / /bdag mthar gdug pa'i sems med pa/ /bskyed cing bkur stir byed pa dang / /sangs rgyas
bstan la rab dang ba'i/ /sems can rnams la phyir zhing ni/ /mang du rab tu dad pa'i ched/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar bdag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum
brjod/ /de nas sems can de rnams ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon gyi/ /mtshan mo mthong ba sbyin par byed/ /de nas bris pa'am gzhan du song / /tho rangs rmi
lam rnam par spyad/ /sa yi phyogs der song nas ni/ /khru brgya yi ni tshad du yang / /kun nas gru bzhi pa ru bya/ /phyi rol dpag tu med pa yi/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi
tshad song nas/ /sA la shing dang phub ma dang / /thal ba sol ba so phag dang / /skra dang sen mo mchod sbyin gyi/ /so phag nag po la sogs gang / /gzhan yang
dkyil 'khor dge ba yi/ /mi dge'i zug rngu thams cad kun/ /lhag ma med par bsal nas ni/ /sa yi gong bu de nyid du/ /gzhan yang chu klung chen po yi/ /'gram
gnyis sa ni sbyang byas nas/ /rab tu bcug ste tho bas brdung / /tsan+dan chu yis yang dag gtor/ /de ltar byas nas ma ltung ba'i/ /ba byung tsan+dan chu bsres nas/ /khru brgyad pa yi
phyogs su ni/ /phyi rol gyis kyang khru bcu yis/ /ched du yongs su spyangs pa la/ /gso sbyong byin nas byug tu gzhug /ji srid sa yi phyogs der ni/ /shin tu 'jam zhing shin tu
ni/ /legs par rdzogs par skyes kyi bar/ /de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni/ /de nas khru bzhi'i tshad du ni/ /grwa bzhi seng ldeng phur bu brgyad/ /sor mo bcu gnyis tshad du bya//
gzhon nu mas bkal srad bu ni/ /tshon sna lnga pa legs 'jam pa/ /shin tu sra ba bcom ldan ma'i/ /rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun gyis/ /bsngags pas phur bu la dkris
nas/ /bdun byas srod la gdab par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/ /gtsang ma'i gos ni bgos pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa yi dbus de ru/ /rtsa ba nag po
med pa yi/ /bum blang dri yi chu dang ni/ /me tog sgron mas bkang ba la/ /mgrin par me tog phreng bar dkris/ /a mra'i yal 'dab kha dgab bya/ /pus mo dag ni nges btsugs
nas/ /rtsa ba'i rig pa bdun byas te/ /yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod/ /de nas phyogs bcur kun bltas nas/ /'di ni bsgrag bya che ge dag /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas mchod
pa'i phyir/ /sems can kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ /bsam byas dkyil 'khor bris pa 'dir/ /sangs rgyas phan par mdzad pa kun/ /dkyil 'khor
du ni byon par mdzod/ /da lta 'dir ni byon nas kyang / /bdag gi mchod yon bzhes su gsol/ /de dbus nyid du brtag bya ba/ /gnas su bris pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /spyan
drang bya zhing lha rnams kyi/ /gnas mdor bstan nas brjod par bya/ /dga' ldan du ni byang chub sems/ /'jig rten gzhan du gang gnas pa/ /de bzhin kha ba'i gnas su
dang / /gang ldan pad+ma'i dbang phyug 'byung / /lcang lo can du nor dbang phyug /ti se ru ni bde byed bshad/ /mchod yon snod ni bkang ba yis/ /de rnams gnas ni rnam
bsams bya/ /de nas zhal ni srub bsnyen bkur/ /dkyil 'khor las rnams thams cad la/ /ming dang gnas ni yongs nyams na/ /phyin ci log tu ldog par 'gyur//
de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni/ /nyin re nyin re tsan+dan gyi/ /chu yis byug tu gzhug par bya/ /mtshan mo'i thun la'ang de bzhin bya/ /phar 'dir yo byad thams cad ni/ /rnam
par 'byor par 'gyur ba yin/ /de la 'di ni brjod bya ste/ /dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa yi/ /phye ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin skyes/ /dzi pa'i me tog dang mtshungs pa'i/ /
phye mas dkyil 'khor kun tu bri/ /pad+ma rA ga ut+pa la/ /phye ma mtha' dag gis gdab bya/ /gur gum chu dang mtshungs pa dang / /puSh+pa rA ga yi dkyil 'khor/ /zar ma'i me tog
dang mtshungs shing / /de bzhin ma ra ka tas kyang / /de tsam kha dog rin chen ma/ /lcags kyang rung ste ming can lnga/ /yang na dris btags phye mas sam/ /ji ltar snyed pa
rnams sprul pas/ /rab bkug rin chen phye ma yis/ /yang dag pa yis dngos grub 'dod/ /nor bu mching bu mtshungs min gang / /pad+ma rA gas rnam pa kun/ /dkyil
'khor yo byad thams cad kyang / /slob dpon gyis ni gzhon nu ma'i/ /lag pas byed du gzhug par bya/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rigs skyes pa/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa
dang / /ma nor skyes pa rab mdzes pa/ /dbang po ma tshang ma yin pa/ /mdor na bud med mtshan nyid dang / /yang dag ldan par skyes pa yis/ /'di 'dra'i gzhon nu ma gcig
gnyis/ /gsum la gso sbyong sbyin nas ni/ /'o ma'i zas kyis mngon dga' bar/ /byas nas dkar po'i go bgos te/ /dkyil 'khor yo byad thams cad ni/ /byed
bzhug dkyil 'khor yo byad kun/ /legs bsags so sor brtags pa yis/ /chu dang rnam par dben pa dang / /dge slong 'dul ba byas pa dang / /yongs su sbyang ba
byas pa dang / /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa sngon 'gro bas/ /slob dpon rang gi lhag gnas ched/ /phye ma thams cad bdug pa dri/ /gtor ma dang ni mar rnams
ni/ /cho ga can gyis byed du gzhug /de nas slob dpon yo byad kun/ /tshogs nas dkyil 'khor rang nyid bri/ /slob ma yongs su gzung bar gyis/ /de rnams sangs rgyas chos
dang ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun la rab dang / /yan lag cha shas kun rdzogs pa/ bden par smra dang sbom pa min/ /mdzes pa mthong dang kha dog gtsigs/ /gzung bar mi
bya gcig gnyis gsum/ /bco brgyad dang ni gzhan bcu drug /de rnams skyabs gsum yongs su 'dzin/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / /'o ma'i ston mo bza' ba
dang / /'o ma'i shing las byung ba yi/ /so shing sor mo brgyad kyi tshad/ /bcom ldan rtsa ba'i snying po yis/ /lan ni nyi shu rtsa bdun du/ /mngon par sngags nas ba yi
gcin/ /rab sbyar mtshan mo'i thun mtshams su/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi phyi rol du/ /shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yis/ /khres la rim pas nyer 'dug nas/ /snying
bo re re lag par byin/ /rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun bzlas/ /gtsug tor bcing la'ang bdun bzlas bya/ /de nas so shing de rnams la/ /byin nas rang rang so shing bza'//
ral gcig ma yi snying po yis/ /lan bdun sngags pa'i dri yi chus/ /spyi bor mngon par gtor bar bya/ /de nas de rnams la brjod bya/ /bcom ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs//
dbang phyug mchog gi thugs rje can/ /chen po'i mchog ni sbyin pa po/ /bsgral dka' sgrol ba dran par gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma yang / /rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste//
sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /bskyed par byed ma dran par gyis/ /de yi 'og tu slob dpon gyis/ /slob ma de rnams kun la ni/ /'dod chags bral dang ldan pa'i
chos/ /brtan par byas nas de rnams mdun/ /shes rab pha rol phyin bklag bya/ /de lta bu yi cho ga yis/ /bud med rnams kyang yongs bzung bya/ /langs nas bu mos bkal ba
yis/ /srad bu tshon sna lnga pa ni/ /mi mnyam rgyud du bsgrim pa la/ /dri yi chu yis mngon bkrus nas/ /re rer pad+ma'i bgrang phreng gis/ /bsang gtor byas nas rtsa ba yi/ /snying po
lan grangs nyer gcig tu/ /mngon sngags de la 'dir brjod bya/ /dpal gyi gzhi ni yod pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhabs mtshan ma/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba
ste/ /pad+ma'i bgrang phreng de phyir sngags/ /de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis/ /slob ma rnams la cha phra mos/ /lag pa la ni bcing bar bya/ /slob ma rnams la gang kho na/ /de
nyid slob ma bdag nyid bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas pa/ /shar du mngon phyogs bla gos ni/ /phrag pa gcig tu byas nas ni/ /pus mo g.yas
pa'i lha nga ni/ /sa la rab tu btsugs byas te/ /rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba dang / /rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thams cad dang / /rang rgyal 'phags pa
nyan thos dang / /lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang / /lha mo'i dri dang me tog gi /phreng ba yongs su 'dzin pa yis/ /kun la gsol ba gdab par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon
bdag /che ge mo zhes bya ba yis/ /bcom ldan 'phags ma sgrol ma yi/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal lags na/ /de dag rang nyid byon par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das kun dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas/ /nyan thos lha klu gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha min nam mkha' lding / /mi'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /rang gi
rig pa sngags tshogs kyis/ /yongs bskor sems can thams cad la/ /rjes su brtse bas byon nas kyang / /bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzod/ /de ltar yang
gnyis yang gsum du/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/ /rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pa dang / /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la bltas nas/ /dbus su me tog phreng ba
dor/ /gal te me tog phreng g.yo byed/ /de nas byon par shes par bya/ /de nas sangs rgyas byang sems la/ /dri yi chu yis mchod yon dang / /me tog phul cig de nas ni/ /khru
brgya'i phyi rol sa gzhi la/ /yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ru/ /a pA marga'i yam shing gis/ /me ni rab tu sbar byas nas/ /shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yis/ /rtsa ba'i snying po
sbrang rtsi zho/ /mar gyi sreg blugs brgyad brgyar dbul/ /de nas sangs rgyas byang sems dang / /lha rnams la yang mchod yon dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi
ru/ /gso sbyong yongs su blangs pa yis/ /skyes bu srung ba'i phreng ba dang / /dbang po tshang ba bzhag par bya/ /de la 'dir ni brjod bya ste/ /gang zhig rnam pa gzhan bya ba/ /skyong
ba bral bar 'gyur ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor dam tshig brgyad rnams ni/ /yang dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir cho ga byas pa yis/ /slob mas dam tshig shes par
'gyur/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gang / /rab gnas slob mas thabs cig tu/ /song nas ku sha bting ba la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /tshogs
kun rjes su dran pa yis/ /g.yas pa'i gzhogs kyis nyal bar bya/ /de nas tho rangs slob dpon gyis/ /gtsang ma shar du kha phyogs pas/ /rmi lam rnam par dpyad
par bya/ /de la 'di ni brjod bya ste/ /gang zhig tsan+dan bil ba sogs/ /u du ma bA ra sogs n+ya gro d+ha/ /rgyal mtshan phreng bas khyab pa dang / /rmi lam
rab tu dad pa'ang rung / /kha cig me lce mdzes pa dang / /de ltar mthong ba de dngos grub/ /mchog gi bar du'o ngang pa dang / /kA ran+Da ba krung krung dang / /rma bya ro ha Na rnams
ni/ /gang zhig de lta bu mthong 'gyur/ /rmi lam bar ma'i dngos grub de/ /myur ba kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ma 'am ra ha Na yang rung / /de bzhin pi wang thogs pa
dang / /kuN+Da la sogs pa yang rung / /de bzhin a sogs d+hi mthong na/ /gang yang rmi lam mthong byed pa/ /mi rnams tha ma'i dngos grub de/ /sgrol ma'i rtog par nges
par bstan/ /gtum po khyi yi lag pa rnams/ /gang gis mthong bar gyur pa dang / /bong bu rnga mo shing rta sogs/ /mthong dang reg pa nyid sogs sam/ /rgya skyegs
til mar gyis reg pa/ /gang gis rmi lam du 'jug pa/ /de yi dngos grub nges par gnas/ /dam tshig tsam du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de lta bu sogs yon tan ldan/ /rmi
lam blo yis rnam dpyad nas/ /de ltar rab blo gang shes nas/ /slob ma de la rmi lam gyi/ /lung du yang ni bstan par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni/ /
gal te khyim gnas gyur pa'am/ /dge slong dge slong ma dang ni/ /dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma yang rung / /chen po de rnams gso sbyong ni/ /bzung ste phyi nas slob ma rnams/ /gso
sbyong yang dag gus par bya/ /slob ma rmi lam mi dge ba/ /bstan bya sngon du sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni/ /snga ma kho nar sa dang ni/ /ras ris mthar ni
a lA ya/ /zangs las 'byung ba rab zhugs te/ /yang dag 'jog par byed du gzhug /de nas dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la/ /tsan+dan chu yis legs par byug /slob ma thams
cad gnas gcig tu/ /snying po bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi yi gnas gcig tu/ /nyer 'dug dam tshig shes pa rnams/ /nang du rab tu gzhug par bya/ /de nas
nyi ma nub dus su/ /dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya/ /bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu ni/ /tshon sna lnga pa rtsa ba yi/ /snying po lan bdun sngags byas te/ /dbang ldan phyogs
nas brtsams nas ni/ /phur bu de rnams srad bus bcings/ /de dag thams cad khru yi tshad/ /gsum byas srad bus yongs dkri bya/ /phyi nas kun tu dung dang ni/ /rnga bo che
dang rdza rnga dang / /'khor rnga rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /'khar ba dang ni pheg rdob rnams/ /kun nas 'khrol bar byed du gzhug /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /phyi
rol du ni dgram par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i thig skud kyis/ /khru brgyar byas nas thig gdab bya/ /de lam dkyil
'khor gnyis pa ste/ /de nas kha dog thams cad pa/ /rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing nas ni/ /rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgyar bzlas/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni/ /sangs rgyas
byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa yi/ /nyan thos dge 'dun rnams la ni/ /phyag byas dkyil 'khor khor yug tu/ /rgyang grags lnga pa lhag gnas
che/ /ral pa gcig pa'i snying po yis/ /gdug pa'i sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems ni bcing bar bya ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor yang ni thams cad kyi/ /slob dpon gyi ni
yo byad rnams/ /ral gcig snying po nyid kyis ni/ /thog mar bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /byang shar phyogs nas brtsams byas te/ /tshangs pa'i thig ni gdab par bya/ /rtsa ba'i
rig pa zlos pa nyid/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhas pas bris/ /yongs su bcad cing lus dkar ba'i/ /slob de de bzhin gshegs rnams la/ /phyag rgya rin chen
phye mas so/ /pad+ma'i rigs la phyag byas te/ /phye ma ser pos bcom ldan ma/ /'phags ma sgrol ma phyag byas nas/ /ljang gu rnams kyis nyan thos kun/ /rang sangs rgyas
kun phyag byas nas/ /nag pos rdo rje'i rigs la'o/ /de ltar dang pos dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa'i snying por ro/ /phyi nas gnyis la khru gnyis kyi tshad du rab tu 'jug par
byed pa'o/ /gsum pa mtho gang ba de'i nyis 'gyur ro/ /de ltar thams cad du rim gyis bris nas nang gi dkyil 'khor du bri bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad der rang byon par mdzad du gsol/ 'bru thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang /
dri dang / me tog thams cad dang / tsan+dan gyi chus yongs su bkang ba/ mA Sha'i yal 'dab kyis kha bkang pa/ du ku la'i ras dkar pos mgrin pa bcings pa/ gser dang /
dngul las byung pa/ dkyil 'khor de'i yo byad thams cad ras ris gnyis pa'i mthar me tog gi phreng bas dkris nas rtsa ba'i rig pas bsngags pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i
bum pa zhes bya ba ste snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag par bya'o/ /de la 'di brjod par bya ste/ /dam tshig don dang bsod nams don/ /'dod don so sor dmigs
byed du/ /sdom pa gzung bar byas gyur nas/ /gang du gnas pa thams cad nas/ /dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bri bar bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub thugs rje che/ /sangs rgyas
byams pa spyan mar bcas/ /'di rnams ming ni kun drang nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal dkar mor grags//
de bzhin du ni khro gnyer can/ /khros ma zhes ni grags pa ste/ /'di rnams ming ni kun dran nas/ /spyan ras gzigs ni bri bar bya/ /rig pa mchog las slar 'jigs
byed/ /rdo rje ser skya rdo rje ni/ /drag por bzhed dang seng+ge dang / /de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur nyid/ /'di rnams ming ni kun nas ni/ /phyag na rdo rje kun tu bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
slob dpon gyis snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su phye ma dkar po dang / yungs kar dkar po bsres pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng+ge'i gdan la nye
bar bzhugs pa/ chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'od kun tu 'phro ba/ gtsug tor nas 'od zer 'byung bzhin pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam pa mchog
thams cad dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa dang por bris shig /bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi gzhogs gnyis su phye ma ser po dang / pad+ma ge sar
phan tshun bsres pas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnams kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs dang / cha byad dang /
dbyibs kyi rnam pa can/ rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa/ sa bon gyis gang ba dang / 'bras bu phyag na bsnams pa la/ 'di lta ste/ bcom
ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / kun nas 'bar ba'i gtsug tor dang / gdugs dkar po dang / gzi brjid phung po dang / nor bu'i phung po
dang / gser gyi phung po dang / rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang / kun nas phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phung po dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
kyi phung po dang / rtag pa'i phung po dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phung po dang / thams cad phung po dang / sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i phung po dang / 'jig rten gsum pa'i
phung po dang / mtha' yas phung po dang / bsod nams phung po dang / lha'i phung po zhes pa 'di rnams g.yas kyi gzhogs su nye bar bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yon du/ 'di lta ste/
bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / mngon par 'phags pa dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / mngon par mtho ba dang / sa'i 'dab ma dang / 'dab ma
brgya pa dang / 'dab ma stong pa dang / 'od zer dang / 'od zer chen po dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od zer dang / bkod pa'i 'od zer dang / dkar po'i 'od zer dang / pad+ma'i 'od
zer dang / bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang / bdud bzhi rnam par 'dul ba'i gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / bsam gyis
mi khyab pa'i gtsug tor zhes pa 'di rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa dang / lung bstan pa zhes gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'di rnams g.yon gyi steng du bri bar bya'o/ /
gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i nye logs su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad bri ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma spyan ma dang / mdzod spu dang / zla
ba dang / snying rje ma dang / byams pa ma dang / mi 'jigs ma dang / lung bstan ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la
gnas pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'khrugs pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun
tu snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye ba'i snying po zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rab
tu dang ba'i sku cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa la nges par rtog bzhin pa/ rang gi gzugs las rab tu snang ba'i sku bri'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i 'og tu de
bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen po khro bo'i gzugs can pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ rtse gsum dang / zhags pas
phyag brel pa/ cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la blta ba'o/ /gzhan du rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi nye logs su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen
mo brgyad la/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan gyi mi thub ma dang / phyi nas dge sbyong ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzes ma dang / sangs rgyas dkar mo dang /
de bzhin gshegs ma sems ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyus 'gugs ma zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sku'o/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa'o/ /'di rnams kyi steng du gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brgyad la/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i kun tu snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dus pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten zhes pa 'di rnams kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba/
pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi 'og tu
de bzhin gshegs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po kun nas 'od pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ phyag na pad+ma ste de rnams thams cad lha'i gzugs
g.yas pas sa bon gyis gang ba dang / phyag g.yon pas mchog sbyin pa/ rang gi cha byad kyis kun tu gnas par yang ngo / /gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i steng du rang sangs
rgyas brgyad ji ltar rig par bri bar bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das snyan grags zhes bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / steng gi drang srong dang / drang srong chen po dang /
lha'i drang srong dang / mA da ra dang / brtsegs pa dang / legs par brtsegs pa dang / brtsegs pa chen po zhes pa rang sangs rgyas brgyad po 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la
skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ bla gos ser po can no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og
tu yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon du snam sbyar ro/ /mdun gyi 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs
pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad pa la gnas pa'o/ /de'i yang nye logs su khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'i 'og tu pad+ma rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo bri bar bya'o/ /pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar
'dug pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ dar la dang / ras kyi smad g.yogs dang / stod g.yogs can/ thal mo sbyar ba byas pa/ cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs la lta bar
gyur pa/ bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o/ /de'i gong du pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba'i khro bo mdog dmar po/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar
'dug pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po de rnams thams cad kun nas 'bar ba chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil
'khor dang rnam par 'gyur pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ dar dang / ras kyi smad g.yogs can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus su bya'o/ /sgrol ma'i g.yon gyi
gzhogs su byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob sku mdog dkar po ral ba'i cod pan 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs
can/ dar la dang / ras kyi smad g.yogs dang / pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o/ /spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa 'gro ba zhes bya ba bri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/ cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang / pad+ma'i gdan
la nye bar 'dug pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i smad g.yogs dang / dar la'i stod g.yogs 'chang ba/ shin tu dang ba'i sku/ 'od zer 'bar
ba/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o/ /dri ma med pa 'gro ba'i steng gi g.yon du bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbyug pa dang /
ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang phreng dang / g.yang gzhi nag po can dang / rab tu dang ba'i sku 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu 'dod pa phun tshogs
byed pa pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ sku dkar po/ pad+ma'i sdong bus dkris pa'i lus can/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dang / g.yas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag tu
bkod pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin ras can/ phyag na rdo rje'i g.yas kyi snam bu gcig la rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bri bar bya'o//
'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog dang / nyal ba dang / legs par grub par byed pa dang / rdo rje sde dang / dpung bzang dang / ral pa gyen brdzes dang / rig pa bzang po
dang / legs 'grub dang / sde bzang dang / stobs po che dang / rnam par 'joms pa dang / ki lI ki la dang / mchog dang / legs 'dul dang / 'gro lding ba dang / sngon rabs
dang / rin chen ke lI dang / byis pa'i ke lI dang / legs par ke lI dang / legs par gang ba dang / gang ba chen po dang / lha mthar byed dang / rdo rje chen po dang / 'bar ba
zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams sngags kyi rgyal po chen po ste kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa/ ut+pa la ltar sngo bsangs/ bzhin cung zad
khro gnyer du byas pa/ phyag g.yon pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa'o/ /'di dag gi 'og tu rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta
ste/ bcom ldan 'das mA ma kI dang / rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang / rdo rje rgyal ma dang / rdo rje rnam par rgyal ma dang / dmar po ldan ma dang / grags

ldan ma dang / bi shi ni rdo rje spyan ma dang / rdo rje khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje khu tshur ma dang / rdo rje mi 'jigs ma dang / rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje sgra ldan ma dang / rdo rje dge legs
ma dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / rdo rje ma mo dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / rdo rje gnam lcags ma dang / dus kyi rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje gtsug
phud ma dang / rdo rje bka' bsgo chen mo dang / rdo rje 'od dang / rgyal ba ldan ma dang / rdo rje gzugs ldan ma dang / rdo rje spyan ma zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams rdo rje'i
rigs kyi rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa/ ut+pa la ltar sngo bsangs/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ cung zad bzhin khro gnyer dang
ldan par byas pa dang / dar dang / ras kyi sham thabs dang / dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/ g.yon pa rdo rje dang / g.yas pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ lhas bstod pa'i gzugs 'chang ba'o/ /de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/ rang gi gzugs dang /
cha byad dang / dbyibs bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba/
ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med dbus su bzhugs pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ dar la dang / ras kyi sham thabs can/ rgyan thams cad kyis
rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i phyag rgya/ g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par byed pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan
par byas pa'i lus can/ cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma'i kha
dog can/ pad+ma'i gdan la rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ dar dang / ras kyi sham thabs can/ stod g.yogs dmar po mnabs pa/
phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ phyag g.yon pas rnga yab kyis brel ba/ 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i spyan cung zad de bzhin gshegs
pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma chen po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs ma/ kun nas 'bar
ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ cung zad 'dzum bzhin pa/ dar dang / ras kyi sham thabs can/ stod g.yogs dmar
po mnabs pa/ phyag g.yon pas ut+pa la yongs su bzung nas g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ lus cung zad 'dud pa/ lang tsho
dang po can/ ha cang mi sbom/ ha cang mi phra ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma bri bar bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi g.yas su phreng gcig
la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bco brgyad la/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag mtha' yas pa dang / phyag stong pa dang / phyag brgya pa dang / phyag bcu gnyis pa
dang / phyag drug pa dang / phyag bzhi pa dang / zhabs stong pa dang / zhabs brgya pa dang / zhabs bcu gnyis pa dang / zhabs drug pa dang / zhabs bzhi pa dang / rta mgrin
dang / don yod zhags pa dang / 'od zer stong gis rnam par snang ba dang / mgrin pa dkar pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / mtha' yas rnam rgyal
dang / rnam rgyal chen po dang / lha'i mtha' dang / mtha' dpag tu med pa dang / yid kyi shing rta dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di rnams
pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtso bo srid par 'jug pa nye bar spyod par byed pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i lus kyis nye bar bskor ba'i lus phyag na pad+ma
dang / g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ cung zad sgrol ma la lta bar gyur pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nye logs su gos dkar mo pad+ma'i gdan la nye
bar 'dug pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/ phyag na pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa dang / g.yas pas bgrang
phreng bsnams pa'o/ /de'ang g.yas su phreng cig la brten pa'i pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi gtso mo bcu bzhi bri bar bya ba la/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can dang /
dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo dang / dpal mdun ma dang / pad+ma go bo rig dang / grags ldan ma dang / sangs rgyas dpa' ba'i zla ba ma dang / longs spyod ldan ma dang / bde
ldan ma dang / grags pa ldan ma dang / shes rab gos can ma dang / stobs gcig ma dang / stobs mang po dang / stobs bcu ma dang / sangs rgyas kyi yum dang / byang chub
kyi yan lag gi yu ma zhes pa 'di rnams rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par
brgyan pa/ lha'i bud med kyi cha byad 'chang ba/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o/ /pad+ma bsnams shing g.yas pas mchog sbyin
pa/ rang gi gzugs su bri bar bya'o/ /sgrol ma'i 'og tu ci bgyi zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las 'phags ma sgrol ma'i khro bo chen po zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa pad+ma'i
gdan la gnas pa/ lus brtan pa/ nag po mthar byed pa'i gzugs can/ khro gnyer du byas pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhal gcig gis drag
tu bzhad pas gdangs bzhin pa/ gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bzhin pa/ dang pos sgrol ma lta ba'o/ /phyag dang pos rin po che mthong ba 'byin par byed bzhin
pa/ g.yon dang pos zhags pa bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o/ /de'i 'ang g.yas su khro bo chen po sgrol mas non pa zhes
bya ba lha chen po la nye bar 'dug pa/ pad+ma'i chu bas dkris pa'i lus can/ ut+pa la ltar sngo bsangs/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par
byed bzhin pa bri bar bya'o/ /'jug pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i cho ga thams cad sngar brjod pa kho na'o/ /ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho
ga'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rang gi snying po sbyin par bgyi'o/ /gang gis brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting
nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /legs so/ /khyod kyis smros shig /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rang gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas 'di las dkyil 'khor che/ /dam pa yang dag rab 'chad byed/ /
dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam pa ru/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri/ /de yi dbus su srad bu mnyam/ /gru bzhi yongs su bskor bar bya/ /gnyis par 'joms pa po song ste//
dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul gyis ni/ /ri mo bzhi po rnams kyang ngo / /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /pad+ma yi ge ze'u 'bru la/ /'jig rten mgon
po dgod par bya/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i phreng ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan kun tu bri/ /de ru slob dpon rab bzhugs nas/ /pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya mchog /dkyil
'khor gnas la nyer 'dug pas/ /mnyam par gzhag pas mnyam par dgod/ /ji ltar chu la pad+ma gang / /gnas kyi nyes pa mang pos kyang / /gos par mi 'gyur de bzhin
'dir/ /'gro la chags pas yang dag byed/ /lan gcig 'di gsungs dper brjod nas/ /de nas lcags kyu mchog dag gis/ /yang dag bkug
nas pad+ma che/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang grol bar 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i lcags kyu chen po'o/ /oM mahA pad+mo hUM dza hrI/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug 'ongs nas slob dpon la mthong ba sbyin par byed do/ /yang na 'od zer gtong bar byed do/ /de nas 'di nyid kyi phyag rgyas slob ma rab tu gzhug par
bya ste/ dar dkar pos gos dkar po dang / gtsug tor dkar pos mgo bo dkri bar bya'o/ /'di nyid 'jig rten du rab tu brjod nas de nas smros shig ces so/ /de nas pad+ma lag
pa g.yon du byin nas g.yas pas chu snod byin te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad pad+ma che/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug /de nyid lhan cig brtag par bya zhes so/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang / ting nge 'dzin yang bslab par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma
zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o/ /de nas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris nas dbus kyi ze 'bru la nye bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgya bzlas
par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa de la kun tu gzigs par byed pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid thob
par byed do/ /zhes pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste de bzhin kho nar dkyil 'khor brtag par byas nas dbus su pad+ma stong dgod du gzhug
go /de nas pad+ma stong po de bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya ste lan re lan re yongs su bzlas nas so/ /de nas slob ma rab tu bcug nas dam tshig brjod par bya'o/ /bu dang
slob ma'i ched du yang / /dam tshig nyams par mi bya ste/ /dam tshig bdag la brjod par bya/ /gang phyir pad+ma'i rnam pa las/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad dag /
dam tshig gi ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mchod/ /lus kyis spyan ras
gzigs mgon la/ /dag gis phyag na rdo rje la/ /las las nam mkha'i snying por skyes/ /ji ltar sgrub thabs cho gar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug ri rab lhun po'i ri'i rtse mor 'khod pa rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis kun tu gnas pa'i sku thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgyad do zhes so/ /
de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun tu bzlas bas ji srid 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams 'phros nas sgrub pa po'i pad+ma'i dbus su 'khod de slar yang de
nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzhan 'byung ste sgrub pa po la mngon par dbang bskur ba gnas shing brtan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bdag gi dngos po thams cad spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug dang mtshungs pa skad cig de la bde ba dang ldan pa dang / ji srid du 'phur bar byed do/ /sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing tshe dpag tu med par
'gyur ro zhes so/ /de nas sgrub pa gzhan dang / las chen po thams cad 'byung ste 'bum bzlas pas las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /'bum
phrag gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad lhag ma med par zad par 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas bsod nams thams
cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni 'bum phrag sum
cu rtsa lnga bzlas pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po ni mchod rten stong phrag brgya byas nas mthar cho gas mtshan thog thag tu
bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas snying gar rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' so sor rnyed do/ /de nas zhal
du rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug so sor rnyed do/ /ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad du 'gyur ro/ /thog mar brjod pas gzhan gyi
grong dang / grong khyer srung ba dang / mdzes par spyan drangs pas thams cad bya'o/ /'bebs pa la tsan+dan gyi bdug pas gdon 'bebs so/ /shi rIShA'i me tog gis sems
can dbang du byed do/ /dri bzang po'i me tog gis sems can thams cad rengs par byed do/ /sa dkar pos bud med do/ /dri zhim po'i me tog gis chom rkun rengs pa'o/ /
yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg gis ri dwags dang / bya rengs so/ /yungs kar dkar po gtor bas mig 'phrul ston par byed do/ /rma bya'i nu mas rmi lam ston par byed
do/ /dus gsum du bzlas pas rmi lam ngan pa 'joms par byed do/ /til gyi sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad rengs par byed do/ /bya gag gi gshog pa'i sbyin
sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed do/ /rgyal po 'khyil ba'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis 'dod pa thams cad dbang du byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas mtshan mo brgyad smyung bar gnas pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i
btsun mo'i mchog dbang du byed pa la bud med kyi dbang po'i spu'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /bu mo dbang du byed pa la'ang ngo / /don gzhan la'ang sbyin sreg dang bcas pas spyan
ras gzigs dbang gi mdun du nyi ma re rer dus gsum du bzlas pa bya'o/ /ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi ma las/ chen po thams cad kyi rgyu 'phrul lo// //
de nas sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin de nyid sgom bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i mnyam par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so/ /
khru lnga pa dang sgo bzhi dang / /sgo khyud rta babs nges gnas pa/ /phyi rol pad+ma'i rnam par bya/ /de nas kun nas grwa rnams su'ang / /de ni legs par bsams byas nas/ /
nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /sngar brjod snying po 'di yis ni/ /zlos bzhin 'di ni bsrung ba dang / /dkar po dmar po ser po dang / /nag po ljang gu'i tshon sna
lnga'i/ /phye ma 'jam po rnams kyis ni/ /sgrol ma'i rig pas mngon sngags pas/ /bsgrub bya bcom ldan 'das ni bya/ /khro bo'i rgyal po mdun du ste/ /g.yon du ral pa
gcig ma bya/ /g.yas su 'dam skyes phyi rol gyi/ /sgo khyud snying por ji rigs grub/ /yongs su 'dod pas rdo rigs bya/ /dri yi phye mas yongs su bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur stobs
po che/ /gang du 'jig rten gsum cho ga /rdo rje 'chang chen 'dod pa yis/ /'das pas rnam par thim par 'gyur/ /khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur bcas/ /de ni g.yas kyi sgo khang
du/ /stobs po che ni rab bzhag nas/ /nya yis mgrin par stobs po che/ /nub phyogs su ni bya ba'o/ /g.yas kyi phyi yi sgo khang du/ /de bzhin dbang phyug chen po bya/ /de la
mdung gi phyag rgya dgod/ /ji 'dra'i u ma bri bar bya/ /lho yi grwa gnyis su bya ba/ /phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o/ /nub dang byang gi grwa rnams su/ /log 'dren phyag rgya rdo rje
'o/ /byang gi grwa gnyis rnams su ni/ /mkhas pas rigs kyi phyag rgya bya/ /shar gyi grwa gcig rnams su ni/ /ma mo tshogs kyi phyag rgya dgod/ /b+h+r-ing gi ri Ta log 'dren
bcas/ /de nas ji ltar 'byor pa yi/ /cho gas ji bzhin lha rnams mchod/ /khro bo stobs chen sgrol mas non/ /bzlas pas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya/ /ka ra bI ra ta
la ni/ /blangs nas rang gnas smyung gnas pas/ /mkhas pas byang gi sgo khang du/ /gtsang ma gang du rab 'jug bya/ /blo dang ldan pas spyan drang bya/ /
khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad nas/ /ji ltar rig pa'i cho ga yis/ /tshar bcad rjes su 'dzin pa'i mchog /gdon dang lus kyi las rnams ni/ /de nyid du ni nges par bya/ /
tshar bcad dam tshig bde ba 'dri/ /gdon 'pho byed dang za byed dang / /gang zhig la la gsod pa dang / /de bzhin sgrib pa sbyang ba dang / /sems can rnams ni thams cad
nyid/ /sgrub thabs bya dang 'khrul 'khor ni/ /ji 'dra ba yi bya ba dang / /mkhas pas las ni stong dag dang / /gdon rnams bod par byed pa dang / /rang gi rigs
dang gzhan rigs kyi/ /phyag rgya nye bar mtshon par bya/ /'di yi dkyil 'khor thams cad nas/ /'byung po'i tshogs la sogs pa kun/ /de nas gtor ma bdug
pa sogs/ /rgyas pas mngon par mchod byar gyis/ /de yis gdon mthong de mchod bya/ /phyis kyi dbang las dul ba thob/ /skye bos btung ba sbyin sreg la/ /sogs
pa rnam par gzhom par bya/ /shi Sha lAn tsa na blangs nas/ /gdon thob pa ni 'pho bar bya/ /srin po rnams kyis byin pa'i mchu/ /mthong ba de 'dra'i mtshon rnams
dang / /sha za rnams la ri bong can/ /mig mi 'dzums par 'dzag pa yi/ /'jigs pa mthong na sna tshogs pa/ /kun tu rnam par lta bar byed/ /skem byed gdon gyi rnam 'gyur
gang / /nus dang dpung pa brten pa yi/ /dgra bo rnams ni thams cad du/ /lha dang mtshon cha'i bya ba ni/ /pad+ma byed dang ral pa dang / /dbyug gu bgrang phreng 'jigs pa'i
gnas/ /ril ba spyi blugs mi thub nyid/ /phyag rgya bram ze can zhes bshad/ /rtse gsum kun dang zla phyed dang / /ral pa mig la sogs pa dang / /khyu mchog sgra dang drag po
dang / /dbang ldan rnams te bdun du grags/ /shak+ti gdengs ka ba dan dang / /khyim bya de bzhin rma bya'i mjug/ phyag rgya gzhon nu ma can bshad/ /'khor lo dung dang be
con nyid/ /ral gri phub nyid nam mkha' lding / /mgo nyid phyag rgya khyab 'jug bshad/ /che ba sprin ni lha chen po'i/ /bum pa gtun shing de bzhin du/ /ngang pa'ang g.yon
gzhogs phyag rgya ste/ /phyag rgya la hi ri kar bshad/ /nam gru rnams dang gtor zan dang / /rgan po gtum po mthong ba ni/ /nam gru dkar po rnams kyi rgya/ /rang gi gzugs
nyid mthong ba ni/ /mdangs 'phrog rnams kyi'o lhung bzed dam/ /'degs par byed pa grol ba'o/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste byed pa
thams cad dge ba la shing gcig gam ni dur khrod gam/ khang stong gtsang ma tshwa sgo med pa'i sa gzhi mthong nas sgrub pa po khros pas sa la ma
lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te re kha gsum der bya'o/ /kun nas khru bzhi pa la dang por thal ba'i re kha'o/ /gnyis pa ri'i btsag gis so/ /
gsum pa sol ba'i phye mas rab tu 'bad pas bri bar bya'o/ /byang ngam/ nub tu'ang sgo gcig byed du gzhug go/ /sgo'i dbus su'ang lha chen po lag na mdud thogs pa
bya'o/ /snam bu'i nang du sangs rgyas bden par rmad du byung ba'i bdag nyid can bya'o/ /sangs rgyas g.yas kyi gzhogs su sgrol mas non pa rnam par dgod par bya'o/ /
g.yon du dpa' mo chen mo stobs mo che ma ral pa gcig ma bzhag nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku rgyab tu dgod par bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / de bzhin
du 'jog po dang / dpa' bo chen po stobs kyi rgyu'ang dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin du pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / dung skyong dang / rigs ldan stobs po che'i nang du
mngon par brjod pa'o/ /lha de rnams ni 'khor dang bcas pa snam bu gang bar dgod par bya'o/ /'di thams cad nas ma mo'i tshogs rnam par med par bya ste dpal
ldan ma ni snam bu'o/ /sgo ru spre'u dang / ra dang / bum rnam yang sgo'i spyan pa ra ba yi yang ngo / /nag po'i brgyad pa la lha rnams lto 'phye chen po las ma 'das pa yang dag
par mchod de stong phrag bzlas par bya'o/ /shes rab can sngags kyi rgyal po grub par 'gyur ro/ /rims dang / gdon thams cad las 'byin pa dang / rtsod pa'ang rnam
par 'joms par byed do/ /rang gnas su 'jug go/ de nas gsang sngags 'di'ang rtag tu bzlas pa'i gu gul gyi chu 'am/ ku shas gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / zhi ba
can dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon par mdzes pa can nyid spyad pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rab tu byas par grub ste thams cad 'joms pa sgrol mas non pa gang yin
pa don gsang ba'i sgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gis mngon par shes pa ste de bzhin
gshegs pa rin chen tog la mngon sum du thos pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ral pa gyen
brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar sems can gyi don gyi phyir dang / sgrol ma'i mthu bstan pa'i phyir dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i snying rje bdag gis bshad
par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa smros shig/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ mahA pu ru Sha ri Sha b+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra mahA
s+thA ma prAp+ta mai tri ya many+dzu shrI badzra pA Ni pra b+h+r-i ti b+h+yo mahA sa twe b+h+yaH/ de rnams la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi snying po
'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa srid pa'i lam rnam par 'joms par byed pa brjod par bgyi'o/ /sat+ya the daM/ he
bo d+hi satwA/ mahA satwa/ he ha le/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ pa ra ma me tri tsit+ta hi ta tsit+ta kA ru Ni kA mAM/ ga ma bi ya ti/ mahA bi ya ti/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ru tsa len+t+ra/ ba la
nam ste stu/ sarba satwa/ b+hA ya pra ta/ ha ri ha ri ha ri bA hano r+b+ba pa/ b+ha bAn kha/ tu ru tu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ su ru su ru/ su pra shA si/ pA ma la mUrti/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki
te shwa rA ya/ kr-iSh+NA dzi na/ dza TA mu ku TA ba la mu trA la ma la/ ba la ma la ma la/ ka la ka la/ na la/ ha la ha la/ hu lu hu lu/ he bo d+hi satwA/ pri ya bo d+hi satwA/ mahA bo
d+hi satwA/ na ma te ru/ ku ru ku ru/ hr-i da yaM/ ma nu sma ra/ i daM tsa me/ kAr+yaM ku ru swAhA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ste/ nyi ma so sor tho rangs langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor byas te dri dang / me tog la sogs pa mngon
par bkram nas de nas lan bcu gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do/ /zla ba drug kho nar byas pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yid kyi shing
rta yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ gal te mtshams med pa byas pas kyang
ma grub pa na de'i tshe nga mtshams med pa byas pa dang / bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su skyes pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i
rtog pa chen po'i rgyud phyi mar 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rig pa/ sring mo bzhi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par
gzigs par gyur pa/ rtog pa bzhir skyes pa/ thung ngu'i gzugs can/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ sa 'og dang / mi snang ba dang / ro langs dang /
'thab rtsod dang / rkang pas rab tu bgrod pa dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon spyod can dang / dbang du byed pa dang / skal pa bzang po nyid rab tu sbyin pa po tshangs pa dang /
khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa las bzlog pa/ rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid can gyis lhag pa'i cha khyim du skyes pa kun tu
ston par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mkhyen pa'i mthu'i don gyis ched stong phrag pas kyang stong phrag brgya po des kyang lan gcig gzhom pa
tsam dang / dpe tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i yul 'jig rten du ma'i 'byung gnas rang bzhin du gnas pa la ltos nas ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar bcom ldan
'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su sgrub pa 'di rnams gsungs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid dbang du gyur pa dngos grub rab tu stsol bar mdzad par gyur to/ /
tad+ya thA/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ oM dza ye swAhA/ rgyal ma zhes bya ba'o/ /tad+ya thA/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a
ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ oM bi dza ya swAhA/ rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'o/ /tad+ya thA/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ oM a dzi te swAhA/ mi thub ma zhes
bya ba'o/ /na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ oM a pa ra dzi te swAhA/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'o zhes pa de lta bu sring mo bzhi'o/ /lnga pa ming po ni/
na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a ha te/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ oM ki ni ki ni sarba ta thA ga tA ut+b+ha pa shAn+te/ ba ra de/ ut+ta ma ta thA ga tA ut+b+ha ba hUM phaT swAhA/
ming po gtum bu ru zhes pa'o/ /sngags kyi rgyal po yongs su bsgrags/ /mdor na nga rgyal can rlom pa/ /phyi ma'i rgyud kyi las rnams ni/ /ji lta ji ltar rab sbyar ba/ /de
lta de ltar sgrub par byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rang gi rdzu 'phrul yang dag par bstan par 'dod pas/ stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das
shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te rang gi rdo rje yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin de las
bzhengs te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa'/ bdag kyang rtog pa'i rgyal po rgyud phyi ma 'dir
bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mthu kun tu bstan pa'i don du 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod rten rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa sbyin par bgyi'o/ /de la rjes su yi rang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe mchog gi grub pa dang /
mchog gi las byed pa tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams kyang khyad par du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa pos gang rtul ba las byung ba 'di
rnams rigs dang / pha rol gnon par byed pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems
dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /phyag na rdo rje/ gsungs shig de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /phyag na rdo rje snyoms
par zhugs pa de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byas so/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes phyag gi sor mo rab tu brkyang ste rdo rje
rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje dmar po dang / rdo rje mthar phyin dang / rdo rje nag po ste g.yon pa'i phyogs las byung ba 'di rnams bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu'i spun rnams so/ /de nas de rnams bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la'ang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu'i spun lnga po rnams la legs so zhes bka' stsal te sems can rnams kyi bsod nams 'byung bar
'gyur ba dang / dngos grub sbyin par byed pa sgrol ma'i rtog par don chen po sbyin pa phyag na rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba pad+ma'i phyag la mnga' bdag tu gyur pa'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo
rjes dkyil 'khor gsungs par gyur to/ /gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga dang ni/ /ji srid khru ni brgyad kyi bar/ /nor 'dod pa yis khru gcig ste/ /bu 'dod pa yis khru gnyis
so/ /dgra nyams byed pas khru gsum mo/ /bzlas pa nyid kyis khru bzhi'o/ /lnga pa dngos grub thams cad la/ /brgyad pa mkha' la 'gro ba yis/ /sa 'og don dang 'bab chu dang / /
rgya mtsho dang ni dngos grub gnas/ /khyim du'ang rung ste gtsang ma yi/ /gzhan du g.yogs par byas pa dang / /las la shis pa gang rung gis/ /thig gis dkyil 'khor thig
gdab bya/ /gru bzhi pa la grwa bzhi pa/ /sgo bzhi rta babs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor che gsum byas pa yis/ /steng gi cha ru bcom ldan 'das/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma'i
gdan gnas pa/ /chos ston par ni mdzad bzhin pa/ /g.yas su spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /tshangs pa'i dbyug pa spyi blugs phyag/ g.yon du
'phags pa phyag rdo rje/ /rdo rje'i phyag gam de gzhogs su/ /khyab 'jug dung dang 'khor lo ste/ /be con phyag na 'khor lo'o/ /dbus kyi cha ru gru la zhon/ /gru yi srog shing
sgreng ba'o/ /dang por rdo rje rab 'joms dang / /sgyu 'phrul dang ni tum bu ru/ /gnyis par rdo rje khu tshur dang / /rgyal mar bcas pa'o gsum pa ru/ /lus dmar dang ni
rnam rgyal bcas/ /bzhi par rdo rje bsags mtha' dang / /mi thub mar bcas lnga pa ru/ /lto nag gzhan mi thub dang bcas/ /ljang gu dkar po dmar po dang / /ser po
nag po go rims bzhin/ /lha rnams dgod par byas nas ni/ /dkar po'i gos dang dkar po'i rgyan/ /be con rdo rje gtun shing dang / /gzhu dang ral gri mtshon cha'i
phyag/ dbus su zla nyi pad+ma la/ /lha rnams mngon sum dgod par bya/ /gru yi 'og tu me dang ni/ /chu yi gter ni gnas par bya/ /dung dang nya dang chu srin gyis/ /rnam par
brgyan pa'i shar dang lho/ /nub dang byang du dbang po dang / /gshin rje chu lha lus ngan rnams/ /bzhon pa bcas shing phyag rgyar bcas/ /legs par dkris pa'i bum pa ni/ /
dri yi chu yis yongs su bkang / /yal 'dab kyis ni nye bar mdzes/ /grwa rnams su ni dgod par bya/ /'dir ni bum pa lnga pa ni/ /rin chen gyis brgyan 'jam pa yi/ /gos kyis
mgrin pa dkris pa dang / /sa ha ka ra'i yal 'dab kyis/ /kha ni dgab par byas pa dang / /gdugs sgreng me tog phreng ba dbyangs/ /shar gyi sgo ru dgod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor
phyi ru rgya mtsho bzhi/ /dung dang pad+ma la sogs kyis/ /ri yi rtse mo yis kyang bya/ /rgyal mtshan rnams 'khrugs bla re bres/ /in+d+ra nI la gser dang ni/ /dngul dang zangs dang
lcags rnams kyi/ /phye mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /lha yi me tog bdug pas bdug /rnam pa sna tshogs gtor mas mchod/ /dus kyis non pa'i me tog 'bras/ /dbyig
gser sna tshogs rin chen dang / /bza' ba phyi rol gcal du dgram/ /ri bo'i steng du rab 'jug bya/ /snying po phye mas spyan drang sogs/ /las rnams kun dang gshegs su
gsol/ /de nas gang gis dkon mchog gsum/ /dad pas byang chub sems bskyed de/ /bud med skyes ba gzhon nu yi/ /bsnyen gnas byas pa gos kyis ni/ /gdong ni nye
bar bcings pa yis/ /dam tshig gis kyang mnyan par gyis/ /dbyig dang gser gyi me tog gis/ /lag pa yis kyang dor bar bya/ /de ni gang du lhung gyur pa/ /de yi rigs
'gyur de nas ni/ /gdong phye lha rnams bstan par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyang 'gyur/ /yang na nyin dang mtshan mo ru/ /dkyil 'khor de bri
mnyes par 'gyur/ /de nas gzugs brnyan 'byung ste a shwat+tha dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / u dum bA ra zhi ba can dang / /tsU ta dang / tsam pa ka dang / na ga ge sar gyis rgyas pa can
dang / bil ba dang / a riSh+Ta dang / ko Tha yis mngon spyod can no/ /dbang du byed pa dang / skal ba ngan pa rnams la bad kan mthar byed dang / sha sma li dang / dI r+g+ha bit+ta'o/ /
smyo bar byed pa la tsan+dan dang / mya ngan med pa'i shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / myos byed rnams so/ /skal pa bzang po nyid la a s+thi dat+ta las byung ba rnams so/ /las thams
cad pa la gser las byung ba'o/ /rgyal srid 'dod pas ni dngul las byung ba'o/ /zangs ni skal ba bzang po'i ched du'o/ /lcags las byung ba ni mngon spyod can no/ /nyams
par byed pa la tsam pa ka dang / nA ga ge sar dang / ba gu la dang / a ti muk+ta ka'o/ /nor 'dod pa yis ni sna ma dang / yu thi ka dang / mal+li ka dang / myos byed dang / gser
shing dang / mA li ka rnams so/ /skal ba bzang po 'dod pas ni pad+ma dang / ku mu da'o/ /zhi ba can la ut+pal dang / so'u gan+d+he ka'o/ /rgyas pa can dang / gzhan la yang dri
bzang po can gyi me tog go/ /rgyas pa can gang la dris dman pa'i me tog go/ /mngon spyod can dang / nyams par byed pa la sogs pa la ni tsan+dan la sogs pa'i dri 'phrog pa'o/ /zhi
ba can dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / skal ba bzang po nyid la de lta bu'i bdug pa lag pa sbyar nas snying po'i sngags 'di rnams kyi las bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na

ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma sh+tsa tur+NAM b+ha gi nI nAM/ na mo de ba tum bu ru sAr+tha kA ha ya/ dzam b+ha ni/ dzam b+hi ka ro ti a mi traM/ s+t+waM b+ha ni/ stam bi ka ro t+ya/ mi traM/

mo ha ni/ mo hI ka ro t+ya mi traM/ an d+ha ni/ in+d+hi ka ro t+ya mi traM/ dza ye A gats+tsha bi dza ya A gats+tsha dzam b+ha ni a gats+tsha stam b+ha ni A gats+tsha/ ba li ba li/ puSh+pa/ d+hU pa/ u pa hA raM/ pra
ti gr-ih+Na thA/ sa mA ya yu pA lA yA thA/ su Tu Tu su sla badzra b+hany+dza nI ya swAhA/ rig pa 'di ni stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / phug
tu rab tu 'jug pa dang / gter 'pho bar byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa nyid dang / mig sman ldong ros sgrub pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / nyams par byed pa dang / gzhan
rab tu 'dzoms pa dang / rang gi yul so sor skyong ba dang / dug dang / pho nya dang / nad 'go ba dang / mche ba rab bsnams la yang dag par gnas pa dang / sems can
thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / khros pas rgyal po'i khab rab tu sgrub pa ste de lta bu la sogs pa'i las gzhan rnams kyang rang gi 'dod pas
bsgrub par bya'o/ /sring mo bzhi'i snying po rdzogs so// //de nas slar yang dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/ khru bzhi pa gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa kun nas rta babs kyis
brgyan pa/ gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan rnams bzhen pa dang bcas mtshon cha dang bcas pa'i sgo skyong dang gsum byed du gzhug go/ /byang gi rab tu thob par bya ste cha
gsum byas nas steng gi cha ru bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'o/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'ang phyag g.yon pas rdo rje dang / g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ kun nas 'bar ba bri
bar bya'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i g.yon du rdo rje lcags kyu lcags kyu lag na thogs pa/ gzhan du rdo rje lcags sgrog lcags sgrog lag na thogs pa/ thams cad kyang ri'i rtse mo la
yang dag par gnas par bya'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs la brten pa'i lha chen po chung ma dang bcas pa/ khyu mchog dang bcas pa yang dag par bri'o/ /gzhan rnam pa gsum
rim gyis mtshon cha dang / gnas dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /b+h+ring gi ri ti dang / nag po chen po rnams so/ /nub tu mi sbyin dang / tum bu ru dang / 'od srung dang
sna tshogs bshes gnyen lag pa rnams ril ba spyi blugs dang / chu snod phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /khron pa dang / srog shing sgreng ba dang / ta ta spu bri'o/ /stod g.yogs ljang gu can lag na
be con thogs pa cod pan gyis brgyan pa phyag na tog skyong bsnams pa/ rna ba la rgya skyegs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /rgyal ba dkar po phyag na rdo rje thogs pa stod g.yogs dang / smad g.yog
can no/ /rnam par rgyal ba lus dmar po phyag na gtun shing thogs pa/ gos dmar po'i stod g.yogs can/ gser gyi kha dog can gyi gzhu phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /gzhan gyis
mi thub pa nag mo gos khra bo'i stod g.yogs can/ gos nag po'i sham thabs can/ phyag na ral gri thogs pa gru la zhon pa'o/ /de nas zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / lha rnams dang /
nang du pad+ma rab tu gtor ba bri bar bya'o/ /byang gi sgo ru log 'dren chen po g.yas kyi gzhogs su chu bo rab med khor yug tu rdo rje dang / dung dang / la da dang / dpal be'u rnams
kyang kun tu bri'o/ /de ltar thams cad yang dag par bris te de nas ji ltar 'byor ba'i gtor ma dang / thug pa rnam pa lnga dang / bza' ba rnam pa lnga dang / k+tany+tsa mang po dang / bza'
dkris pa'i bag zan dang / dzam+bu li ka dang / zho dang / bu ram dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi ji ltar rigs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /chu'i bum pa bzhi ji ltar 'dod pa'i yal 'dab kyis
kha bkab pa dang / bum pa dri'i chu thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba sa bon thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang / yal 'dab dang / gos kyis
mgrin pa dkris pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che rnams dang / yal 'dab kyis brgyan pa'i bum pa rnam pa lnga lnga rnams dang / phyi ru rin po che rnams kyis mngon
par bkram pa'o/ /de lta bu la sogs pa'i bkra shis pa rnams byas nas phyi nas bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas sngon du slob ma rab tu gzhug par bya ste/ 'di las gzhan pa'i

sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsa N+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma sh+tsa tur+b+ha gi nI nAM ma ma dza yA ya/ mA he ti swAhA/ sngags 'di rnam pa brgyad
kyis sems can thams cad dbang du byed do/ /me tog dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa dang / chu dang / thal bas dri med nyid sun 'byin pa'i cha byad kyis kyang ngo / /na mo rat+na
tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsan+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa tA ye/ na mo bi dza yA ya/ ha ha/ d+ha li/ ku mA ra ni biSh+nu mu khe ra Te sha swAhA/ rig pa 'di 'bum bzlas pas sngon du
bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas brgya byin gyi gnam lcags phog pa'i shing blangs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas par gyur nas gang du mchod rten ring
ba srel dang bcas pa der song nas bum pa bzhi po thams cad kyang me tog dang / yal 'dab kyis kha brgyan pa bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas ku sha bting zhing bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor
lcags gsum bcings pa'i phur bu'am/ rkang pa g.yon pa lag pa g.yon pas mnan te ji srid du sngags mi snang bar gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /lag pa gtang bar yang
mi bya'o/ /de nas phur bu de dgon par gdab par bya ste phur bu khyim du 'byung ngo / /cho ga 'di nyid kyis btab nas phur bu rkang pa g.yon pas yang dag par mnan nas dbang du gyis
shig /grong khyer 'jig pa'i lag pa btsir bas phyag rgya thams cad dang / dug byas pa rnams kyang 'joms par byed do/ /skye bo'i nang du'ang gdab par bya ste thams cad du 'gyur

ro/ /gzhan la'ang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las rnams byed do/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se na pa tA ye/ na mash+tsa ta sr-i NAM/ b+ha gi nI nAM/ na mastum
bu ru sarba ba ha s+ya/ mahA kar+Na s+ya/ pi tsi ba tsi/ a mu kA ya/ b+harga pra pa tAn+tu swAhA/ nag po'i brgyad pa'am/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas
sngags 'di thod par khrag gis bri bar bya'o/ /stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags par byas nas chu la dor bar bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na
tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa tA ye/ na mash+tsa ti sr-i NAM b+ha gi nAM nAM/ na mo dzam+b+ha ni tsA Tu tsA Tu tsa Tu swAhA/ rig pa 'dis rgyal gyi zla ba
la mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og tu na le sham gsum khar bcug ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas na le sham gcig khar rab tu bcug ste gang mig mi 'dzums

par lta bar byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se NA pa ta ye/ na mash+tsa ti sr-i NAM b+hA gi nI nAM/ na mastum+bu ru mahA sAr+tha bA
hA ya/ na mo dza ye bi dza ye a dzi te a pa rA dzi te swAhA/ /rig pa 'dis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas nag po'i brgyad pa'am/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pa
la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gos gtsang ma bgos nas mar me dang / rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba la sogs pa phul te mchod pa rgya chen po byas te chu rang nyid
kyis blangs nas zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste thun gcig tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de 'thungs shing khrus byas nas cho ga de nyid kyis tho rangs dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i slong mo
zos nas de lta bu brgyad zlos shig/ de nas phyogs bzhir rig pa'i gnas rnams kha ru rab tu 'jug par byed de thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/

na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA ba ta ye/ na mash+tsa ti sr-i NAM b+hA gi nI nAM/ tan+t+ri mi li mi li swAhA/ rig pa 'dis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te lag pa g.yas pas
khu tshur byas nas nyi ma bcu gsum du bzlas par bya'o/ /dug dang / mche bas shi ba thams cad slong ba 'jug par byed do/ /khu tshur gyis gdon rnams 'bebs par byed do//

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa tA ye/ na mash+tsa ti sr-i NAM b+ha gi nI nAM/ na ma stum+bu ru/ sarba mahA ya/ su Tu su Tu badzra pra b+hany+dza nI ye swAhA/ sngags
'dis ba byung gi dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa byas nas der bA sha ka'i yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig/ nag po'i brgyad
pa nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga pa'i bar du'o/ /gang 'dod pa de 'gugs par byed do/ /'dis kyang khros pas rgyal po'i pho brang rab tu bsgrubs par bya ste kun tu rgyu rab tu
zhugs nas de la sol bas mngon par bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya
rab 'chad byed/ /dge ba'i lag pa las kun la/ /las gang cung zad bya ba de/ /kun la lag pa g.yon sbyar bya/ /mthe bong can la bzung ba yi/ /phyag rgya lha yir yongs
su bsgrags/ /sdigs mdzub can ni gnod sbyin la/ /dri za la ni gung mo ste/ /'byung po rnams la ming med do/ /klu la lag pa mthe'u chung / /srin
po rnams la mthil du 'o/ /dbyug pa'i phyag rgya yi dwags rnams/ /phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad du bshad/ /mthe bong rdo rje rab 'joms pa/ /sdigs mdzub rdo rje khu tshur te/ /gung
mo rdo rje lus dmar la/ /mthe chung nag po'i yan lag can/ /mthe bong tum+bu ru zhes 'di/ /rang gi gzugs kyis rang rang la/ /phyag rgya lnga po rnam par dgod/ /de
nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skang ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can/ sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mas ji ltar/ bcom ldan 'das/
rig pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i ched du ji ltar bya ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
kyi bu legs so/ /des na gang rig pa 'dzin pa bkrus bzhin pa rig pa de rjes su dran par byas nas rig pa med par khrus bya ba dang / rnam par dben pa'i phyogs ma
yin par bzlog pa nyid de rnams ni lus rtsub pa dang / stobs chung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang lam du 'gro ba grong ba'i chos kyis gos pa rnams la yid kyis bzlas ba byed do/ /rtag tu
sems g.yo ba dang / nad mang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang yang yang nas yang du rig pa thun mong du 'pho ba dang / gnas ma yin pa rnams la rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang / sbyin sreg
dang bral bas bzlas pa byed pa ni rtag tu don nyams pa dang / grogs nyams par yang 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig slar yang rig pa 'dzin pa rang gi rig pa la brnyas pa byed pa dang /
lha la spyod par byed pa ni log par 'dren pa dang skrag par byed do/ /rtag tu 'jig rten dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu'ang rig pa 'dzin
pas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyis gsungs pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams me tog dang / bdug spos la sogs pa
rnams kyis mchod par bya bkur stir bya'o/ /dam tshig med pa dang / srog gcod par byed pa dang / sngags byed pa dang / dge slong ma sun 'byin par byed pa dang / mtshams
med pa byed pa dang / tshul dang bral bas dge 'dun gyi rdzas la yongs su longs spyod pa dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang la yongs su 'gro ba dang / dge slong dam/
dge slong ma gsod par byed pa dang / zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed pa dang / dam tshig med par khro bas zas rdzi bar byed pa dang / 'thor bar byed pa
dang / dam tshig med pa shi ba mthong nas 'gro bar mi byed pa dang / dam tshig med pa dang / dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la phyag rgya dang / sngags sbyin par byed pa dang /
de la'ang dam tshig med par sman rkang pas rdzi bar byed pa dang / dam tshig las nyams par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha gzhan
rnams la'ang dri med nyid kyis 'gom par byed pa dang / dam tshig med par dung dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / be con dang / mdung dang / rdo rje dang /
phub dang / gzhu dang / gshol dang / gtun shing dang / mda' dang / mdung thung dang / glang po che dang / khyu mchog dang / bong bu dang / phag dang / sha ra b+ha dang / seng+ge
dang / bya gag dang / rma bya dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / ngang pa dang / mi dang / lha'i bzhon pa dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams kyang 'gom par byed pa dang / sna
tshogs byed pa mthong nas rkang pas gnon par byed pa dang / rnam pa gzhan du log par 'dren pa dang / dngos grub ster bar mi byed do/ /bza' ba'i cho ga'ang 'dir
til dang / sha dang / par+pa Ta dang / dzam bu li ka dang / nya dang / spu pa li ka mang po dang / til gyi thug pa dang / lha bshos dang / dri med nyid bza' ba'ang spang bar bya'o/ /lha'i
dri med nyid gnon pa dang / pad+ma gnon pa dang / chu la gnas pa dang ldan pa dang / ut+pal gnon pa dang / nags kyi bdag po gcod pa dang / rtsa ba 'byin par byed pa'ang spang
par bya'o/ /rig pa rjes su dran par byed pa nyid kyis rtag tu gos gtsang ma bgos pas bya ba thams cad la bstan pa nyid dang / gzhan rig pa'i cho ga thams cad la mchod par
byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slar yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po khyed rnams nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags
ma sgrol ma'i rig pa'i yi ge rnams thabs dang bcas pas bde blag tu sgrub par byed pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar
yid kyis grub pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ g+hu ni g+hu ni la la la sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/ pa rA kra ma
swAhA/ a mi ta b+hA su ta swAhA/ sarbe sh+tsa Ar+ya a ba lo ki te swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags pa zla ba ma zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nu mo ste las thams cad byed
pa'o/ /sgrub pa pos rtag tu gtsug phud bcing ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba'ang bya'o/ /bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa'o/ /de la
'di ni tho rangs langs nas gtsang mar gyur pas dkyil 'khor byas nas me tog la sogs pa gtor te lnga brtson pas brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i
don rdzogs par byed do/ /yang na gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do/ /de nas dkyil 'khor du rtse trI dzi kaM rab tu gtor nas gang 'dod pa de skrod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /bklags
pas grub pa gang yin pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya bar 'gyur ro/ /yang 'dir rnam grangs kyi gter 'dir de dag gcig tu reg pa de dran par byed do/ /de nas
gshed byed skyed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing gi me rab tu sbar te dar chen pos bskor la ji ltar skyes pa'i khrag gis sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma
bdun pa la 'jigs pa'i nga ro can gyi gshed byed mtshan mo phyed nas langs par byed do/ /yang dag par bsngags pas ji ltar brjod pa'i gnas su'ang byin gyis brlabs
pa sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i byin gyis brlabs pas ji ltar bde bar mngon par bde bar byed do/ /de nas gnas kha cig tu mi rnams 'chi ba dang /
gnas kha cig tu me 'bar bar mthong ba dang / gnas kha cig tu lcags sgrog bcings pa mthong ngo / /de ltar gshed byed de rnam par rgyu bar byed do/ /de zhi ba'i don du bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pad+ma stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ /mchog tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra rnams bskyed par byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing
gi me rab tu sbar te yungs kar dkar po la til nag po'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shing / /'gro bar byed do/ /de nas rims kyis 'dzin par
'dod na dur khrod kyi me la dur khrod kyi thal ba stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rims chen pos 'dzin no/ /zhi ba'i don du chu la brgya rtsa bzlas te mgo bor sbyin par
bya'o/ /rims las grol lo/ /mgo bo zug rngus 'dzin par 'dod na ba byung gi gzugs brnyan la mi rus kyi phur bu la stong phrag brgyad bzlas la mgo bor phur bus gdab
bo/ mgo bo zug rngu chen pos 'dzin no/ /phur bu bton pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po la btab na ma ning du 'gyur ro/ /bton na thar ro/ /snying gar btab na gzar chen por
'gyur ro/ /bton na thar ro/ /seng ldeng gi phur bu sha dang / khrag gis btags pa srad bus dkris pa la brgyad brgya bzlas pa mi rus kyi phur bu'i mgo bor gdab par bya'o/ /
dgra'i sgor btab na tho rangs 'bros par byed do/ /ji srid phur bu bton par ma gyur gyi bar du gang du'ang gnas par mi byed do/ /rgyal po skyed par 'dod
na lha chen po'i khang par song nas lha la dug dang / khrag gis byugs te sha chen po'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /nim+ba'i 'dab mas kyang mchod par bya'o/ /de nas dug dang /
khrag dang / ske tshe rnams gcig tu byas nas brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig/ brgyad brgya dang bos rang gi sha'o/ /gnyis pas me tog go/ gsum pas btsun mo'i
'khor ro/ /bzhi pas mtshon cha chen po'o/ /lnga pas glang po che'o/ /drug pas ma he ste khro bo chen pos dkris pa'i las so/ /blo bzang po nyid nyams par byed par 'dod na
nim+ba'i shing gis me sbar nas nim+ba'i lo ma dang / dur khrod kyi thal ba phan tshun bsres pas sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skad cig la nyams
par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lkugs par byed par 'dod na ka sa ma ya'i gzugs brnyan byas nas zangs kyi phur bu la brgyad brgya bzlas te dgra bo yid la byas nas kha la
phur bu gdab par bya'o/ /lkugs par 'gyur ro/ /phur bu bton na thar ro/ /mngon spyod can rdzogs so// //ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'byung
ste so shing la lan bdun bzlas nas bza' bar bya'o/ /ma blangs par bza' ba rnyed do/ /brgyad brgyar bzlas nas mgo bo la byugs bas skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro//
gos la lan bdun mngon par sngags nas gyon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ /mig sman la mngon par sngags nas mig la bskus na khro bos dkris pa rnams kyis mthong na/
dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /lam du zlos bzhin par song na chom rkun rnams kyis 'joms mi nus so/ /sor mo la lan bdun bzlas pas mche ba can thams cad rengs par 'gyur
ro/ /gseg ma la brgyad brgyar bzlas nas chu la gtor na chu la rgyu ba thams cad rengs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcings pa lam 'gag pa la bzlas na thar ro/ /ka ra bI ra'i
lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du nye bar byugs nas sa la mtshon cha sbyin par bya'o/ /gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar byed do/ /khyor ba'i chu la sngags nas steng
du gtor bar bya ste dus ma yin pa'i char rengs par byed do/ /thal ba la brgyad brgyar bzlas na thal ba 'debs par 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyi phye ma rdo'i ra bar 'gyur ro/ /sgron
ma gsum gyis me'i ra bar 'gyur ro/ /bil ba'i 'dab mas bil ba'i ra bar 'gyur ro/ /brgyad brgyar bzlas pa'i chus chu'i ra bar 'gyur ro/ /mdor bsdus na/ bcom ldan
'das gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed do/ /rig pa bsgrubs pa las mtshams med
