la/ /bsnyen pas ci ste cung zad 'grub med na/ /bsgrubs pas nyon mongs kho na ci rung lags/ /rgyal bas ye shes zhi ba gang yin pa/ /de
yis 'di dag gso bar sngon gsungs na/ /gang la'ang sngags dang rig pa grub med pa/ /de dag rnams kyang ji ltar gso bar bgyi/ /thugs rje ldan pas 'gro la sman
slad du/ /khyod kyis gsang sngags sna tshogs bshad pa rnams/ /de dag bzlas brjod sbyin sreg brtul zhugs dang / /bsnyen la sogs pas ma grub ci las gyur/ /
cho ga nyams sam 'on te mthu ma mchis/ /dus kyi rang bzhin lags sam sdig pas bsgribs/ /gsang sngags gzhan du gyur tam 'chol las gyur/ /thams cad
ma lus bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /sras kyi tshig de nges par gsan gyur nas/ /yud tsam dgongs nas dkyus ring spyan phye ste/ /phyag gi rdo rje me stag zer
'phro ba/ /gsor nas rdo rje can gyis 'di skad gsungs/ /e ma'o zla ba'i 'od ltar lham me ba'i/ /snying rjes sems can phan phyir khyod 'dri ba/ /shin tu dri ma med pa'i
sems 'di yis/ /bde gshegs sras nang pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bde ma chags/ /rang gi sdug bsngal rnams kyis mi brdzi yang //
gzhan gyi sdug bsngal rnams kyis sdug bsngal te/ /de dag bde bas dga' dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bu khyod rang bzhin bzang po 'di lta bus/ /gang phyir sems can phan phyin 'di
'dri ba/ /de phyir myur du rtse gcig yid byos dang / /gsang sngags mdo sde'i tshul du ngas bshad nyon/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod gang dag ngas gsungs pa/ /de yi brtul zhugs
dang por ngas bshad do/ /de yis bde bar gshegs la dad bskyed nas/ /de bzhin du ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed/ /ser sna dregs dang rgyags pa rnams spangs te/ /dkon
mchog gsum la dad pas bsten par bya/ /rdo rje'i rigs zhes brjod pa rgya chen dang / /nga la yang ni dad cing dga' bar bya/ /tshig rtsub phra ma 'khyal pa smra ba dang / /gzhan gyi
bud med bgrod dang brdzun smra zhing / /rku dang gzhan gyi srog gcod gnod byed dang / /chang dang byed pa rtag tu spang bar bya/ /rmongs pa gang gis lus dang ngag dang ni/ /de bzhin
yid kyis bsod nams bsags byas kyang / /thams cad log par lta bas bcom pas na/ /de yi rnam smin mi 'dod 'bras bur 'gyur/ /dper na sa dang chu dang dus ldan
yang / /sa bon tshig pa myu gu mi skye ltar/ /de bzhin mi shes log ltas bcom pa yi/ /sems las dge ba'i chos rnams mi skye 'o/ /de phyir log par lta ba rnam spangs te/ /
yang dag lta ba la ni bsten par gyis/ /rtag tu sems ni dge ba bcu dag gi /chos kyi lam la gnas par byas na legs/ /lha dang lha min sha za khrag
'thung ba/ /mtshan mo rgyu ba mi bzad 'jig rten na/ /sems can rnams la gnod pa byed cing rgyu/ /bzlas brjod brtson pa'i sems ni g.yeng bar byed/ /de dag rnams kyi
gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir/ /nga yi gsang sngags rig pa'i tshogs mthong na/ /skrag par byed do snyam du dogs skyes pa/ /de phyir zlos pa'i sems ni g.yeng bar byed/ /de
ltar gnod byed de dag gzhom pa dang / /bdag nyid 'byor par bya phyir ngas gsungs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor lha dang lha min gnas gyur pa/ /dam tshig ji bzhin bsod nams
don du lta/ /sna tshogs pa yi gdon rnams gnos pa la/ /gang zhig rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor der ni gnod byed gzhom pa'i phyir/ /mi yis rab
tu bsgrims nas 'jug par bya/ /gang yang rig pa mchog tu gsungs pa dang / /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du yang 'jug par bya/ /der ni dam tshig sna tshogs ngas bshad
pa/ /sdig pa bsal phyir rgyun du blta bar bya/ /rdo rje'i rigs gtso pho nya mo yi tshogs/ /rig pa mang pos bsten pa'i lha mo de/ /zlos pa mthong na bgegs rnams phung ba
dang / /rngam pa 'don cing shin tu skrag par 'gyur/ /ji lta ji ltar dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / /de lta de ltar rdo rje'i rigs bsten dang / /rig pa'i tshogs la bsten pa'i bsod
nams kyis/ /de yi lus la lus kyi byin rlabs 'jug /mi tshugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid de mthong dang / /sa phyogs rdo rje'i me 'bar de shes na/ /lha klu lha min gnod sbyin grub
pa rnams/ /bzlas brjod byed pas skrag nas 'byer bar 'gyur/ /nga yi dam tshig mthong ba'i bu dag gis/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pas bshad pa yi/ /gsang sngags de
ni ma bsgrims bzhin du 'grub/ /bgegs rnams thams cad brlag par byed par 'gyur/ /rig dang dam tshig ma mthong snying rje med/ /de bzhin byang chub sems ni ma bskyed
cing / /sangs rgyas ma dad lha gzhan la brten pas/ /nga yi gsang sngags bzlas na phung bar 'gyur/ /bsam pa zhan cing nyams kyis mi lcogs pas/ /dkyil 'khor de kun
blta bar mi nus na'ang / /de las gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /gcig tsam zhig kyang dad pas mthong gyur na/ /gnod sbyin tshogs dang mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / /sa bla'i
gdon rnams kun dang klu dag dang / /lha la sogs dang bgegs dang log 'dren rnams/ /brtul zhugs gnas pa de la glags mi lta/ /dper na lo tog thams cad sa bdag
la/ /brten nas skyon med par ni skye ba ltar/ /de bzhin tshul khrims brten nas chos dkar mchog /snying rje'i chus brlan pas ni rnam par skyon
rgyal ba ngas gsungs so sor thar pa yang / /tshul khrims rnam dag 'dul ba ma lus las/ /sngags pa khyim pas rtags dang cho ga spangs/ /lhag ma rnams ni nyams su
blang bar bya/ /de ltar sdig pa'i chos las rnam grol nas/ /bde bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos/ /dag cing grol ba dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /bzlas
pas skyon mdo sde bklag par bya/ /gtsang zhing rab tu dben pa'i phyogs su ni/ /'jim pa'am ni bye ma las byas pa'i/ /bde gshegs mchod rten rten 'brel snying
po can/ /sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir ni rtag tu gdab/ /ring bsrel can gyi sku gzugs mchod rten la/ /bstod cing dri dang phreng ba mar me dang / /gdugs dang rgyal
mtshan ba dan rol mo dang / /mchog tu dad pa yis ni mchod par bgyi/ /nam yang 'khor lo gcig pa'i shing rta ni/ /rta dang ldan yang lam du mi 'gro ltar/ /de bzhin
sgrub pa po yi grogs med na/ /lus can dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ni blo ldan gzugs bzang gtsang sbra che/ /rigs ni btsun zhing chos la gzhol ba dang /
spobs pa che zhing dpa' la dbang po dul/ /snyan par smra zhing sbyin phod snying rje can/ /bkres dang skom dang nyon mongs bzod pa dang / /bram ze dag dang lha gzhan mchod mi byed/ /
sgrin zhing gzo la byas pa gzo ba dang / /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa grogs po yin/ /de ltar ma lus yon tan ldan pa dag /rtsod pa'i dus na shin tu dkon pas na/ /yon
tan phyed dang bzhi cha brgyad cha tsam/ /de lta bu dag sngags pa'i grogs por bsten/ /'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u dang po'o// //rang sangs
rgyas dang bde gshegs nyid skyes dang / /rgyal ba sngon chad gang na bzhugs pa yi/ /gnas gang bsod nams ldan zhing yid dga' ba/ /lha dang lha min la sogs phyag byas
mchod/ /gso sbyong sdom pa dang ni ldan pa yis/ /bdag nyid dag par bya phyir bsnyen par bya/ /de lta bu dag ma rnyed gzhan yang ni/ /chu bo chu klung 'bab chu mod pa dang / /pad+ma
ut+pa las ni brgyan pa'i mtsho/ /skye bo rnams kyang shin tu mi rgyu ba/ /dwang zhing zhim pa'i chu ni mang ba dang / /mi bzad gdon rnams kyang ni mi gnas pa/ /me tog 'bras bu gtsang
ma yod pa dang / /sman ljongs ljon shing sna tshogs dkrigs pa dang / /sa steng gnas mal shin tu gtsang ba dang / /gang na stag gzigs seng+ge med pa dang / /yid 'ong mnyam zhing
tsher ma med pa dag /mi yi dngos grub gnas su bsgrags pa yin/ /grogs po grog mkhar thal ba sgra shad dang / /nyal nyil sol ba tshwa
sgo'am btsog can spang / /der ni sa brkos sbyangs nas gnas brtsigs pa/ /dro la brtan zhing 'jim pas zhal zhal bya/ /shar ram byang ngam nub tu sgo gtod cing / /
lho phyogs su ni nam yang sgo mi gtod/ /dri gtsang khang pa de yi phyogs gcig tu/ /rgyal ba lam mchog rnam par ston pa yi/ /ras kyi sku gzugs las phyir brtan par
gdags/ /yang na shing gzugs legs pa mchod phyir bzhag /tha ga pas btags 'jam la snyoms pa dang / /thags bzang de bzhin skra shad med pa dang / /kho lag
che zhing ma nyams kha tshar bcas/ /ras kyi gzugs des mi la dngos grub ster/ /gtsang ma'i spos chu'i btab pa de la ni/ /tshon rtsi spyin med snod gsar blugs pa yis//
khrus byas gtsang la gso sbyong bzung ba'i mi/ /mkhas pas ba lang sku yis bri bar bya/ /phreng ba bdug spos mar me phreng ba dang / /byugs pa dag gi sku gzugs cher
mchod de/ /nub phyogs zhal bstan mi g.yo brtan pa gdags/ /de yi spyan sngar dngos grub brtsam par bya/ /gtsug phud bzhag nas skra ni bregs nas su/ /'byung
khungs tshon gyis gos kyi kha dog bsgyur/ /gos dkar dag gam shing lo'am gos ma'am/ /zar ma'am shing shun rnams kyi gos bgo'o/ /ku ba'am lcags sam 'jim pa las
byas pa'i/ /dbyibs ni legs shing mi rtsub 'jam pa dang / /ma chags zlum zhing ma gas rma med pa/ /yid du 'ong ba'i lhung bzed bcang bar bya/ /ha cang mi nye ha cang mi ring la/ /
bza' btung mod cing dmangs rigs mang ba dang / /mgron la mchod byed legs par byin pa'i grong / /bram ze phyi rol skye ba med par bsten/ /nga rgyal gyis ni non pa'i bram ze
rnams/ /rigs kyis rlom zhing snying rjer mi ldan pa/ /de dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /mchod pa mthong nas bgegs kyang byed par 'a gyur/ /bram ze sangs
rgyas pa las ji ltar dman/ /smrang las bram ze dag las dmangs rigs rnams/ /bsnyen bkur dang ni mchod pa 'byung bas na/ /dmangs rigs kyis kyang gsang sngags
ji ltar bzlas/ /lha dang 'gron mchod pa dang las drug dang / /rgyal po dang ni me lha bsten pa dang / /bu yi don du 'gro bar bya ba dag /bram ze rnams kyis nges par 'grub
pa yin/ /rgyal rigs rje'u rigs rnams kyang rang gi las/ /grub pas 'di la the tshom ma byed ces/ /rdzun du smra ba sna tshogs skyon dag gis/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi sems
ni sreg par byed/ /yan lag brgyad lam gnas pas rtag tu ni/ /nyi ma phyed mtshams tshun chad blang bar bya/ /bram ze'i dus ni phyi dro yin pas
na/ /de phyir bram ze'i khyim du 'gro mi bya/ /dge dang mi dge shes pa bzung na ni/ /bram ze dmangs rigs dag las khyad par med/ /'on kyang 'gro ba'i blos ni bram
ze dang / /'di ni dmangs rigs yin zhes brtags par zad/ /bden pa'i lam dmigs dge ba'i rjes 'brangs na/ /dmangs rigs dag kyang rga shi med par
'gro/ /log pa'i lam zhugs nyes par spyod ldan na/ /bram ze gang yin mi bzad dmyal bar ltung / /lus can shin tu dri ma ldan pa dag /'di na gzhan gyis dag
par mi 'gyur te/ /de ni sdig pa rnam par bsal ba dang / /bsod nams ma lus yongs su bzung bas 'dag /dper na rma ni gso dang bsal ba'i phyir/ /nad
pa dag la smin pa sbyin pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'dir yang bkres pa'i sdug bsngal dag/ /bsal phyir rgyal bas kha zas bza' bar gsungs/ /la la lam gyis dub cing
'gro ba'i tshe/ /bkres skom gdungs pas rang gi bu yi sha /za ba bzhin du rnal 'byor sems dman zhing / /tshe dang rgyags phyir bza' bar mi bya'o/ /mang du blugs na
rtsol med mtho ba dang / /de bzhin nyung dus srang ni dma' 'gyur la/ /ran pas skad cig mnyam par 'gro ba ltar/ /lus can kha zas de ltar bza' bar bya/ /dper na khang
rnying mi zhig bya ba'i phyir/ /mi yis ka ba brtan po btsugs pa ltar/ /de bzhin lus kyis 'khrul 'khor gnas pa dang / /shing rta'i mig bsku bzhin du kha zas bza'/ /'dod
pa'i khams ni kha zas kyis gnas zhes/ /rgyal bas chos gcig tu ni bka' stsal pa/ /lus ni chu shing bzhin du rig bya ste/ /sems ni bza' btung sogs la chags
mi bya/ /dbang po drug po yul la 'phro ba dang / /bde gshegs gsungs pa'i shes pas bsrung bar bya/ /lhung bzed de dag las ni gcig thogs nas/ /gnya' shing
gang du lta zhing bsod snyoms spyad/ /'dzum zhing 'gro la smra zhing zur mig can/ /yan lag thams cad yid 'phrog byed pa'i gzugs/ /bud med gzugs ni mtshon
cha 'debs 'dra bas/ /skyes pa'i sems dag mngon du 'phrog par byed/ /lcags kyi thong lcags rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /mig ni rnam par bkab pa ches bla yi/ /
nye na dran pa nyams byed bud med kyi/ /dkyus rings mig can bzhin ni ma mthong bla/ /gang du dga' bar 'gro zhing 'dzin med la/ /sems kyis sems ni rnam par 'dul
bzhin du/ /rab 'bring la sogs rnam par spangs nas su/ /mi smra bar ni gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro/ /gang na bzhon be'u phrug chung ba dang / /
gang na skyes bu chang ni 'thung ba dang / /gang na bu mo gzhon bsten rtse ba dang / /de bzhin gang na gzhon nu rtse ba dang / /gang na dga' ston khyi za byed pa dang / /gang na skye
bo mang po 'dus pa dang / /gang na de bzhin rol mo byed pa rnams/ /der ni skyes bu nam yang 'gro mi bya/ /bsod snyoms ci snyed khyer te 'ongs nas kyang / /dang por
ji ltar bde bar bgo bar bya/ /rkang bkrus glo bur ba la byin nas su/ /lus bsrung phyir ni kha zas bza' bar bya/ /dus su zos nas dus gsum khrus byas te/ /phreng
ba mar me bdug pa bstod dang dri/ /sha chang med pa'i lha bshos phul nas su/ /ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas bzlas brjod bya/ /bdug pa byug spos la sogs ma rnyed
na/ /dri zhim me tog sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ /spra ba arga bil ba bri ha ti/ /ku sha dri ngan yid du mi 'ong spang / /'greng dang 'dug dang ma log nyal ba dang / /'gro 'phres
za glog bzlas brjod byed pa na/ /rjes su dran drug so so'i yon tan dang / /rig par bcas te rjes su dran par bya/ /'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u ste
gnyis pa'o// //'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs tshogs ldan pa'i/ /sems ni 'khor ba yin par kun tu brjod/ /nyon mongs rnam grol shel dang zla 'dra ba/ /
srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i mthar ni yongs su bsgrags/ /dper na dri med chu ni chur sogs kyis/ /skad cig tu yang rnyog par byed pa ltar/ /de bzhin rnam dag dri ma med pa'i sems/ /
'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis rnyog par 'gyur/ /bo de tse dang dung shel ru rag sha /lung tang pad+ma'i snying po zha nye zangs/ /'khar ba'i bgrang phreng brgya ni rtsa brgyad pa/ /de
dag las ni bgrang phreng gcig blangs te/ /de ni lag pa g.yas pas gzung ba'am/ /lag pa g.yon pas bsgrims te mi 'khrul gzung / /tshar re phyin cing nor bu re re nas/ /
sngags pa yis ni rim bzhin drang bar bya/ /'dug nas dbang po yang dag bsdams pa dang / /lus kyang drang zhing brtan par bzhag nas su/ /phyis ni ma mchu shin tu mdzes par
yang / /bskul zhing gsang sngags ci dgar bzlas brjod bya/ /sems ni glog dang sprin dang rlung dang mtshungs/ /rgya mtsho chen po yi ni rlabs dang 'dra/ /sgyu can 'dod dgur
yul la mngon dga' ba/ /g.yo zhing 'phyan pa nges par gdul bar bya/ /gang tshe zlos dga'i sems ni zhi ba la/ /bsten pas gnyid kyis dran ba rmongs gyur na/ /langs nas
bcag cing phyogs su lta ba dang / /chu yis gdong yang yongs su bkru bar bya/ /las kyi dbang bsgyur bdag po med pa dang / /mgon med
rten med tshe rabs gcig nas gcig /lus kyi kha brgyud rjes su rab 'gro ba/ /de yi rjes su dge dang mi dge 'brang / /tshol dang mdza' bshes dang ni rnam par bral/ /mi
sdug pa dang phrad cing 'dod pas gdungs/ /ngan pa skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal can/ /yul rnams kun tu song na'ang med pa min/ /sha sbrang tsha grang bkres dang ngal la
sogs/ /gang du song yang sdug bsngal nyid yin pas/ /yul la mngon dga'i sems ni 'byung ba na/ /rnam rtog de dag rnams kyis bzlog par bya/ /'dod chags shas
che mi gtsang sha tshil dang / /pags pa keng rus lta bas rnam par bzlog /byams dang snying rje'i chus gdab zhe sdang la/ /gti mug la ni rten 'brel lam gyis so//
re zhig na ni dgra yang mdza' bor 'gyur/ /mdza' bo dag kyang dgrar ni 'gyur ba nyid/ /de bzhin kha cig dag ni bar mar 'gyur/ /bar ma de nyid kyang ni dgra
bor 'gyur/ /de ltar mdza' bshes 'gyur bar rig bya ste/ /blo gros ldan pas nam yang chags mi bya/ /gnyen la dga' ba'i sems kyi rnam rtog dag /bzlog
nas dge la bde bar gzhag par bya/ /dang po zlos nas bzlas brjod zin par du/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rde'u rigs zhing pa dang / /bud med ma ning khye'u dang bu mo dang / /sngags
'chang nam yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /ci ste dgos pa yod na sngags g.yog dang / /bzlas brjod zin nas cung zad smra bar bya/ /smras na lud pa bshang gci bor nas kyang / /
chu yi nang du zhugs nas khrus kyang bya/ /me tog dri snod mar me phul ba dang / /tshul khrims brtson 'grus dka' thub byas pa yi/ /dge ba de kun bla na med pa yi/ /sangs
rgyas byang chub bla na med par bsngo/ /dper na chu klung rgya mtshor phyin pa na/ /lan tshwa'i ror ni gcig tu gyur pa bzhin/ /de ltar bla med byang chub bsngos pa yi/ /bsod
nams rgyal ba'i ror ni gcig tu 'gyur/ /dper na skyes bu la las 'bras bu'i phyir/ /sA lu bskyed kyi sog ma'i phyir min las/ /sA lu rnyed nas bsgrims pa med par
ni/ /sog ma'i phung po zhar la 'byung ba bzhin/ /de bzhin byang chub 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /bsod nams sgrub kyi longs spyod phyir min yang / /sog ma'i phung po
dag dang mtshungs par ni/ /ma bsgrims bzhin du mi yi longs spyod 'grub/ /tshe ring ba 'di legs par thob pa dang / /chos bzhin bsgrub pa'i yul dag rnyed pa'am/ /
skyo ba med par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba yi/ /bsam pa rnams ni rtag tu rdzogs par bya/ /grags dang ma grags rnyed dang ma rnyed dang / /bde dang sdug
bsngal de bzhin stod smad dag /sems kyis 'jig rten tshogs rnams rab bcom ste/ /sdig pa'i gnas su gyur pa spang bar bya/ /dper na rgya mtsho skad cig tsam
yang ni/ /mi yi ro dang lhan cig mi gnas ltar/ /de bzhin rnam rtog sems kyis sdig byas pa/ /sngags pas skad cig tsam yang gnas mi bya/ /dper na rlung
med khang pa'i nang du ni/ /mar me gtsug pa mi g.yo 'bar ba ltar/ /rtse gcig sems kyis zlos la mngon dga' ba'i/ /lus la chos kyang de bzhin 'bar bar
'gyur/ /stangs dang mchongs pa dang ni gar byed dang / /glu len rnga dung skye bos dpyas 'gyur dang / /lhag pa'i nga rgyal 'drid dang 'dod chen dang / /rgyan po dang ni
'dus la lta 'dod dang / /dus min gnyid dang mi 'grub smra ba dang / /bstan bcos ngan dang snyan dngags klog 'don dang / /chags dang 'tshig dang dregs dang
rgyags pa dang / /zhe la 'dzin dang le lo g.yo sgyu sbang / /sha chang ke'u dang tsong dang sgog rdog dang / /'bru dang til dang la phug su ra Na/ /'byung po'i zas dang lha
bshos gtor ma dang / /gu lang mchod byas gtor ma mi bza'o/ /ngas ni sngags pas kha zas dkar gsum dang / /rtsa ba sdong bu 'bras bu tshod ma dang / /zho dang nas dang 'o ma
mar dag dang / /'bru mar tshigs ma dar ba 'o bskol dang / /thug pa dag ni bza' btung yin par gsungs/ /sha za srin po dag dang gnon po dang / /ro langs dang ni 'jig pa
sgrub pa dang / /lha min bu mo'i 'khrul 'khor 'joms pa'i tshe/ /'bru mar tshigs ma'i bza' ba mchog tu bsngags/ /de ltar bzlas brjod byed pa'i sgrub pa pos/ /nyin
gcig bzhin du byas nas bzlas pa ni/ /phul nas cho ga bzhin du gshegs su gsol/ /nub mo ku sha bting nas nyal bar bya/ /byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms
ldan pa dang / /bde gshegs chos dang dge 'dun bcas pa dran bya ste/ /shA ri'i bu dang nga la btud nas thal sbyar nyal/ /de ltar sngags pa'i sdig pa mtha' dag zad
par bya/ /'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u gsum pa'o// //sgrub pa pos ni nges par bcang ba yi/ /rdo rje de dag gang yin bshad par bya/ /sor
bcu bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad dang / /mchog gi tshad ni sor yang nyi shu pa'o/ /gser gyi rdo rje rig 'dzin nyid dang ni/ /sa rnams thob par bya phyir rab tu shis/ /rgyal
po'i don du dngul gyi mchog yin te/ /zangs kyi rin chen 'byung ba'i klu bsgrubs la/ /lha min dbang po'i 'khrul 'khor gzhig pa dang / /phug tu
'gro la rdo yi rdo rje 'o/ /don kun bsgrub pa la ni lcags gsum gyi/ /gsang ba'i sde gzhom pa la lcags kyi 'o/ /gdon gzhan la ni seng ldeng dpal dang tshe/ /nad med
nor rdzas la ni bil pa'o/ /gnod sbyin ma mo'i sgrub la ma du'i shing / /chos kyi don la a shwad las byas shis/ /gsal zhing rtse mo'i dgra rnams gzhig pa la/ /
mi rnams bsad pa la ni mi rus kyi/ /shel las byas pa mig 'phrul chen po la/ /dbye phyir 'jim pa las byas rab tu shis/ /gsad cing bskam par ba ru ra yi shing //
sha za bsgrub pa la yang rtag tu shis/ /lha dang gnod sbyin dri za bsgrub pa la/ /sgron shing las ni byas pa'i rdo rje 'o/ /ci ste klu ni dbang du byed 'dod na/ /de tshe klu shing rtsa
ba las byas pa'i/ /gzugs bsgyur ba la sa las byas pa ste/ /ro langs sgrub pa la ni ka dam pa'o/ /pun da ka dang ra dza arga dang / /a shwad shing gi rdo rje nor gyi
phyir/ /gla ba a mra shri bar+Na ba yi/ /ardzu la sogs pa las byas pa dag /mi rnams g.yul las rgyal bar bya phyir ro/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa thob bya'i phyir/ /tsan+dan
dkar po dang ni dmar po ste/ /dbyibs legs 'jam zhing ma nyams rma med pa'i/ /rdo rje rtse lnga sra ba bcang bar bya/ /dang po zlos tshe de ni thogs nas su/ /bzlas brjod zin
nas myur ba kho nar yang / /dad pa'i sems kyis phyag byas dri sogs kyis/ /mchod nas rdo rje rgyal ba'i zhabs drung bzhag /nga yi rigs kyi gsang sngags sgrub pa pos/ /rdo rje
med na 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de las gcig kyang rnyed par ma gyur na/ /khu tshur bcangs nas rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas/ /ldong ros gi wang ral gri any+dza na/ /spang ma
ba bla zhags pa li khri btsag /mar dang shu dag 'khor lo rdo rje mdung / /pags pa go cha mdung ni rtse gsum pa/ /rdzas ni bcu bdun bsgrubs pa de rnams kyis/ /grub pa
rnam pa gsum rnams thob par byed/ /rang sngags cho ga lhag par bshad pa gang / /der yang grub pa rnam pa gsum du mthong / /bgegs dang log 'dren grub par mi dga'
ba/ /rig pa'i tshogs rnams kyi ni mdun na rgyu/ /rig 'dzin brtson pa'i bdag nyid can dag la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs glags skabs tshol zhing rgyu/ /bgegs kyi rigs ni
rnam pa bzhi yod de/ /sa steng 'di na 'khod pa'i bgegs rnams ni/ /rnam par 'jig dang wa dang ne'u le dang / /de bzhin so gcig pa dang rigs rnams bzhi/ /de dang de las
'phros pa mtha' yas so/ /sa steng 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi gang yin/ /de dag g.yog 'khor mya ngan med pa yin/ /de yi g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag
bdun rnams/ /de dag gsang sngags sgrub la gegs byed do/ /wa yi rigs ni bye ba bco brgyad dag /dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor te de rnams kyi/ /sde dpon glang chen
gdong ste stobs po che/ /sa steng mtha' dag kun tu bgegs kyang byed/ /so gcig rigs kyi sde dpon gtsug 'phyang ste/ /bye ba drug cu'i bgegs la dbang bsgyur zhing / /
tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi ma zla ba rlung / /de rnams kyis bshad sngags la bgegs byed do/ /ne'u le'i rigs gang yin pa rgya che ste/ /khrag khrig bye ba thor 'bum phrag
stong dang / /de dag rnams kyi sde dpon gtsug nas phyung / /nga yi rig dang sngags la bgegs byed do/ /dga' byed pad+ma 'dra bar dkyus ring mig /lngas rtsen sngags
rgyud ma ni bgegs kyang byed/ /nor spyod bu ni gang yin gang po ba/ /rang gi gsang sngags rgyud la bgegs kyang byed/ /sgrub pa po la 'byor bar mi dga' ba/ /brtse
med rang rang rigs la bgegs byed do/ /rang gi gsang sngags gzugs su rnam sprul nas/ /phreng ba dang ni gtor ma mngon du len/ /lha yi log 'dren gyis
byas de mthong nas/ /khros shing 'khrugs nas phyir yang phyogs par 'gyur/ /sngon chad sems ni 'jungs dang rmongs pa yis/ /lha yis log 'dren bgegs kyi lus 'di ston//
lugs 'di lha dang klu dang grub pa dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum lhas kyang bzlog mi nus/ /bgegs kyis 'jigs su rung bar byos pa dag /sngar bshad pas ni de dag zlog par
byed/ /bzlas brjod zin nas legs par bsrung ba dang / /dkyil 'khor mang byas bsgrub la 'jug par bya/ /gzhan du mchod pa cho ga med pa dang / /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg
cho ga bral ba'am/ /gang zhig rtag tu sems ni 'di ltar sems/ /rig pa gang zhig bdag gis bzlas pa bya/ /yul dang rgyal sogs gtam la chags pa de'i/ /lus la
thogs pa med par rab tu 'jug /'di ltar phan tshun du ni 'gro ba na/ /rig pa 'dod pa'i sems dag g.yeng bar byed/ /dper na chu nang grib ma snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin mi yi
lus la 'jug par 'gyur/ /'khru tshe gzhan la zlos pa na yang gzhan/ /nyal na gzhan yin me tog bdug pa dang / /mar me 'bul ba'i tshe na'ang gzhan yin la/ /sbyin sreg
byed pa na yang bgegs gzhan 'jug /dper na nyi zer me shel bab pa yi/ /rkyen gyis ma bsgrims me ni 'byung ba ltar/ /de bzhin bgegs kyang lus la zhugs byung na/ /
'dod chags me chen kun tu skyed par byed/ /g.yo zhing 'gul ba zhes ni bya ba'i bgegs/ /chu nang skyes bu 'khru ba'i tshe na 'dzin/ /bkres
shing lus la snyoms shing gnyid kyang cha/ /de bzhin lus lci mchog tu khro bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin dri za zhes ni bya ba'i bgegs/ /de ni dri 'bul ba na lus la
'jug /yul dang rgyal po gnyen dang nor la sems/ /snyom zhing bud med dag la chags par 'gyur/ /nag po'i lus che sa ni brtol nas su/ /bdug pa rab tu
'bul ba'i tshe na 'jug /'jungs dang g.yo sgyu byed cing mi srun la/ /'dod chen che la rab tu khu chu 'dzag /mar me gtsug phud gcig pa gegs byed pa/ /snying ga
tsha zhing gzer thabs sems nyams byed/ /bgreng ba'i tshe na gtsug 'phyang 'jug 'gyur te/ /rims dang 'khru skyugs drag pos 'debs par byed/ /me tog 'bul
tshe me tog cher bkod pa/ /rang gi gnas skabs rnyed nas lus la 'jug /rims dang cham pa lus tshigs na ba dang / /grog po dag dang rnam par bral bar byed/ /
bgegs kyis brlams pa phyogs na lam min lam du mthong / /spyod pa sna tshogs byed cing 'dod chags rnams kyis gdungs/ /glo bur smra zhing klog la don med kun tu
'phyan/ /don du sgrub pa rnams la sems kyang yid gnyis byed/ /sems ni log par lta bas non pas na/ /gsang sngags med cing mtho ris lha yang med/ /bsod nams med
cing sdig pa cung zad med/ /thar pa med cing 'ching ba'i rgyu yang med/ /skye bo don med nyon mongs dka' thub ches/ /sna tshogs 'khyal ba'i tshig 'di rtag tu smra/ /sen mos rtswa
gcod bong rdo 'jig pa dang / /mtshan mo so yang khrig khrig 'cha' ba dang / /bu mo bdag 'dod khyo ni mi rnyed cing / /skyes pa bdag 'dod chung ma gzhar mi rnyed/ /dgos pa'i
don mi 'grub cing mi dgos 'grub/ /gar yang 'gro dgos gnyid med mi yang brlams/ /de bzhin stag gzig seng+ge khyi dang phag /bong bu rnga mo byi la sha za wa/ /bya rgod
'ug pa skyar mo mi'u thung hrul/ /gcer bu thal ris can dang mi nag po/ /khron skams thod pa rus gong phung po dang / /lcags dang rdo khung mi gtsang khang rul dang / /kha
bzhin gyur cing ral gri mdung thogs pa/ /rmi lam 'di rnams rmis pa'i mi yang brlams/ /bgegs dang log 'dren rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor
drag shul thabs las sbyar/ /sngags pa de yi gsang sngags las zhugs pa/ /bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs/ /phyugs lhas shing gcig lha
yi khang pa'am/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo'am khang stong nags tshal du/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa khru bzhi'i tshad/ /tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs dag
gis bris/ /phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongs su bzung / /sgo bzhi pa la ku sha'i rtswa yang bkram/ /bza' dang sha chang la phug la sogs bcas/ /'bras chan 'bras
bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin/ /bum pa pad+ma dmar po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /nag po ra ri med cing rin chen bcas/ /sman dang 'bru dang spos chus bkang ba bzhi/ /ldum bus
kha brgyan ras kyis mgul ba dkri/ /lus dmar po dang kI li kI la dang / /'gro lding ba la sogs pas brgya bzlas te/ /dkyil 'khor khor yug tu ni bzhag par bya/ /
de nas byug spos bdug spos la sogs dbul/ /bgegs kyis brlams pas shar phyogs kha bstan te/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bde ba'i stan la bzhag /bzlas
brjod byed cing bum pa re res bkru/ /'on kyang log 'dren rnams las thar bar 'gyur/ /sgrub pa po yi mi ni 'ba' zhig la/ /bgegs rnams gzhig phyir phan par
ma zad kyi/ /rgyal po'i 'khor dang bud med bu med dang / /bu mo dag dang rol mo mkhan rnams dang / /bud med phal dang tshong pa rnams kyang rung / /zhing pa rnams dang
dbul zhing phongs pa dang / /gdon gyis zin cing rim gyis btab pa dang / /bus pa'i gden dang me tog 'bras bu 'phrog /rmi lam smyo dang sems ni g.yengs pa dang / /dug kyang
sel te khrus 'dis dag par byed/ /'phags pa dpung bzang gi zhus pa'i le'u bzhi pa'o// //bgegs kyis bsod nams ma lus zad par byed/ /de bas
mi yis gsang sngags 'grub mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar zla ba sprin las rnam grol ltar/ /de bzhin bgegs las grol ba rnam par gsal/ /dper nas chu dus rnams bral ba
yi/ /snod gnas 'bras bu me tog myu gu med/ /de dang ma bral myu gu lo ma dang / /sdong bu dag dang me tog 'bras bu skye/ /cho ga nyams shing yi ge gug skyed med/ /mchod
pa med cing mi gtsang bzlas brjod byas/ /gug skyed yi ge lhag par gyur pa yis/ /gsang sngags dngos grub rgya chen mi ster ro/ /dper na dbyar gyi dus ni char sprin dag /skye
po'i skal bzhin char pa legs par 'bebs/ /de bzhin mi yi skal ba gzigs nas ni/ /'dod pa bzhin du gsang sngags dngos grub stsol/ /yul dang dus dang cho ga las
rnams dang / /sdig pa sbyang zhing bsod nams bsags pa dang / /gus dang bzlas brjod kun la gzigs nas ni/ /de dag gsang sngags 'bras bu rnam par stsol/ /ji
tsam sdig pa mang pos rab gang zhing / /ji tsam las dkar bsod nams ma bsags dang / /ji srid cho ga med par bzlas byas pa/ /de srid sngags
pas dngos grub mi 'thob bo/ /cho ga nyams sam bar chad sngags gzhan bzlas/ /bzlas pa btang ngam gzhan la byin gyur na/ /dus gsum mchod pa la ni brtson byas
nas/ /slar yang 'bum bzlas bsgrub la 'jug par bya/ /stong phrag bcu 'am brgyad dam bdun nam bzhi/ /bzlas mthar de la mar gyi sbyin sreg bya/ /yang na ma grugs
nas sam til nag gam/ /yungs kar mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /'dzam bu ma du blag sha pa la sha/ /u dum seng ldeng a shwad a pa mar/ /arka a sho ka
dang rardza ka /n+ya gro bil pa a mra sha'i me yi/ /yam shing gzhon nu sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /btsal nas zho mar sbrang rtsi la btags nas/ /rtag tu me la sbyin sreg
bya bar bya/ /de ltar byas na dngos grub myur du 'thob/ /gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyis ni gsang sngags gang / /bcad dam bcings sam mnan par gyur kyang rung / /
de yi gzugs brnyan sa las byas nas su/ /nga yi zhabs drung mngon du phyogs bzhag ste/ /sngags pas kI li kI li sogs snying pos/ /mar dang 'o mas de yis gzugs
brnyan bkru/ /de ltar zhag bdun byas pas gsang sngags dag /bcings pa dang ni mnan las grol bar 'gyur/ /mchod pa la sogs cho ga ldan yang ni/ /ci ste gsang sngags
'bras bu mi ster na/ /de'i gzugs dug dang ske tshes byugs nas su/ /kI li kI li 'gro lding la sogs pas/ /sngags kyis de la yungs mar tshwa sbyar bas/ /zhag bdun dus
gsum sbyin sreg las byas na/ /gsang sngags 'ongs nas rmi lam dag tu ni/ /cho ga nyams pa'am yi ge lhag chad ston/ /sngon ni gsang sngags lugs 'chang bstan mod kyi/ /
ji ltar rgya mtsho dus las mi 'da' ltar/ /sngags kyis gzhan gyis gsang sngags mi bsnan cing / /bcing dang gcad pa nam yang mi byed do/ /dper na byams pa'i mi yis
mi gzhan la/ /che ge mo yi khyim 'dir phyin chad khyod/ /blta ba'i phyir yang 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes/ /rigs pa'i tshig gis rnam par bstan pa dang / /des kyang de yis tshig de
mnyan nas su/ /khyim du smra dang blta phyir mi 'gro ba/ /de bzhin gsang sngags gang yang rung ba'i sngags/ /bzlas pas gzhan gyi gsang sngags bsnan mi bya/ /gsang sngags bcad dang
bcing ba mi bya zhing / /yi ge lhag chad gsang sngags mi sbyin no/ /las rnams spyad pa gzhan du bsgyur mi bya/ /gnas rnams gzir bar nam yang mi bya'o/ /dbab dang bcing
dang brdeg dang rmongs bya dang / /yan lag mi gzhig rigs kyang mi brlag cing / /sngags pas klu dang gdon la sogs pa rnams/ /gzhan du
bskad pa rnam yang mi bya'o/ /dgar dang bskrad pa dang ni bsad pa dang / /byis pa gdon gyis zin pa mi gso zhing / /rgya mo sa mda' snyi dang 'dzol bu yis/ /sems can
gnod pa nam yang mi bya'o/ /dngos grub phyir ni rnam pa bcur gsungs te/ /sngags pa dang ni rang sngags g.yog dang rdzas/ /brtson 'grus phyogs dang sa gzhi dus
dang ni/ /yan lag rdzogs pa'i lha dang sems stobs so/ /gzhan dag kha cig rig 'dzin grogs zhes zer/ /gzhan dag phyogs dang brtson 'grus dus rnams
nyid/ /gzhan ni rdzas dang sa gzhi lha dang sngags/ /kha cig sems stobs yin zhes rnam par smra/ /sgrub phyir de ltar bcu dang brgyad dang lnga/ /de bzhin bzhi dang
gsum dang gcig nyid ces/ /sngags rig rang rang blo yi rnam par 'chad/ /sangs rgyas rgyud la cho ga gnyis kyis 'grub/ /sgrub pa gang zhig rang gi yon tan rdzogs//
brtson 'grus mchog dang yang dag ldan pa dang / /gzhan gyis rnyed pa dag la phrag dog med/ /'dod la ma chags lus kyis nyon mongs bzod/ /gug skyed klad kor tsheg
tshang zur phyin la/ /gsang sngags dag cing shin tu cho gar bcas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' bsten pa yi/ /gnas su bzlas na yid 'ong dngos grub thob/ /ji
ltar ri dwags rgyal po bkres pa dag /mthu stobs chen pos glang chen gsod pa dang / /de bzhin spyang ki phag dang ri dwags dang / /wa rnams kyang ni myur du gsod pa ltar/ /de
bzhin sngags pa seng+ge'i tshul gyis su/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i las rnams la/ /brtson 'grus chen po dang ni ldan pa dang / /'bad pa'i mchog rnams kyis kyang bsten
par bya/ /rdza rnga'i sgra dang dung dang rnga sgra dang / /shin tu 'jigs byed skye bo'i sgra dag dang / /gad rgyangs bshugs glu dag dang glu gar dang / /gling bu pi wang rdza rnga chen po'i sgra/ /
bya bran sna tshogs sgra dang chu sgra dang / /bud med rgyan gyi sil khrol sgra rnams dang / /sha sbrang tsha grang rlung gi gnod pa yis/ /mi yi sems ni g.yeng zhing g.yo bar byed/ /bzlas
brjod byed tshe mi myur mi dal zhing / /sgra cher mi dbyung ha cang chung ba'ang min/ /smra bzhin ma yin gzhan du g.yengs bzhin min/ /gug skyed klad klor tsheg rnams nyams par
min/ /ji ltar chu klung nyin mtshan rtag tu ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin phyag bcas bzlas dang brtul zhugs kyis/ /bsod nams lus can
la ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /le lo 'dod chags mi dger ldan pa'i sems/ /gang nas gang du g.yeng zhing rgyu ba dag /de dang de nas myur du bzlog
nas ni/ /gsang sngags yi ge mchog la legs par sbyar/ /sna rtser blta zhing rnam par rtog pa spong / /nam zhig bskyod kyang rnam par mi g.yo ba/ /de tshe dmigs la gnas
pa thob pa ste/ /sems ni las su rung bar 'gyur bar nges/ /rtse gcig sems dang ldan pa'i mi la ni/ /yid las byung ba'i dga' ba rab tu skyed/ /dga' bas lus ni
shin tu sbyangs pa 'thob/ /lus sbyangs pas ni bde ba'i skal ldan 'gyur/ /lus bde rtse gcig sems dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /de tshe bzlas brjod thogs pa med par
'gyur/ /tshe rabs gzhan du gang dang gang byas pa'i/ /sdig pa ma lus bzlas brjod byas pas 'byang / /bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus byang gyur nas/ /dang ba'i yid kyis
dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir bcom ldan rgyal ba'i dbang po yis/ /chos 'di kun gyi rtsa ba sems zhes gsungs/ /sems ni dang bas lha mi'i bde ba dang / /mtho
ris dang ni byang grol thob par 'gyur/ /sems kyi skyon gyis dud 'gror skye ba dang / /sems dmyal gnas shing mi sdug dbul por 'gyur/ /sems ni rab tu dang bar
gyur pa'i mis/ /sa chu me rlung skye rga na 'chi sogs/ /bar dang tha mar gnod pa kun bral ba/ /rnam grol bde zhing zhi ba thob par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags dngos grub kun dang thun
mong ba/ /bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal brgya dang 'brel/ /nyon mongs dug bcas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /dang ba'i sems kyis thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /'dod rgyal
las las ma byung dus las min/ /rang bzhin dbang phyug las kyang byung ba min/ /rgyu med can min skyes bus ma byas kyang / /las dang nyon mongs pa las sems can byung / /
gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan/ /de ni bdag min bdag kyang gzugs ma yin/ /gzugs la bdag med bdag la gzugs med de/ /gzugs ni stong pa'o phung
bzhi'ang rig par gyis/ /gzugs ni dbu ba dag dang 'dra ba ste/ /tshor ba chu bur bzhin du rtag pa med/ /de ltar mthong ba lta ba bzang po yin/ /gang zhig gzhan gyur de ni lta
ngan gsung / /de ltar zlos pa'i gsang sngags nye gyur na/ /mtshan mo nyal na rmi lam 'di dag mthong / /khang bzang ljon shing rgyal mtshan seng+ge rta/ /ri bo shing rta sgra ldan sprin
dang glu/ /stag dang bse dang glang chen khyu mchog la/ /rmi lam na ni dga' bas rmis pa dang / /me tog phreng ba spos dang dri rnams dang / /sha chang nya dang 'bras bu glegs bam dang / /
lha yi gzugs dang ut+pal dmar po dang / /shing rta gang ba'am ba bzhon be'u phrug can/ /gdugs dkar rnga yab lham dang ral gri dang / /
bsil yab gser g.yu can dang phreng ba dang / /nor bu mu tig nya phyis dung dang dngul/ /bud med gzugs bzang yid 'ong bu mo dang / /rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis
spras pa'i rgyan/ /mal stan dkar po bting ba rnyed pa dang / /tho rangs khar ni chu bo chu klung dang / /'bab chu'am rgya mtsho dang ni rdzing bu dang / /lu ma la ni 'thung ngam rkyal
rmi dang / /de bzhin khrag gis lus khrus byed pa'am/ /lha khang mchod rten 'dug nas rgyal ba'i gzugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog dang rang sangs rgyas/ /zag
med dge 'dun dge slong dge slong ma/ /dge bsnyen rnams dang sa bdag lha rnams dang / /mchod gnas bram ze yid 'ong skyes bu dang / /mi dang mi mchog phyug cing 'byor pa'i
bu/ /pha ma mdza' bshes gnyen dang gnod sbyin dang / /grub pa'i lha dang na chung tshogs rnams dang / /ji snyed nyi ma zla ba za ba dang / /sa yi nang 'gro sa bon 'thung ba dang //
me la sri zhing sha ni za ba dang / /lus kyi nang du me ni zhugs pa mthong / /rmi lam bzang po 'di dag mthong ba gang / /de dag ring por mi thogs grub par 'gyur/ /zla ba
gcig dang zla phyed nyin zhag dang / /skad cig gis ni phyi phyir nye bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u lnga pa'o// //dngos grub nye na zlos la dga'
ba dang / /sems ni nam yang sdig la dga' mi 'gyur/ /bkres skom tsha grang rlung dang ngal ba yi/ /sdug bsngal drag pos nyen kyang g.yo mi 'gyur/ /sbrang bu sha sbrang srin bu
grog sbur dang / /sdig sbrul rkang brgya pa dang sbrul dang dred/ /sha za sprul po rnams kyang de dag gi /lus dang grib ma la ni mi 'gong ngo / /tshig ni gzung bar 'os shing yid
gzhungs la/ /snyan ngag dang ni dri ba rnams la mkhas/ /chos la mngon dga' gter rnams mthong ba dang / /lus kyi nad dang dri ma med par 'gyur/ /skye bos mthong ngam thos
par gyur kyang rung / /myur du mngon dga' yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /bud med 'dod lha'i mdas phog pa rnams kyis/ /'dod lha'i longs spyod phyir ni 'bod par 'gyur/ /gang
tshe mkhas pas lha dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha yi bu mo'i gzugs dang sgra/ /mis ni dga' ba'i yid kyis mthong thos na/ /de tshe shin tu nye bar gyur pa yin/ /lus ni dri med
dag par rig pa dang / /gso sbyong sdom pa dang ni ldan pa yis/ /nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum du ni/ /kha zas spang zhing smyung bar gnas pa yi/ /nyin zhag de dag
'das par byas nas su/ /rang gi 'byor phyir bsgrub la 'jug par bya/ /gsung de dpung bzang gis thos slar gsol pa/ /zas kyis mi 'dag
ces sngar gsungs pa dang / /mchod 'os khyod kyis lus dag bgyi phyir yang / /ci slad smyung ba mi bzad bgyi bar gsungs/ /srid pa'i mthar phyin bde bar gshegs
pa yis/ /shing rta'i mig bsku bza' ba'ang ci phyir gsungs/ /rdo rje can gyis dpung bzang tshig gsan nas/ /'brug sgra zab 'dra'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/ /bu
gcig lus dag bya phyir smyung bya bar/ /bde gshegs 'di na nam yang mi gsung yang / /lus 'di mi gtsang pags ba sha khrag rkang / /klad rgyas rgyu ma mcher mchin
mkhal ma zhag /mkhris pa bad kan khu chu phyi sa dang / /gcin snabs ba spu skra dang rus pa dang / /mig dang rna ba sna dang kha dang ni/ /bshang sgo mtshan dang bu ga dgu
pa yi/ /rma nas dri ma sna tshogs mi gtsang ba/ /'dzag pa'i rgyun ni rtag tu 'byung ba yin/ /de ltar yan lag thams cad 'dus pa dang / /sa chu me rlung nam mkha'
rnams dang ldan/ /dri bzhin las kyi rjes 'brang mi yi lus/ /thams cad ldan pa'i gzugs la gnas pa yi/ /bshang gci snabs dang mchil ma bad kan dang //
'di dag zad par bya phyir smyung bar gsungs/ /dri ma zad nas mi yi lus dag tu/ /rang gi 'byor phyir bsgrub la bde bar 'jug /'dod chags kyis ni gdungs par gyur na
yang / /lus kyi yan lag 'di dag thams cad la/ /dran pa rtse gcig mngon du byas nas ni/ /ye shes mig gis so sor rnam par brtag /de ltar rang gis nges par brtags
pa na/ /lus dang srog la rjes su chags pa yi/ /'dod chags rtsad nas yongs ye zhi 'gyur te/ /nyi mas mun nag gtan nas bsal ba bzhin/ /phan yon de yis gsang
sngags nye bsnyen nas/ /rang gi las la nye bar rig pa dang / /yar gyi tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi 'am/ /yang na bco lnga la ni bzlas brjod bya/ /lha yi gnas kyi sa dag
bstar ba'i phyir/ /sa dang lci bsres ba la sogs pas byug /dad pas bde gshegs kun la phreng ba dang / /lha bshos me tog dri dang mar mes mchod/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin
pa dang 'khor mchod/ /de nas rang sngags lha la dbul bar bya/ /bstod 'os sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bstod nas su/ /phyir zhing byang chub sems kyang dran byas te/ /sems
can skye rgan 'chis gzir ba la/ /ji ltar rigs par snying rje'ang bsgom par bya/ /'dus chen mdo sde bklag pa'am bkra shis kyi/ /tshigs su bcad pa'am chos kyi 'khor
lo mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'am sgron ma che/ /gang yang rung ba gcig ni rim bzhin bklag /de nas bla 'og phyogs rnams
bcings nas su/ /lus la go cha bgo bar byas nas ni/ /gong du smos pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams las/ /gcig cig tshon rtsi rnams kyis bri bar bya/ /rdo rje me chu
rlung dang mdung thung dag /rim bzhin dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bri bar bya/ /ra bar bris la lha dang lha min dang / /snang ba'i bdag nyid sems ni myos par 'gyur/ /seng+ge'i
gdan gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i stan/ /de ni dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag par bya/ /bdag nyid bsrung ba byas te der 'dug nas/ /rdzas blangs myur du bzlas
brjod byas nas ni/ /bdug pa'i sbyin sreg stong yang sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas de ni dri chus bkrus nas su/ /bgegs mang rnams kyang rab tu bsal byas nas/ /byang chub
shing lo gsum gyi steng du bzhag /bzhi yis bkab nas ji srid grub pa ni/ /rnam gsum mthong gi bar du gsang sngags bzlas/ /drod dang dud 'thul me bzhin 'bar
ba 'am/ /rim bzhin bzlog nas 'byung na'ang 'grub par gsungs/ /dro bas 'gro ba thams cad dbang 'gyur te/ /du ba 'thul bas lus ni mi snang 'gyur/ /'bar bas
mkha' la shin tu 'gro 'gyur te/ /mi yi lus ni lha ltar gsal bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar lus la grang ba 'jug pa dang / /ji ltar mngal du dri za 'jug pa dang / /nyi zer me shel
zhugs nas me 'byung ltar/ /de bzhin dngos grub lus la 'jug par 'gyur/ /mar me mched cing shin tu 'bar ba dag /snum zhing dkyus ring gser gyi mdog ltar
dang / /'bru mar zad kyang 'bar bar gyur na ni/ /de tshe sngags pas dngos grub thob 'gyur te/ /de dag rdzas las byung ba'i dngos grub bo/ /mis ni ri mo'i sku gzugs 'gul
ba 'am/ /phreng ba smin ma mig dang rnga yab bam/ /gal te rgyan rnams g.yo bar gyur pa 'am/ /mkha' las me tog char ram rdzi char 'bab/ /sa ni myur du g.yo bar gyur
pa 'am/ /lus mi snang bar mkha' las tshig tu ni/ /bu cig dam pa ci 'dod slongs shig ces/ /lha yi rnga sgra'am lus kyi ba spu ldang / /rgyan gyi char chen rab tu 'bab
pa 'am/ /ji ste mkha' la lha dang lha min dang / /gsang sngags gzugs ni mngon du mthong na grub/ /ma nyams me tog dbyig dang chu bsres shing / /bstod dang bcas
par mchod yon rgyun sbreng nas/ /rtse gcig sems kyi mgo btud phyag byas te/ /dad dang 'bad pa'i rjes mthun mchog blang ngo / /mchog thob nas ni dga' bas phyag
byas te/ /dad pas bstod cing mchod yon phul nas su/ /gsang sngags brjod cing slar yang gshegs su gsol/ /gsang sngags kun la
tshul ni 'di yin no/ /gang zhig sems stobs mchog tu ldan pa des/ /'dir ni 'jigs dang bcas pa'i las bya'o/ /sems stobs chung ba'i mi la sha za yis/ /
glags mthong nas ni phung bar byed par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo go bgos mtshon cha'i thabs mkhas pas/ /chas pa'i glang chen mchog zhon gzhu thogs nas/ /mda'
'phen mthu dang ldan pa gcig pus kyang / /dgra yi tshogs kun las ni rgyal bar nus/ /de bzhin sems stobs chen po'i tshul khrims kyis/ /go bgos legs
bsrungs glang chen zhon nas su/ /gsang sngags gzhu thogs bzlas brjod mda' 'phen pas/ /'byung po la sogs mtshan mo rgyu las rgyal/ /sgur po'am yan lag lhag
chad thung du dang / /de bzhin ring po yang na sbom po 'am/ /smad pa'i mngal na skyes pa'am ma ning ngam/ /rnam pa de 'dra'i ro dag spang bar bya'o/ /ma zhu ba dang rims
drag tshad pa dang / /'khru skyug bcings dang chu dang gsal shing dang / /sbrul gyis gsad dam dug gis shi ba 'am/ /bad kan sbrul sogs mthong min bsad pa la/ /yan
lag tshang zhing kha na ma smad pa/ /lus la rma med skyes pa'i ro mthong na/ /ral gri be con lag na thogs pa yis/ /nyin par thog thag tu ni bsrung bar bya/ /dur khrod khang stong
dang ni shing gcig dang / /bzhi mdo'am 'bab chu dag gam chu klung ngam/ /mtsho 'am rgya mtsho 'am ni ri bo la/ /skad cig gis kyang ro langs 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang yang
rung ba'i gnas gcig brtags nas ni/ /sa dang lci ba la sogs byug par bya/ /gtsang ma der ni dkar nag dmar po 'am/ /tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnams kyis dam tshig bri/ /
gong du smos pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams las/ /bsams nas 'dod pa gang yang rung ba gcig /dad pa chen pos rigs kyi yum gyi mchog /zlos shing rab tu bsgrims
te bri bar bya/ /'jigs pa med pa'i g.yog gis de blangs nas/ /khyer te 'ongs nas ku sha'i steng bzhag ste/ /skra dang kha spu rnams kyang bregs byas nas/ /de yi mod la 'bru
mar dag gis bsku/ /de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnag pa bzhi/ /gtsang ma'i chus bkang khrus rtsis sbyar te bkru/ /de nas gos dmar phrugs gcig bskon nas su/ /de nas
dkyil 'khor dbus su rtswa stan dang / /ma nyams me tog steng du ro bzhag cing / /ro yi mgo bo shar ram byang du bstan/ /dri yis byug cing bdug pas bdug par bya/ /phreng
ba gdags shing me tog sil mas gtor/ /sha dang nya sha mar khu til bsres pa'i/ /khur ba la sogs ji snyed bungs bskyed de/ /'byung po
klu dang sha za gnod sbyin dang / /'dre la bla 'og phyogs su spyin par bya/ /grogs po mchog ldan bdag nyid bsrung bya ste/ /rtse gcig sems kyis gsang sngags bzlas
brjod bya/ /ro ni ldang du nye ba'i tshe na ni/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can bgegs ni sna tshogs 'byung / /gtsug tor rgyal po'i sngags kyis thal ba'am/ /ma grugs
yungs kar sogs la sngags nas su/ /gtor nas phyogs bzhi dag nas 'ongs pa'i bgegs/ /gsang sngags mthu yis de dag 'byor bar 'gyur/ /de dag zhi bar
bya phyir khro bo ni/ /bdud rtsi thabs sbyor drag shul las can sbyar/ /bgegs rnams bcom pas de nas 'ongs ba'i bgegs/ /gsang sngags mthu yis myur du ldang
bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig gsang sngags cho ga zhib mo las/ /mthong ba de ni thogs med nges par 'grub/ /gal te ro de langs par gyur pa las/ /de yi gsang sngags cho
ga mi shes na'ang / /gsang sngags gzhan du bstan pa'i cho ga yis/ /langs pa de la rang gis dngos grub blang / /gter gyi phyogs dang phug tu 'gro ba dang / /ral gri
any+dza bzhon pa mngag gzhug dang / /'byung khungs gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub rab tu ster/ /bsrung ba'i stobs med sngags
kyi stobs med dang / /dka' thub stobs med sems stobs med pa yi/ /blo zhan gang zhig ro langs dngos grub tshol/ /de ni mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams kyis bsad/ /'phags
pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u drug pa'o// //mi gang mi yi sha ni 'tshong 'dod des/ /mar gyi ngo la dur khrod song nas su/ /shing rdo mtshon dang dug dang dbyug
to sman/ /bgegs la sogs pas shi bar gyur pa yi/ /byin pa brla dang ske dang mgo bo dag /'jigs pa med pas mtshan mo blangs nas su/ /btubs te skon bu'am gyo
dum sar pa 'am/ /gtsang ma der ni mi nyung bzhag par bya/ /lus la khrag gis lag rjes bris nas su/ /rgyu mas mgo dang mgrin pa dkri bar bya/ /lus la mi lpags
sar pa bgos nas kyang / /lag g.yon shas bkang gyo mo de thogs nas/ /khrag gis bskus pa'i ral gri lag g.yas kyis/ /rab tu bsgrims nas de ni thogs nas
kyang / /sgra cher 'bod cing tshig tu sha 'di dag /khyed cag su zhig nyo bar byed 'dod ces/ /shar dang byang dang lho dang nub phyogs su/ /myur du bskor zhing shin tu brjod
par bya/ /ci ste lus ni snang ngam mi snang bar/ /tshig gis khyod ni nor ram rig pa 'am/ /bcud kyis len pa'am grong ngam rgyal srid dam/ /phug
tu 'gro 'am ci 'dod ces zer na/ /sngar ni gang zhig sems kyis bsams pa'i don/ /de nyid smra zhing gzhan ni smra mi bya/ /rig pa mang pos bsten pa'i dur khrod
'dir/ /don 'di'i phyir ni sdug bsngal drag po yis/ /bdag kyang gdungs bzhin 'ongs kyi 'di nyid na/ /yod na sha 'di khyer la bdag la byin/ /ci ste srang la
bcal te ma gang na/ /rang gi sha yis de ni dgang bar bya/ /gal te dur khrod 'di ni stong pa ste/ /nor med bu khyod gzhan du song shig ces/ /mtshan mo rgyu bas de skad
bsgo na ni/ /de la bdag ni gang du 'gro zhes dri/ /lan thob de nyid rang gis brtags nas su/ /sha de bor nas de nas 'gro bar bya/ /sha yi cho ga ngas gsungs de
dag ni/ /gsang sngags ma bzlas pas ni bsten mi bya/ /rigs mchog gtsug tor stobs chen la sogs pas/ /dur khrod du ni bsrung bar ngas gsungs so/ /gsang
sngags drag pos gang zhig sha za ba/ /de la dur khrod mi sha'i sbyin sreg bya/ /ral gris sor gnyis sor gsum tshad tsam du/ /btubs nas me la sbyin sreg stong bya
'o/ /me tog ma nyams 'bras yos sha khrag nya/ /chang dang sbrang rtsi bu ram chang dang til/ /bdug pa phreng ba mar me byug pa can/ /lha bshos gtor ma dur khrod gtor bar bya/ /
dbab dang bskrad dang gnyid kyis myos bya dang / /dmag gzhom grong khyer phung bar bya ba la/ /sha za ma mo'am drag mo srin mo'i tshogs/ /gnod sbyin rnams la mi sha'i sbyin sreg bya//
mi yi sha ni rnyed par ma gyur na/ /ba lang sha yi sbyin sreg de bzhin shis/ /ma he'i sha 'am khyi sha mar bsres la/ /tshes grangs dag la smyung byas sbyin sreg bya/ /gnod sbyin
mo yi cho ga zhib mor ni/ /bsang sngags mnyes byas grub pa 'di rnams ster/ /ma dang sgyug mo sru mo grogs mo dang / /bu mo chung ma mna' mar grub par 'gyur/ /ma dang sgyug
mo sru mo gang yin de/ /med bzhin rin chen bzhin du grub pa mchog /yid 'ong grogs mo bu mo grub pa 'bring / /chung ma mna' ma grub pa tha mar bsgrags/ /dus gsum
du ni me tog phreng ba dri/ /mar ram 'bru mar mar me tsan+dan dang / /a gar dri zhim bdug pas mchod pa dang / /gtor ma sna tshogs rtag tu mtshan mo sbyin/ /gnod sbyin mo
ni dga' nas mngon phyogs nas/ /rnyed pa rnyed cing sa bon 'byung bar byed/ /'dod chags zil gyis non pa'i bud med dag /gnod par byed pa nges par gnas par
'gyur/ /bud med gnod pa byed tshe 'gro mi bya/ /rnyed pa mang nyung la yang 'dod mi skyed/ /sngags pas mtshan mo khu ba dgag byas la/ /brtson
'grus rab tu bskyed de bsgrub par bya/ /sems rmongs gang zhig gzhan du brtsam byas na/ /gnod sbyin mos ni myur du phung bar byed/ /bsams na phung bar yang ni 'gyur
ba nyid/ /sha za gnod sbyin mo la'ang de nyid de/ /de las cho ga lhag pa 'di rnams bya/ /sha chang la phug tshod ma cung peng dang / /nas chan ma sha can dang 'bras chan nya/ /
gtor ma de dag kun tu bdug pa dbul/ /gnas ni khang stong dag gam dur khrod shis/ /me tog shir sha kun dur arga dang / /bil pa pri ha ku sha ra dza rka/ /a kas ut+pal
a ta ru sha ka/ se'u can mya ngan tshang sogs me tog dbul/ /klu la bu ram 'o ma mar sbyar ba'i/ /bdug pa dri zhim a gar tsan+dan dri/ /phreng ba me tog dri zhim sna tshogs
dang / /'bras chan zho dang 'bras yos 'bras bu dbul/ /ba dan sngon po bum pa sngon po dang / /gos kyang sngon po lha bshos gtor ma dri/ /phreng ba byug pa me tog
sngon po dag /ji snyed brang gis 'gro ba rnams la dbul/ /mthe bong me long ral gri chu dang shel/ /mar me sa gzhi bcas dang nam mkha' dang / /lhung bzed nor bu
dag dang me 'bar ba/ /'di la gsal bar ston pa rtag tu 'byung / /'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar byung / /mtho ris sa steng dus dang mi ldan yang / /lha dang lha min dag dang
mi dge ba'i/ /las rnams thams cad gsal bar ston par rtogs/ /cho ga nyams pa'am yang na phyed bzlas pa 'am/ /yi ge chad dam yi ge lhag pa 'am/ /bzlas brjod ma
byas dad pa med pa dang / /mchod pa med cing sa gzhi mi gtsang dang / /sprin gyi tshogs kyis nyi zer bsgribs pa dang / /byis pa yan lag nyams shing lhag pa dang / /de lta bu la
mi yi gsal ston pa/ /'bad par mi 'gyur dgos pa yong mi ston/ /gsal ston dbab phyir sngon du cho ga bzhin/ /bzlas shing tshes grangs bzang la sngags pa yang / /smyung
byas dgongs kar sa dang lci ba yis/ /ba ko tsam gyis sa gzhi legs par byug /byug spos dang ni me tog bdug spos dang / /lha bshos mar me dag kyang phul nas su//
byis pa gzhon nu sta gon gnas par bya/ /de nas nang bar cho ga 'di kun bya/ /khrus byas lus la gos dkar gtsang bgos te/ /shar phyogs kha bltas ku sha'i gdan steng
du/ /'dug nas gsang sngags rjes su dran par bya/ /me long thal ba gtsang mas lan bdun nam/ /brgyad dam yang na bcur ni phyis nas su/ /rtse gcig sems kyis
gsang sngags zlos bzhin du/ /byis pa gzhon nu nub tu kha bstan pas/ /lha yi mig gis bltas na 'das pa dang / /da ltar dang ni ma 'ongs mthong
bar 'gyur/ /me long zhes bya'i cho ga mtha' dag ni/ /ral gri gsal bar ston la sbyar bar bya/ /mthe bong rgya skyegs khu bas bskus nas su/ /'bru mar dri zhim dag
gis bsku bar bya/ /bum pa gtsang ma chus bkang mi g.yor bzhag /sa btsugs lhung bzed nor bu chu yis dgang / /sku gzugs la ni bdug spos me tog dbul/ /
de nas byis pa gzhon nus blta bar bya/ /gsal bar ston nam rmi lam la sogs pas/ /dngos grub brtags te de nas bzlas brjod bya/ /gal te yid ni ches par
ma gyur na/ /de nas rig sngags mi gdug bzlas brjod bya/ /nga yi gsang sngags dag pa gang yang rung / /gso sbyong byas nas nan tan bzung nas su/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel
mchod rten drung du bzlas/ /yang na sku gzugs ma nyams spyan sngar bzlas/ /lus dang ngag yid lag pa mig dang ni/ /smin mtshams yan lag rnam par g.yo ba
dag /rab tu bsdams nas de la yid gzhol zhing / /byams la gnas shing ku sha'i khres la 'dug /ji srid du ni rtse gcig gnas gyur pa/ /de srid du ni 'bum mam
nyis 'bum bzlas/ /nga yi gsang sngags hUM zhes bya ba 'dis/ /shing la'ang 'bab na mi la smos ci dgos/ /de nas dbab pa'i snod rnams brtag par bya/ /bu mo gzhon nu
lo bcu'am bcu gnyis pa/ /bcu pa'am brgyad dam bdun nam bzhi 'am gsum/ /yang na khye'u 'ang rung ste gnyis sam lnga/ /tshigs rus rtsa mi mngon cing gzugs bzang
ba/ /yan lag rdzogs shing mig dkyus ring la dkar/ /kha bzhin zla 'dra mche ba mnyam la rno/ /sor mo thags bzang mdzes la long bu nub/ /lte ba zab cing mdzes la nu
mjing legs/ /ba spu re re skra yang gnag la stug /lto ba mi rlog gnyer ma gsum dang ldan/ /mdog kyang bzang zhing mnga' byad dang yang ldan/ /gang la yid dga' lta ba brtan
par 'gyur/ /blta bas kyang ni ngoms par mi 'gyur dang / /lha gzhan dag la mi phyogs dbab pa'i snod/ /tshes grangs bzang la nyin zhag gcig tu ni/ /smyung ba byas pas
bdug spos phreng ba dang / /tsan+dan mar me me tog rnams kyis mchod/ /bza' dang 'bras chan la sogs gtor ma mang / /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin rnams la sbyin/ /dbab
pa'i snod rnams khrus byas gos dkar bskon/ /shar phyogs kha bltas brgyan ni rnam par spang / /byug spos me tog la sogs de la sbyin/ /bdug pas bdug cing gsang
sngags bzlas brjod bya/ /hUM gis gsang sngags thog mar bzlas nas su/ /gr-ih+Na A bi sha zhes brjod par bya/ /mig ni gdangs shing 'dzums
par mi byed na/ /rdzogs par gyur par shes par byas nas su/ /'jigs pa med par de tshe dri bar bya/ /mchod yon dang ni bdug pa phul nas su/ /rig pa mchog gis gsang
sngags dran byas nas/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni lha tshogs gang yin dri/ /dus gsum dag gis bdag gi dgos pa gang / /de ni legs par dgongs la bka' stsol cig /
bde dang sdug bsngal dngos grub thob mi thob/ /shes nas de yang de bzhin bzung nas su/ /de ma thag tu slar yang gtang bar bya/ /mi sdug sngags bzlas cho ga 'di rnams
kyis/ /dbab pa'i don la sems ni phebs 'gyur gyis/ /gang zhig blun pas gzhan du brtsams na ni/ /de ni mi kun rnams kyis dpyas par 'gyur/ /zhi zhing gzhungs
la rgya cher dkyus kyang ring / /brtan zhing gzi che mdangs ldan dmar bar snang / /'dzums shing 'phyad med lha yi mig 'dra ba/ /dbab pa'i snod la lha babs de ltar 'gyur/ /
mig ni rab tu dmar zhing zlum por 'dug /bgrang cing mi sdug rab tu 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /'dzums pa med cing 'jigs med blta ba ni/ /srin po lto 'phye gnod sbyin
babs pa'i mig /gal te babs pa snod ni mi gtong na/ /shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod pa 'am/ /stobs po che 'am dgod pa'am lcags kyu bzlas/ /yang na rab tu
'dus pa'i mdo sde bklag /seng+ge'i gdan gyi arga'am pa la sha'i/ /yam shing mar gyis bskus pa brgya rtsa bsreg /ma grugs til ni sbrang rtsi'am mar gyis skus/ /gtum
pos sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ /snga ma bzhin du gsang sngags cho ga dag /dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin spyad nas ni/ /bdag gis yid dang mthun pa'i dngos grub thob/ /sngags
pa yun ring nyon mongs mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u bdun pa'o// //sangs rgyas kyis gsungs yan lag brgyad lam ni/ /yang dag 'tsho
dang las mtha' ting 'dzin dag /rtsol dang rtog dang dran dang lta ba rnams/ /so so so sor yang dag bsten par bya/ /lam 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags dngos grub cing / /de
bzhin 'dis ni mtho ris thar pa thob/ /rgyal sras sngon gyi rgyal ba 'das pa dag /'di nas gshegs shing de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /ngoms med sems kyis lus
dang ngag yid kyis/ /gus par bsod nams gang dag bsags pa yang / /bde gshegs gsungs pa'i bden pa'i lam dmigs na/ /dge ba'i lam de yang dag bskyed
pa yin/ /yongs su 'dzin pa rnam par spangs nas su/ /chos gos dang ni bsod snyoms ngan don dang / /sman dang mal stan ngan don tsam gyis
kyang / /chog pa'i sems dang ldan pas bsod nams thob/ /bdag la bstod pa nam mang mi bya zhing / /sems can gzhan la smad par mi bya'o/ /stag dang sprul dang
me 'drar 'jig rten dag /bsams nas spangs te dben la dga' bar bya/ /bud med mtshan nyid skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /sman dang glang chen brtag pa'am
skar ma'i dpyad/ /mtshon cha brteg pa'am rta dpyad rang bzo 'am/ /bstan bcos ngan pa slob cing klog pa spang / /glang chen rta dang ba lang bya gag khyi/ /gong mo sreg
pa 'ug pa skyes pa dang / /bud med bu mo byis par lug sogs/ /'thab mo 'gyed pa mi blta mi bya'o/ /yul sa'i gtam dang mi dbang bsten pa dang / /dmag dang
gyad dang na chung gtam dag dang / /sgrung sdebs dang ni sngon gyi lo rgyus dang / /'dod chags dang ni smad 'tshong gtam mi bya/ /sngags pa gsang sngags bzlas pa
mnos pa ni/ /grong dang grong khyer khyim dang gcug lag khang / /mchod rten bsti gnas ri dang dka' thub gnas/ /kun dga'i lu ma'am rdzing bur 'gro mi bya/ /
sngar bshad pa yi gnas rnams ma rnyed na/ /lha khang stong pa dag gam shing drung ngam/ /ri dang chu bo chu klung 'bab chu dang / /nags tshal stong pa dag dang yul stong dang / /gnas
gang rung bar sngags pas gnas shing bzlas/ /yang na gnas ni nges par ma byas na/ /zla ba brgyad po 'di yis dus dag tu/ /gnas 'di gang yang rung ba gcig tu bsten//
mtsho dang shing dang ri bo dgon pa'i gnas/ /mtshe'u dang khang pa gnas sam chu ngogs su/ /dgun dpyid zla ba rnams la gnas byas nas/ /sngags pas dbyar ni gcig tu gnas
bya ste/ /ji ltar rgyal bas dge slong dbyar zla gsum/ /tshul zhugs gnas gzhan mi 'gror gsungs pa bzhin/ /de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags pa yang / /zla ba gsum
du gcig tu gnas par gsungs/ /sngags pas dbyar ni bsgrub la mi 'jug par/ /bzlas brjod kyis ni dus kyang bzlas par bya/ /dbyar 'das nas ni gsang sngags gzi bskyed
pas/ /bdag nyid bsrung byas bsgrub la 'jug par bya/ /me thab zlum po gru gsum gru bzhi dang / /pad+ma lta bur bya zhing dbyibs legs shing / /'jam zhing shin tu mnyam par
byas nas su/ /de dag sa dang lci bas legs par byug /zlum por dbang thang bskyed dang nor dgug dang / /spyan drang zhi ba'i cho ga bya bar shis/ /gru gsum du ni dgar bskrad
bsad pa dang / /gshed byed la sogs drag po rnams kyang bya/ /gru bzhi par ni klu dang gsang ba pa'i/ /srog bskam pa 'am yan lag gzhig par
bya/ /pad+ma'i dbyibs su bud med bu mo'i grong / /yul 'khor thob pa'am don kun bsgrub par shis/ /me thab lci ba gtsang mas byugs nas kyang / /tha ma thog thag ku sha
dgram par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum dang phyag na rdo rje dang / /yum la'ang dad pas phreng ba bdug pa dang / /dri dang mnyams me tog ci snyed pas/ /cho ga bzhin du
legs par mchod par bya/ /yam shing mang po thab kyi drung bzhag ste/ /rlung yab kyis ni me ni sbar byas nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag byas khro bo ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil
pas ma nyams pad+ma 'am/ /ma grugs til nag las ni bdun nam brgyad/ /bcu 'am nyi shur sreg blugs me la bsreg /ku sha bting ba'am khres sam rtswa stan la/ /
'dug nas shar phyogs kha bltas rdzas rnams ni/ /mar ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma la btags nas/ /rang gi gsang sngags sgrub phyir sbyin sreg bya/ /me yi mtshan ma nye bar
brtag pa ni/ /me stag du ba me lce sgra rnams las/ /de bzhin 'grub dang mi 'grub thams cad kyang / /sngags kyis byin rlabs me ni ston par byed/ /du ba med cing
gser gyi mdog ltar dwangs/ /me lce rab tu che la g.yas su 'khyil/ /kha dog 'ja' 'dra yang na dkar yang rung / /yang na byu ru bcag pa'i kha dog 'dra/ /shin tu snum la me
lce 'gab nas 'phro/ /rab tu 'bar ba nyi ma'i 'od zer 'dra/ /dbyibs ni bum pa rgyal mtshan gdugs kyang 'dra/ /dpal be'u dang pad+ma blugs gzar 'dra/ /me lce tri shul rdo rje
ral gri 'dra/ /yang na shing rta mchog dang rnga yab 'dra/ /rdza rnga rnga chen dang ni gling bu'i sgra/ /du ba me lce dri zhim me stag bzang / /yang na ma sbar bar yang 'bar gyur na/ /de tshe dngos
grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /du ba che zhing me stag rgod pa dang / /'bar bar dka' zhing cung zad cung zad 'bar/ /me lce rnam par chad cing gzi mdangs med/ /rtsub gnag
sprin dang pa la sha yi mdog /gsal shing 'dra zhing zhib ma'i gzugs kyang 'dra/ /phyugs kyi mgo 'dra skra yang rab tu rtsub/ /me lce 'phro bas sbyin sreg byed pa tshig /mi ro'i
dri nga dngos grub med pa ston/ /me lce'i mtshan ma 'di 'dra mthong nas kyang / /stobs po che yi mar gyis sbyin sreg bya/ /byin pa dag dang mchan khung spu rnams ni/ /lag pas
kyang ni btog par mi bya zhing / /me yis mi sreg spu gris dreg mi bya/ /spu med bya phyir sman gyis mi byug go /ji ltar ral gri so la 'dzin pa'i mis/ /legs par ma bzung lag
pa chod pa ltar/ /de bzhin sngags kyang legs par ma bzlas na/ /'bras bu med pa'am yang na phung bar 'gyur/ /mi ni tshul khrims gtsang sbra
mi ldan yang / /gsang sngags lha ni nam yang gnod mi mdzad/ /lha yi 'khor du gyur pa gang yin rnams/ /mi yi glags mthong nas ni phung bar byed/ /sgrub pa kun la dang
po kho nar ni/ /lha bshos gtor ma phal cher dbul bar bya/ /sngags pa'i las grub nas kyang dus kun tu/ /rang gi nyams kyis ji snyed dbul bar bya/ /lha dang lha min
gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul ba/ /dri za 'byung po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang / /gang dgas la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/
bu smad g.yog 'khor tshogs dang bcas rnams la/ /bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyi/ /gsan nas phan gdags
phyir ni longs spyod cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i chal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang / /shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang / /ri bo
kun la gang dag gnas pa dang / /chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang / /rin chen gnas na lhag par gang gnas dang / /mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu ngogs dang /
g.ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang / /grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang / /khang stong dag dang lha yi khang pa dang / /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag
gam/ /dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dag dang / /rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang / /lam srang 'dun khang dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /gang dag lam po che dang
shing gcig dang / /dur khrod chen po'am nags tshal chen po dang / /seng+ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang / /'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang / /gang dag gling
mchog rnams na gnas pa dang / /lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams/ /rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su/ /phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang / /bstod dang gtor
ma mar me gus dbul ba/ /'di bzhes nas ni btung zhing bsnams nas su/ /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas su/ /de
nas phyogs skyong rnams la mchod pa bya/ /dbang po 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas pa yis/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje srin po chu bdag
dang / /rlung dang lus ngan 'byung po gdon dang bcas/ /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang / /lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang / /ri yi lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams
la/ /so so so sor gtor ma phul 'di rnams/ /rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang / /rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su
rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang / /nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs gcig tu/ /me tog dri dang byug pa gtor mar bcas/ /'di rnams btung zhing legs
par gsol nas kyang / /bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de ltar gang zhig mtshan mo rgyu ba la/ /gtor ma gtong ba'i las rnams byed pa de'i/ /dngos
grub myur zhing shin tu bgegs kyang med/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'ang thob bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u brgyad pa'o// //
gang zhig dgra bcom pha ma gsod pa dang / /mthun pa'i dge 'dun dbyen ni byed pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs la sdang ba'i sems kyis su/ /nam zhig mi dag sku mtshal
'byin par byed/ /shin tu mi bzad pa yi las 'di rnams/ /rgyal bas mtshams med lnga po yin par bshad/ /gti mug can gyis sdig pa gcig byas kyang / /phung po
'di la grub pa thob mi 'gyur/ /mchod rten bshig cing byang chub sems dpa' gsod/ /nyon mongs zad pa'i ma ni sun 'byin dang / /slob pa gsod cing dge 'dun
mnga' ba la/ /gang zhig 'dod pas mang nyung rku 'phrog pa/ /mtshams med nye lngar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /tshul nyams mi gang zhig ni 'di byed pa/ /bskal ba'i
bar du mnar med sdug bsngal myong / /gsang sngags dngos grub bsgrims kyang yong mi thob/ /gang zhig bde gshegs gsung gi glegs bam dag /chud gson pa dang mes ni
bsreg pa dang / /bsam pa ngan pas chur ni 'dor ba dang / /yang na chos kyi sku ni spong ba'am/ /bslab tshig ma lus pas ni brgyan pa yi/ /dge slong dag gam dge slong ma gsod
dam/ /dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma gsod dam/ /ngan pa'i sems kyis lha khang bsregs kyang rung / /mi yi yul na sdig pa 'di byas pa/ /dka' ba spyod pa ldan yang grub mi
thob/ /gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa yi/ /bsam pas gnod pa cung zad byas kyang rung / /bdag nyid ngan pas dmyal bar bcos par 'gyur/ /de nas shi nas
las kyi dbang gis kyang / /rigs ngan mi dang dud 'gror skye ba 'thob/ /'di dag ngas ni khyod la mdor bshad pa'o/ /gang zhig byang chub sems ni blangs pa las/ /rmongs pas
'jig rten lha tshogs phyag byas na/ /de dag de la mi dgar gyur nas su/ /de yi gsang sngags dngos grub nyams par byed/ /gang gi tshe na sems ni dang ba yis/ /mi yi yul
na byang chub sems blangs pa/ /de ni phyin chad lha dang lha min dang / /'jig rten ma lus rnams kyis phyag byar 'os/ /mis ni mngon par mtho
ba ma lus pa'i/ /bslab pa mtha' dag blangs par gyur pa dang / /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang / /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang bsabs pa yin//
gang zhig mi bzad las byed thub pa gsod/ /rig sngags gcod dam gnod par byed pa'am/ /bsam pa ngan pas gsang sngags tshogs mi mchod/ /don med bzhin
du sen mos rtswa gcod dang / /rkang pas rkang pa nyed par byed pa dang / /phyugs la sogs pa sna tshogs sna 'bugs dang / /'phags pa'i dge 'dun la ni mi gus pa/ /'byung
por byin nam lha yi gtor ma'am/ /sa la lhung bas sngags pas bza' mi bya/ /'dod chags zil gyis gnon pas dud 'gro dang / /bud med bgrod bya min par
'gro mi bya/ /glang chen mi gdul sprul yang mi gzung zhing / /rta rgyug glo rdebs lcags kyis gzhu mi bya/ /las de rnams dang ldan par gyur pa de'i/ /dngos grub nam yang
'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can nad kyis gdungs dang sdug bsngal la/ /rtag tu byams pa'i sems ni yid la bya/ /dper na nam mkha' mthar thug med pa la/
'dom gyis gzhal bas mtha' rtogs mi nus ltar/ /de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la brten nas ni/ /phan gnod byas pa'i dge sdig mtha' mi rtogs/ /rgya dang rnyi dang bod rgya
'jol bu mis/ /khyi la sogs pa'i sems can gsod pa dang / /bya rog la sogs gzeb kyis bcings byas nas/ /'di dang pha rol tu yang grub mi thob/ /bdud dgra'i me
tog rnying pa por ba rnams/ /rkang pas mi rdzi mgo la gdags mi bya/ /bkres pas gdung kyang de dag rnams la ni/ /phul ba'i lha bshos rnams kyang bza' mi bya/ /'jigs
kyang tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug dang / /drag po rlung lha sogs la phyag mi bya/ /des bshad pa yi chos la mi bsten zhing / /de dag dka' thub mi spyad rtags mi mchod//
de dag chos la'ang ngan sems mi bya zhing / /de yi spyod la nam yang dga' mi bya/ /de dag bstod pa mi gdon sngags mi bzlas/ /sbyin pa byin tshe snying rje bskyed nas sbyin//
bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis brten pa yi/ /gnas dang rgyal sras rnams la phyag bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams/ /de dag rtag tu phyag bya'i
gnas yin no/ /ji ltar zla ba tshes la mi rnams ni/ /phyag 'tshal nya la lus can phyag mi 'tshal/ /de bzhin dad pas rgyal ba'i thugs sras la/ /phyag bya de ltar bde bar
gshegs la min/ /'jig rten kun gyi mngon mtho bslab pa can/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i don du ni/ /skye ba len pa de la ci yi phyir//
bu gcig bdag nyid kun der phyag mi bya/ /skyes bu bsam yas rmad byung rdzu 'phrul can/ /de la mi ngan gang zhig mi 'dud pa/ /de la rgyal ba thams cad thugs nur
nas/ /de yi gsang sngags dngos grub mi stsol to/ /dper na shing gi me tog dang por ni/ /yid 'ong phyi nas 'bras bur 'gyur ba ltar/ /sems can mchog rnams me
tog 'dra bar ltos/ /'bras bu bzhin du rgyal ba rig par gyis/ /gang zhig rang bzhin chags sdang rnam bral yang / /brtse la snying rje khro la khro ba dang / /'dod chags
can la chags can ltar ston pa/ /byang chub tshul gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig las dang rnam smin mkhyen pa yis/ /'gro ba kun la ji ltar mthun pa yi/ /
gsang sngags gzugs kyi rjes su 'jug mdzad pa/ /sngags kyi rnam 'dren de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u dgu pa'o// //
lha dang lha min mi la phan gdags phyir/ /gsang sngags rig sngags rnam pa sna tshogs dag /bya ba phrag gsum dang ni 'bum phrag lnga/ /rig 'dzin sde snod bshad
par rgyal bas gsungs/ /ngas ni gsang ba pa rnams gzhom pa dang / /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor bcas shing phyag rgyar ldan pa yi//
gsang sngags bye ba phrag bdun rab tu bshad/ /pho nya bcu dang rig pa'i rgyal po bdun/ /de bzhin phyag brnyan drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / /nga yi snying po dam pa brgyad rnams dang /
khro bo drag po bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang / /rig pa mchog la sogs pa mthu bo che/ /rig pa'i bdag po gsang sngags rjes 'brang bcas/ /de snyed rdo rje'i rigs ni gang yin ba/
de dar ni 'di dag nga yis rgya cher bshad/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi gsang sngags bye ba phrag /gsum dang de bzhin 'bum phrag lnga rnams bshad/ /de yi rig sngags bdag po rta
mgrin dang / /de yi ming can dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum/ /bcu gnyis phyag dang phyag drug pa dang ni/ /thor tshug cod pan 'dod pa 'byor byed dang / /zhal bzhi don yod
zhags la'ang bdun bstan pa/ /sa steng gsang sngags nyi ma bdun ltar 'bar/ /de rnams rta mgrin dkyil 'khor gsang sngags te/ /mi la mchog sbyin 'jig rten gsum
gyis 'dud/ /sgrol ma dkar mo gos dkar can ma dang / /rnam gzigs ral pa gcig ma dkar sham dang / /grags ldan khro gnyer can dang 'di dag rnams/ /pad+ma'i rigs
kyi rig sngags rgyal mo mchog /de dag dkyil 'khor smra tshogs gzugs can dang / /phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs rnams dang ldan/ /rgyal ba'i gsang
sngags rgyud du 'og pag can/ /rig pa'i dbang phyug gsang sngags bdag por bsgom/ /de yi gsang sngags mi la grub mchog ster/ /de la lngas rtsen yang ni mngon par
dga'/ /gnod sbyin dbang phyug de dang rtags mthun pas/ /de yi bka' yis gsang sngags tshogs rnams bshad/ /lngas rtsen gyis ni stong phrag nyi shu ste/ /de yi chung mas
de yi phyed bshad do/ /nor gyi bdag pos stong phrag sum cu ste/ /gang po'i pha yis kyang ni 'bum bshad do/ /lha dang lha min la sogs rgyal ba la/ /dad pa rnams kyis gsang
sngags mtha' yas bshad/ /kha cig nga yi rigs su gtogs pa ste/ /kha cig kyang ni pad+ma'i rigs su gtogs/ /kha cig nor gyi rigs su gtogs pa yin/ /gzhan
yang kha cig gnas med rnam par 'khyam/ /nor spyod ces bya nor gyi rigs su gsungs/ /nga ni rdo rje'i rigs las rab tu bstan/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma'i
rigs yin te/ /rigs bzhi pa ni 'dir yang lngas rtsen yin/ /gsang sngags mdo sder ngas bshad gang yin de/ /bzhi po 'dir ni rnam par sbyar bar bya/ /gzhan
yang 'di na kha cig gnas med par/ /bde bar gshegs la brten cing yongs 'khyam pa/ /mdo sde 'dir ni de dag thams cad kyang / /'byor bar 'dod pa'i mis ni rnam par
sbyar/ /lam 'di nyid du zhugs pa'i sngags pas ni/ /yid dang mthun pa'i dngos grub thob bar 'gyur/ /srid gsum nang na rgyal ba dkon mchog ste/ /de yi 'og tu de las
byung ba'i chos/ /de yi dge 'dun skyes chen brgyad po ste/ /srid pa gsum na dkon mchog gsum po gtso/ /'di gsum bsod nams rnam 'phel rgyu yin pas/ /dngos grub 'dod
pas gsang sngags mgo la gdon/ /bsod nams ched dang log 'dren rmongs bya'i phyir/ /phyag na rdo rje gtum mchog phyag 'tshal zhes/ /gsang sngags rnams kyi mgo la
sbyar bar bya/ /gnod sbyin mgon po ngas ni bshad pa yin/ /nor gyi rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs la yang / /rang gi gsang sngags bdag por ldan par bya/ /bde bar gshegs
min nyan thos lam zhugs dang / /rang rgyal rnams kyi lam la gnas pa dang / /dad pa med cing tshul khrims 'jungs pa yis/ /nga yi rdo rje nam yang bcang mi bya/ /gang
zhig theg pa mchog la sdang ba dang / /bdud kyis bshad pa yin zhes smra ba dang / /rmongs nas nga la gnod sbyin zhes smra dang / /byang chub sems dpa' la ni mi 'dud pa'i/
dge slong dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang / /dge bsnyen ma dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyis/ /nga yi rigs kyi gsang sngags bzlas brjod na/ /de
dag rnams kyis lus ni myur du 'jig /gang zhig nga rigs rjes su 'brang ba'i gdon/ /'byung po gnod sbyin klu dang sha za yis/ /nga yi sngags zlos rdo rje thogs pa dag
mthong nas khros nas phung bar byed par 'gyur/ /gang zhig theg mchog rgya chen klog pa dang / /de la dad cing de nyid 'chad par spro/ /brtson 'grus che zhing byang chub sems
brtan pa/ /de la nga yi gsang sngags mchog sbyin mdzad/ /ngas ni 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas pa'i/ /gsang sngags yangs shing rgyas par bshad pa yin/ /de nas
gzhan yang 'jig rten pa bsdus nas/ /zhar la bshad pa 'di dag khyod kyis nyon/ /drag po yis ni bye ba phrag bcu bshad/ /nor lha'i bus ni stong phrag sum cu
ste/ /tshangs pa yis ni stong phrag drug cu nyid/ /nyi mas kyang ni 'bum phrag gsum bshad do/ /nam mkha' lding gis stong phrag bco brgyad de/ /gtum byed mas ni
stong phrag brgyad bshad do/ /me yis kyang ni brgya phrag bdun nyid dang / /phur bu gsum pa yis ni stong bshad do/ /klu mi rgyal po rnams kyis lnga stong ste/ /mtshan mo
rgyu dbang stong phrag bcu gnyis bshad/ /'gro la phan phyir 'jig rten bdag po bzhis/ /'bum phrag bzhi ni rab tu bshad pa yin/ /lha min dbang pos 'bum phrag gnyis
nyid de/ /lha yi dbang pos kyang ni 'bum phrag gsum/ /gsang sngags phyag rgya sna tshogs cho gar ldan/ /so so'i gzhung gi dkyil 'khor rnams dang bcas/ /rang sngags rdo rje'i
rjes 'brangs dad bskyed na/ /ma bsgrims bzhin du the tshom med par 'grub/ /de las bzlog na dngos grub mi thob la/ /sdug bsngal mang po yang ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /'phags
pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u bcu pa'o// //bcud kyis len dang gter dang phug 'gro dang / /nor bsgyur 'byung khungs sngags dang gser bsgyur rtsi/ /rin
thang med pa'i rin chen nor sbyin te/ /brgyad po bstan pa yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /sngags dang phug tu 'gro dang bcud kyis len/ /sdig pa spong bar byed pa mchog tu
bstan/ /rin chen dang ni gter dang 'byung khungs 'bring / /gser bsgyur rtsi dang nor bsgyur tha ma 'o/ /mi ni sems stobs ldan zhing chos la brtson/ /dka' thub gyis phyug
dang por bstan pa'i snod/ /rdul shas che ba la ni 'bring por gsungs/ /tha ma la ni mun pa can gyis bsten/ /gang zhig mchog tu bstan pa bsten 'dod pa/ /des ni tha mar
bstan pa rnam par spang / /gal te nor la sred cing sdug bsngal gyis/ /gdungs na 'bring po la ni bstan par bya/ /lha yi bde ba dang ni 'byor
pa dang / /tshe dang stobs gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / /thos mang mdangs bzang gcig tu yid gzhungs dang / /dbang thang che kun dka' thub stobs kyi 'thob/ /
chags dang rnam bral dge la dga' ba dang / /rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la sems gzhol dang / /sdig pa spangs shing bzlas brjod ldan pa yi/ /mi la lha rdzas
dngos grub ring ba med/ /rdo rje mtshon me gnam lcags mthu 'dra ba'i/ /gsang sngags mi yi 'jig rten mchog sbyin mdzad/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol nyid na yang / /
sdug bsngal sel cing sdig 'joms gzhan med do/ /gang zhig dpag bsam ljon pa'i shing lta bu/ /la lar dngos grub la lar bsod nams dang / /gzhan la gzugs
stobs che dang bde ba dag /yid mthun 'bras bu 'dod pa'i mi la stsol/ /gsang sngags sna tshogs gzugs su rnam sprul nas/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal gang zhig 'jigs
skrag pa'am/ /rgyal po chom rkun thog gis 'jigs skrag pa'i/ /'gro ba'i tshogs chen mtha' dag skyob par mdzad/ /gang zhig yul dang khyim la bsten kyang rung / /
dka' thub ma nyams rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /nyin zhag gcig tu cung zad sngags bzlas na/ /de yi gsang sngags dus shig na ni 'grub/ /cho ga bzhin du dang por 'bum bzlas
nas/ /de nas sngags pa bsgrub la 'jug par bya/ /de nas dngos grub myur du thob 'gyur la/ /gsang sngags cho gas yun ring nyon mi mongs/ /lus la sa yis dril phyis byas
nas su/ /chu chen rnyog pa med par zhugs nas kyang / /ci tsam 'dod pa'i bar du khrus byas te/ /byung nas shar ram byang du kha bltas nas/ /chu yis lag pa rkang pa bkrus
nas su/ /pus mo phyi rol du ni bstan byas te/ /bar du lag bzhag tsog tsog por 'dug nas/ /sgra med dbu ba med pas nye reg bya/ /lan gsum bar du chu ni 'thungs nas
kyang / /mchu la lan gnyis yongs su phyi bar bya/ /so la chags pa lce yis reg pa dang / /sbrid pa byung na kha yang bkru bar bya/ /rab byung skyes pa bud med gzhon nu dang / /
gzhon nu ma dang bram ze rgan mo rnams/ /de la nam yang sngags pas reg mi bya/ /sngags pas de dag rnams la mi bsam mo/ /brgya la de dag rnams kyis reg gyur tam/
sgrub pos de dag rnams la reg gyur na/ /slar yang khrus dang 'thor 'thung byas nas su/ /de nas phyir yang bzlas la 'jug par bya/ /gtsang sbra la dad zlos dga' snying
rje can/ /rtag tu len pa las ni log pa dang / /slong mo'i zas za lha yi las la brtson/ /de yi lus la gsang sngags 'jug par 'gyur//
'ga' yis bud med gos dang nor rnams dang / /bzhon pa rgyan dang byug pa bza' btung dang / /mal stan rnams ni mang nyung byin gyur na/ /de la sgrub la gnas par
mi blang ngo / /sa phung bshang sgor lnga ste mtshan la gsum/ /g.yon la gsum ste lag pa gnyis la bdun/ /yang na sa dang chu yis ji srid du/ /dri ma dri bral de srid
bar du bya/ /sos ka nags me mched pa'i me lce yis/ /ma bsgrims bzhin du tshang tshing kun bsregs ltar/ /bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar/ /brtson
'grus chen po'i me lces sdig pa sreg /ji ltar gangs la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/ /gdungs na gzi brjid mi bzod 'ju ba bzhin/ /tshul khrims nyi ma'i 'od zer
bzlas brjod kyis/ /gdungs na sdig pa'i gangs kyang zad par 'gyur/ /mun nag smag la mar me phyung pa yis/ /mun nag ma lus sel bar byed pa ltar/ /tshe rabs
stong na gnas pa'i sdig pa'i mun/ /bzlas brjod mar mes myur du sel bar byed/ /ci ste sbyin sreg dang ni bzlas brjod kyis/ /gsang sngags bsgrubs kyang dngos
grub ma thob na/ /'jim pa las ni mchod rten 'bum gdab pa'am/ /yang na chu 'gram bye ma dag la gdab/ /des ni de yi sdig pa srid gzhan la/ /byas pa gang yin de ni zad
gyur na/ /des ni gsang sngags mthu yis 'di nyid du/ /mthong ba'i chos la bsod nams 'bras bu thob/ /sngags kyi rtsa ba dang po tshul khrims te/ /de nas brtson 'grus dang
ni bzod pa dang / /rgyal ba la ni dad dang byang chub sems/ /gsang sngags dang ni le lo med pa'o/ /de ltar mi dbang yan lag bdun ldan pa/ /skyo ba med par skye dgu 'dul
bar byed/ /de bzhin sngags pa'ang yan lag 'di bdun dang / /ldan par gyur na sdig pa 'dul bar byed/ /dang po bzlas brjod phal cher byas nas su/ /de yi 'og tu 'dir
ni sbyin sreg bya/ /sbyin sreg dag gis gsang sngags mchog myur stsol/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'ang sbyin par mdzad/ /gang gis dpag tshad brgya yi pha rol nas/ /
gsang sngags mthu yis bud med bkug kyang ni/ /bud med ma yin gnod sbyin bu mo ste/ /de gzugs cha byad kyis ni sngags pa bsten/ /'dod pa'i don phyir bsgrubs pa
gang yin te/ /grub na'ang gnod sbyin bu mos sbyin par byed/ /de ni bud med de yi lus su yang / /sprul nas mtshan mo 'dod pa bsten par byed/ /ji ltar mi dag 'dod phyir
bud med la/ /bsten pa'i mi ni nor ni zad 'gyur ltar/ /de bzhin gnod sbyin mo 'am bran mo dag /gsang sngags mthus bkug bsten
par byed pa'o/ /gzhan gyis chung mar yid la bzhag nas su/ /gang zhig de la 'dod gdungs sten byed pa/ /mi shes yid kyis gzhan gyi chung ma la/ /'dod pa
spyad pas sdig pa mang du thob/ /rgyal ba la dang gzhan la phan brtson pa'i/ /lha klu lha min gnod sbyin dri za dang / /grub par bcas pa'i sngags bshad gang yin
pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang sangs rgyas/ /de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /ma 'ongs sems can mgon skyabs med rnams la/ /
rab tu gzigs nas byin gyis brlab pa mdzad/ /de dag 'bras bu rab dang 'bring dang ni/ /tha mar dbye bas rnam pa gsum du bstan/ /mkha' la 'gro dang dpal
gyi phug tu 'jug /'dod dgu'i gzugs can mi snang rnam pa dang / /gnod sbyin mo yi khyo dang bcud kyis len/ /mig 'phrul sgyu ma mtshan mo rgyu ba ste/ /de dag
mchog yin 'bring ni sa bdag go /grong dang nor dang dbye dang dgug pa dang / /dgar dang bskrad pa dang ni gsad pa dang / /klu yi gdon gyis zin pa gso ba dang //
gang yang 'di lta bu dang mthun pa'i las/ /de ni mkhas pas phran tshegs yin par bstan/ /bye phrag tu ni klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /byis pa gdon gyis zin dang gang dag tu/ /
lus can rnams la ngo mtshar sna tshogs dag /ston par byed par phra mo phran tshegs yin/ /bya ba dang khu tshur thal lcag skra drang dang / /rna bar bzlas dang dbang dang bskrad pa
pa dang / /bsad dang bcing la sogs pas tshar gcad dang / /bod dang rig pa'i gos dang sngags gos dang / /rdog pas bsnun dang rnam par bskyod pa dang / /mig tu dug song
ltar ni gzhug pa dang / /khab kyis gzugs dang kha bcing skyug tu gzhug /phu zhes bud dang yan lag gzhig pa dang / /brang gis 'gro ba dag dang dgug pa dang / /phyir yang
bcing dang mnan par bya ba dang / /rmongs par byed dang dug zar gzhug pa dang / /dug ni gzhan la spo bar bya ba dang / /lcags kyur ldan pas drang bar bya ba 'am/ /lus la
zhen pa'i dug ni bslang ba 'am/ /zos par bza' dang zos pa bcad pa dang / /sa bcing ba dang pho nya btang ba dang / /bskrad pa dang ni klu la bstan pa dang / /dung dang rdza rnga'i
sgras ni bslang pa ste/ /rnam pa 'di dag dug gi rgyud du bshad/ /sa yi steng na sbrul ni brgyad cu dag /gzhan la gnod par byed cing rnam par 'khyam/ /de dag rnams ni
nyi shu gdengs ka can/ /'khyil pa drug dang dug med bcu gnyis dang / /de bzhin sprul ni khro bo bcu gsum ste/ /sum cu gang yin
rigs de'i nang du gtogs/ /sbal pa'i mgo dang sdig pa kha brgyad dang / /rnam par dbye na rab tu mang po yod/ /gcin rtug kha chu reg dang mthong ba dang / /mche ba
btsugs pa las ni dug kyang gtong / /de la dug gi rgyud la mkhas pa yis/ /rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa gsum du dbye/ /dug mod khro bo'i dbang bsgyur skrag pa dang / /
de bzhin sngags pa'am/ bkres pa'i zas phyir ram/ /sha khon yod pa'am gshin rjes bstan pa'am/ /lus la brdzis na de dag za bar byed/ /zos pa de yang
rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ /mche bas 'dzin dang sos bcad btab pa'o/ /gang du mche ba gcig gis khrag phyung rjes/ /de ni dug chung bas ni zin par bshad/ /gang
du mche ba gnyis kyis btab nas su/ /khrag dag byung bar gyur pa zos pa'o/ /gal te mche ba gsum gyis sha bcad na/ /de ni bcad par gyur pa yin zhes bstan//
