phyin par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par bstan pa dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi

gleng gzhir sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po byung ba mngon par bsgrubs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi mthus rab tu 'byung zhing der de
dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig /ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis smon lam chen po shin tu yongs su dag pas bsgrubs pa rang gi bsod nams las nges par skyes pa/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi zhing bstan pa de dag yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
gcig tu 'gyur zhing chu zheng dpag tu med pa dang / yon tan gyi rgyan dpag tu med pa'i ming dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khyad par 'phags pa mngon par mtho ba'i rgyan bkod
par mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / thos pa dang / dran pas lhan cig mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su btang ba dang / mar mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes mi snyegs pa/
ngang tshul ngan pa/ sdig pa'i chos yang dag par spyod pa/ rgyud bsregs pa/ bsam pa bsregs pa/ sa bon bsregs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa/ ngan song la mngon par phyogs
pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gtum po dam pa'i chos spong ba de rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'dus pa dang por 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bdag gis
de dag thams cad zhi ba'i lam bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la dgod par gyur cig /de nas ji tsam du khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can de rnams zhing der 'dus pa gnyis pa la
'byung bar 'gyur zhing bdag gis de dag thams cad bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par gyur
cig /de bzhin gshegs pa dung gi 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ shad+khe/ sh+ng+khe/ sh+d+kha pAN+Da re swAhA/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dus pa'i yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad bdag gcig
pu gnyis su ma mchis pas rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'phel bar bgyi bar spro bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag stong pa nyid dang /
mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid mngon du mdzad cing / de las gzhan pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang mngon du mdzad
nas bde bar bzhugs pa tshegs chung ngus bzhugs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rtsi mo'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ shi khe/ shi kha ban+d+he swAhA/
de'i 'og tu bdag tshogs shin tu bsags/ brang pa yongs su rdzogs/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bgyi bde bzhin nyid
kyi 'khor lo dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'khor lo dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi 'khor lo dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
smon pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byung ba'i 'khor lo dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i 'khor lo dang / chos
kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i 'khor lo dang / bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang pa'i 'khor lo dang / nga dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / chad pa dang /
bdag dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par zhen pa'i bar mi
dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang / mdor na gang na 'khor lo med pa bskor ba med pa de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur cig /rab tu bskor nas sems can rnams su yongs
su smin par gyur cig /yongs su smin par bgyis nas sems can la sman ba'i slad du sems can gyi khams dang / las kyi khams dang / nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / nam mkha'i khams
ji tsam pa de tsam du gnas par gyur cig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ mnye/ sarba ma n+ya pra hA Ne swAhA/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / sangs
rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan yongs su spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa
la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba dang / pha ma dang / bla ma dang / yon gnas dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dman pa dang / bkren pa dang /
sdug phongs pa las bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i dge ba'i tsa ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / mthol ba dang / bshags pa dang ldan pa
dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang ldan pa dang / byis pa nas bzung nas da ltar ram/ skye ba thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis ba'i 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu
bsags pa nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar gang lags pa de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bgyis nas mchog dang / gtso bo dang / gya
nom pa dang / rab dang / phul dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong na mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong ma dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam
pa dang / mnyam pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang /
nyon mongs ma mchis pa dang / chags pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang / lus dang / sems grol ba dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa
nyid kyi yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis
gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid mngon du mdzad nas yongs su bsngos pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /
ji ltar chos nyid de dang / ji ltar de bzhin nyid de dang / ji ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' de dang / ji ltar chos nyid kyi dbyings de dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid de dang / ji ltar rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de nas ji ltar de kho na nyid mthong ba'i bar gang la gnyis med cing gnyis ma yin pa med pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas dang /
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he/ bud+d+he/ sarba bud+d+ha bi Sha ya bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ 'phags pa yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyal po sngags dang bcas pa ji snyed
pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes snying po dang / dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa'i/ /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang / /ngan 'gro rnams las bsgrol ba dang / /nyon mongs rnams las sgrol ba'i
phyir/ /srid pa mi bde dog pa na/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs ci mchis pa/ /de ltas yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed do/ /sems can phongs pa thams cad kyi/ /
skyabs su bdag nyid rtag tu shog /bdag ni mgon med rnams kyi mgon/ /rten med rnams kyi rten du bdag /skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal bde bar byed pa dang / /
bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs zhi bar byed par shog /dge ba'i las rnams gang dang gang / /'di dang gzhan du bsags pa rnams/ /bsod nams ye shes zhes bya
ba'i/ /tshogs ni rnam pa gnyis su shog /pha rol phyin pa drug sgo nas/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus gang brtsams pa/ /de yang sems can ma lus pa/ /thams cad la ni phan par shog /
tshe yi mtha' klas byed pa dang / /gang yang cung zad byed 'gyur ba/ /mdor na sems can thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs thams cad zhi ba dang / /grol bar bya
ba'i phyir 'bad cing / /byang chub rab tu dga' brtson no/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/ /cho ga bzhin du kun tu bskyed/ /sems can kun dang snying rje dang / /byams pa nye bar
gnas par bya/ /sems ni legs par sbyang ba'i phyir/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis rjes dran drug/ /nang gi bdag nyid zhi ba yis/ /bsam pa gcig tu bsgom par bya/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i
sras rnams kyi/ /smon lam ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin/ /bdag kyang dge ba'i sems kyis su/ /de bzhin du ni smon lam 'debs/ /chos kyi longs spyod sna tshogs la/ /mnyam par
bzhag nas yid rang ngos/ /sems can thams cad bde ba dang / /zhi zhing nad kyang med par shog /bdag ni bya ba kun nus shing / /yon tan dang yang ldan par shog /nor ldan gtong
phod shes rab can/ /bzod ldan dge la dad pa dang / /sems can tshe rabs thams cad du/ /skye ba dran zhing brtser ldan shog /dpal legs par grub par byed pa'i rgyud chen po
las 'byung ba'i smon lam rdzogs so// //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje
chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal
mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag
gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang / sems can thams
cad kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs
rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang / sems
can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon lam ji skad bstan pa thams cad kyang myur du thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas
bdag dang / sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing dam pa mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang /
sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten dag na phongs shing nyams thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyid pa la mthu chen po thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas 'jig rten
dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang / me dang / chu dang / rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang byung bas skye bo mang po nyams thag pa de dag zhi ba dang / ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig /
btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod
pas bdag dang / sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jig rten chen po nye bar gnas pa na'ang 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon
sum du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen po mdzad par gyur cig /bdag dang / sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma spros pa/ chos bdag med pa
dran pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems tshad med par brtan pa/ sems ma zhum pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing
dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar gyur cig /tshe rabs thams cad du'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang / byang
chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug las sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing ji skad bstan pa bzhin du grub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig/
ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro
gcig par gyur cig /ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang / sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas dus gsum gyi rgyal
ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyis thugs rje'i rang
bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis pas thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams
cad la'ang snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi chad par 'byung bar gyur cig /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /de snyed bdag ni lus skyes par/ /de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing /
de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par/ /de srid mgon po mtshan brjod cing / /ngag gi sbyor ba tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid
bdag ni 'khor ba na/ /de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba/ /de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing / /yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig /de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug
rten bgyis pas/ /lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing / /yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig /de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs/ /rtag tu sbyor bar
bgyis pas na/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs/ /srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig bo/ /yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te/ /srid gsum
re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA ka ru ni ka ya/ oM tsakra brti/ tsin+tA ma Ni mahA pad+ma ru ru

tiShA/ dz+wa la a kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs so// //oM pad+me tsin+tA ma Ni dz+wa la hUM/ snying po'o/ /oM b+ha ra ta pad+me hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM ma Ni badzre Ni hUM/
gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /sngags snying bzhi 'byung ba dang / smon lam dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / sngags su bcad pa rdzogs so// //dkon
mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'di'am gang dag 'das pa dang / /mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lhar gyur ba/ /mi yi mchog
dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med/ /de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /zad pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas/ /shes pas
shAkya thub des rab tu phye/ /bdud rtsi zhi ba 'dus byas ma yin pa/ /chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med/ /de bas 'dis ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir
ni dge bar shog /mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab bstan pa/ /ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa/ /rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis lam mthong ba/ /ting 'dzin de dang mnyam
pa yod ma yin/ /de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /gang zag chen po brgyad po rab bsngags shing / /gang zag zung bzhir
brjod pa de dag ni/ /dang song chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa/ /bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas zhes gsungs/ /de la byin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te/ /zhing rab gshin
la sa bon btab pa bzhin/ /'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /gang dag bstan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing / /go
ta ma yi bstan la 'jug byed pa/ /de dag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jug thob ste/ /mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa/ /de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de
yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni/ /'jig tshogs lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang / /the tshom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag /gcig char spangs te 'phags
pa'i bden mthong ba/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang / /sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi
byed cing / /glo bur byas na'ang 'chang par mi byed pa/ /de ltar de dag lta bas 'dzin mi byed/ /de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /
ci ltang dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa/ /phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi g.yo ltar/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi/ /gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhin
no/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /shes rab zab mos shin tu bstan pa yi/ /'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam sgom
zhing / /lus kyang sbyin par yid la byas pa ni/ /de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /
bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /ci ltar me ni rlung gi rab gtor ba/ /lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid/ /de ltar kun tu sbyor ba rab btang ba/ /sangs rgyas sras
rnams bstan du med par 'gro /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden ba de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams
cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /ston mchog lha dang mis ni mchod 'os pa/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams
cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams
cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa
'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag /skyes dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog /'di ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis//
shin tu bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang / /rab rgyal dag
gi gzi brjid dang / /dgra bcom dag gi mthu dag dang / /gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang / /shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang / /maung+gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang / /ma 'gags pa yi
mig dang ni/ /'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / /kauN+Da'in+ya'i sngar thob dang / /kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang / /tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang / /brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang / /'jig
rten skyong ba'i yul rnams dang / /dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang / /sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang / /'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang / /de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis/ /
bdag gi dug ni dug med shog /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal
ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor pad+ma dkar po'i drung / /thams cad skyob ba sA la'i drung na gnas/ /bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shir sha'i drung / /sangs rgyas

gser thub u du ma bA ra'i drung / /'od srung n+ya gro d+ha yi drung na gnas/ /shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du/ /phyin nas byang chub thob gyur gau ta ma/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la/ /
mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag /lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas/ /rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar 'gyur bar byos/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag
'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis khyed rnams bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /mtshan mo bde
legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la 'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /de dag sdig par ma gyur cig /nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/ /rgyu skar thams cad
bzang po yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/ /dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med/ /bden pa'i tshig gis kun tu bde legs su gyur cig /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po
las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang / bden tshig rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zas skom bzang po'i ro zhim zhing mdog sdug la dri bsung dang
ldan zhing ngad ldang ba/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i nags tshal dkon zhing dri ma med la rgyan gyis klubs pa/ yal ga'i thor to'i ljid
kyis gzur za la mgo lcogs me tog kha phye zhing 'dab mas legs par brgyan te bung ba lang long khyus lding zhing 'phungs pa rnams kyis bzhib cing non pa'i shugs kyis bag tsam
'dar ldem ldem la rin chen yal ga dang / ma rgad lcug phran gyi bla re 'jol ba dang / mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ 'gro ba dag tu mtshor bar 'gro ba'i g.yangs chen po yang ba dag
tu mar me snang gsal dag cing dri ma med pa lta bu byin pa gang las bsod nams dang / bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang / dge ba dang / dge ba'i rgyu dang / mthun pa bde dgu'i gzhir
gyur pa des na sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid che ba che ge mo zhig gi lus dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis bsgrubs pa la tshe dang / kha dog dang / stobs dang / gzi byin dang / longs spyod dang /
dbang phyug dang / shes rab dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /sbyin bdag gi bsod nams ma skyes pa rnams ni skye bar gyur cig /sbyin bdag gi longs spyod kyi sa zin
ba rnams ni 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig /de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi pha ma mchog tu dka' ba byed byed ba/ gso gas/ gnam gnam/ bskyed bskyed/ bsring bsring la dzam+bu'i gling
bkra yer yer mig gis mthong bar byed pas kyang bsod nams kyi phud kyi skal shas thob par gyur cig /de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi chung ma rnams dang / bu rnams dang / bu mo rnams dang /
sbyin bdag gi gnyen 'dab mdza' bshes rgyas ba'i tshan ris gang dag 'khod cing 'tshol gnas pa de dag kyang tshe rang zhing longs spyod che la g.yog 'khor mang bar gyur cig /gang dag
'das shing tshe 'phos pa de dag kyang 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i gnas dang / gnas tha dad pa'i khyad par thob pa 'gyur te lha'i gnas su skyes par gyur nas
'phags pa byams pa'i zhal snga nas mnyes par byed par gyur cig /de bzhin du rgyal po'i mchog rgyal po chen po mnga' bdag dam pa dpal lha btsan pos ma phebs pa rnams
ni phebs par gyur cig /phebs zin pa rnams ni cham du phebs par gyur cig /stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyang brnyes par gyur cig /de bzhin du nye 'khor
gyi grong na gnas pa'i rigs bzhi ste bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs la sogs pa yul gyi mi rnams la nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur cig/
de bzhin du mi mdzed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / klu'i rgyal po
dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bde ba'i ri bo dang / gangs can dang / lngas rtsen dang / lnga len la sogs pa dang / nor bu bzang dang / rdzogs
bzang gnyis dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas par/ gzhan yang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sbyin bdag gi khyim 'di na gnas pa'i lha rnams dang / sbyin bdag gis bsten pa'i lha'i khyad par
gyis de dag gzi sbyin dang / stobs dang / gzhal med khang rnams rgyas par gyur cig /de dag gzi byin dang ldan par gyur/ stobs dang ldan par gyur/ gzhan gyis mi tshugs par gyur/
che bar grags par gyur nas/ sbyin bdag bdag nyid chen po 'di nyid kyi mdzod dang / bang ba dang / ba lang gi khyu dang / phyugs gdags sna tshogs kyi khyu dang / zhing gi rmo rko dang / lam gyi sgo
rnams dang / bla 'og gi bya ba thams cad la chos bzhin du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par gyur cig /gnod pa rnams ni zlog par gyur cig /don du bsgrubs pa rnams ni
snang bar gyur cig /de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi dad pa dang sbyar te dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyis gnod pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /dud 'gro rnams gcig la gcig
za ba rnams zlog par gyur cig /yi dwags kyi bkres shing skoms pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /mi rnams tshol 'gros g.yen sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi
bar gyur cig /lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /mdor na khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems
can thams cad dang / srog chags thams cad kyis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa ma skyes ma byung ba/ ma byas ma bcos pa/ 'chi 'pho med pa/ mi gnas pa/
dmigs su med pa/ bde ba/ zhi ba/ gya nom pa/ bde legs can/ gnas dang / gling dang / skyob pa dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / mi g.yo ba gang yin pa'i mya ngan
las 'das pa'i chos kyi mchog de reg cing thob par gyur cig /gnod sbyin gang dag bzhon pa mi zad dpung can lha rdzas gos gyon phreng ba thogs/ gang dag 'jig rten
gsum mchog mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod pa'i sangs rgyas skyabs song ba/ /lngas rtsen lag na rdo rje nor sbyin dpal can nor bu bzang sras las sogs pa/ /de dag thams
cad lhan cig rtag tu khyod kyis khyim du chos bzhin srung bar shog /lngas rtsen dang ni 'phrog ma bu sdug 'khor bcas nor bu bzang sras dbung dang bcas rnams dang / /gnod sbyin
dbang po lag na rdo rje rang gi sde tshan bcas dang rang gi sder bcas dang / /gzhan yang gnod sbyin dbang po gang dag sde chen grags ldan bstan pa dag la dga' ba rnams/ /thams
cad mthun par khyod kyi pha tshan dang ni gnyen sdug bcas la rtag tu skyong gyur cig /mtshan mo dang ni nyi ma 'char ka nyi ma'i gung rnams dang / /nyi ma nub kar rtag tu khyod la bkra
shis ldan par shog /dpal chen lag na rdo rje nor bu bzang dang 'phags skyes sogs/ /khyod dang gnyen 'dun rnams dang bcas la yongs su skyong gyur cig gtong la dpa' ba
rnams kyang khyim 'khor stobs dang 'byor pa grub cing mi nad med par shog /yon gnas rnams kyang yon tan tshogs pas 'phel bar 'gyur zhing 'bru rnams rab tu rgyas par
shog /mchod rten rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa yun ring 'bar bar shog /rgyal po chos bzhin byed pas skyong gyur sems can mtha' dag
rab zhi bde ba myong gyur cig /sbyin pa'i rabs las byung ba'i smon lam rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /
rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing / /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing /
chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /khyed
la bde legs mdzad par gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyi 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig
'khor bar 'khor ba yis/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur ba de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad bar 'gyur/ /gang
zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes
pas/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal
bcas par rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos
gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyan
pa gang byung de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyi pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /khyed
la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lha bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu
sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yi/ /khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring 'grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyod
cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs gyur/ /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir ldog dag kyang bde gyur cig /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs//
nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs
mdzad kyi/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dag /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /
'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/
thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyi bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhag gyur cing / /sa dang bar snang
dag la gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo
las 'byung ba'i bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ swa sti gAThA/ bod skad du/ bde legs kyi tshigs
su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha cig nye bar song nas su/ /lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te/ /sangs rgyas chen po thub pa che/ /ci zhig smras na bde legs
'gyur/ /des ni tshig 'di gsan gyur nas/ /'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig rtag tu rjod byed pa/ /nga yi bde legs 'gyur te ston/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang
mtho ris na/ /rin chen rgya chen mchog ni gang yod pa/ /des ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la/ /cis kyang grangs dang bgrang dang char mi phod/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med
de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin tu gya
nom gang / /shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag thugs chud pa/ /chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te/ /de sngon byas na phyin chad mya ngan med/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med
de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /rgyal ba gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs
pa/ /de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste/ /sbyin gnas de dag sa steng shin tu dkon/ /de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge
'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin gya nom pa/ /'od mchog
dpa' bo dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /shes rab dam pa mchog gi dam pa mchog /mchog min mchog mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /ting 'dzin dam pa bar chad med pa gang / /mtha' yas blo
ldan de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa/ /ting 'dzin de brtan rdo rje dper byas pa/ /ting 'dzin de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /ting
nge 'dzin gyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /ji ltar sgo gtan dam zhing rab dam ste/ /stobs
chen rlung bzhi dag gis mi bskyod pa/ /de ltar mkhas pa bden bzhi mthong gnas pa/ /'jig rten smra ba rnams kyis 'dir mi g.yo/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /
dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /
thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stobs rnams kun dang ldan/ /kun gyi dam pa 'dzin pa kun dang bral/ /bsam pa kun
mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden
mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /srid pa 'gog cing mi g.yo 'gyur ba med/ /skyon med 'jig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /shin tu 'gog
cing gya nom nges par 'byung / /shin tu dri med zhi ba blos mi 'phrog /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar
nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'di ni shin tu bde legs shog /shin tu sdug bsngal ston cing bde sbyin pa'i/ /bden rnams mthong ste gang dag bag
yod pa/ /bden pa rin chen rnams la dogs bral ba/ /de dag skye ba brgyad pa phyis mi len/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig
rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /dam pa rnams kyis dam pa don ldan mkhyen/ /mchog dang mchog min
mkhyen cing don dam brtson/ /gzhan gyis mi phrogs dam pa thugs chud rtogs/ /shin tu sdug bsngal rnams kyi dpung mnyen mchog /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /'dun pa skyed nas rnal 'byor ldan
gyur cing / /gau tam bstan la rtag brtson rab grol zhi/ /gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dag zhi der reg/ /'di la de reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med
de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /bden pa mthong bas brjed
pas brgya lam na/ /gal te sdig pa 'ga' zhig byas gyur kyang / /de ni de 'chal ba yi 'os min te/ /chos nyid 'di ni mi g.yo gnas phyir ro/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad
byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dir ni shin tu bde legs shog /lha dang
bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad na/ /sangs rgyas dang ni lhag pa'am mtshungs pa med/ /lha dang mi yi ston pa bla na med/ /ston pa ded dbon sman pa
rnams kyi mchog /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa
'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /sos ka'i zla ba dang por thub pa yis/ /nags khrod chos kyi dam pa rab brnyes pa/ /chos de dang ni lhag pa'am mtshungs pa med/ /
'di la de reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog
na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /sdug pa rnying zad gsar du byas med la/ /rims nad med pas 'jigs med mya ngan bral/ /rtsa ba 'gags pas
srid pa mi skyed pa/ /bstan pa mar me bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar
nga'i 'dod bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ swa s+t+ya ya na gA thA/
bod skad du/ bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'dren pa'i drung du ni/ /lha zhig nye bar song nas su/ /gang gis rtag
tu bde legs pa/ /bdag gis zhu yi bcom ldan gsungs/ /dam pas de dag gsan pa dang / /'jig rten 'dren pas lung bstan pa/ /gang gis kun tu bde legs su/ /'gyur ba lta khyod
legs par nyon/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la/ /dad pa mi g.yo legs rab bstan/ /gang zhig dge ba tshul khrims can/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig pha dang
ma dag dang / /bu dang bu mo bran dag la/ /rtag tu legs par bsnyen bkur ba/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig dgra bcom grags pa la/ /legs par rab dang yon 'bul dang //
lha yi bka' bzhin byed pa dag /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid la nyes byas med pa dang / /gang zhig rnam gsum rab bsdams pa/ /de dag kun
tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'byung bo thams cad la/ /tshad med kun tu mi 'khrugs pa/ /byams pa'i sems ni sgom byed pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig sdug
bsngal kun spang phyir/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /bde ba 'dren pa legs bsgom pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dus byas thams cad kyis//
stong nyid rtag tu legs mthong zhing / /de ni sems la gnas gyur pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis lus kyi dri med chos/ /mngon sum byas
nas rgyu ba dang / /dgra bcom rnam grol sems ldan pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /gti mug rnams dang chags bral zhing / /ye shes
'khrug med skyes gyur pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/ /mgon po yang srid spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas khong du chud gyur pa//
de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /bde legs su 'gyur pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ de ba pa ri pri ts+tsha maM ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/
lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mgon po phyogs gcig bzhugs pa
na/ /lha gcig dpa' bo chen po la/ /phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig gsol to/ /dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /lha dang mi rnams so so nas/ /bkra shis dag ni brjod bgyis na/ /bkra shis
dam pa gang zhig lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /lha dang mi rnams so so nas/ /bkra shis rnams ni rjod byed pa/ /de dag bkra shis
brjod par bya/ /yul bzang gnas dang grogs mchog dang / /sngon chad bsod nams byas pa dang / /sems ni legs par gtad byas pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /sbyin dang shin tu snyan
smra dang / /yang dag don la rnam nges dang / /khrims ldan rnams dang mtshungs sbyor ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /byis pa rnams la mi bsten dang / /mkhas pa rnams la bsten pa dang / /mchod
'os rnams la mchod byed pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /pha ma bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / /zhi dang tshangs par spyod pa dang / /'byung po kun la snying brtse ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin//
sdig pa'i las las ldog pa dang / /dge ba'i las la bsten pa dang / /bag yod pa dang rtag mkhas pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /nga rgyal med dang khengs med dang / /chog shes
mthun pa'i 'tsho ba dang / /rtag tu byas pa gzo byed pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /sbyin spyod de bzhin bzod pa dang / /'phags pa rnams dang mthun sbyor dang / /dus skabs su ni
chos nyan pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /le lo med dang mang thos dang / /chos la legs par rnam nges dang / /de bzhin sems la rnyog med pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig
sems can thams cad la/ /byams pa'i sems ni rab bsgom zhing / /dpag tu med de mi 'khrug pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig 'phags pa'i bden rnams la/ /shes rab mig
ni rnam sbyangs dang / /tshul khrims nongs par ma gyur pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba dang / /tshangs par spyod pa sgom pa dang / /
mya ngan 'das pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang / /shes pa mi 'khrugs skye 'gyur ba/ /
de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /'jig rten chos rnams kyis bskyod kyang / /gang gi sems ni mi g.yo dang / /dri med zhi dang mya ngan med/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /de dang de ni
ci rigs par/ /'di la bkra shis de dag ni/ /mkhas pa gang zhig bstod byed pa/ /de la rtag tu bkra shis 'gyur/ /lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// /
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'chal lo/ /dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bkra
shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mi bskyod pa/ /rin chen 'byung ldan 'od dpag med dang
don yod grub/ /rigs lnga bde gshegs rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje sems ma dang ni rin chen sems ma dang //
chos kyi sems ma dang ni las kyi sems mar bcas/ /bcom ldan yum mchog rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje
sems dpa' dang ni rdo rje rgyal po dang / /rdo rje chags pa dang ni rdo rje legs par bcas/ /bcom ldan mi bskyod 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng
'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje rin chen dang ni rdo rje gzi brjid mchog /rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang ni rdo rje rgyal po dang / /bcom ldan rin 'byung 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis
dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje chos rab dang ni rdo rje gnon po dang / /rdo rje 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje smra bar bcas/ /bcom ldan snang mtha'i 'khor gyi bkra shis gang
yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje las rab dang ni rdo rje srung ba dang / /rdo rje gnod sbyin dang ni rdo rje khu tshur bcas/ /bcom ldan don grub 'khor gyi
bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /lha mo sgeg mo dang ni lha mo phreng ba ma/ /lha mo glum dang ni lha mo gar mar bcas/ /nang gi mchod pa'i lha
mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /lha mo bdug spos ma dang lha mo me tog ma/ /lha mo mar me ma dang lha mo dri mar bcas/ /phyi yi
mchod pa'i lha mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /sgo ba lcags kyu ma dang sgo ba zhags pa dang / /
sgo ba lcags sgrog ma dang sgo ba dril bur bcas/ /bcom ldan sgo srung rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /dpal

rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyis bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can/ /tshe lo brgyad khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ /shi ri sha yi
shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can/ /tshe lo
bdun khri'i dus na su ka'i grong khyer du/ /shing mchog pun d+ha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /rgyal ba thams
cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can/ /tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du/ /shing mchog sA la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis
phun sum tshogs gyur cig /thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni bcom ldan bram ze'i rigs/ /tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ /shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs
rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs/ /tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer bde
ldan du/ /u dum bA ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /skyob pa 'od srung rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can/ /
tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na bA rA Na sI ru/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'gro mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal
rigs brtson 'grus can/ /tshe lo brgya ba'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du/ /a shwat+tha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs
gyur cig /sangs rgyas rabs bdun bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang / /phyogs dus kun gyi bde gshegs byin brlabs rmad byung ba/ /chos dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs
ldan mi 'gyur ba/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
pany+tsa ta thA ga ta maM ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan/ /zla ba nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa/ /dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra
shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid pa'i gti mug rnam sbyong ba/ /mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas bkra shis pa/ /dge mnyam bsam
sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad cing / /yang dag bden pa'i 'byor
pa sbyin mdzad mi slu ba/ /rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /bsam gtan ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa pha
rol phyin pa'i gnas/ /ye shes pad+mo'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing / /tshe grangs med par byin gyis rlob pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi
byed shog /sems can don gyi las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing / /'gro ba kun gyi 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa/ /thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /
bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rigs
gsum gyi bkra shis/ bcom ldan gser mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku/ /bde gshegs sku yi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis
des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog /bcom ldan dung mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /bde gshegs gsung gi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /
bkra shis des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog /bcom ldan ljang ser ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon phyag na rdo rje ste/ /bde gshegs thugs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra
shis des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /dpal rigs gsum gyi bkra shis rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ rat+na tri mang+ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi
bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgya mtsho lta bur rgal dka' 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis bsag dka'
ma lus rdzogs/ /'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig gyur pa de bzhin gshegs/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /rang don spangs shing gzhan don rtag tu lhur len cing //
'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la lta ba brgyang bsrings te/ /dad dang brtson 'grus lhur len grogs mchog byang chub sems/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang
deng 'dir bde legs shog /skye 'gag med cing rtog pa'i 'ching byed mtha' dag spangs/ /ma rig mun pa 'joms byed stong nyid sgron ma'i mchog /dmigs pa sna tshogs
spangs pa lam gyi bde sgrub chos/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //
rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags su sku mdog zla ba'i gser 'dra ba/ /shes rab rtags su ral gri bo ti
phyag na bsnams/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /thugs rje'i rtags su sku mdog zla
ba'i 'od chags pa/ /skyon gyis mgos phyag mtshan phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir
bde legs shog /chos nyid mi 'gyur rtags su sku mdog mthing nag sngo/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i bkra shis gang
yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /rigs gsum gyi bkra shis rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ mang+ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/
bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum
spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed dang po 'o/ /de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /
'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa 'o/ /dge 'dun dam pa'i chos
ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug /mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis
gsum pa 'o/ /sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba po/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par brtul ba yongs ldan pa/ /tshogs kyi lam gyis thub pa'i bkra shis gang byung
ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i/ /gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ /dbang
bcas lha yis bskor ba'i bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams pa zhi byed shog/ lo ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lum bI'i
tshal/ /lha mang dag gis bsten par mgon po bltam pa na/ /srid pa'i mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang byung pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer ser skya'i
gnas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du/ /lhums nas bltam pa ston pa bde gshegs zas gtsang sras/ /myur bskrun bdud rtsi'i chus gtor ba yi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des
ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni/ /rmad du grags pa che ba'i lha yis mngon bstod pa/ /bsam pas dge bsgrubs bsod nams
phung po'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /dgyes shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste/ /dka' thub tshal du mngon par gshegs
shing tshangs la sogs/ /lha yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /rab tu 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga'
zhing / /baiDUr+ya ltar sngo ba'i rtswa bting steng bzhugs te/ /skyil mo krung bcas mi g.yo mchog gi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /chu bo'i
'gram na tsa sha'i phreng gis yongs bskor ba/ /shin tu rmad du byung ba'i srid pa sel mdzad pa/ /klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams
la zhi byed shog/ shing rgyal drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs/ /mang po btul te sa steng dang ni nam mkha' la/ /bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang
byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs te/ /nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dag rnam btul ba/ /ston
pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer bA rA Na sIr drang srong mchog bzhugs nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mchog
tu bstan pa'i bkra shis gang / /lha yul dang ni shin tu rmad du byung gyur pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa dag byed pa/ /bsod
nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa/ /bcom ldan shAkya thub pa'i seng ges gang gsungs pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /mu stegs byed pa kun
gyi nga rgyal gzhom pa dang / /'gro la bde ba bskyed phyir cho 'phrul dam pa dag /nye bar ston pa rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro
la phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs/ /sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i
bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer gshegs pa/ /man dar ba'i me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa/ /lha
mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas pa/ /mkha' lding gnod
sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /dkon mchog gsum
dang mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur
cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ rat+na tri swa sti gA thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon
mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /che ba'i che mchog ston mchog bla na med/ /chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin brlabs kyis/ /bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi
ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med/ /dam chos bdud rtsi bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /nyes pa'i skyon bral
dge tshogs rnam 'phel ba/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba/ /rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin brlabs
kyis/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /tshangs dang lha dbang srung ma'i byin brlabs kyis/ /phan mdzad lha yi
bkra shis gnas gyur te/ /bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin grub pa dang / /tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan par shog /dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa bcom
ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des pa la gsungs pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ni mi tra dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
la phab pa'o// //gsar bcug kha skong 'di rnams gong gi 'jug mtshams so sor pod che long 'khod zin stabs le tshan che rigs rgyud sde'i go rim bzhin 'jug ma bde nas 'di bas rim par bzhugs pa/
rgya gar skad du/ ku la lo ka nA tha pany+tsa da sha ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba/ dpal ldan rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de nas 'di ni mchog tu gsang / /'jig rten yang dag rmongs pa'i mchog /rigs dang rigs byung mngon brjod pas/ /gnyis mod
sngags ni rab bshad bya/ /dam tshig spyod pa nges par grol/ /bya ba dus tshod rnam par spangs/ /de nyid gsum ldan yang dag lha/ /'jig rten mgon po 'gro ba'i bdag /'dod
pa'i dbang phyug 'dod pa'i lha/ /mthong dang ma mthong 'bras rab ster/ /de 'dir sngags ni mtshungs med pa/ /bla ma'i zhal la rnam par gnas/ /drag chen 'jigs byed lus la
ni/ /lnga pa'i thig le dang bcas shing / /rnam gcod dang po yang dag ldan/ /chen po lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan/ /lce gnyis yan lag med gnyis gnas/ /lus gsum gyis ni
sngags mchog la/ /yi ge rnams kyi bsdu ba las/ /mtshan nyid cho ga bzhin du bzlas/ /'di yi rjes dran sngags pa yis/ /gtsang ngam yang na mi gtsang rung / /lha bzhin mthong ba
lha rnams kyis/ /de yi lha mo 'dod lha bzhin/ /'di bzhin sngags kyi 'dod lha yi/ /bya ba med cing bsgrub pa'ang med/ /mchod med me la sbyin sreg med/ /rnal 'byor ldan dang yang
dag ldan/ /dus tshod rnams las rnam nges grol/ /rtse gcig sems ni g.yo mi byed/ /sgrib pa dang bral mtshungs pa yi/ /mchog gi bsam gtan yang dag sbyar/ /rigs kyi 'jig
rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa lnga bcu pa las sngags kyi de khon nyid kyi le'u ste dang po'o// //snying ga'i 'khor lo'i nang song ba'i/ /de nyid gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro /dbye ba
nyis 'gyur de las ni/ /ye shes nyid ni kun 'gro bya/ /mi 'gyur dga' ba'i yul rig pa/ /sems kyi rjes su rtogs pa can/ /bya ba de yi bde 'dod phyir/ /rtog pa kun nas 'jug par
'gyur/ /de yi ngo bo rtogs nyid 'jug /de sems dga' ba'i spyod yul la/ /bya ba dang ni las rnams kun/ /tshig dang bcas pas the tshom med/ /bsam gtan rnal 'byor yang dag ldan//
brtan par dgod bya blo ldan gyis/ /'gro kun dgra yi rang bzhin gyi/ /sa steng sa 'og mtho ris sgrub/ /lte ba'i pad+mar pad+ma che/ /rnam gsum nam mkha'i nang song ba/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag
ldan/ /nam mkha' phyag rgya'i bdag nyid bzhin/ /srog 'bab pa yi tshad kyis ni/ /gnas gnyis po yis goms par bya/ /de bzhin rab tu dgod byas nas/ /'jig rten mgon po'i sku
ru 'gyur/ /gang gis gzhan du bzlas byas dang / /las rnams kyang ni bsgrub byas na/ /de ni mkha' la khu tshur bsnun/ /rmongs pas sbun stong 'joms par byed/ /bsam gtan sbyor bas
cho ga bzhin/ /las gang rtag tu bya ba ste/ /de las myur du sgrub byed do/ /de yi las ni yid kyir 'dod/ /rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa lnga bcu pa las bdag gi de kho na nyid
kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //rang bzhin bsam gtan dang bcas shing / /dzA ti mtshal gyi 'od zer bzhin/ /se 'bru le brgan me
tog bzhin/ /li khri dmar po dang mtshungs gtso/ /sngags kyi sku yi lha yi lha/ /zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/ /mkha' pad zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /khyab bdag zhags pa lcags
kyu bsnams/ /mchog sbyin phyag gis yang dag rol/ /mu tig nor bus rnam par brgyan/ /pad+ma'i phyag dang spyan gsum po/ /gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs sku/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug
'gro ba'i mgon/ /rnal 'byor ma yi thugs dgyes pa/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /sngags rnams kun la bsam gtan bya/ /gang dang gang gis bsgom pa yis/ /
rnal 'byor goms par gyur pa'i phyir/ /de ni de yi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /yid bzhin nor mchog ji bzhin no/ /lha ni dkar pos zhi rab ster/ /de bzhin dag ni rab sad byed/ /dbang
dang dgug pa'i de nyid la/ /sku mdog dmar po rnam par bsam/ /du ba dmar ba'i 'od mdog can/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pas/ /dgra bo rnams ni nyer skrod pa/ /'dir
ni the tshom med par byed/ /du ba skya bo dmar ba yis/ /rnam bar zhe sdang nges sbyor ba/ /gsad pa la ni kha dog gnag /rengs pa la ni ser por shis/ /lug gi steng du gnas pa la/ /
rkan gyi bar du rnam phug na/ /srid pa gsum du gang gang gnas/ /thams cad rab tu rmongs par byed/ /gzhan dag rmongs pas ci zhig bya/ /don mang tshig ni rab 'dus ba/ /'jig rten
gsum gyi las rnams ni/ /yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa yi/ /rgyud gzhan rnams la nyer gyur pa/ /gsungs dang ma gsungs gyur pa ni/ /rang bzhin bsam gtan sbyor ba yis/ /bya ba
'di la the tshom med/ /gang zhig lha ni nam mkha' mtshungs/ /kha dog dbye bas so so ste/ /'jig rten gsum na gang spyod pa'i/ /las rnams thams cad bya ba'o/ /skal bzang byed pa'i
sngags rnams ni/ /snying ga'i chu skyes dbus song ba/ /snying ga'i chu skyes sbyor ba yis/ /dbang la sogs pa yang dag bsgrub/ /yi ge gsum dang bcas pa'i lha/ /steng du 'gro ba
gsum ldan pas/ /mi rnams las ni rtag bsgrubs pa/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams zhal la gnas/ /rnam pa gsum ni 'gugs par byed/ /pad+ma gzugs ldan gyur pas mdzes/ /rtag
sbyor rgyun du rnal 'byor bas/ /mar me g.yo med gnas pa bzhin/ /sngon gsungs lha yi lha dbang phyug /skya rengs dmar po dang mtshungs 'od/ /mtshan mo phyed kyi dus gnas la/ /
rnal 'byor nyid ni yang dag spyod/ /de yi gzugs 'dzin lus la ni/ /yang dag sngon du bkod pa yis/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i lha/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la yang dag blang / /
thams cad bla ma'i zhal la gnas/ /zhags pa lcags kyu'i 'od zer gyis/ /de las lcags kyu bsnun nas ni/ /zhags pa yis ni 'gugs par
byed/ /rnam par myos shing lus ni dmar/ /yang dang yang du brgyal gyur te/ /bu ga sgo dgu nas bsnun nas/ /khrag gis rab tu 'bab par byed/ /sgrib pa med par dang mtshungs par/ /
rang lus rnam par lta bar bya/ /de yi dbugs las bzhengs pa'i sngags/ /yi ge'i dbang po dang por bsam/ /'bar zhing 'bar ba lta bu yis/ /kha yi sgo ru sngon 'dod rol/ /pad+ma'i
gzugs 'dzin de yang ni/ /kha yi nang nas nges par 'byung / /bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim gyur te/ /ji srid de snying chu skyes la/ /gang zhig de yi snying gnas pa/ /'dir ni de'i snying kun
nas phrogs/ /mer mer por ni blangs pa yis/ /sgrol ma'i gzugs bzhin yid 'phrog pa/ /de ni gsum pas cho ga bzhin/ /rlung gis lo ma g.yo ba ltar/ /rang gi khyim du rim par
bsgom/ /gcig gi ngo bor gyur pa mchog /lha dang lha yi sgrub pa'i thabs/ /mtshan mo mdun du bsgrub par bya/ /bran gyi ngo bos 'jug 'gyur zhing / /'tsho ba dang ni nor gyis kyang //
sa stengs 'jig rten slar ci smos/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /sngags kyi dbang po sgrub pa pos/ /rang dbang med rnams sbyar mi bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal dbang bzlas byas
pas/ /rgyal srid sgrub pa de mchog go /gzhan du gang gis rab bsgrubs na/ /bud med 'dod pas long bzhin myos/ /gal te lha yi bu mo yang / /de yi skad cig nyid la mchi/ /rigs kyi
'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa las lha'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //'jig rten dbang phyug snying po mchog /sba zhing srog bzhin yang dag bsrung / /
dam tshig spyod pa dman pas kyang / /'dren pa'i bdag nyid sngags bzlas bya/ /gcig pu grogs dang bral byas te/ /blo dang ldan pas 'bum du bzlas/ /de yi mngon sum 'ong 'gyur te/ /'khor
lo gsum du legs 'gro mchog /'jig rten thams cad 'byin pa dang / /sdud pa dang ni yang dang yang / /nam mkha'i go 'phang bder 'gro ste/ /dran pas 'di la the tshom med/ /sems
dang sems med sbyor ba ni/ /sems ni sems med la nges mthong / /sems ni sems ma la thim nas/ /rab 'jug lus skyes ma rnams la/ /nad bcas nad med pa dang ni/ /nad
med de bzhin nad bcas byed/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i mchog /sngags kyi rgyal po'i dbang pos so/ /gzhan du byis pa rmongs pa yis/ /zla ba 'dzin par 'dod pa bzhin/ /
gang zhig rang bzhin sbyor bral bas/ /las rnams bsgrub pa de mchog min/ /gang gis gsum gsum gnas skabs gsum/ /'jig rten mgon po nyid rig nas/ /chu 'dzin bral
ba'i nam mkha' bzhin/ /'jig rten mgon po'i go 'phang 'gro/ /zhes pa ni dpal pad+ma 'bar ba'i rgyud chen po las byung ba rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon
po lnga bcu pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po bi ma la shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas/ byang chub rin chen gyis bskul nas/ shud ke grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis
dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ya thA la b+d+ha kha sa ma tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ ji bzhin brnyes pa
nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /sa gsum kun gyi snying po
dang ldan pa/ /dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas ngo bo mdzad/ /de ni mkha' dang mnyam par spyod pa'o/ /gal te de 'dra'i ngo bor sems dag pa/ /byis pa 'di ni don dam sgom pa
yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rang bzhin mthong min te/ /sangs rgyas dang ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /rin chen tog dang pad ldan 'jug pa ste/ /lha de rnams kyi rang bzhin yod ma
yin/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rang bzhin no/ /dang po'i chos las de rnams 'byung ba ste/ /mkha' dang lhan cig sems can khams rnams kyang / /gzhug rnams su ni
bstan bcos tshad mar byas/ /gdod nas dag pa'i go 'phang mkha' mnyam mtshungs/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan dang yang ldan/ /gang zhig chos de nyid kyi rang bzhin can/ /sa gsum po
yi chos ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la ni phyag 'tshal ba'i/ /bsod nams kyang ni mtha' yas 'byung 'gyur zhing / /rdo rje sems
dpa' de la phyag 'tshal bas/ /chos kyi bdag nyid chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ /sems can thams cad yongs su bsgom par yang / /bya ba 'di ni thar pa'i rang bzhin no/ /dngos kun
rdo rje sems dpar dag byas pa'i/ /thar pa chos kyi rang bzhin bya ba ste/ /chos 'di 'jig pa med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /'jig rten pas ni rang bzhin gzhan du byas/ /'di ni sku dang
gsung dang thugs dag ni/ /chos 'di yi ni dang po 'byung ba ste/ /rnal 'byor gnas ni lha mo skul byed ma/ /der ni dang por chos rnams 'byung 'gyur ba'o/ /der ni sngags rnams rdo
rje gcig dngos bsgom/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rdo rje dngos dmigs sam/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis kyang rab brgyan cing / /sku mdog kyang ni sngon po'i rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje sems
dpa'i ting 'dzin dge ba ste/ /gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus gnas par/ /yi ge bskyed pa nyid du bsam par bya/ /yi ge'i
gzugs ni yongs su gyur pa las/ /rdo rje rang bzhin nyid du bsam par bya/ /mchu yi mtha' ni sngags pas bsgom bya ba/ /rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis
rang bzhin te/ /gnyis su med pa'i sku yi rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dmigs par bya ba'o/ /'di ni sems nyid yongs su grub pa ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa yis ni gsungs pa yin/ /
gang zhig bsgom pa 'di yis sgom byed pa/ /sems kyi rang bzhin nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni lha mo bzhi rnams ro gcig pa'o/ /ngo bo blos ni mkha' dang mnyam las bsgom/ /de
lta'i chos byas sems kyi rang bzhin te/ /lha mo thar pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa' des mthong ba/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can/ /rnal 'byor gnas dang
rol ba ste/ /thams cad mnyam pa'i btsun mor bcas/ /bkod pa dag dang ldan par gnas/ /mkhas bcas dngos las byung de la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gang mthong bar/ /
gzung ba sangs rgyas spro bsdu'o/ /bzhi yi ngo bo lha mo bzhi/ /dbus su nges par gnas pa ste/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sa gsum la ni khyab pa'o/ /lha yi der ni kha
bzhi pa'i/ /lha tshogs rdo rje nyid yin no/ /de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ /rnam 'phrul thams cad 'di yi'o/ /ci lta ci ltar sems can rnams/ /skye bar 'gyur ba lan nyid do/ /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje yin par 'gyur/ /de las gang byung lha kun kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul yin/ /sems can rnams ni chos kyi ngo bor blta/ /
sa gsum thams cad gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /rol pa mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyis gzigs shing / /de yis rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma kun mthong / /lha yi dam tshig gi le'u ste dang
po'o// //rtag tu mchog ldan khyod kyis ni/ /dam tshig lha mo thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i lha mo ni/ /du mchis bdag cag zhu bar 'tshal/ /
de la gru bzhi gsungs pa ste/ /steng dang dbyer med byas pa'i chos mnyam rang snang ma/ /zhi la thar pa ma dang mchog tu mnyam byed ma/ /gang phyir sgyu ma'i mdzad pas sangs rgyas rnams dang
mnyam/ /mkha' mnyam thams cad rol pa zhi ba med pa'o/ /ru lu ru lu b+h+yo ru d+ha/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kun tu rol ba ste/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang ni sgra brnyan chos
mnyam snang / /lhan cig gnas min cha ste rang nyid pi wang mtshungs/ /byas pa'i snang ba dang ni mnyam par gyur pa'o/ /gang zhig chos rnams snang ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ /der
ni rdo rje mdzad pa gzugs can lta bu ste/ /rdo rje'i theg pa der ni gzugs sogs 'dod yon gyi/ /bde ba mi zad sna tshogs dang mnyam stsol mdzad pa'o/ /rnal 'byor gnas ni du ma'i
rdo rje'i tshul 'di ni/ /du ma'i gzugs 'dzin der ni rdo rje dang mnyam zhing / /nyid dang 'dra ba'i sems dpa' rnams ni spro mdzad pa'i/ /rdo rje dbyings dang lhan
cig mchog stsol mdzad/ /rang bdag mkha' mnyam bzhugs la bskul ba ni/ /gang zhig rtse gcig sems kyis 'di nyan cing / /brjod bcas sems kyi glu 'di 'dzin pa'o/ /glu 'di nam
mkha' dang ni mnyam pa ste/ /der ni gzugs bcas rdo rje len pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid thugs ni sad byed cing / /rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir ni rgyud kyang len par 'gyur/ /'di ni
rdo rje'i tshig ste rdo rje gzhan rang bzhin/ /sngags pas thugs chud dkyil 'khor kun bsgoms shing / /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pad mchog der bsgom pa/ /dkyil 'khor
dbus gnas chos ni hUM gi dbye ba can/ /gzugs rnams thams cad sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par brtag /thugs kyi ngo bor gcig bsam rdo rje theg pa'o/ /sems ni mkha' mnyam
sems kyi theg pa rang bzhin med/ /gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yang ni lus can ma yin te/ /der ni rdo rje la ni med pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te/ /'jig
rten pa la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du mdzad/ /sems can 'dul ba'i rang bzhin du ni sad mdzad pa/ /kye lags rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni gcig pa'i dngos/ /lha mo bzhis smras rdo
rje kun tu spangs pa ste/ /nang du gnas pa rdo rje rol par ldan pa dang / /thugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis der ni rab tu gnas/ /thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos ni rnam par 'byung ba'o/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin
can gyi rdo rje spro bya zhing / /spros pa'i rdo rje slar yang bsdu byas te/ /sems kyi rang bzhin du ni gcig phyir ro/ /sems ni 'gog par gyur pa na/ /kun kyang mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong / /yang
dang yang du sngags bsdus pas/ /gcig pa'i rnam par bya ba'o/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //bram ze dang ni gdol pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin
du/ /chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o/ /gcig gi rang bzhin la gnas pa yi dngos po ste/ /de la rdo rje can gyis mnyam pa'i ngo bor gsungs/ /bram ze dang ni khyi dag
gcig pa'i dngos yin zhing / /rus pa'i rgyan rnams kyang ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje'i go 'phang de la len pa'i rang bzhin no/ /rnal 'byor de la mnyam pa'i ngo bor nges mthong ste/ /de dang
mnyam pa'i rang bzhin sems can rnams la sbas/ /de yi rnal 'byor rang bzhin lha mos gsungs pa ni/ /lha mo thams cad der ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin te/ /gtso bo dang bcas mdzes pa
gcig pu 'byung gyur khyod/ /mnyam pa rang bzhin de ni sngags pa gcig pu ste/ /rdo rje rnam par sad par byed pa gcig pu nyid/ /der ni zhe sdang rang bzhin dag ni zhig pa ste/ /yan lag byed
ba'i chos ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /der ni rdo rje'i btsun mo gcig rang bzhin/ /gang tshe rdo rje la ni dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i tshe/ /lha yi g.yon gyi phyed
dang gcig tu gyur par blta/ /lung nyid tshad mar byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' de bsgom bya/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //glang po dang ni rta dang mi
dang khyi dang ni/ /ba lang sha ste thams cad ma lus gyur pa rnams/ /dam tshig de nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te/ /mkha' mnyam rang bzhin can gyi rnal 'byor pas bza' ba'i/ /dam
tshig 'di ni lha ma bzhi pos gsungs pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa la bsgom pa'i sems dang ldan gyur cing / /sems gcig pa ni rdo rje 'chang nyid 'grub 'gyur te/ /dngos po nyid dang bcas pa'i
thugs ni skye bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i dngos mdzad zhi ba ma gsungs snying po ste/ /'di ltar chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs bya zhing / /de ltar mkha' dang mnyam par rnam par dpyad par bya/ /
lha 'di rnam snang lha mo lnga rnams de'i bdag nyid/ /rdo rje theg pa la ni mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te/ /skul byed mas ni srid pa'i rang bzhin yin phyir ro/ /gcig pa'i dang po rdo rje sems te
skur mthong ba/ /rdo rje'i theg par 'dod rnams lha mos 'di skad gsungs/ /bden pa bskyed pa 'di ni rnam snang lha mos gsungs/ /'di ni zla ba'i dbus gnas bsgom pa rdo rje'i gsang
sngags te/ /de ni sems gcig pa yis rdo rje rnam bsgom pa/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa nyid do/ /rnal 'byor gnas kyi dbus gnas rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom/ /ngas ni rdo rje'i theg par
'di skad du/ /chos rnams gcig pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan/ /sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //dngos med mi rtag pa las dngos bcas lus bsgom
yin/ /lha mos skul ba byed pa'i dngos po ste/ /de ltar chos las nges par brtag bya bas/ /sems ni nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang / /dngos po theg pa med pa'i dngos por bya/ /dngos
po'i rang bzhin la ni theg pa med pa ste/ /sems ni nam mkha' nyid dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin can/ /sda ma ci bzhin sems ni rnam par sbyar bar bya/ /ci ltar de ni dngos por bya ba ste/ /dngos
po 'di ni theg par 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /sems can nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang / /dbus su tshig ni chos la nges rtog par/ /sems las dngos po nyid du bya ba ste/ /rnam pa du ma'i tshul
gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed par bya ba'o/ /ci ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i chu/ /'di 'dra'i sems ni myur ba'i ngo bor bsgrub/ /de ltar bstan du med pa 'di ni nga yis bstan/ /
rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yi rang bzhin gyis/ /bzhi pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor bya ba ste/ /de la rdo rje'i chu ni yi dam lha yi rang bzhin can/ /thugs kyi ngo bo'i rnal 'byor pas bza' bya/ /chos dang dge
'dun dang ni rdo rje'i chu ste de rnams mnyam pa'i rang bzhin te/ /zhag dang khrag sogs mchog tu mdzes par rab bzhugs dngos po'i lus ni bsgyur bar bya/ /
bza' dang bca' dang mal bstan la sogs de rnams thams cad 'di'i rang bzhin/ /gang zhig ting nge 'dzin du nges par bstan pa'ang de dang gcig pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni
gsum char rdo rje'i ngo bor mdzad/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje can gyis sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid du gsungs/ /de yi rang bzhin mkha' mnyam so sor
snang bar 'gyur/ /sgyu ma'i ngo bor nges par bstan pa yis/ /rdo rje yi ni nges par 'jug par bya ba ste/ /sems can rang bzhin la ni theg par med/ /sems ni de la gnas pa'i snying po'o/ /
de lta'i ngo bos thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi/ /sngags pa khyod ni 'grub par 'gyur ba ste/ /thugs dang spro dang slar yang bsdus bya ba/ /gsum car yang ni gcig pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sems
ni ri rab hUM dang mnyam byas te/ /dag pa'i sangs rgyas su ni sems slar bskyed/ /sems dub gyur na slar yang bsdu ba dag /der ni sngags pas des brtag bsgom par bya/ /bsdus pa'i
ngo bos slar yang sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' der ni sku g.yos mdzad/ /slar yang nam mkha'i ngo bos khro bas te/ /de ltar spros dang bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de la rdo rje sems
dpa' gcig dngos grub pa'i phyir/ /de'i phyir spro pa 'ang rdo rje 'chang du rigs/ /sngags pas brtan par gyur na spro/ /brtan par ma gyur 'dir spros pa/ /lus nyon mongs kyi 'bras mi 'byin//
nges par 'grub 'gyur theg pa'i dngos/ /thams cad bden pa 'di rnams bstan/ /de lta'i chos ni bsgom pa yi/ /dngos po rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems ni
smad mi bya/ /gang yang dri ma cis kyang gos pa min/ /kye rnal 'byor pa/ bcom ldan 'das yum skul byed ma ni dang po'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje bskyed par bsgoms pas sangs rgyas bskyed mdzad
pa'o/ /lha mo rnams ni lha dang gcig pa'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byor pa bskyed mdzad pa'o/ /rjes su 'dzin pas bsgom pa'i sems dang ni/ /yi ge hUM gis kyang ni de
'grub 'gyur/ /brla dang rkang pa dag tu rnam rtog pa'i/ /rmongs pa yid la bya ba ma yin no/ /'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di nyid ni/ /rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis ni yang dag bcings/ /sngags

pas nam mkha'i khams su khro bo'i lha/ /bye ba stong phrag dag ni spro bya ste/ /gcig pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i rdo rjer ni/ /slar yang nges par bsdu bar bya ba yin/ /byang chub theg pa sems kyi rang bzhin
te/ /byang chub kyang ni sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /gnyis ka rang bzhin sems kyi theg pa ste/ /sems kyang mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no/ /rgyud gzhan dang thun mong ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //
ji bzhin brnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po tAk+Sha ka ga Na dang / lo tsA ba mang 'or dge
slong byang chub shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na badzra sa mu ts+tsa ya/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes rdo rje kun
las btus pa/ dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa yis/ /dus gcig tshe na bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /gsang
ba'i dbyings su bdag nyid kyis/ /ye shes ngo bor bzhugs gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs/ /ro mnyam dam tshig rdo rje nyid/ /mi byed ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs so/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sems dpa' chen po byams pa sogs/ /rnams kyis zhus shing gsol btab ni/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus/ /ma rig pa dang sems byung dang /
sems zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ /de skad ces ni gsol pa dang / /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /sku gsung thugs nyid rdo rje yi/ /bdag nyid can gyis bka' stsal pa/ /
rigs kyi bu rnams legs nyon cig /ye shes gsum ni rdo rje las/ /byang sems rdo rje de bzhin nyid/ /yang dag 'byung ba de yi phyir/ /ye shes rdo rje'i rang bzhin ni/ /de yi don ni 'di lta ste/ /
ye shes gsum ni dag pa'i sems snang ba gsum gyi 'byung gnas rdo rje las mi phyed pa rlung rig tha mi dad du gnas pa nyid de/ byang chub sems ni kun rdzob don dam dbyer med pa ste/ /rdo rje de bzhin

nyid ni gdod ma nas lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid las yang dag par 'byung ba ni/ /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo bde chen/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'byung zhing 'jug la gnas pa de'i phyir
na/ /'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ye shes rdo rje rlung sems dbyer med thogs pa med pas khyab cing dbang byed pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa ni/ /dbyings dang ye shes gnyis
su med pa nyid/ /mngon par byang chub nyid las rab 'byung ba/ /rlung rig dbyer med pa las dus kun tu/ /snang ba gsum du shar ba 'gag pa med/ /de nyid lhan cig skyes par rab rtogs bya/ /yang
dag don ni zab pa ste/ /rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag bshad kyi don la ni/ /gsang ba yang dang byang chub sems/ /rlung sems dbyer med chos nyid las/ /zab pa mi 'gyur rang rig ni/ /spros med
'gag pa med cing zhi/ /skye med mnyam nyid ngar las ni/ /rtogs pa med kyang rgyu rkyen las/ /shes pa ma rig de nyid ni/ /'byung gnas thog ma mtha' ma med/ /de las lhan skyes ma rig pa/ /nye bar thob
pa dngos med pa/ /bdag med thams cad snying po las/ /snang med pa las ma 'gags pas/ /rim pa ma yin 'char ba yang / /zab pa stong chen por 'byung ba'i/ /ma rig pa las rkyen snang ba/ /
snang ba thob pa mi rtog pa/ /de las rang bzhin sems las byung / /de las snang ba mched pa ste/ /shin tu gsal zhing stong pa che/ /sems las 'byung ba'i rgyan
dag ni/ /rgyu dang mig yul dbang po dag /mtshungs pa'i de ma thag pa las/ /sems zhes bya ba 'byung ba ste/ /de ni snang ba'i don dang ni/ /stong pa nyid du gsungs pa yin/ /sems ni don la gnas
pa ste/ /sems byung bye brag rnam par ston/ /ma rig de nyid chos nyid do/ /chos nyid bdag nyid mi gnas pas/ /snang dang stong pa de dag ni/ /gsum gsum spros pa med 'byung ba/ /'od gsal dang
las 'byung ba ste/ /gsal bde stong pa dbyer med pas/ /rdo rje byang sems ngo bor bstan/ /ces pas bstan te/ de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag de'i dus
la shin tu ngo mtshar can du ngo mtshar skyes te cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid can gyis byang
chub sems dpa' de rnams cang mi smra bar gyur pa gzigs nas bka' stsal pa ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar 'dug /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ /mgo bos gtugs te gzhan yang zhus pa/ /e ma ho ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /rtogs par dka' ba'i rnam shes ni/ /gsum gyi dbye ba mchog zab pa/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pas gsung du gsol/ /de skad ces ni zhus pa dang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gang dag 'od gsal las byung de nyid ni/ /sems

dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes/ /chos rnams kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa ste/ /kun nyon mongs dang rnam par byang ba yi/ /bdag nyid de las rtogs pa gnyis rim byed/ /rnam shes de yi bzhon pa rlung yin te/ /

rlung las me dang me las chu 'byung zhing / /chu las sa yang rab tu 'byung bar bshad/ /de rnams 'dus las phung po lnga nyid dang / /skye mched drug dang yul lngar snang ba gang / /de dag rten cing 'brel par

'byung ba ste/ /rlung dang rnam shes nye bar 'dres pa'o/ /de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyis ni/ /rang bzhin gyi ni snang bar rab gsal bar/ /spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed pa'o/ /snang ba'i rgyu 'bras kyis
ni rang bzhin rnams/ /yang dag par yang rab tu 'byung ba dang / /rmi lam sgyu ma ltar ni snang ba'o/ /de yang 'od gsal gnas pa med pa dang / /'gag pa dang ni skye ba med pa ste/ /don dam bden pa
yang dag pa yi mtha'/ /de las 'byung ba mun pa'i snang ba ni/ /'gog pa ma rig pa zhes bya bar bstan/ /de yi rang bzhin snang ba dang / /'khrul dang rnam par g.yeng ba dang / /dran pa med dang le
lo dang / /mi smra ba dang mi gsal ba'o/ /ma rig pa yang sems las byung ba ste/ /ngo bo chos nyid rnam par mi rtog pa/ /mar me ltar 'bar snang ba nyer thob las/ /rlung gi khams nyid phra bar 'jug
pas ni/ /ma ning ltar ni shes dang mi gsal ba'o/ /nyi ma'i snang ba lta bur bstan pa dang / /shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu lta bu ste/ /de yi rang bzhin chags dang
dga' ba dang / /mchog tu dga' dang drag po la sogs pa'o/ /kun rdzob tu ni mngon sum gyis bstan dang / /skyes pa'i gzugs dang yab lha'i tshogs dag dang / /mtshan ma rdo rje zhes ni rang
brtags pa'o/ /sems las sems zhes bshad pa yin/ /zla ba'i snang dang shin tu gsal ba ste/ /chu yi zla ba lta bur bstan pa'o/ /rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o/ /kun rdzob
tu gsal ba las/ bud med dang / b+ha ga dang / pad+ma dang lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o/ /'dir chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /gang dag 'od gsal las byung de nyid
ni chos nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal dbyings las/ rig pa rtog med kyi shes pa phra ba'i rlung dang lhan cig tu 'byung bas na/ sems ni kun gzhi'o/ /yid kyi rnam par
shes pa ni spro ba dang sdud par byed pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni tshogs brgyad dang ldan pa'o/ /chos rnams kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa ni/ /byang chub kyi sems mi 'gyur ba rdo rje nam mkha' mnyam
pa nyid do/ /sa bon ma dag pa las 'gro ba 'khrul pa kun nas nyon mongs par snang la/ bag chags dag las 'khrul pa las log pa/ rnam par byang ba nyid du yang dag par snang ba'o/ /phyi
rol pas btags pa'i tha snyad sna tshogs pa bdag tu btags pa de las/ rtog pa gnyis su gyur pa ste/ gzung 'dzin du 'byung ba'o/ /bdag dang gzhan ni bdag dang bdag gi bar 'dzin pa
gnyis su btags pas/ dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa/ sems su rig par byed pa nyid do/ /de las rnam par shes pa nyid du snang / de nyid du chos nyid kyi rlung las/ 'od snang rang byung gi
snang bar shar ba'o/ /der las rlung las kun tu g.yo bas/ chags pa las me byung / bsrub pa las zhe sdang gi chu snang / drod gsher las gti mug gi sa'i khams bskyed cing / der 'byung ba lnga
lhan cig tu tshogs shing 'dus pa las/ rtsa kun gzhi'i rig pa snying ga tsam du brten te/ de las gzung 'dzin du 'khrul pa las/ de rnams 'dus pa las phung po lnga dang ni skye mched drug dang yul
