lngar snang ba ste/ de nyid rlung dang rnam shes tha dad med par nye bar 'dres pas/ 'gag pa med pa kun tu snang ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid du'o/ /chos nyid rtog med kyi ngang las/
rlung dang lhan cig tu 'byung bas/ srid pa bar dor yul lha spyod tshul ni/ de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi ni/ rkyen las 'char ba'i snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba thob pa
ste/ rgyu'i rkyen dang / dmigs pa dang / dbang po bdag po dang / mtshungs pa de ma thag pa las/ mngon par 'byung ba/ rtog pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi snang ba/ rang bzhin sum cu rtsa
gsum dang / mtshan nyid bzhi bcu dang ma rig pa'i skad cig ma bdun du rab tu gsal bar nyin dang mtshan du spyod pas/ rjes su nyams su myong bar
byed pa ma dag pa'i dus so/ /yang rlung dal zhing rig pa cung zad gnas pa'i tshe/ snang ba gsum gyi rgyu 'bras thams cad sgyu ma lta bur gyur pas/ /rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad ye shes kyi
ngang du rang dag rang zhi rang sar grol bas/ yang dag par rab tu 'byung ba/ de bzhin nyid du bde ba/ gsal ba/ stong zhing bdag med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'char bas/ /
bag chags rnam par dag pa'i bar dor rmi lam gyi bar dor lus ngag sgyu ma ltar kun tu snang ba'o/ /sgyu lus kyi snang ba de nyid kun rdzob kyi spyod pa dag par byed pa'i phyir/ de yang 'od gsal
ba la rab tu 'jug pas ril por 'dzin pa dang / rjes su gzhig pa'i bsam gtan gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dri ma rnam par dag pa'i tshe/ gang la yang gnas pa med pa dang / chos rnams
kun la 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa med cing / skye ba med pa ste/ spros med don dam pa'i bden pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i don/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' snang ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /de nyid las ni
lugs las bzlog gyur pa'i/ /mun pa lta bu'i snang ba pra rlung las/ /'gog pa ma rig pa zhes bya bar bstan/ /de yi rang bzhin snang ba 'byung ba dang / /'khrul dang rnam g.yeng the tshom dang /

brjed ngas pa dang le lo dang / /mi smra gyur dang skyo gyur pa'o/ /ma rig pa yang sems las byung ba ste/ /snang ba nyer thob mar me ltar 'bar las/ /ngo bo chos nyid rnam par mi rtog pa/ /rlung gi khams
nyid phra bar 'jug pas ni/ /ma ning ltar ni shes pa ma g.yos pa'o/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad lte bar ldan pa la/ /stong pa bzhi bcas ma ning yi ge gnas/ /hrIHni thig le ldan pa dbus su dmigs/ /
snang ba thob pa nyid kyi don 'di'o/ /snang ba mched pa nyi ma lta bur bstan/ /shin tu gsal ba smig rgyu lta bu ste/ /de yi rang bzhin 'dod chags dga' ba dang / /mchog tu dga' ba drag po la sogs
pa'o/ /kun rdzob tu ni mngon sum gyis bstan dang / /skyes pa'i gzugs dang lha yi tshogs dag la/ /mtshan ma rdo rje zhes ni rang brtags pa'o/ /pad+ma de nyid lte bar nyi ma'i dal/ /dbus su rdo
rje thig le ldan pa la/ /kA li gsal byed yi ge sum cu bdun/ /snang ba mched pa de nyid gsal ba'o/ /sems las byung ba la ni sems zhes bshad/ /rgyu ba'i snang ba rab tu gsal ba ste/ /chu yi zla
ba lta bur bstan pa'o/ /rang bzhin chags pa dang bral la sogs pa'o/ /kun rdzob gsal ba las ni bud med dang / /b+ha ga pad+ma lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o/ /snga ma ltar las zla dbus pad+mar bcas/ /
dbyangs yig phyogs su brkyang ba 'od 'bar ba/ /mtshams su zung bcas bcu gnyis rim par dgod/ /gsang sngags 'khor lo rim pa kun rdzogs byed/ /dmigs bcas bzlas pa sems
gsum sgyu mar 'char/ /'od gsal ye shes ngang las zung 'jug pa'o/ /snang ba mched pa bde ba ste/ /gzung du med pas chags zhen bral/ /nyi ma
ltar gsal ngang gis bde/ /'gro 'ong gnas nyid skad cig ma/ /mtshan ma bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /go 'byed mun pa 'joms pa'o/ /snang ba thob pa'i ye shes sems/ /rnam par mi rtog
bdag nyid can/ /ma rig de nyid rnam dag pa/ /mun ba med cing snang ba bral/ /sgron ma ltar 'char lhun grub pa/ /g.yo med mi g.yo rnam dag pa'o/ /gnas med chos nyid ngang du dag /stong
dang stong pa chen po dang / /shin tu stong pa dngos med pa/ /thams cad stong pa zag pa med/ /nye bar thob pa snang med pa/ /mkha' ltar dag pa 'od gsal ba/ /mnyam med gnyis med phyag
rgya che/ /lhan cig skyes pa chos kyi dbyings/ /lhag mthong dmigs pa kun las 'das/ /kun khyab zhi ba spros med pa/ /stong nyid ngang las rtog pa dang / /mi rtog mtha' las 'das pa ste//
chos nyid zab dang rgya che ba'i/ /rgya mtsho chen po rang dngos la/ /rtsa shing g.yo bcas sna tshogs pa/ /steng du lhung zhing 'gro 'ong nyid/ /du mas khebs shing bskyod gyur kyang / /rtog med
rang bzhin gnas med pas/ /ro gcig 'gyur med mkha' ltar ro/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// //rnal 'byor lus
nyid sgyu ma rmi lam ltar/ /gnas lus nges par 'gyur ba de nyid las/ /rdo rje pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba shes rab kyi ye shes rab tu 'byung ba las rang gi rdo rje sbyor ba las me'o/ /me las chu/ chu
las nur nur po rnams dang / de nas mer mer po rnams dang / nar nar po dang / gor gor po dag go /de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba las te/ khrag gi gong bu las mkhrang
'gyur rnams so/ /khyab 'jug rus sbal gyi rnam pa can de dag pha ma'i khu khrag dag gis bskyed pa'o/ /de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba'i chags pa las/ 'dod chags dang bral
ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba bar ma'i cha las shes par bya ste/ de las rtswa rnams lus la mngon par 'byung ba/ stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa/ kun 'dar ma dang / ro ma
dang / rkyang ma dang / lte ba dang / snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo dang / gsang ba dang / mdzod spu'i 'khor lo dag dang / yang na sum cu gnyis dang / rtsa kha gsum pa dang / rtsa lu gu

rgyud dang / rtsa ba'i mig lta bu dang / rtsa bar ta ka rin po che'i pho brang dang / rtsa rig ba'i gnas dang / gzhu chen gyi dbyibs dang / bde skyong nor bu'i 'khor lo ste/ /dbyibs tha dad dum las yi
ge'i rnam pa sogs srog tu gyur pa snying por gnas pa las/ khams gsum pa'i 'gro ba'i rgyud dpag tu med pa las skyon dang yon tan mtha' dag gi rten can te/ de'i phyir lus dang lus las
'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'char ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsung gi bzlas pa'i phyir phyag rgya dang / bsgom pa'i phyag rgya gsum du gyur pa dang / A li kA li
las yang dag par 'byung ba'i sngags dang sems kyi thabs su gyur pa shes rab dang / mi phyed pas bde ba chen po ltar dmigs pa'o/ /yab yum bsrubs pa'i bde bde nyid las/ /gnas
skabs dag las rigs kyi cha thob pa/ /mngon par byang chub ye shes lngar 'byung las/ /lus rdzogs 'byung bas bya ba byed 'gyur ba'o/ /chos rnams kun ni bdag tu bsgrub pa dang / /bdag ni
lhar bsgrub lha nyid ye shes so/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i yul dbang po gnyis thabs su gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba ni/ sems dang sems las 'byung bdag gi thabs
su gyur pa'o/ /sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thabs shes rab ro mnyam par gyur pa'o/ /de sgyu ma lta bu'i dpe nye bar mtshon te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi zhing khams rnams/ /sgyu ma lta bu dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mig 'phrul dang / dbang po'i gzhu
dang / glog dang / chu bur dang / me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis/ bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon pa'i tshul lo/ /rdo rje lus kyi rtsa dang
rlung / /yi ge thig le gnas bdag /dbyangs dang gsal byed tshogs rnams las/ /thabs dang shes rab ro mnyam 'char/ /gsal dang bde ba brten pa nyid/ /mi rtog chos nyid ngang las ni/ /rlung
ngang shes pa mnyam du yang / /'byung 'jug gnas pa nyid yin no/ /chos nyid snang ba kun gzhi ste/ /rnam shes ma bcos rang gsal ba/ /sgrib med rang byung kun tu ni/ /g.yo bcas 'gyur
med kun tu ni/ /de nyid gnas brten gyur pa'o/ /rnam pa sems byung 'char ba yang / /du ma nyid ni go rims dang / /go rims med pa'i rang bzhin rnams/ /rtog pa'i 'du 'phro rkyen gyis bsgyur
chags bral gsum du 'byung ba nyid/ /yid la byed pa 'gro 'ong dang / /rig brgod par byed dang yid 'byung ba'o/ /mya ngam gsum ni ma dad pa/ /zhe sdang med bas zhi bar gnas/ /kun tu rtog pa
khong khro ba/ /'jigs pa tsam mo 'tshig pa ste/ /reg pa khre bo'i spyod pa dang / /'khon du 'dzin nyid 'jigs chen po/ /sred pa che 'bring gsum 'byung ba/ /nyer len bzhi ste 'chab bcan/ /mi
dge dkres skom gdung ba po/ /rig 'dzin yid la byed pa bzhi/ /rig pa po ste gnas pa las/ /tshim par byed pa tshor ba ni/ /rnam pa gsum ste sems pa'o/ /gnyid dang 'gyod pa rtog dpyod pa//
ngo tsha shes dang bag yod pa/ /rnam par mi 'tshe snying rje dang / /brtse ba byams pa gsum gsum dang / /dogs dang bsags pa ser sna dang / /phrag dog rtog pa rang bzhin te/ /snang ba'i ngang du spro
zhing sdud/ /chags pa zhen dang dga' ba dang / /dga' zhing shin tu dga' ba ste/ /'dod chags rtogs par 'byung ba'o/ /bde bas yi rangs gti mug mod
rab tu mgu ba shes rab dang / /ngo mtshar dgod par byed dang tshim/ /'byung ba kha sprod 'jib pa dang / /rten pa de nyid ting 'dzin te/ /brtson 'grus byed dang rgyal ba dang / /bya dang 'phrog pa
las gyur yin/ /stobs ngom rgyags pa dregs byed do/ /mos pas spro bar gyur pa ste/ /lhan cig skyes bdag btang snyoms so/ /tha dad med pa shin tu'o/ /drug po rnam sgeg zhe 'gras
byed/ /bag yod pa yi dge ba ste/ /tshig gsal bden smra dad pa dang / /g.yo med dran pa ldan pa can/ /mi bden pa dang de bzhin nges/ /shes bzhin ma yin ma nges pa/ /nye bar mi
len ma chags sems/ /sbyin byed bskul ba mdun pa nyid/ /de bzhin des dang ngo tsha med/ /dpa' bas rnam par 'tshe byed pa/ /bag med pa dang khrel med pa/ /shes bzhin bral ba ma
yin pa/ /g.yo sgyu ston pas mi bsrun dang / /gya gyur byed pa rgod bag can/ /'di dag rtog pa 'byung ba ste/ /snang ba mched pa'i shes pa las/ /kun tu rgyu zhing 'jug par byed/ /
mtshan nyid 'di dag bstan pa'o/ /chags pa bar ma'i skad cig ma/ /ma rig pa nyid min pa ltar/ /'thibs shing snang ba med pa'o/ /brjed ngas pa dang rmugs pa'o/ /'khrul chen log
par lta ba can/ /brjod med 'gog pas 'jug pa zad/ /skyo zhing le lo snyom las byed/ /the tshom gyur pa yid spyod pa/ /ma ning 'byung ba phra ba dang / /rags pa skye 'gag gnas pa las/ /
bag chags dri ma'i rtog pa kun/ /snang ba thob pa'i de nyid du/ /stong nyid spros pa bral gyur pas/ /rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba'o/ /nang gi rnam par shes pa de nyid ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i chos
nyid rtog med pa/ /'od gsal ngo bo stong zhing bdag med pa/ /rlung gis bskyod par mtshan ma'i rnam par byung / /de yi skad cig rang bzhin 'byung 'jug pa/ /mtshan ma snang ba gsum du
mngon par 'byung / /de bas na 'di dag nges par rtogs pas ji ltar 'o ma dang / til dag gis yang dag pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / til mar gyi 'byung ba de bzhin du sngags dang
phyag rgya mngon par 'du bya ba'i rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyor ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar brtag par mi nus so/ /gang du rlung med na kun gzhi rten pa med pa'o/ /gang du kun
gzhi'i rten pa med na rnam par shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa nyid med na gang b+ha ga dang ling+ga yang dag par sbyor bar nus pa med de/ des ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi
rnyed do/ /ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar dang / /ji ltar til mar te/ de bzhin du rdo rje thabs kyi ye shes nye bar brtag pa'i phyir dang / pad+ma shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar brtag pa'i phyir ro/ /
yul 'jug pa med cing / de la sems pa med pas/ rnam par shes pa'i bzhon pa rlung med do/ /de med pas phyi rol 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / nang khams
dang skye mched med par 'gyur te/ snang ba gsum du dmigs pa yang mi 'byung bas/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu 'jug pa med pa na/ /zung du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
sems kyi ngo bo nyid/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /mos gus mthar phyin gyur pas ni/ /lam gyi rim pa kun rdzogs pa/ /sgrib dag yon tan thob pa ste/ /dbang gi rgyal ba rnyed pa bzhin/ /
las dang dngos grub ma lus pa/ /ye shes mi zad gnas thob bo/ /gang rnal 'byor lam gyi rim pa thams cad cig car du rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lhag par mos
pa tsam gyis/ las dang po la gnas par 'gyur te phyir mi ldog pa la yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// //
spyi don mdo ltar ston pa bdag med pa/ /e ni chos te baM ni gang zag gis/ /stong pa zhi ba dngos po med pa nyid/ /phung po khams dang skye mched thams cad kun/ /rang bzhin med pa'i
chos rnams thams cad bral/ /blang dor med pa'i ye shes mnyam ba nyid/ / ni stong nyid spros dang bral ba las/ /baM ni thabs mchog snying rje chen por bstan/ /gnyis med mnyam pa byang
sems ro gcig pa'o/ /rnam thar sgo gsum pha rol phyin pa drug /tshad med bzhi dang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi/ /byang chub mchog chos sum cu rtsa bdun te/ /so so yang dag rig dang ma 'dres
chos/ /stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi dang bsrung ba med/ /mkhyen pa rgyas pa de nyid kun khyab mdzad/ /e baM brtan g.yo snang dang stong pa las/ /phung po khams dang skye mched thams cad ni/ /lha yi
bdag nyid dkyil 'khor dag tu'o/ /yig don sgra dang tha snyad du ma rnams/ /brtags pa med de sna tshogs rkyen gyur las/ /rgyu 'bras rab byed sgyu mar snang ba kun/ /'jig rten rigs byed mtshon
byed sgra ldan pa'o/ /'dod chags chos kyi sbas pa zhes bya ba/ /rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor las/ /sna tshogs dga' ba dang po rjes chags dang / /rnam par smin pa mchog tu bde ba
nyid/ /mtshan nyid bral ba skad cig lhan cig skyes/ /bde ba mi 'gyur ye shes phyag rgya che/ /rnam par nyid pa dga' bral rjes la'o/ /de nyid snying po bla med byang chub sems/ /bde stong dbyer
med byang chub chen po'o/ /kun de byang sems ye shes mes sbyangs pas/ /zag med bde bas lus sems rnam dag pa'o/ /'jig rten kun du brtan pa sna tshogs pa/ /de rten 'byung ba 'dus pa'i
ri rab dang / /gzhal med khang sogs dngos po 'khrul las snang / /brten pa 'gro rgyud khams gsum sems can kun/ /sgyu ma lta bur skye zhing 'ga' par 'gyur/ /'khor ba yul dang dbang
po rtog par byung / /de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis brlabs pa las/ /zlog byed yang dag kun rdzob lam brtan pas/ /dngos po mtshan ma 'dzin pa las log
nas/ /rang bzhin bden don rtog pas byang chub thob/ /'od gsal ba yi de nyid ni/ /shes pa spyi yi khyad par las/ /de las sems ni ma bcos pa/ /gnas lug phyogs su ma lhung bas/ /
de yang rtog med chos nyid kyi/ /snang ba gsum du mngon par 'byung / /yul dang yul can gnas skabs las/ /rgya mtsho rab tu dngas pa las/ /de las rlung gis bskyod gyur pas/ /rab rlabs
'byung ba ji bzhin du/ /rang bzhin sems byung rtog tshogs byung / /gnas rgyu dus dang rkyen dbang gis/ /gnas na 'od gsal stong nyid las/ /rgyu ni rlung sems dbyer med pas/ /dus
gsum dus med skad cig mar/ /ngo bo stong pa rlung gis bskyod/ /rkyen las mtshan ma'i chos su snang / /gnas sgrub bye brag tha dad pas/ /rnam shes de nyid 'bul ba dang / /ma 'khrul pa
las khyad par du/ /dge dang mi dge sna tshogs las/ /bde sdug nyams su myong gyur pas/ /las dang nyon mongs bag chags las/ /lus ngag yid kyis spyod par snang / /ma dag dag
byed bla ma yi/ /gdams pas kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams bsod nams ma yin las/ /rgyu 'bras sna tshogs snang ba yang / /nam mkha' lta bu'i dang las ni/ /nam mkha' lta
bu'i cho 'phrul byung / /de nyid skye med rang bzhin las/ /'gag pa med par gnas pa'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ /de nyid bdag med chos nyid las/ /spros med dngos dang dngos
med kyi/ /ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gnas med pa'o/ /rgyar ni go rims bzhin du gnas pa la/ /sdud byed go rims 'chol ba 'khor lo brten/ /dam tshig kun ldan phyag rgya snying po nyid/ /kun dor
'byung lnga lha mo rdo rje dbyings/ /bde chen rdo rje gsang ba phun sum tshogs/ /de nyid mi 'gyur 'byung gnas thim gyur gang / /skad cig rgyan rdzogs bum pa gang ba ltar/ /bdud rtsi gtsug tor ye

shes rgyal bar gyur/ /rjod byed 'bru gsum brjod bya badzra d+h+ri ka /bya ba rdzogs pa'i rnam par skye ba ste/ /snang ba thob pa lhan cig tu gnas pas yul ldan pa snang ba mched pa/ rtog cing ba'i bye brag la
rig pa 'jug pas zad pa snang ba'o/ /byams pas gsol pa/ sbas pa'i don gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun rdzob bden pas sbas pa ni gang du snod bcud ma lus pa snang ba
sgyu ma lta bur bdag byin gyis brlab par bzhin gyis bden pa rnam par dag ba'o/ /sems snang ba gsum gyis sbas pa ni gang chos nyid las yang dag par 'byung ba/ thob pa dang / mched pa
dang / snang ba ni sems ye shes kun tu rnam par rtog pa med pa bzhin du rang bzhin dang bcas par 'byung ba'o/ /chos kyis sbas pa ni bde ba'i don gang rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyar ba'i bde
bas/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i snang ba gsum nye bar mtshon par byed pa de ni/ bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni sbas
pa'i bshad pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyi'i don ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsal pa/ nyan thos la sogs
pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos la spyod pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud mtha' dag tu/ rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la
sogs pa'i 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa ngo mtshar gyi rdo rje'i tshig thos nas smod par byed ba de rnams las mi 'gal ba'i sgo nas bshad pa de ni spyi'i don du gsungs pa'o/ /
byams pas gsol ba/ yi ge'i don gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang yang A li kA li'i sgra'i don la brten nas brjod par byed pa/ brjod pa'i mtha'i
byed pa/ mtha' dang brjod pa rkyen rnams las rnam par 'byung ba/ rab tu byed pa dang bcas pa tha snyad sna tshogs pa la brten nas cha shas tsam du bstan pa'o/ /byams pas gsol pa/ thun
mong ma yin pa bla na med pa 'di ltar mthar thug pa bshad pa ji ltar bshad pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rnams la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legs so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog dang ldan pa nyon cig/ /mtha' ni mu ste/ 'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i tshul zhes bya ba mthar
thug pa'o/ /mtha' ldan mtha' bcas grol ba yang dag mtha'/ /mtha' nyid bzlog bral grub mtha' las 'das pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thabs
gang gis mthar thug thob pa lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i mtha' snang ba gsum las stong pa gsum mo/ /dmigs pa med
pa sgyu ma lta bu las stong pa gsum gyi mtha' bde stong 'od gsal pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol ba/ stong pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i mthar ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar mes shing bsregs pa ste 'bar bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od gsal bar shes rab kyi snang ba ye shes yun ring pos rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /ji ltar ta la'i lo ma
yang 'bar bar byed pa de bzhin du ste 'od gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyis ye shes la mched pa rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /ji ltar ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du snang ba
thob pa'i ye shes mchog tu gyur pas rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /de'i phyir shing ta la'i lo ma dang ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pas 'bar zhing thal bar gyur pa de bzhin du stong pa dang / stong pa
chen po dang / shin tu stong pa dang / thams cad stong pa rnams snang ba nye bar thob pa 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /'od gsal don dam bden pa nyid/ /
mnyam nyid ye shes rtog pas ni/ /dbyings kyi dang du rtog pa'i tshogs/ /ma dag gnyen po'i byed pa dang / /rgyu rkyen yul spyod dngos po kun/ /rtog med rang 'byung me 'bar bas/ /shing gi
bye brag sna tshogs dang / /ras bal phung po du ma yang / /tshig cing dngos med byed pa ltar/ /de bzhin gzugs 'dzin ma lus pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas nyid du/ /bsregs shing thim
gyur mi gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /kun rtog ma lus bcom gyur pa'i/ /rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi/ /mkhyen pa byang chub sems kyi rgyun/ /mi 'gag phrin las
rgyun mi 'chad/ /mi 'gyur stong nyid bde chen po/ /zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa/ /thob tu med las kun tu 'byung / /lhun grub de bzhin nyid gnas pa'o/ /de kho na nyid las rtog pa dang
mi rtog pa rnam par dag par gyur pas/ rang bzhin slob dang mi slob pa'i bye brag gis rab tu mi gnas pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ro/ /'di ni mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o/ /dpal
ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// //byams pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi mtha' drug gis bshad pa ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dgongs pas bshad pa dang dgongs pas bshad pa dang dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / sgra ji
bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa rnams so/ /byams pas gsol pa/ thugs brtse ba nye bar gzhag cing / bcom ldan 'das tshig re re'i dbye ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ mthar thug pas bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal ba rmad du byung ba bshad pa ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags
dang bral ba yang ma yin pa dang / bar ma dbu ma nye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o/ /bde ba zag bcas ma yin te/ /zag
pa med pa'i bde ba nyid/ /bde ba spangs shing 'bras med pas/ /sgyu ma lta bur byung ba ste/ /de nyid bde ba'i ye shes ni/ /dbu ma tsam du'ang mi dmigs so/ /gang zag dbang po dman pa
rnams/ /skrag byed 'gal ba ltar snang ngo / /dbang po mchog rnams chos la ni/ /sngon chad ma byung chos thos pas/ /ngo mtshar nges shes skyes pa yis/ /rmad du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin
thog /rnam par grol thob mtshan nyid do/ /phyi rol gsang bar smra la sogs/ /ma dag dag par 'dod pa dang / /ma grol grol 'dod dgag pa dang / /rang gar 'jug pa dgag pa'i phyir/ /cung
zad 'jig rten brtags pa las/ /bzlog phyir ye shes zab mo'i don/ /gnas lugs 'khrul pa rnam dag ste/ /de nyid snying po dgongs te bshad/ /lus dang
dag dang yid med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / thams cad stong pa dang / dag pa dang / 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig ni dgongs ba ma yin pas bshad pa'o/ /chos
thams cad la dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang / bdag tu 'dzin pa la dgongs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dgongs pa min te/ chos thams cad bdag med par ston cing spros med de bzhin
nyid las stong pa nyid du sten pa dang / chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dang / lus med pa ste phung po dang khams dang skye mched mi dmigs pa dang / brjod pa las
'das pas ngag med pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir yid med pa ni dgongs min du bshad pa'o/ /ga bur dang / khrag chen po dang / tsan dan dmar po dang rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang /

yi ge dang / phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni drang ba'i don te/ /ga bur ni khu ba dang / khrag chen po ni zla mtshan gyi khrag dang / tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni

tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba'o/ /rdo rje dang mtshan ma dang / thabs dang / pad+ma b+ha ga dang / shes rab dang / yi ge dang / phyag rgya dang / btsun mo rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig
rnams nges pa'i don no/ /ga bur ni dkyil 'khor yig 'bru dang / khrag chen po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yig 'bru dang / tsan dan dmar po ni pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad yig 'bru gsum dang bcas po

dang / rdo rje'i rgyud mtshan ma yab dang / pad+ma mtshan ma ste yum dang / yi ge ni sngags te sa bon dang / phyag rgya ni phyag mtshan te sku yongs su grub pa phyag rgya bzhi ldan no/ /lha'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa

yongs su brtags pa'i lha rnams 'khrul pa bzlog pa tha mal cad las nus pa cung zang ldan pa ste thun mong pa'o/ /yang rang bzhin tha mi dad pa'i don las ga bur ni khu ba ga bur shu ki ste rnam pa kun 'dar las

rgyu ba dang / khrag chen po ni rang 'byung gi khrag ste si si lha rak+ta rtsa ro nas rgyu ba dang / tsan+dan dmar po'i khu ba ni chos 'byung nang du 'dres pa las yum gyi pad+ma'i khongs su yongs su 'dres la dbyer med pa

las 'gro ba'i lus mngon par byang chub pa'i tshul du yongs su rdzogs pa nyid do/ /pad+ma b+ha ga ste shes rab kyi cha dang / rdo rje ling+ga ste thabs kyi cha dang / zla nyid nub pa'i ldog pa cha mnyam par gyur pa las yi
ge ste sa bon yon tan grub byed/ phyag rgya bzhi ldan gyi yab yub rdo rje btsun mo rnams chos 'byung las mngon par bde ba'i don ye shes yang dag par bstan pa thun mong ma yin pa'o/ /byams pas
gsol pa/ de dag gi drang ba'i don gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang yang A li dang kA li'i yi ge sna tshogs sgra'i don gyi sgo nas rjod par byed pa'i mtha' dang / brjod par bya
ba'i thun mong gi chos dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la bla na med pa gsang ba chen po'i gzungs sngags dang rig sngags
'di sgra'i de kho na nyid la brten nas rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / yang gang zag rtog ge bar gyur pa rnams la bstan gyi rjod byed thun mong du gyur pa mi phyed rdo rje'i yi ge srog tu gyur pa chos

kyi phung po du ma yang de nyid las byung zhing de nyid du thos pa ni drang ba'i don du bstan pa'o/ /de dag la yang phung po lnga dang / rigs lnga dang / 'byung ba lnga dang ye shes lnga rnam par dag pa/
tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dag go /thug pa phyogs bcas 'gyur pa nyid/ /nyi zla
lus kyi gnas las skyes/ /dbang gi dkyil 'khor g.yo ldan pa/ /gnas bzhi las phyogs gyur pa/ /chu bos brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste/ /stong dang brgyad cu d+h+r-i 'od can/ /de dag chos kyi
sgor gyur pa/ /phung po bla na med par 'gyur/ /gnyis ka dang bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams su don gsal bar gsungs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste/ 'di lta ste dkyil 'khor dang
mchod sbyin dang / gtor ma dang / sman dang / zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni sgra ji
bzhin pa ste yi ge'i don gyis bshad pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor rtog pa'i cho ga sogs/ /spyod pa bsnyen bsgrub 'bras ldan pa/ /yan lag don rgyas rnam bshad pa/ /ji bzhin sgra zhes bstan pa

yin/ /ko Ta l+Sha/ ko Ta b+ha Na/ ko Ta we/ ko Ta b+ha Tha pa/ ko ta ra ka/ ko la kha/ ko la ba/ ko la b+ha shal/ ko la sta thA/ ki la b+ha b+hi/ 'dis dbang po dang yul gsungs te/ de lte bu la sogs pa
rdo rje'i tshig ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgo nas sbas pa'i bshad pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda'i gsang ba gang / /ko Ta k+Sha sogs mkha' 'gros bstan pa dang / brda spyod gsang ba
'jig rten ma grags pas/ /ji bzhin ma yin sgrar bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems nyid spros med las/ /mtha' bral rnam par mi rtog pas/ /dmigs med phyag rgya chen po ste/ /mi gnas zung
'jug bla na med/ /rdo rje rang 'byung ting nge 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /rgyal bas nges pa'i don du gsungs/ /mtha' drug rnam par dbye ba gtan la phab pa'o/ /dpal ye
shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// //byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje theg pa chen po'i rgyud sde
gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyud sde ni 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud dang / gnyis ka'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang / /bya ba'i rgyud dang / rtog
pa'i rgyud do/ /byams pas gsol pa/ rgyud de rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor bla na med pa rgyud ni stong
phrag bcu gnyis te rgyas par phye na grangs med do/ /rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la stong phrag drug go /spyod pa'i rgyud la stong phrag brgyad do/ /bya ba'i rgyud la stong phrag bzhi'o/ /rtog pa dang phra

mo'i rgyud la stong phrag bzhi'o/ /de dag stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi ste rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge ji snyed pa ni/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha rdza dz+ha nya/ Ta T+ha Da D+ha Na/ ta thA da d+ha na/ pa pha
ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ a A i I u U/ r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai o au aM aH/ 'di dag ni ming gi yi ge'i tshogs rnams so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi byed pa'i cho ga dang sgrub pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa las rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis langs
te 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas rab tu bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje
btsun mo'i b+ha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal ba rmad du byung ba rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' drug dang tshul bzhi'i sgo nas rab tu spyod de bsgrub par bya'o/ /
zhes rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du gnas so/ /rig ma dang lha mo dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor la dgod par bya'o/ /de nas las byed pa'i sgrub pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu

rab tu spyod de sgrub par byed pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la bzhugs so/ /las kyi bya ba sna tshogs rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu spyad pa sgrub par byed pa ni spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhugs
so/ /'khor ba la shin tu 'jigs par dmigs shing shin tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang / ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba med pa dang / bdag nyid lha'i snyems pa med pa dang / rmad du byung ba'i spyod
yul rang rkyen gyis rgyu'i bar spyod pa sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugs so// /sngags dang sman dang / sbyin sreg dang mig sman dang rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po

brgyad rab tu spyad pa sgrub par byed pa phra mo dang rtog pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so/ /gsang chen rgyud kyi ngo bo dang / /nges tshig sgra 'jug rgyu mtshan dang / /khyad par dbye thabs dang ldan pa/ /gzhung
tshad dang ni ldang tshad dang / /brjod bya rjod byed ston tshul lo/ /sems bskyed sngon 'gro mtshungs ldan pas/ /khyad par smin lam byin rlabs lam/ /rjes snang 'brel pa thun mong min/ /bde
ba lam myur mthong chos 'gyur/ /de nyid thabs zab bla na med/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyi/ /sku gsung thugs las mi phyed pa/ /bde chen mchog gi snying po nyid/ /ngo bo ye shes dri med
pa'o/ /tan+t+ra zhes pa rgyud yin te/ /tan+t+ra shes pa dngos la rgyu na/ /tra ya dus gsum thog med pas/ /'dren pa rtog tshogs 'joms byed pa'o/ /rgyun chags
'brel ba ma tshang med/ /rgyas byed sems can khams las ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor pa/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa mtha' yas pa/ /bar mi bcad cing ye shes rgyun/ /
phrin las mi zad 'khor lo ste/ /rgyud ces sgrar btags de nyid do/ /gleng bzhi gleng slong gsang chen la/ /rgyas pa sdus ngo bo mi 'gyur ba/ /'jig gnas mthar phyin bla na med/ /rdo rje
theg pa'i ldang tshad do/ /sngon rgyu gdung ba shes che la/ /spong bar mi nus 'jug phyir na/ /dbang phyug chen po lta bu'o/ /lam la gnas pa rim gnyis chos/ /ngo bo mi 'gyur mchog
gsang ba/ /sa lam bgrod pa mthar phyin pas/ /bla ma'i lam ni gtsor gyur pa/ /bla na med pa tshe 'dis thob/ /rgyu dang thabs lam 'bras bu ste/ sgrub byed gsang brtsa ba'i rgyud/ /snying po
mchog las rab 'byam spyod/ /gsal byed phyi ma bde blag 'gyur/ /dka' ba spyod dang kha skong byed/ /the tshoms la nges ster ba dang / /dus rtags blo la sbyar ba ste/ /snod rig skal
pa'i khyad par bstan/ /gsang ba chen po spyi dang bye brag thams cad du/ /tha dad pa dang gcig gnas pa ting 'dzin dang / /mthar thug rim pa dam tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni/ /sdom
pa'i de nyid kun tu khyab pa byang chub sems/ /yang dag bde ba chen po phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa/ /ye shes tshad med rgya chad phyogs su lhung ba med/ /mnyam nyid spros pa med pa dag pa chen po
ste/ /sgra dang sgra min las 'das rgyud ni bla med pa'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o// //byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyor ba dang po'i mdzad pa

gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal bde ba chen po'i 'byung ba 'og min chos kyi dbyings dkyil 'khor chen po yong su dag pa tshad med pa'i phro brang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'i dbus su bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus
pa'i gsang ba bla na med par dbang bskur ba/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i snying po gsang ba chen po yongs su dag cing ye shes yongs su dag pa thob pa ni dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i yon tan phrin
las mi zad pa rgyan gyis 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ spro ba dang bsdu bar mdzad pa/ spros pa med cing snang ba rnam par dag pa de nyid la gnas pa ni sbyor ba dang po zhes bya'o/ /byams pas gsol pa/
dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ji ltar du ston par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di nyid tshad med dkyil 'khor gdu/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs
rdo rje bla na med pa'i mchog /rten dang brten par bcas pa yi/ /bde gshegs pho brang snying po ni/ /'dod pa khams kyi 'gro ba rnams/ /ri rab chen po'i steng du
ni/ /khang bu brtsegs pa ga la bar/ /dbang po brgya byin 'khor bcas pa/ /nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis sogs/ /rin chen rang byung mchod sprin ldan/ /dbang bskur rim pa ston par
mdzad/ /dbang phyug u mar bcas pa dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug gdong drug sogs/ /'dul phyir yul dang dbang po ni/ /gnyis med mnyam par sbyor ba las/ /longs spyod bde ba'i
spyod pa yis/ /rnam par dag pa bya ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor du ni 'jug par mdzad/ /de nas dag khams de nyid du/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dang las 'das pa yi/ /byang chub sems mchog
rdo rje bla med pa/ /zil gnon rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la zhugs/ /dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med mnyam nyid dang / /rnal 'byor bde chen mngon par byang chub pa/ /nyi zla pad+ma A li kA li
bcas/ /thugs gsung sku yi rdo rje de nyid las/ /'od spros 'jig rten khams su khyab gyur pas/ /brtan g.yor bcas pa yongs su dag par gyur/ /byin gyis brlabs kyi snang ba'i rgyud
sbyangs pas/ /'gro ba rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang bkod/ /bde ba dang ni yid bde thob gyur te/ /rjes su rnal 'byor ye shes rgya mtsho las/ /mi byed dbang phyug byang chub sems kyi sku/ /
ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i ting 'dzin las/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa dang / /sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid mchog /dbang bskur ba yi cho 'phrul bla na med/ /gsol ba

lhun grub snying po'i ngang la ste/ /oM AHhUM dang swA hA 'od 'phro ba/ /'od zer gyis ni phyogs bcur khyab par mdzad/ /lAM mAM bAM tAM AM las 'byung ba bzhi/ /maiM th+liM oM oM oM hUM oM saM las/ /rnam shes
brgyad kyi rang bzhin sems dpa' che/ /rU sha ga ra spa ste 'dod yon nyid/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHhUM drug 'od 'bar las/ /mthar byed khro bo'i rgyal po yum bcas bcu/ /yan lag tshogs gnas phyogs kyi
gdon 'joms pa'o/ /shin tu rnal 'byor rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul ston/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems kyi rdo rje 'chang de nyid/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rgyan bcas
gzigs par gyur/ /mtshan dpe rdzogs pa phyag rgya ldan par snang / /de nyid chos dbyings rdo rje yum bcas bzhi/ /chos 'byung nas byon thugs ka'i dbus ma nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa du ma
spros pa las/ /ched du brjod pa gsang ba de nyid gsungs/ /kun rdzob cho 'phrul mi zad 'khor lo bstan/ /de rjes 'dod pa khams pa gdul don du/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis dang
ba'i tshul/ /rnam snang mdzad pa rdo rje 'dzin sku las/ /sku yi cha zhu lha mo'i tshul bstan pa/ /spro dang bsdu ba ye shes mngon rol pa'i/ /spyod pa bde chen dgyes bar bstan pa'o/ /dpal ldan mi
bskyod rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mchog /rdul med pa nyid gru bzhir byin brlabs pa/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs dpag med/ /phyogs dus kun nas
khyab cing yongs su bskor/ /byang chub sems nyid rdo rje dbus bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad pa rin chen 'byung / /'od dpag med pa gdon mi za ba nyid/ /bder gshegs
dpag med rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /bar snang ye shes yum dang gnyis med pa/ /shin tu rnal 'byor rim pa yang dag pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjes byin rlabs pa/ /dam tshig pa dang
ye shes sems dpa' che/ /nus pa brtan dang dbang bskur rgyas btab pa'o/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' thugs kar nges gnas pa/ /rnal 'byor chen po yi ni mgon po mchog /rig pa
chen po'i skyes bu de bzhin gshegs/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med bzhugs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med 'dus pa'i dus/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag med
brjod mi lang / /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma sprin phreng ba'i/ /mchod pa'i tshogs kyis bar snang gang bas mchod/ /rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin gshegs pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs dang sems
dpa' thams cad kyis/ /thun mong du ni gsol ba btab gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba/ /rdo rje snying pos bsdus pa yi/ /bcom
ldan snying po bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus shing gsol pa btab par gyur la/ /de tshe rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ /'dir ni legs gyis gsang ba nges pa la/ /spro bas zhus pa gsang chen
bla med pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gyur thams cad kyang / /the tshom skye bar gyur pa yin pas na/ /sems dpa' khyed rnams kun gyis ji ltar rtogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis
gsol pa ni/ /rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis ni/ /shin tu rtogs par dka' bar gyur pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mthu stobs kyis/ /skal par ldan pa rjes su 'dzin par ni//
nus pa mchog ldan phun sum tshogs pa yi/ /shin tu rab tu rtogs par byin rlabs shing / /dbang bskur mdzad pas mngon par rtogs mdzad gsol/ /rmad du byung ba'i ye shes cho 'phrul kun/ /
da lta nyid du gsal bar bstan mdzad gsol/ /sbyor ba dang po'i rig pa'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /mngon rdzogs byang chub rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas ni/ /dang po'i mgon

po nyid kyis ni/ /rig pa chen po'i skyes bu ste/ /chos dbyings rdo rje ma gnyis med/ /dkyil 'khor spro dang sdud par mdzad/ /dpal ldan mi bskyod rdo rjes ni/ /ye shes sgron ma rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms zhugs pas/ /badzra d+h+rika las phyung gyur ni/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /in+d+ra nI la kund ltar/ /rA ga 'bar ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ /g.yas g.yon rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /pad+ma
'khor lo nor bu dang / /pad+ma ral gri g.yon du ste/ /rdo rje skyil krung rgyan spras pa/ /de nyid sku las 'od zer tshogs/ /spros nas kun tu bder gshegs kyis/ /phyogs
bcu'i zhing khams khyab mdzad nas/ /'gro sbyangs dag par gyur nas ni/ /smin par nas zhugs thugs kar thim/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /bcom ldan zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur/ /rin chen
sna tshogs seng+ge'i khri/ /zla ba nyi ma'i steng du bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus gnas pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo mngon par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dpal ye shes
rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa drug pa'o// //dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
zhugs te/ /zhal gsum phyag drug kunada'i mdog /'khor lo dril bu yum dang rol/ /rdo rje nor bu g.yas pa la/ /g.yon pa pad+ma ral gri 'dzin/ /sngo dang dmar dang g.yas dang g.yon
glang chen khri steng pad zla'i steng / /rgyan bcas skyil krung bzhugs pa'o/ /bde gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ /bdag med rdo rje la bzhugs te/ /rat+na d+h+rika phyung gser gyi mdog /
yid bzhin nor bu dril bu dang / /'khor lo pad+ma ral gri can/ /dung dang ut+pal mtshungs pa ni/ /rin chen rgyan spras rta mchog ste/ /yum bcas skyil krung bzhugs pa'o/ /dpal ldan tshe
dpag med pa ni/ /'od zer 'bar ba rdo rjer bzhugs/ /a ro lika ces rA ga'i 'od/ /sngo dkar pad+ma dril bu dang / /rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri bcas/ /yum bcas rma bya'i khri la bzhugs/ /rin chen
rgyan ldan 'od 'phro bas/ /mnyam pa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /bcom ldan gdon mi za ba'i sku/ /zil gnon rdo rje la bzhugs te/ /pradz+nyA d+h+rika las markata mdog /dkar dmar ral gri
dril bus 'khyud/ /rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu dang / /pad+ma rin chen rgyan ldan nyid/ /yum bcas shang shang khrir bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
kyi 'khor lo mngon par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bdun pa'o// //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo

rje btsun mo spyan ma yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kun/ /mnyam byed dam tshig la bzhugs te/ /mo hA ra ti las byung ba/ /dung mdog sdo dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /sku yi rdo rje dang mtshungs pa/ /pad+ma
zla nyi shar lhor bzhugs/ /rdo rje btsun mo mA ma kis/ /sangs rgyas rjes su mnyes byed pa'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /dwe Sha ra ti las byon pa/ /thugs kyi rdo rje mtshungs pa nyid/ /
baiDUr dung dang rA ga'i zhal/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan spras 'gying / /pad zlar lho nub grwar bzhugs so/ /rdo rje btsun mo gos dkar gyis/ /rjes su chags pa rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
zhugs te/ /rA ga ra ti las byon pa/ /gsung gi rdo rje mtshungs pa nyid/ /ban+d+hu ri ka sngo dang dkar/ /sgeg cing rin chen rgyan spras pa/ /pad zlar nub byang grwar

bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje btsun mo sgrol ma yi/ /glu ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /badzra ra ti las byung sgeg /markata dung dang b+han+du ka /phrin las rdo rje dang mtshungs
pa/ /rin chen rgyan gyis legs spras pa/ /pad zlar byang shar grwar bzhugs pa'o/ /lus kyi gnas su lte ba dang / /snying ga mgrin pa gsang ba dang / /lAM mAM pAM tAM sa bon nyid/ /'byung ba la
ni lhan cig spyod pa yi/ /lha mo ye shes ba de bar rol/ /de nyid mnyam pa phyag rgya che/ /ye shes mnyam par sbyor ba lha mo'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las
rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'o// //lha mo gzugs kyi rdo rje mas/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bzhugs te/ /badzra rU pe zhes
sngags las/ /sku mchog dkar mo me long 'dzin/ /rdo rje spyan ma dang mtshungs pa/ /rin chen rgyan rnams kyis mdzes spras/ /me yi phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs pa'o/ /lha mo sgra yi rdo rje
mas/ /nam mkha'i 'od kyi sprin rdo rje/ /tshim byed ting 'dzin la bzhugs te/ /badzra shap+de las byon pa/ /rdo rje mA ma kI dang mtshungs/ /a gau rgyud mangs sbreng mdzad glu/ /dbyangs kyis kun

tu mchod byed pa/ /bden bral phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so/ /lha mo dri byug rdo rje mas/ /mngon par byang chub bdun ston pa/ /de nyid rdo rje'i ting 'dzin bzhugs/ /badzra gan+d+he las byung ba/ /gos dkar
yum dang mtshungs pa ste/ /dung chos lha rdzas mchog 'dzin pa/ /rin chen rgyan spras 'gying bag ldan/ /rig 'dzin phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje ro mchog lha mo ni/ /dam tshig chen po'i
mchod pa ni/ /kun mchog ting 'dzin la bzhugs te/ /badzra rA sa las byung ba/ /rin chen pad snod bdud rtsi ni/ /ro mchog bcud ldan 'dzin mdzad pa/ /sgrol ma dang ni mtshungs pa ste/ /dbang
ldan phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so/ /rig ma mchod lha rnams kyis ni/ /mchod sprin rgya mtshos mchod gyur pa'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa dgu pa'o// /
byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying ni/ /zhi ba'i dam tshig mchog gnas las/ /k+Shiti gar+b+ha'i sngags las byung / /mdog dkar 'khor lo rtsibs bcu 'dzin/ /thor tshugs cod pan rgyan
gyis spras/ /shar khyams skyil krung dag gis bzhugs/ /sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /dngos dang dngos med dam tshig ste/ /ro mnyam ting 'dzin la bzhugs pa/ /badzra pA Ni aM zhes
las/ /gser mdog rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin/ /lho phyogs khyams la skyil krung bzhugs/ /byang chub nam mkha'i snying po ni/ /dam tshig mchog la gzigs pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
zhugs te/ /A kA kha gar+b+ha'i sngags las byung / /gser mdog marka ta 'dzin pa/ /'gying bcas lho phyogs khyams la bzhugs/ /sems dpa' 'jig rten dbang
phyug gis/ /gsung mchog rdo rje ye shes kyi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /lo ke shwa ra badzra las/ /byon pa pad+ma rA ga'i 'od/ /g.yon pa'i pad+ma g.yas pa yis/ /'byed mdzad nub
kyi lha khyams bzhugs/ /byang sems mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyis/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje tshul gcig pa'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bzhugs te/ /g+ho Sha nA tha las byung ba'i/ /dmar ser
rin chen rgyan spras pa'i/ /ut+pal dmar po 'dzin mdzad pa/ /g.yas pas 'byed par mdzad pa ni/ /skyil krung nub kyi khyams la bzhugs/ /byang sems nyes pa kun sel gyis/ /chos rnams
kun la 'jug pa'i sgo/ /rdo rje zhes pa'i ting 'dzin bzhugs/ /ni wA ra ni las byung ba'i/ /markata 'od 'phro ral gri can/ /rgyan ldan byang gi khyams la bzhugs/ /dpal ldan byams pa'i mgon
pos ni/ /rdo rje spros pa'i sngags bkod kyi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /mai tri nA tha las byung ba/ /dung mdog klu shing spyi blugs can/ /rin chen rgyan gyis spras pa ste/ /shar gyi khyams
la bzhugs mdzad pa'o/ /sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni/ /zhing khams kun khyab mchod sprin gyi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /sa man+ta b+ha dra las byung ba/ /ljang mdog sna tshogs
rdo rje can/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan spras pa/ /byang phyogs khyams la skyil krung bzhugs/ /pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la ni/ /'gyid bcas thor tshugs rgyan spras pa/ /kun kyang zhal gsum phyag
drug ste/ /gtsol ba snol ma'i tshul gyis gzigs/ /meM th+liM oM oM oM dang ni/ /hUM oM saM nyid rnam shes brgyad/ /rnam par dag pa sems dpa'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las
rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o// //tshogs slob gang zag sgra don ston/ /bden pa gnyis su yongs bsdus pa/ /khyad par rnam par nges 'gyur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor sgo
bzhi dang / /phyogs rnams kun tu khro bo bcu/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can bgegs 'joms mdzad/ /zhal gsum phyag drug ldan pa'o/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed/ /rdo rje 'khor
lo 'bar ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /ya mAn+ta kr-i ta las byung ba/ /mthing nag g.yas dkar g.yon dmar zhing / /rdo rje tho ba 'khor lo dang / /ral gri nor bu sngags mdzub can//

shar sgor dri za'i steng bzhugs pa'o/ /khro rgyal shes rab mthar byed kyis/ /mngon par byang chub rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta sngags las byung / /dung mdog sngo
dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /be con dgra sta 'khor lo dang / /ral gri nor bu pad+ma 'dzin/ /lho sgor grul bum gnon mdzad pa'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rta mchog gis/ /rdo rje chags med pad+ma ni/ /ye shes
'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin las/ /pad+ma d+h+rika las phyung ba ni/ /b+han+du ri ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ /g.yas mthing g.yon dkar 'jigs par byed/ /pad+ma rdo rje tho ba dang / /

ral gri 'khor lo dgra sta can/ /nub sgor klu dbang steng bzhugs pa'o/ /khro rgyal bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yis/ /rdo rje byin rlabs snying po'i tshul/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin la zhugs te/ /big+h+nA n+ta kri ta las byung
ba/ /markata dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /rgya gram 'khor lo ral gri dang / /gtun shing dgra sta sdigs mdzub can/ /byang sgor gnod sbyin steng bzhugs so/ /khro rgyal mi g.yo mgon po yis/ /
chos dbyings mi zad rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /Ar+ya a tsa las phyung nyid/ /baiDUr+ya dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /ral gri 'khor lo dgra sta dang / /pad+ma nor bu sdigs mdzub
bo/ /me phyogs drang srong gnon mdzad pa'o/ /khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po yis/ /bsam gtan thogs med rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /Tak+ki rA dza'i sngags las phyung / /in+d+ra
nI la kund dmar/ /phyag rgya bsnol ba'i sdigs mdzub can/ /lcags kyu ral gri ut+pal/ /sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'dzin pa ste/ /bden bral steng du bzhugs pa'o/ /khro bo rdo rje be con can/
'jigs mdzad snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin/ /nI la daN+Da las byung ba/ /char sprin mdog 'dra dkar dmar zhal/ /dbyug pa ral gri nor bu dang / /'khor lo pad+ma sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /gtum po
mi bzad me dpung klong / /rlung lha'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje khro bo stobs po che/ /sku gsum mi phyed rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /mahA ba la'i sngags las phyung / /ut+pal
sprin dkar bye ru'i zhal/ /rtse gsum rnga yab ral gri dang / /'khor lo nor bu sdigs mdzub can/ /'byung po'i gdan steng bzhugs mdzad pa'o/ /khro rgyal rdo rje gtsug tor can/ /rig pa'i steng
mchog rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /uSh+NI Sha bi dza'i sngags las phyung / /nam mkha'i mdog can gtsug tor gyi/ /phyag rgya spyi bor bcings pa ste/ /rdo rje ral gri pad+ma dang / /
sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'khor lo 'dzin/ /rnam 'tshe 'joms mdzad sa bdag gnon/ /lha rgyal tshangs pa gnon mdzad pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes khros pa'i sku/ /rab tu 'byung gnas ye
shes kyi/ /rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ /brtan g.yo gdug pa dug can gyi/ /drag po 'joms mdzad mthing nag nyid/ /sum b+ha rA dza'i sngags las byung / /rdo rje 'khor lo ral
gri dang / /nor bu pad+ma sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /rnam 'tshe zhi mdzad sa bdag gnon/ /las kyi gnas su khro bo rnams/ /sa bon phyag mtshan rtsa gnas la/ /g.yas mthing thod dbyug
g.yon par ni/ /be con mgrin par pad+ma dang / /gsang bar sna tshogs rdo rje 'khyil/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsgo bzhi bsrung / /drug ldan hUM gis brgyan pa ni/ /lcags kyu dpung g.yas rtse
gsum g.yon/ /lha dar dbyug pa tri shU la/ /long bur rdo rje spyi gtsug tu/ /'khor lo gye'u 'phags gyur pa'o/ /khro rgyal thams cad yum dang ldan/ /rin
chen klu dbang rgyan gyis spras/ /dbu skra gyen brdzes me dpung dbus/ /yan lag rags shing brjid pa'i sku/ /ha ha hUM hUM sgra sgrogs pas/ /srid gsum g.yo bar mdzad pa po/ /dngos po mtshan
mar 'jin pa'i gdon/ /log lta can rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba dgyes/ /gsang ba bde ba chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes snying po bstan/ /lha tshogs mngon
par 'byung ba'i 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o// //zab pa'i rgyan la rnam par dbye ba gang / /
mtha' ldan dang ni bshad tshul dbye ba yis/ /nus pa khyad par gyur pa rgyan dang ldan/ /sa yi dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyan bstan pa'o/ /rgya che'i rgyan la spyi dang bye brag can/ /rgya che la
ni mtshon don ston pa dang / /rigs can lngas ni nges par 'jug gyur pa/ /gang zag dang ni dngos grub sgrub pa'i gnas/ /lnga tshad gzugs khams tshad med ldan/ /tshul ldan
ston pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /rgyud dang gleng gzhi nges pa'i tshig /rgyu yis mthar 'byin spyod pa'o/ /chos kyi tha dad pa yi rgyan/ /tshogs slob gnyis dang bden gnyis so/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas gsol pa/ /don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu
spyad par bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
gang du sems can thams cad kyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe yang dag pa'i mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug cing mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las
'das pa mngon du byed do/ /gang du 'gro ba'i don 'byung ba/ /dus la bab pa de yi tshe/ /rdo rje'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'i tshe/ /thogs pa med par phrin las kun/ /gdul bya'i bsam pa ji
lta bar/ /nges pa nyid du 'byung 'gyur ba'o/ /sa rlung brtan po thob pa dang / /rlung gis rnam par 'degs byed pa/ /thabs dang shes rab srog rtsol la/ /brten pas rdo rje rkang mgyogs 'grub
tha mal lus ngag yid dag la/ /lha sngags rlung sems rtse gcig las/ /bsam gtan sa rlung me rlung gis/ /kun tu bsgyur bas gser 'gyur thob/ /lha byed sgyu ma'i rnam shes las/ /ting
'dzin chu rlung gsal snang gis/ /lkog tu gyur pa'i rdzas mthong ba/ /de nyid mig sman ril bu 'grub/ /rlung gi dmigs pa rnon po yi/ /rnal 'byor pa yi mtshon cha mchog /gar bsgyur gcod
par byed pa yi/ /thogs med ral gri'i dngos grub bo/ /rtog med tha mal dbugs bral la/ /zhing skyong cho 'phrul yum gzhan bzhugs/ /pho nya sngags kyi
nus pa las/ /grub ster ro langs grub pa 'byung / /bdud rtsi rang lus gnas pa las/ /stobs gyur 'byung ba ro snyoms pas/ /sman mchog zil ldan rnyed pa ltar/ /bcud len yon
tan khyad par 'grub/ /nam mkha'i rlung las rtsa gnas der/ /rlung sgrom dag byed sbad shes pas/ /grib ma mi 'byung bde thob pa/ /mi snang bar snang byed pa nyid/ /gsang sgo rtsa yi bu
ga las/ /'dus pa sgron mes khams dgu yi/ /dwangs snyigs byed pas lha min gyi/ /bug rnyed la ni sa 'og 'grub/ /dbang dang dgug dang bskrad pa dang / /mnan dang rengs byed mngon
spyod dang / /zhi dang rgyas pa kun las byed/ /brjod bya dang ni rjod byed dang / /dpe dang mngon gyur stobs dang ni/ /chos don khyad par gyur ba'i phyir/ /nus ldan gsang ba'i rgyan yin no/ /
gnas pa dang ni gsal rdzu 'phrul/ /yon tan phrin las rgyan rim bzhin/ /de ni rjod byed rtag par brgyan/ /don gyur dgos pa bla na med/ /don gnas byed dang ye shes kyi/ /gsang
chen don mthong snying po ste/ /rgyan pas dbye bsdu bstan pa'o/ /dug zhi ba dang bsrung ba dang / /rgol ba'i nus 'joms phrin las te/ /rab 'byams las tshogs du ma bstan/ /dpal
ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o// //byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang / rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang / mtha' drug gis bshad pa dang / bshad tshul rnam pa bzhi dang / dbye ba rnam
pa gnyis dang / gang zag rnam pa lnga'i sgo nas slob ma brtag pa dang / bden pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa'o/ /gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang /
tshad dang / dgos pa rnams so/ /dang po gleng gzhi gleng slong bstan pa las/ /phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang ldan bsdus pa/ /gser gyi 'khor lo rin chen chos mthun pa/ /spyi bo'i gnas su e
baM rdo rje bzhugs/ /ston pa chags can 'khor dang de bzhin chos/ /ye shes dus ldan tshad las dgos pa bsgrub/ /byang sems rdo rje cho ga dbang bskur ba/ /rnam grangs le'u gnas tshul
lnga ldan pa/ /rim gnyis rgyud gsum don gyis phye ba nyid/ /byang chub phyogs las dum bu dbye bar gyur/ /rnal 'byor bsnyen bsgrub yan lag mchog dang ni/ /rdo rje rnam bzhi yan lag
rim pas bsdus/ /dgos pa'i khyad par las dang dngos grub las/ /grub pa brgyad dang mchog ldan yang dag pa'o/ /bde chen 'khor lor thig le gtso gyur pa'i/ /dgu brgya phrag gcig
ye shes rlung gyur pa/ /bcu gcig bzhi cha phrag lnga'i rtsa gnas so/ /lnga bcu phrag gnyis A li kA li ste/ /rtsibs stong ldan pa sbas pa'i 'khor lo'o/ /spyod pa
rim ldan rjes su gsang ba ste/ /rmad byung dkyil 'khor snying po bskul ba dang / /sngags dang ye shes sku ba bskyed 'phrin las dang / /rab 'byam rigs 'dzin yan lag 'bras bu bstan/ /
sngags dang nad la mchog gzhol rnal 'byor grub/ /las tshogs tshar gcod rjes 'dzin rmi lam chos/ /rnam dag dkyil 'khor las kyi phrin las tshogs/ /dam tshig sdom pa rab
rdzogs gzhung bsdus bstan/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o// //snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid du/ /lhan cig
skyes pa'i snying po gsang ba gang / /rgyal chen shAkya'i rigs rgyud dus ldan mchog /don gyi pho brang du 'khrungs dbugs 'byin pa/ /byang chub gleng gzhi a khaM bIr hUM las/ /'jig pa chu
sgo yang dag thar pa'i rten/ /gzigs las rlung yul las 'das kun 'dar mthong / /gshegs pa ye shes sa bon drug tu ni/ /nges 'byung rang 'byung gnyis su med pa'i rten/ /sngon
zhing 'gog pas nges pa snying por bskul/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon byed shes spyod pa/ /'khor lo bskor bstan snying po mchog thob pas/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bla na med par gyur/ /de ni
rgyud ces mngon par byang chub lnga/ /phung po dag pa khams gsang rigs gcig nyid/ /gleng gzhi nges pa dbang sogs la ma rdo rje/ /rgyu ni spyod pa zhi drag khro tshogs 'dren/ /gleng gzhi dbye ba tshul
gnyis rtogs par bya/ /yid bzhin nor bu ngo bo nyid ldan sku/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o// //mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lor
gsung rdo rje/ /mtha' ldan drug ni glang chen stobs ldan pa/ /brjod bya ming tshig rab byed sgra tshogs las/ /zung gyur ro drug longs spyod don ldan brjod/ /'gro drug gnas don nges pa rgyan du
gyur/ /'jig rten gnas dang 'jig rten 'das las grol/ /yangs thob rnal 'byor rgyu 'bras rmi lam dang / /mtshungs pa sgyu mar ston pa dang drang ba'i don/ /grub mtha' rim ldan gzungs las
yon tan tshogs/ /ngo bo nyid kyis grol ba stong pa nyid/ /rnam par mi rtog skye med dngos rnam dag /spros bral de bzhin nyid las kun tu ston/ /ye shes yongs su dag pa nges pa'i don/ /
dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i blo bzlog byed/ /yang dag gnyis med ye shes lam ston cing / /dman pa zil gnon mchog don rmad gyur pa/ /dgongs bshad gsang chen 'byung gnas
don kun bsgrub/ /chos rnams 'byung ba rgya mtsho chen po las/ /thugs rje'i zhags pas 'dren pa blo gros mchog /tshig don spro bsdus byang chub gnas thob byed/ /yon tan dgongs pa min pa
zhes brjod do/ /rtsa rlung byang sems yi ge gnas dag pa/ /ro rkyang srog rtsol drang nges khyad par gsang / /snying gar 'bru lnga rtsa ba 'bru lnga lhung ba dag /dgongs
bshad drug lnga shes byed lam sbyang ba'o/ /dgongs min A li gsung dbyangs yan lag gnas/ /de nyid chos rnams bdag med sgra sgrogs pa/ /A li kA li drug ldan mtshan dpe ni/ /ji
bzhin sgra las rgyan spras bla na med/ /ji bzhin min sgra bcu gnas rdo rje'i dbyings/ /gsang ba snying po bsdus pa brdas bshad nyid/ /thog ma bar dang mtha' mar dge ba'i chos/ /bla med
mi zad rnam pa thams cad du/ /rab 'byam don bsgrub rtog pa phrin las tshogs/ /grub steng gnas las ji bzhin sgar 'byung ston/ /phyir mi bzlog pa bral dang mtha' las 'das/ /khyad
par brda las zab pa snying po'i don/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul tha snyad las grol ba/ /ji bzhin ma yin sgra zhes rnam par bsgrags/ /dus gzhan la dgongs pa ni drang ba'i don to/ /gang zag
gzhan la dgongs pa ni drang ba'i don to/ /mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa ni nges pa'i don to/ /don gzhan la dgongs pa ni nges pa'i don to/ /gang zag gi bsam pa la dgongs pa ni dgongs
bshad do/ /bsgyur ba la ldem por dgongs pa ni dgongs bshad do/ /gnyen po la ldem por dgongs pa ni dgongs bshad do/ /gzhung la ldem por dgongs pa ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'o/ /
mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bco lnga pa'o// //lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas pa ni/ /
rnam par bshad pa tshul bzhin ldan pa ni/ /ma nor phyin ci ma log ston pa ste/ /'di ni rdo rje btsun mo'i chos tshal mtshungs/ /lte ba'i 'khor lo sgra ldan yig 'bru brgyad/ /mdo las e baM ma yA
gsang ba nyid/ /rgyud spyi brda dbyibs sgra dang rgyas 'debs te/ /kun rdzob rang gzhan bdag byin brlabs pa las/ /rmi lam sgyu lus mtshan pa bar do sbyang / /sems gsum stong nyid ye shes sbas
pa nyid/ /snang ba gsum las drang bzhin dag 'od gsal/ /bde ba las ni gtum mo 'bar 'dzag las/ /phyi rol gnyis med gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pa/ /sgyu ma'i rol pa btsun mo lta
bur bstan/ /dang po yi ge'i don te spyi ming tsam/ /smos pas A li kA lis rkyen sbyar nas/ /rnam pa du ma'i byed pa sgrar bcas pa/ /las rnams lus dang yan lag 'brel pas mtshon/ /spyi don
gnyis las mos don nyan rang dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i lam mchog la dbang ste/ /'jug pa rnam thar la sogs drug ldan pa/ /chos rnams yongs rdzogs mkhyen bcas 'dir ston byed/ /
rdo rje theg pa spyi don rgyud kun gyi/ /dgongs par lta ba'i rnal 'byor gsang ston pa/ /rig sngags gzung bcas gsang sngags de nyid kyi/ /'dus par 'jug pa'i rim pa lam gyur pa'o/ /sbas pa'i
don las snying po gsang ba mchog /bla na med pa'i 'byung gnas btsun mo dang / /phyogs mtshungs phyi ltar rin chen rgyan spras bzhin/ /spyi don gnyis kyis na
bza' gos rim na/ /sbas don gsang ba btsun mo'i lus ngag yid/ /lus ni sgyu ma kun rdzob rmi lam ltar/ /ngag ni rlung sngags gnyis med sbyor ba las/ /rnam shes sems nyid snang ba
gsum sbas pa/ /bde ba'i lam gyis sbas pa dga' ba bzhi/ /ye shes chen po rol pa'i gsang ba mchog /snying po bde chen lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /ye shes 'byung gnas nyid ni skad
cig bzhi/ /mthar thug de kho na nyid 'od gsal ba/ /de la brten pas lam myur bgrod pa ste/ /rang 'byung zhi gnas lhag mthong ro mnyam pa/ /zung 'jug mi 'gyur byang chub sems rdo rje//
lam mthar phyin pa lhun grub ngo bo nyid/ /brjod 'das rgya chen po yang de nyid do/ /e waM las ni phun tshogs lnga ldan pa/ /dpe don gyur pa sgra dang rtags las shes/ /yi ge bzhi bcu gsang ba
gleng gzhi las/ /e paM gsang ba gleng bslang mdo rgyas pa/ /'dzam gling gnas su dkyil 'khor snang ba bstan/ /gsang sngags dbyibs dang brda sngags don sbyar ba/ /thun mong gyur ba the tshom
sel ba'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o// //smin mtshams mdzod spu'i 'khor lo mu khyud las/ /rtsa yi byed pa ro rkyang thabs shes las/

srog rtsol 'byung 'jug byang sems spro bsdu dang / /sgro 'dogs gcod pa phyi dang gsang ba'i tshul/ /rdo rje'i lus kyi gnas lugs khyad par las/ /dmag dpon ral gri thogs pa lta bu ste/ /tshogs slob gnyis la

spyi dang rang mtshan nyid/ /spros dang spyod pa de nyid snang ba lam/ /rnam shes ye shes dbang po sgo 'byed pa/ /chos la rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas bstan/ /gang zag rigs pa dbye ba gnyis su shes/ /dbang gis
phye ba khyad par chos la yang / /phyi las gzhol dang gsang ba nang gnas byed/ /de nyid khyad par dbye ba de ni mtshon par bya/ /'jig rten pa rnams khams gsum bsam gtan phyir ldog lam/ /'jig rten

las 'das phyir mi ldog pa yang dag bstan/ /ye shes las ni bla ma'i lam rten 'don rdzogs thob/ /byin rlabs chu rgyun gyis ni bde chen bla med don/ /rab grub bde ba dpe med ma rtogs log rtog the tshom sel/ /sgro
'dogs skur 'debs bral ba dri med gsang ba grub pa can/ /mthar thug snying po rdzogs sangs 'bras bu lam gyur spyod pa'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o// //
gsang ba'i 'khor lo la brten rigs las ni/ /'gro ba blo rigs lnga ldan dbang po ni/ /rab dang yang rab dman pa 'bring rnams te/ /yan lag rlung sgo dbang po lnga spyod yul/ /bdud rtsi lnga ldan
de nyid blon po ste/ /byang sems thig le bde ba'i 'byung gnas so/ /gsang ba bde skyong 'khor lo de nyid ni/ /skal ldan blo ldan 'gro ba'i rgyud kyis bsdus/ /gang zag blo rigs dpe dang sbyar ba ste/ /
snod kyi bye brag chos mthun mtshungs pa ste/ /rgyud la 'jug pa'i dbang po'i rim pa ni/ /tha dad chos can blon por chos mthun pa/ /tsan+dan lta bu dbang po dman pa'o/ /
ut+pal lta bu tha mar gyur pa dang / /pad dkar skal ldan 'bring gyur cung zad dang / /pad dmar dbang po rab 'gyur brtson pa che/ /yang rab rin chen lta bu bla na med/ /rtsa dang byang sems yi
ge rlung dag pa/ /nges pa can dang ma nges par 'byung la/ /sbyangs pa can dang thog ma med nas kyi/ /rang bzhin yon tan gus pa thob gyur pa'o/ /tsan+dan lta bu ni nyan thos kyi rigs can/ ut+pal
lta bu ni rang rgyal ba'o/ /pad+ma dkar po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so/ /pad dpar lta bu ni gsang sngags la 'jug pa'o/ /rin chen lta bu yon tan dang ldan pa ni/ /dpal rdo rje
'chang gi rigs so/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bco brgyad pa'o// //kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni chu zla sogs pa'o/ /don dam pa'i bden pa ni
stong pa nyid bco brgyad do/ /de'i don ni rgya mtshor gza' skar shar ba ltar skad cig la 'char ba'o/ /gtsug tor gnas las yon tan kun mthar phyin/ /rdo rje gsum gyi snying po sku gsum
rdzogs/ /kun 'dar byang chub sems kyis brtan gyur pa/ /sgro 'dogs gcod byed dmag dpon ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /don dam kun rdzob dbyer med rta mchog ste/ /dbu ma zung 'jug rab tu mi
gnas pa/ /sku bzhi lhun grub ye shes rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sbyang gzhi sbyong byed ldan par rim pa nyid/ /rdo rje lus kyi rtsa gnas thams cad ni/ /dbu ma la brten cha shas phra rags gang / /mtshungs
gyur rdo rje gsang chen gyur pa gang / /lam gyur bden pa gnyis kyis de nyid ni/ /thams cad sdud byed rim pa rab rdzogs la/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin byang chub pas/ /thog ma bar dang mtha' ma
kun tu yang / /dus dang rnam pa thams cad rten byed pa/ /khyab cing gnas med gnas ni bsam mi khyab/ /rgyu 'bras 'gag med rten cing 'brel 'byung gi /sku sogs dbang phyug yon tan tshad med pa/
nam mkha' khyab pa yang dag zhing khams nyid/ /zung 'jug gang du thim pa gnas gar 'jug /gang gi ngo bo byang sems 'gyur med pa/ /gnyis med ro mnyam gyur pa lam dang ni/ /lta la
spyod pa kun tu zung 'jug pa/ /thogs pa med par 'byung ba'i dpal dang ldan/ /ye shes bla med dbang phyug bcu gsum sa/ /mthar phyin skad cig byang chub dbyings ye shes/ /dbyer
med byang chub chen po mgon po nyid/ /bde chen mnyam nyid rang 'byung chen po'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o// //nang stong pa nyid

dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong ba nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdus so/ /chen po stong ba nyid dang / don dam pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas ni brtson
'grus kyis so/ /mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang / dor ba med pa ni dga' ba yang dag pas so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
cad stong pa nyid ni shan tu sbyangs pas so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid dang / mi dmigs pa ni/ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gis so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
dang / ngo bo stong pa nyid ni dran pa yang dag pas so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ btang snyoms yang dag pa byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pas so/ /skad cig ma ste chos nyid
bden pa'i don to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/ mgon po byams pa la cung zad cig bzhengs la bzod par gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
bdag zab don cung zad cig zhu bas/ /skabs dbye bar gsol zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i dus la bab par shes na ci rigs par zhus shig /ngas
legs par bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/ gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di yi/ /dgongs pa zab cing rgya che bas/ /gting
dpag dka' bar gyur pas na/ /zab don snying po gsung du gsol/ /zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ nam mkha'i snying po shin tu legs/ /gsang chen de nyid gong

'og tu/ /snga phyi'i rim pa'i khyad par kun/ /bshad kyis gus pas legs par zung / /gsang pa'i de nyid bla na med/ /rgya 'bras zab cing rgya che ba/ /thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa'i rgyud/ /zung 'jug ba de
chen bstan par bya/ /thog ma par dang mthar dge ba/ /byang chub sems mchog bstan pa nyid/ /gzhi dang dngos po'i khyad par dang / /lam byed nus pa phrin las sogs/ /'byung gnas ye shes bstan pa

la/ /smon pa dang ni 'jug sems bskyed/ /don dam bstan pa'i byang chub sems/ /yang dag don gyi sems bskyed pa/ /kun tu bzang po'i ting 'dzin las/ /spyi por pad+ma zla nyi la/ /'khor lo oM dkar 'od 'phro

ba/ /mgrin par pad dmar AH'od 'bar/ /thugs kar zla ba rdo rje ni/ /dkar po rtse lnga 'od 'phro ba/ /dngul chu'i mdog 'dra'i hUM ye shes/ /kun rdzob don dam byang chub sems/ /de nyid ting 'dzin gnas par
bya/ /dpral bar rin chen sa yig ser/ /lte bar ral gri ha ljang ba/ /'od 'phro ye shes lnga bdag nyid/ /'od 'gyed 'gro ba sbyangs pa las/ /slar 'dus rigs kyi bdag po ni/ /rdo rje bai DUr+ya yi 'od/ /

thugs kar rdo rje la thim pas/ /khro bo'i rdo rje kha gyes pas/ /'dus pa rdo rje 'chang ngo bo/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje nyid/ /gnyis med bde ba chen por gnas/ /rtogs pa brjod pas bstan par 'gyur/ /
rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gnas pa ni/ /'jig rten lam la gnas pa ste/ /phyi la mchog tu gzhol bas ni/ /'jig rten chos brgyad rtog pa 'dab/ /ma spangs lha yi dmigs pa las/ /phra mo rlung la bslab
pa dang / /rags pa thig le bsgom pas ni/ /las chen thun mong dngos grub la/ /dmigs phyir gnas skabs 'bras bu thob/ /rim gnyis ldan pa'i ting
'dzin las/ /sbro bsdu rigs kyi rnal 'byor lam/ /sa bon thig le'i de nyid las/ /ngo bo ye shes bde chen 'grub/ /mchog gyur nang don mngon du bya/ /rnam par bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //
byang chub sems dang lus gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor bde chen 'byung gnas nyid/ /sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa/ /bum pa gsang ba shes rab dang / /de nyid snying po'i dkyil 'khor
te/ /ye shes mchog tA dbang bskur ba'o/ /gsang ba'i de khon nyid ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub pa lhan cig skyes pa/ skal ba dang ldan pa rnams las/
tshad med pa'i don dam pa'i ye shes kyi dbang rdo rjes thogs pa med par kun tu dbang bskur ba'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o// //
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa yi/ /chos don de nyid bla na med/ /spyod pa'i gsar ba mngon du byung / /khyad par snod ldan rtogs gyur pa'o/ /dag pa'i gnas dang
'khor 'dus la/ /ci phyir tshig ni 'di lta bu/ /rigs pa ma yin ces pa'i don/ /the tshom gnas su gyur pa las/ /phyi rol gyur dang thun mong dang / /ji bzhin sgra
dang ma yin dang / /bstan la rang dgar 'jug pa can/ /yin nam snyam du rtog pa la/ /bzlog pa de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /phyin ci log tu gyur las bzlog /lan
gsungs sgro 'dogs bcad pa'o/ /sems la dmigs pa bdag med pa/ /rnam par dben don bstan pa las/ /gsang ba byang chub rim gyis dang / /cig car rim pa nyer bstan
pa/ /de nyid lam du mngon par 'byung / /spyod dang grol ba bla med pa/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis 'dul don du/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i spyod pa spyod/ /rnal 'byor brtul zhugs mchog
'dzin pa'i/ /kun 'gro kun la dbang bskur ba/ /mi 'jigs dgra las rgyal ba ste/ /rig pa brtul zhugs sbyod bya ba/ /kun bzang mgon po kun spyod do/ /spros
pa'i spyod pas mnyam gzhag dang / /rjes thob gnyis med lam du blang / /phyogs las rnam rgyal spyod thob nas/ /ye shes chen po'i spyod bya ba/ /zung 'jug bde chen ro
mnyam las/ /mthar thug sbang blang med par grol/ /a ba d+hU tI'i spyod pa las/ /spros bcas spros med dag dang ni/ /shin tu spros med sbyod pa spyod/ /dpal ye
shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //sangs rgyas kun gyi bla med pa/ /gsang ba byang chub sems
dbang bskur/ /dbang po rab dang yang rab dang / /'bring gyur mos pa'i dbang byas pas/ /thams cad mos spyod lam mtshon pa/
gsang chen mchog gi don las ni/ /ye shes lam bstan de nyid do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po tshad gyur pa/ /ye shes tshad med ri rab ste/ /spyod yul bla med 'dir bstan
pa/ /mchod pa'i rol pa lha mo ste/ /pad+ma sna tshogs bde bas mchod/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba kun/ /gsang chen theg pa la brten nas/ /rdo rje ye shes ting 'dzin
brnyes/ /rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bor ni/ /bde chen mnyam pa nyid gyur pas/ /mi phyed ye shes mngon sangs rgyas/ /rigs ldan mchod pa bla na med pa ste/ /dran pa gcig pa
nas ni lus dben par/ /rags pa'i ting 'dzin slob dus mnyam rjes las/ /yul lnga gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs/ /sa yi snying po la sogs dbang po lnga/ /yab yum lhar
brten slob pa spyod pa ste/ /gzung 'dzin ma spangs spros pa ldan pa'i phyir/ /spros bcas spyod pa zhes ni grags pa'o/ /mchod yul rigs lnga rnam snang la sogs pa/ /mchod rdzas
yul lnga lha dang lha mor snang / /mchod byed spros bcas spyod pa lag nas pa/ /mchod thabs so sor rigs kyis mchod pa'o/ /rten slob spros med ngag dben sems dben ldan/ /
bdag byin brlabs pas ting 'dzin phra ba sa/ /slob ma mnyam rjes thabs dang shes rab dag /gnyis med rten pa'i lus sems brten slob pa/ /mchod bya rigs kyi bdag po lnga sogs
so/ /mchod dngos rnam gsum khyad par dag tu ro/ /mchod byed rnal 'byor gyis ni thabs bcas mchod/ /rten slob shin tu spros med 'od gsal nas/ /sgyu lus dag pa'i bar
du ting 'dzin ni/ /shin tu phra ba slob pa mnyam rjes la/ /bsams pas thabs dang shes rab dbang po dang / /yul lnga gnyis med rang bzhin med par bslab/ /spros pa rnam par
byed pa de yi phyir/ /shin tu sbros med de la bye brag tu/ /mchod bya'i yul ni ye shes sku 'byung ba/ /mchod byed gang zag sgyu mar gnas pas so/ /don ni snang gsum sgyu mar ldan pa
las/ /mchod dngos sgyu ma'i 'dod yon nyid yin no/ /mchod pa'i thabs ni bsam gtan gnyis kyis ni/ /'od gsal dang du thim pa de nyid do/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las
btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //rjes su mdor bstan drug gis ni/ /dben pa gsum dang sgyu lus dang / /'od gsal sngon 'gro rgyu dag
las/ /ting 'dzin las spyod des spyod pa'i/ /snyoms 'jug rim pa gnyis ldan pas/ /dag pa'i sgyu lus rdzogs rim gyi/ /rigs lnga'i gsang ba'i spyod pa las/ /slob bzhin zung 'jug ye shes
'thob/ /bskyed rim pas ni mkha' gsang dag /byin brlabs snyoms zhugs spyod pa'o/ /rjes su dran pa bcu drug gis/ /lam dang spyod pa bstan pa las/ /
dag pa'i sgyu mal gnas nas/ /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /rigs lnga'i dang po'i sbyor ba bstan/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran la sogs lngas/ /sgyu dag 'od gsal lugs bzlog las//
rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan pa'o/ /snang gsum dang las longs sku ni/ /rdo rje 'chang du gnas pa las/ /yab yum bde ba'i ngang las ni/ /rnam snang mdzad kyi spro bsdu yis/ /sprul sku'i spros nas
bsdu bar bya/ /rjes dran drug pas lce chung gi /dud rtsi 'bab byed bcud len bstan/ /bdun pas bdag nyid yab yum ldan/ /mtshan ma med la gnas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i
mchog gnas pa/ /brgyad pa dgu pa bcu pa las/ /sku gsung thugs rnams byin brlab pa/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bstan pa'o/ /bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pas/ /rgyu dag lha yi sku gsung
thugs/ /byin rlabs bzhi yi bsdus pa la/ /thams cad ye shes dbyings 'jug pa/ /phyi mar mchog thob bstan pa'o/ /bcu gsum pa ni bar ma dor/ /sangs rgyas lam ni ston pa'i/ /bcu
bzhi pa dang bco lnga pas/ /phyag rgya chen po grub pa ste/ /tshe 'dir 'tshang rgya'i lam ston byed/ /de ltar rjes dran bco lnga pas/ /ting nge 'dzin ni bstan pa'o/ /spyod pa rjes dran bcu drug pas//
dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin bsdus nas ni/ /spyod pa lha mo dgu'am lnga/ /spyod pa mthar phyin byed pa'o/ /rjes dran bcu drug gis ni 'dir/ /myur bar skyob pa'i khyad par yang / /zab dang rgya che bstan
pa'o/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /bder gshegs byang chub sems dpar
bcas/ /the tshom gcod mdzad rdo rje'i tshig /yang dag don ni ston par mdzad/ /gsang ba ye shes smin grol gyis/ /ting 'dzin ye shes chos bstan to/ /dgongs te gsungs pa gang la gang / /sngon
byung rjes 'jug ldem dgongs nyid/ /gsal ba gzhan las khyad par gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dbus dbyung rigs bsdus pa'i/ /de nyid rgyal ba bslang bar mdzad/ /gcod byed rdo rje bzlas ba ste//
ma byin len pa sems dmigs kyis/ /mi tshangs spyod pa'i 'od gsal ba/ /sgyu mas brdzun du smra ba nyid/ /zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pas/ /tshig rtsub dngos 'dzin zlog par byed pa'o/ /las

rlung cung zad dul bar gyur pa yis/ /ye shes rlung gi nus pa rnyed gyur nas/ /ting 'dzin gsal zhing phra rab 'jug ba nyid/ /kun 'dar du ni srog rtsol rab sim gyur/ /rgya dper yi ge mi gsal bas dge gzhan ma rnyed/ /dbu mar gnas pas
'byung 'jug g.yo mi 'gyur/ /de las ye shes 'od zer glog lta bu/ /kun nas 'byung ba de nyid thig le'i dbus/ /dkar dmar gong bu 'dres pa'i byang chub sems/ /'byung ba'i sgo dang 'jug
pa'i sgo nyid ni/ /mi 'pho ri bong 'dzin pa zla rgyas pas/ /sna yi bu ga g.yas g.yon rnal 'byor pa'i/ /gcig nas 'byung zhing gcig tu 'jug pa ni/ /tshim byed bde
gnas snying ga lte bar ni/ /gnas pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i snying po ni/ /bskul bar gyur pa'i bde gshegs thams cad la/ /phyogs bcur mchod nas dgyes bar gyur pa las/ /bdud rtsi spyan gyi
mdzod spu nas phyung ste/ /'jug pa rnal 'byor spyi gtsug 'khor lor zhugs/ /mgrin par longs spyod thugs kar thim gyur bas/ /byang chub chen po a ba d+hU tIr gnas/ /de nyid spros med
bdud rtsi rab rgyas pas/ /gnas bcur khyab pa kun 'dar mi ldog gyur/ /bde ba chen po'i snying po bskul ba ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ro mnyam pas/ /byang sems rdo rje nyid du mchog
mngon 'gyur/ /rgyal sras thams cad rab tu dgyes gyur bas/ /ye shes snying po nus pa brtan byed 'gyur/ /'di ni ye shes po nya mchog gis ni/ /skad cig nyid la byang chub mngon du
byed/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyid shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //ye shes mngon par 'byung ba las/ /sngags kyis lha yi sku bskyed pa/ /mngon
par byang chub rnam lnga las/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid grub byed pa'i/ /bden gnyes rnam dag rgyu 'bras te/ /yongs su dag pa'i skur rdzogs byed/ /rigs kyi lha yi rnal 'byor pa/ /rim pa ji bzhin
rdzogs byed pa/ /sngags kyis bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /ye shes kyis ni sku bskyed pa/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid rnal 'byor pa/ /sgyu ma stong nyid 'jug pa ste/ /dngos pos mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /khams
gsum brtan g.yo bdag nyid bcas/ /ril 'dzin rjes gzhig ting 'dzin gyis/ /thams cad 'od gsal gnas 'jug pa/ /ye shes zung 'jug thob 'gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting
'jin gyis/ /mngon shes sgrub byed sa bon bcas/ /de las yang dag rab grub 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las stobs/ /mtshungs med yon tan
rgya mtsho ste/ /mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo mchog /A li bcu gnyis dbyangs ldan pa/ /'byung ba lnga yi rlung gis ni/ /lha mo lnga ru gyur ba la/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cung brjod/ /kA li gsal
byed yi ge ni/ /Da D+ha da d+ha ya la ta/ /sum cu rtsa bzhi de snyed las/ /drug bcas bzhi bcu nyis 'gyur las/ /bde byad bzang po brgyad cur 'gyur/ /rang bzhin dag pas gnas 'gyur pa'o/ /yang na
dbyangs yig nyis 'gyur bcas/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis bo/ /'grub 'gyur rgyu rkyen nyer len las/ /rgyu 'bras mngon du gsal bar 'byung / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun yon tan ni/ /
'khor los sgyur las khyad 'phags pa/ /mdzod spu smin mtshams 'od 'bar ba/ /gsang ba sbu bas su nub ba dang / /gtsug tor lta bas mi mngon ba/ /'od zer dkyil 'khor khyab byed ba/ /dbang gi
nus pa brtan gyur pas/ /gzugs sku'i yon tan rgyu 'bras kyi/ /byed las stobs ldan 'byung 'gyur nyid/ /gsang sngags zab dang rgya che ba/ /myur ba nyid du byin
brlabs shing / /bde ba lam byed tshe 'di dang / /bar do'i ye shes mngon du byed/ /bla ma las ni grol spyod 'thob/ /mngon sum rten 'brel khyad par ro/ /dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las
btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas rang bzhin rtog pa ni/ /dper na rgya mtsho chen po la/ /bya yi tshogs rnams rgyu ba kun/ /'gro 'ong du ma byed
gyur kyang / /rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa bzhin/ /snang ba gsum gyi ye shes la/ /gos pa med cing rtog ba med/ /rtsa rnams rnam par dag pas ni/ /gtum mo ye shes me 'bar ba'o/ /
rlung ni srog rtsol dag ba na/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zlar 'char/ /thig le dag par gyur pa na/ /'od gsal bde ba chen por 'char/ /bdag chags rtog bdag pa las/ /rmi lam sangs
rgyas zhing khams mthong / /yi ge dag cing khams dwangs bas/ /mkhyen pa rkyang bas rnam grol 'thob/ /sems gsum zhi gnas cha ngang ni/ /sems gsum lhag mthong gang
yin pa/ /rnal 'byor ba la nges par 'char/ /rtog pa'i rba rlabs dang gis zhi/ /snang ba skye ba med ba ste/ /snang ba thob pa 'gag ba med/ /snang ba mched ba mi gnas shing / /gnas pa
med bas mi rtag pa/ /nyer thob stong nyid don gnas pa'o/ /'od gsal chos nyid de bzhin nyid/ /mkha' ltar dag pa bde ba che/ /ma 'gags dri ma med zhi ba/ /don dam phyag rgya chen po
nyid/ /sa lam nus pa kun rdzogs pa/ /slob pa'i zung 'jug snying po nyid/ /rdo rje sgo gsum rnam dag pas/ /mi slob zung 'jug mngon du gyur/ /de nyid mthar phyin bla med pa'o/ /dpal ye
shes rdo rje kun las btus las rab tu byed pa nyid shu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bsam gtan gnyis kyis ye
shes 'jug /de yi khyad par bcas pa bstan/ /rig pa 'dzin pa lnga grub pa/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad/ /'bru gsum bdud rtsi ril bu yi/ /yon tan nus pa myur grub
byed/ /rdo rje dgug pa'i phrin las dbang / /dam tshig sha lnga'i yon tan tshul/ /de las dngos grub dbang phyug 'thob/ /mngon gyur 'bras bu phrin las 'grub/ /da ni bsnyen bsgrub yan
lag bzhi/ /rdo rje rnam bzhi lha yi sku/ /lus dben rdo rje bzlas pa dang / /snang gsum sgyu lus 'od gsal la/ /so sor bsdus pa bsam gtan ma/ /srog rtsol 'dzin pa de bzhin nyid/ /
rjes dran yan lag ting 'dzin stobs/ /zung 'jug rim pa bstan pa las/ /rigs kyi cha las de nyid gnas/ /rgyu rkyen lam dang nus 'bral gang / /mngon 'gyur lta stangs spyod yul
kun/ /rim gyis 'char dang cig car ba/ /de nyid thod rgal rim rtogs bya/ /tshe 'dir sangs rgyas lam dang ni/ /bar dor dngos grub 'byung lam dang / /sgo
gsum byin brlabs rdo rje yi/ /smon lam phyi dus 'grub par gyur/ /bsam gtan gnas pa dbang po thabs/ /yul nyid shes rab ting nge 'dzin/ /dbyer med sbyor ba gsang gnas
te/ /dus gsum las 'das rtog pa'o/ /rnam shes de nyid gsal ba las/ /ma 'gags yul rjes mi 'brang zhing / /mi g.yo nyon mongs las dag pa/ /rnam par spyod pa bye brag
gsal/ /rnam par mi rtog dmigs med pa/ /mi 'khrul lus sems tha mi dad/ /tshor ba las 'das dga' ba nyid/ /'phro ba med pas sems gnas pa'o/ /zug rngu'i rdul mang rnam
'tshe dag /sgo gsum ngang du dul zhing zhi/ /bde ba zag med chos nyid gnas/ /'du 'bral med par gyur pas so/ /rab tu dul ba rnam shes tshogs/ /dag gyur shes bya chos kyi khams//
zad cing gzung 'dzin rnam dag pas/ /stong nyid ye shes rtsa gcig pa/ /rnam pa kun du mi ldog pas/ /mtshan ma med pa byang chub pa'o/ /snang ba thob pa stong pa nyid/ /mched pa stong chen
gyur pa ste/ /snang tsam thams cad stong pa dang / /nyer thob thams cad stong pa nyid/ /dag pa rab gsal mchog gyur pas/ /ro gcig gyur pa lugs 'byung dang / /lugs bzlog rtog
tshogs zhi ba ste/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos 'jig rten lam/ /de nyid mchog tu bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag nyid las/ /rkyen las 'byung ba lam gyur pa/ /rnal 'byor gsal
dang mi rtog pa/ /bde ba'i bye dpa lta stangs las/ /ka ra Na bcings nus pas ni/ /srid pa gsum po g.yo mi 'gyur/ /bin+d+ra kun dor gnang sdom las/ /mi 'gyur brtan byed yon tan thob/ /
lus gnas rtsa yi pho brang las/ /g.yas pa'i nyi ma rtsol ba ste/ /g.yon pa zla ba srog bcing ba/ /'byung 'jug gnas pa lam bstan pa'o/ /dbu mar byang sems rten byed pa/ /kun 'dar
nges gnas 'pho med bzung / /mtshan mar mi 'gyur mchog gi rtsa/ /las kyi rlung sgom bye brag pa/ /'gog pas mu na pa sgra gcan 'dzin/ /gsang ba'i sna rtse'i steng 'og tu/ /'byung ba rkyen rlung
snang ba grogs/ /sgo lnga bzlog las gnas par bya/ /ye shes sgron me snang ba ste/ /rnal 'byor gang zhig mngon gyur pas/ /rlung sems rnam dag rtags 'char ba/ /yang na 'phro te lam 'thob
'gyur/ /de las rang bzhin dag pa'i tshe/ /'od gsal ngang las spro bsdu nyid/ /dbu ma'i lam nas 'jug par 'gyur/ /bde ba'i thig le thabs dang ni/ /ye shes me ni shes rab che/ /gnyis
med d+hU tI'i nang zhugs pas/ /bdud rtsi mi 'pho gsang lam gnas/ /de nyid du ni srog brten cing / /'dzin pa ye shes lam gyur pa'o/ /de las gtum mo 'bar gyur zhing / /las rlung
gyen log lte bar phyin/ /lho las bdud rtsi 'bar 'dzag gyur/ /mgrin par dga' ba snying gar ni/ /mchog dga' lte bar khyad par can/ /gsang par mi ldog
lhan cig skyes/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur 'thob pa'o/ /de nyid ye shes rjes dran gces/ /lus ngag yid dang ye shes zhi/ /phyag rgya'i de nyid mngon gyur pa'o/ /shes pa dag ni rnam dag
pa/ /lte bar 'dod chags rtog pa dag /snying gar /nyid kyi rtog pa zhi/ /mgrin par rmi lam shes pa dag /dpral bar sad pa'i sems ba spangs/ /las rlung rtsa yi 'khor lo yi/ /thig
ler gnas pa rten dang ni/ /brten pa byang sems mi 'gyur thob/ /las kyi phung po log gyur cing / /mnyam pa'i bden pa la 'jug pa/ /gtsug tor sgo ni phye gyur pas/ /'bigs
byed brtan pa'i don thob pas/ /yon tan dpag med mngon du gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang du gyur/ /de nyid yon tan phrin las tshogs/ /rtog
