dpal ni gang zhig lags/ /rdo rje dang ni snying po dang / /de bzhin rgyan gyi don ni ci/ /kye ho mchog de bstan du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug
rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /gsang ba'i rgyud du rab sbas pa/ /ji bzhin gnas pa'i de kho na/ /yang dag bstan gyis rtse gcig nyon/ /lus

ngag yid gsum bde dam pas/ /lha mo las ni bskyod bya ste/ /byang chub chen po bde ba yis/ /chul bzhin du ni sngags pas bya/ /bskul ba'i snying pos 'di smra ste/ /dz+dza zhes skad cig skad cig tu/ /rang
gi gnas na gnas pa yin/ /de nyid lha nyid bskyed par bya/ /bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan/ /rtsa ba gsang ba'i thig le la/ /me tog dang ni dra ba nyid/ /rlung gis phul bas bskyod par bya/ /de bzhin
bskyod pas bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin du yang bskul bya ba/ /rgyud kyi phreng ni 'od gsal bzhin/ /steng dang mdun du rtsa gnyis las/ /bcu drug gnas su yang dag gnas/ /de las snying dbus
rab zhugs te/ /rlung gi sbyor bas phul byas pas/ /steng dang mdog rab mdzes rdzogs sku/ /bdag gi dpal du shes par bya/ /de las byung ba'i dngos grub che/ /nor bu la gnas rtog bral ba/ /thig le
yig med bsdus pa'i sku/ /lhan cig skyes par shes par bya/ /de la de yi gzugs kyi sku/ /nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yi/ /bral ba'i shes pas don byed pa/ /gzhan gyi dpal du shes par

bya/ /de rnams rgyud las byung ba yi/ /ye shes shes rab shin tu gsang / /gsang ba rnam par 'grub pa yi/ /rdo rje snying po'i rgyan zhes bya/ /lha mo las byung bde dang ldan/ /'ja' tshon ltar gsal rgyud dag pa
snang ba'i sku de mi shigs pa/ /rdo rje nga yis yang dag bsgrags/ /snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun/ /bsdus phyir brtsegs pa'i sku dam pa/ /rtog bral rgyud du sim gnas pa/ /'byung phyir
snying po zhes su bsgrags/ /dag dang ma dag thams cad la/ /'khor ba ji srid bar snang ba/ /gnyis ka mdzes par byed pas na/ /rgyan du yang dag bsgrags pa yi/ /dpal dang rdo rje snying po

dang / /rgyan zhes bya ba bzhi po ni/ /'brel cing grub par byed pa'i phyir/ /rgyud ces bya bar bshad pa'o/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang / /bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kyi/ /mtshan gyi don ni 'di
don du/ /yang dag 'dus bar ngas bshad do/ /gzhan du don ni ma bsgrags pa/ /bla ma la ni gus pa yi/ /slob ma la ni ma rtogs pa'i/ /rgyud gzhan dag tu sbas pa'o/ /don 'di yang dag
ma shes na/ /ji snyed don ni bsam yas pa/ /shes kyang de yi 'bras bu med/ /de 'dod mnyes byas yang dag blang / /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las ye shes gsum gyi mtshan 'byung ba
zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang / /bla ma smod byed brtson pa la/ /dam tshig phyir ni yongs bsgral bya/ /de yi sha khrag klad pa rnams/ /
drangs te chos kyi ston mo bya/ /de ltar ma byas sdug bsngal tshogs/ /gti mug can des thob par 'gyur/ /nad thams cad dang khros chen dang / /'jigs dang nye
bar 'tshe ba yi/ /bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru/ /sdug bsngal chen por rab snyed cing / /'o dod 'bod pas sbrul gyis brgyan/ /bstir med chen por rtag par 'gro/ /de bas las
'dis rgyas gdab bo/ /bdag nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi/ /khro bo gzugs can nyid gyur nas/ /ut+pal mthing ga 'dra ba yi/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /rdo rje tri shUl phur bu
dang / /thod ba gri gug 'khor lo 'dzin/ /mi sdug khros pa lce lnga pa/ /bsams nas de 'og nam mkha' la/ /bsgrub bya rgyas par dmigs nas su/ /rdo rje phur pa la sogs pa/ /
sems can dkyil 'khor gnas pa la/ /sgrub pos de yi nyes pa bsgo/ /de nas phyag mtshan tri shul dang / /phur bu drag po mchog dag gis/ /mgo dang snying ga lta ba dang / /rkang pa gnyis
dang lte ba dang / /rkang pa gnyis dang lag pa yi/ /ga nas lnga rab tu phug bya ste/ /lce lnga'i 'od zer lnga po yis/ /srin bu 'dza' lu ka bzhin du/ /khrag kun sngags kyis drangs nas su/ /thod
par phab nas btung bar bya/ /de bzhin sha rnams yang bsdus nas/ /bza' ba ru ni rab tu brtag /rus pa rnams kyang 'chos byas nas/ /shes pa rdo rje pad+mar sbyar/ /'di ni don sgrub

rab byed pas/ /zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyi/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yang / /'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu/ /bsgrub bya legs par bsgrub byas nas/ /las ngan dag gis de mi
'khol/ /sangs rgyas su ni skye bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor de yang de yi mthus/ /khro bo mkha' 'gro zhes 'gyur te/ /khams gsum bsad dang gsob dang / /sems kyis rdo rje brtan byas nas/ /skad cig
tsam du byed par 'gyur/ /gsal bar nus pa gdon mi za/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las rdo rje mkha' 'gro khro bo'i sbyor bas dgra bsad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas gzhan
yang bshad bya ba/ /'dod chags thabs chen po yi rgyud/ /gang gis legs par shes na ni/ /tshe 'dis dngos grub sbyin par bshad/ /gsang ba 'dus pa stong phrag gcig /rdo rje phreng ba 'bum

phrag gsum/ /dgongs pa lung ston stong phrag bzhi/ /lha mo bzhis zhus brgya bdun cu/ /ut+pa tan+t+rA nyis brgya brgyad/ /de yi nye bar bshad pa'i rgyud/ /dam tshig chen po lnga bcu lnga/ /rdo rje lnga
'bum stong phrag gcig /kun las btus pa 'bum phrag gcig /mnyam nyid rnam rgyal nyis brgya bcu/ /zla gsang thig le stong phrag bdun/ /rdo rje sa 'og brgya nyi shu/ /cod pan rdo

rje bdun brgya lnga/ /khro zla thig le 'bum phrag lnga/ /rdo rje rnam rgyal brgya dgu bcu/ /mnyam nyid gsang ba stong phrag lnga/ /rdo rje gsang rgyan stong phrag lnga/ /rdo rje gsang mdzes stong phrag
bdun/ /nor bu gsang thig 'bum phrag bcu/ /snang mdzad rdzu 'phrul stong dang brgya/ /rdo rje gsang rgyan stong phrag gcig /rdo rje thod pa nyis
brgya brgya/ /de nyid brgya stong brgya stong bdun/ /dam tshig mngon brgyan stong phrag gsum/ /'jam dpal dpa' bo 'bum phrag gcig /gsang chen 'dus pa brgya lnga bcu/ /
rin chen sdong po dgu brgya bdun/ /dus kyi thig le brgya brgyad cu/ /lha mo bstan chos lnga brgya bdun/ /'di rnams dgongs pa'i bye brag gis/ /nga yis yang dag bstan par bya/ /
'di ni gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa yis/ /rgyud kyi dbye ba bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin du ni yan lag bcings/ /rgod dang bltas pas shes par bya/ /de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug
gis/ /rgyud rnams kun kyang shes par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud kun yang / /'di yi rim pas shes par bya/ /phyi nang dbye bar shes pa yis/ /rgyud kyi dbye ba shes par
bya/ /nang du bstan pa'i bla ma las/ /yang dag blangs te bsgrub par bya/ /ci bzhin gnas pa la dgongs te/ /bde bar gshegs pas rgyud kun bstan/ /rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi
rgyud/ /'di yi rgyud ni mkha' 'gro ba/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi phyi mo ste/ /gzhan du ma bsgrags don gang zhig /'di ru yang dag bstan pa ste/ /rnal 'byor gang zhig len pa'am/ /
sgom par byed dam 'chad pa 'am/ /grog par byed pa rnal 'byor che/ /de yang nga dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las rgyud thams cad dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sna tshogs mdo dang rgyud rnams kyis/ /sdom pa yang dag shes 'gyur na/ /mkha' 'gro chen por 'gyur bar bshad/ /
gang gis nyan thos rab 'byin pa/ /spong ba ltung ba'i bye brag bshad/ /bsgrub pa dang ni rdzas grags kyis/ /'di ru des kyang yongs rdzogs byed/ /tshul khrims kyis ni bslab pa gsum/ /
dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sdom pa nyi shu la sogs dang / /sems can don byed pa'i tshul khrims/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab sbyin pa/ /lus ngag yid gsum rab 'byung ba'i/ /

sdom pa des kyang mkha' 'gro yi/ /rgyud rnams yang dag sbyor bar byed/ /zla ba smyung dang gtsang spra bsdam/ /grong dang gnag lhas thang pa'am/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni/ /gnod pa dang ni yod mi
byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdom pa mchog /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /'gro ba'i don byed byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems ni rab tu bzung / /rdo rje mi bskyod rigs chen po/ /rdo rje che
dang dril bu dang / /slob dpon yang ni bzung byas la/ /de yi yon tan thob par byed/ /rin chen tog gi rigs mthon po/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams//
byin pas de yi yon tan thob/ /pad+mo snang ba'i rigs dag la/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi/ /dam tshig rab tu bzung ba yis/ /bla med byang chub thob par byed/ /rnga sbra las kyi rigs mang po/ /dam
tshig dang ni sdom par ldan/ /bsnyen bkur mchod pa sems can don/ /byas pas de yi yon tan thob/ /srog mi gcod cing g.yem mi bya/ /ma byin mi len rdzun mi smra/ /phra dang kyal tshig rtsub
po dang / /smra ba mi bya ba rnab sems dang / /gnod sems log par lta ba rnams/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang / /lha dang bla ma de bzhin no/ /nyes pa kun gyi
rtsa ba'i phyir/ /chang yang rnam par spang bar bya/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha sogs/ /mtshan ma 'am ni lha yi grib/ /'gom dang bza' bar mi bya ba/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i/ /sdom
pa gang de gsungs pa rnams/ /'di ru dang po'i las can la/ /de yis yang dag 'jug par byed/ /thun mong ma yin pas pham pa/ /bcu bzhir grags pa gang 'di ni/ /sngags pas don kun
'grub byed pas/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya'o/ /slob dpon snying nas smod pa dang / /bde gshegs bka' las 'da' byed dang / /zhes sdang gis ni mched sun 'byin/ /byams sems med par
sems can spangs/ /byang chub sems chen 'dor ba dang / /bdag gzhan grub pa'i mtha' smod byed/ /snod mi rung la gsang ba bstan/ /rgyal ba'i bdag nyid phung po smod/ /dag pa'i chos la som

nyi byed/ /gsum ldan khro la byams ldan te/ /stong pa thal byung la rtog pa/ /dad ldan sems ni sun 'byin byed/ /dam tshig dang ldan rtse mi byed/ /shes ldan bud med smod par byed/ /sngags pas de dag yong
spangs nas/ /nges par dngos grub thob par byed/ /de la sngags pa yong 'das nas/ /nges par bdud dang phrad par 'gyur/ /nad dang sdug bsngal 'phel 'gyur te/ /bstir med spyi'u tshugs dmyal
bar 'gro/ /sbom po ltung byed nyes dmigs kyang / /de dang 'dra bar shes par bya/ /dam tshig mi ldan rig mar bsten/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod par byed/ /gsang ba'i chos ni ston
pa dang / /dad ldan rnams la gzhan du ston/ /nyan thos nang du yun ring gnas/ /snod mi rung la gsang ba bstan/ /kha na ma tho sbom 'gyur te/ /sngags pa de yi dam sdom zad/ /zad pas
'grub par yod mi 'gyur/ /de bas nyin re lan gsum du/ /kha ton gyis kyang bklag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor mthong dang zhugs pa dang / /dbang bskur ba la sogs tshul kyi/ /rdo rje
mkha' 'gro thob pa gzhan/ /byang chub sems dang nyan thos dang / /bya dang gnyis ka rnal 'byor rgyud/ /dgongs gsungs rnams kyis de lta min/ /de lta bas na sdom pa'i mchog /nga yis yang

dag bstan par bya/ /dri chen dri chu rak+ta dang / /shes dang byang chub sems rnams ni/ /bza' ba'i sbyor bas yang dag bza'/ /lto yi ye shes mis sbyangs phyir/ /phyi rol zas las khyad par 'gyur/ /de bzhin glad
chen rta sha dang / /ba glang khyi sha sha chen rnams/ /ye shes lnga yi ngo bo'i phyir/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bza' bar bya/ /de bzhin sems can gsad par
bya/ /ma byin par yang blang bar bya'o/ /bud med thams cad 'dod pa spyod/ /brdzun tshig dag kyang smra bar bya/ /de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa'
mnyes par 'gyur/ /sems can rnams kyang tshim zhing dga'/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor snying po yis/ /sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems/ /rang 'dren nyan thos sku gzugs
sogs/ /rang nyid dag pa gsum sbyor bas/ /phyag byas na ni mi rung 'gyur/ /kun du rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /lus ngag yid kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /rang nyid bsam gtan
gsum sbyor bas/ /dbyer med blo yis mi bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang mi bri'o/ /glegs bam dag kyang mi bklag go /mchod rten las kyang yong mi bya/ /lag pa'i phyag
rgya rnams kyang spang / /nyin re zhing ni dus bzhi ru/ /bu mo legs par goms pa las/ /ga bur tsan+dan khas blangs te/ /cho ga bzhin du lus 'khor mchod/ /rol mo'i thabs ni
sna tshogs pa/ /nga mi rgyud las rab bstan pas/ /bcu drug thig le ngal so las/ /sngags kyi snying po brtag par bya/ /bla ma dam pa thugs rje ches/ /yang dag bstan pa la
dmigs nas/ /phyin ci log khur yongs 'dor te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nga 'drar 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las dam tshig dang sdom pa dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //
de nas ro langs chen mo yi/ /sgrub pa yang dag bshad par bya/ /sgrub pos legs par shes gyur na/ /dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /nag po yi ni tshes brgyad dang / /yang na bcu
bzhi gang yang rung / /shing gcig dur khrod ma mo'am/ /yang na mi med grong bar du/ /sngon du sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can/ /las kun 'grub par byed par sgrub/ /mda' mkhan ma dang sme sha
can/ /gdol pa mo dang gar mkhan sogs/ /mdun gyi so la lhag yod pa/ /byad dang mdangs ldan rma med ma/ /lo ni sum cu rtsa gnyis bsngags/ /yang na nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /yang na chu dang
dang por skyes/ /sbyangs nas shi ba ma sbags pa/ /yang dag blangs te pha bong steng / /gzhan yang bu mo skra bzung ste/ /lha bzhad dang ni dbang po lag /dkar po dang ni ri sgra dang / /gru
gnon chu yis bkru bar bya/ /de nas tsan+dan dkar po yis/ /bu mo lus byugs rgyan dang gos/ /yang dag brgyan te mdun bzhag nas/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bya ste/ /rtsa sogs
gsang sngags rab tu bzla/ /'byung po'i gtor ma yang byin te/ /shan nag po mdangs dang ldan/ /myos byed bsregs pa ro yi khar/ /mtshan gcig thog thag sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas
tho ras dus su yang / /khrag chen phyogs bzhir gtor byas nas/ /mar khu chen po ro la bsku/ /de nas ro de langs gyur te/ /khro dang ldan ba'i ag
tsar gyis/ /sa gsum mo yi sgras 'gengs byed/ /de tshe sgrub po skrag mi bya/ /mA ma ki yi sbyor ba sogs/ /srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya/ /skrag na de ma thag tu gsod/ /de
tshe bsrung bas bsrungs byas nas/ /bdag nyid langs te de yi mgor/ /yungs kar gyis ni brdeg par bya/ /de nas de ni babs gyur te/ /sgrub pa po yi mdun gnas nas/ /bka'
nod 'di skad smra bar byed/ /sems can chen po khyod ci 'dod/ /bdag la yang dag bka' stsol cig /ral gra mig sma nas 'og gam/ /rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis
len/ /mi snang 'gugs pa las gang dag /bdag gis gcig cig sbyar bar bya/ /de nas sgrub po de yis kyang / /gang 'dod smras nas cang te'u brdung / /de nas ro langs kha de nas//
du ba 'thul zhing me 'bar ba/ /de nas sbrul nag lta bu ru/ /ro yi kha nas 'byung bar byed/ /de de sgrub pos kha yis blang / /byung ste gser gyi ral grir 'gyur/ /de thogs tshangs
pa'i 'jig rten khams/ /steng du nges par 'gro bar byed/ /de bzhin kun du 'gro bar byed/ /de bzhin rdzas kun gang la bstan/ /thams cad gser 'gyur rtsi lta bu/ /de bzhin
thabs sgrub de bya na/ /ro ni snga mkho bzhin 'gyur te/ /de yis spyin sreg rab byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag tshim par bya/ /de bas 'di ni sgrub pa'i mchog /don kun yang dag 'grub byed pa/ /
las thams cad kyi gtso bo ste/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las ro langs chen mo'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas
nga yis sgrub po yi/ /dngos grub slob dpon las byung phyir/ /rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pa yi/ /slob dpon bkur pa'i cho ga bshad/ /slob dpon med par gyur na ni/ /dngos grub thob par mi
'gyur bas/ /slob dpon grangs dang mtshan nyid ni/ /yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis/ /dam sdom gyi ni snod gtsang la/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs par/ /byed cing dang po las

'jug par/ /byed pa rgyu yi slob dpon no/ /ri bong 'dzin pa skul byed cing / /de yi sgrub po zhing dag cing / /ye shes sgyu ma'i snod rung byed/ /rkyen kyi slob dpon chen po'o/ /lhan cig nyan par gang gyur pa/ /
de las dga' ba yang dag thob/ /thob pas yang dag rab mthar phyin/ /lhan cig byed pa'i slob dpon ni/ /mi 'gyur byams ldan shes rab can/ /sngags rgyud sbyor shes dkyil 'khor mkhas/ /de nyid
bcu shes theg chen dga'/ /gsang ba zungs thub slob dpon yin/ /mig bzang ya so bcu drug pa/ /khu 'phrig rtog pa yang dag spangs/ /bla ma dga' ba dad mos can/ /shin tu rgyan gyis rab brgyan pa//
dad ldan sbyor ba la goms pa/ /gzugs bzang 'dod chags kyis myos byed/ /shin tu dul ba khyad par can/ /bkur ba'i gnas su yang dag blangs/ /dge dang
bsgom pa la dga' ba/ /rtag tu bla ma la gus pa'i/ /slob mas bla ma 'di ltar blta/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung / /de
ni ye shes rgya mtsho che/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen sbyin/ /de yi yon tan thams cad gzung / /skyon kun sems kyis kyang mi bsam/ /yon tan bzung nas dngos grub 'thob/ /skyon gyis
dngos grub nyams par byed/ /mchod rten bshig dang sdig 'dra'i phyir/ /de yi grib ma'ang mi 'gom ste/ /stan dang lham dang bzhon pa dang / /'gom par bya ba smos ci dgos/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu
ba'i/ /mchog kun de yis sbangs par 'gyur/ /slob dpon smod par byed pa de/ /rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya/ /da ni bgegs dang log 'dren 'dzin/ /rims dang spyug dang gshin rjes 'dzin/ /
'chi bar rab tu 'gyur ba ste/ /ngan pa gtum po blun chen te/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur yang / /blo ldan rnams kyis mi bsrung bar/ /mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha yis/ /khan mtho byed pa
bsad/ /mdo sogs bstan pa'i dmyal ba ru/ /slob dpon smod par byed pa de/ /gnas par 'gyur bar nga yis bstan/ /de bas bla ma'i zhabs drung du/ /bag ma bzhin du ngo tsha bsrung / /glal
dang dgod dang lud pa sogs/ /kha la lag bas bkab nas su/ /shin tu 'jam par smra bar bya/ /mgo thod bcing dang mtshon byug pa/ /bla ma'i drung du mi bya'o/ /bro brdung ba dang brkam tshig dag/ /thos
pa'i yul nas mi bya'o/ /mdun 'gro ba dang rkang pa brkyang / /yang dag nyid du mi bya'o/ /las ni gang dag byed pa'am/ /mnyan pa la sogs 'dod pa la/ /gzung phyir thal mo ma bshig par/ /gnas
nas langs te mthong yul du/ /rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya ste/ /mtshan mo dang ni chu brgal dang / /gcong rong dag tu gnas gyur na/ /bka' lung gnyer du dgum pa'i phyir/ /mdun du 'gro ba nyes
mi 'gyur/ /de bas thabs ni thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bla ma mchog /rjes su mthun pas mnyes par bya/ /de mnyes sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes/ /gang gis slob dpon yang dag smad/ /
de yis rgyud kun bsgrub pa'i mchog /gnyid dang 'du 'dzi rnam spangs te/ /bskal pa stong du legs bsgrubs kyang / /dmyal sogs sgrub par byed pa'o/ /de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te/ /
bsam pa 'bras bu smin byed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /sems can dad dang ldan pas mchod/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las bla ma bkur ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //

rdo rje pad+mo sbyor ba las/ /yang dag ye shes skye 'gyur bas/ /sgyu ma'i mchog ni bud med de/ /de yi ming dang mtshan nyid bstan/ /ha sti ni dang shang+ki ni/ /ka ma la dang tsi tra ma/ /thams cad rigs ni
bzhir 'gyur te/ /ha sti rak+ta ro tsha ba/ /sbom mo 'dod chags yang dag cha/ /pad yangs kha nas sha rul bro/ /dkar 'chang mtha' phra go sbom byed/ /shang+ki rak+ta

ro skyur ba/ /rked phra sna legs cung zad khro/ /kha nas dud bro 'gros dal legs/ /dkar 'chang dpal gyi 'bras bu 'dra/ /ka ma'i rak+ta'i ro mngar zhing / /shang+ki rak+ta ro skyur ba/ /phra sbom ran pa
dmar mo ste/ /'dod chags mig ni mi 'dzums lta/ /dkar 'chang a ri sha 'dra ba/ /tsi tra rak+ta ro mngar zhing / /thun rung khro bag dang bcas pa/ /chags min lta byed ngo gang pa/ /dkar 'chang
g.yas g.yon dgye ba ste/ /'di rnams yang dag phrad gyur na/ /sgrub pa po la tshe 'di ru/ /dngos grub yang dag ster ba ste/ /de bas 'di rnams 'bad pas btsal/ /yang dag rnyed nas gang rung
du/ /ba lang bza' ni mda' yi nang / /btung bas shel khams rnam par 'phel/ /de ni thabs kyis ster ba yis/ /yang dag tu ni rang bzhin brtag /rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /dngos
po thams cad zad pa ste/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang / /bral ba'i dga' ba yang dag zab/ /bsam med zad med phra mo ste/ /dam pa zhi ba rnam dag pa/ /'chi med rdo rje bdud rtsi brjod//
gang gi dbus su 'dab brgyad pa/ /snying po lnga yis yang dag brgyan/ /de dbus de gnas cha nas lnga/ /cha gnyis pa ni brgyad mthar dbyung / /sum cu bcu pa lnga yi ni/ /cha gnyis lnga pa drug pa
yi/ /thig le ru ni gzhug pa ste/ /skyes bu gang gis de la ni/ /mig gi 'od zer gyis blta ba/ /de la ci bzhin gnas pa yi/ /ye shes skye bar the tshom med/ /nam zhig 'gog pa'i sems gyur na/ /sangs

rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa/ /dpal ldan mkha' 'gro 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de ring phan chad bu khyod ni/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag 'dri ba dang / /sgrub po rgyud la sbyor ba yi/ /slob dpon chen po nyid du 'gyur//
'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang / /dbang bskur bar ni rab bsngags te/ /thams cad sngags ni sgrub 'gyur te/ /las mchog khyad par can yang 'grub/ /bu mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun/ /sems can
khyod kyis 'dod pa gyis/ /yid du 'ong ba'i rig ma 'di/ /bde gshegs kun gyis khyod spyod gnas/ /stong pa la ni sems sbyor na/ /khyod ni yang dag dam par 'gyur/ /'di ni bde gshegs bde
mdzad pa/ /khyod ni 'di las rab byung ngo / /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi mtshan nyid brtag pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas

yang ni bshad bya ba/ /dngos kun cho ga shes med na/ /sgrub po dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de phyir 'dir ni brtul zhugs bstan/ /sbyor ba'i rtsol ba thams cad ni/ /de nyid rig pas spang bar bya/ /rdo rje
sems dang nges 'dug pa/ /spangs nas gzhan du mi bya'o/ /dag pa de nyid la gnas pas/ /sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya ste/ /bdag med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /ci srid bar du so sor brtag /dngos
med go 'phang la gnas dang / /thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/ /rgyud las gang ci 'byung ba rnams/ /ma brtags pas ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sgom pa'i sbyor
ba'i stobs kyis ni/ /dngos grub mtshan nyid gang yang rung / /de kun skad cig tsam la ni/ /rang nyid gnas par gyur pa yin/ /de bas dge slong dngos gnas dang / /de bzhin rtog ge rgan po dang /
rang gi bu dang rgyal po la/ /de nyid yang dag bshad mi bya/ /ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas/ /pha rol du ni 'od mi gsal/ /bum pa de nyid chag gyur na/ /de 'og mar me gsal bar 'gyur/ /de
bzhin rang lus bum pa nyid/ /bla ma'i kha yis legs bcag nas/ /de nyid mar me nyid lta bu/ /sbyor ba'i de nyid ston pa yin/ /sbyor ba de nyid la gnas na/ /gang tshe bstan pa mi rtag la/ /gnas
shing 'jig rten pa spangs te/ /spyod pa thams cad byas na ni/ /de la de tshe sangs rgyas gzigs/ /kun tu the tshom gcod pa yis/ /rig pas byis pa bzhin du spyad/ /gang tshe chags med rnal
'byor pa/ /de tshe phun sum tshogs 'phel 'gyur/ /sdig pa ma lus ldan pa dang / /gti mug sgrib pa rab gnas pa/ /smyon pa'i rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis/ /zla drug gis ni don yod grub/ /rang
nyid sangs rgyas kun mthong zhing / /'dod pa kun gyis rab tu 'gengs/ /zad med gzhom du med pa dang / /dang ba'i sku tsha 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog /'bad pa med
par yang dag 'thob/ /'dod pa kun gyi dga' mos rnams/ /'bad bral bas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'gro dang 'dug dang gnas pa na/ /mchog tu zab pa'i gnas la brtag /'od
gsal ye shes lam mkhan pa/ /mtshan nyid rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sems kyi rin chen brtan par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab zhugs pa/ /byin
gyis brlab pa'ang mdzad par 'gyur/ /de ltar gyur pas zhugs nas kyang / /ji srid sems ni mi skyo bar/ /mnyam bzhag yid ni bzang po yis/ /de la 'bad pas bsgom par bya/ /de 'og la ni ci dga'
ba'i/ /spyad pa yis ni gcig byas na/ /cung zad spyan phye ba yi mtshan/ /byang chub rgya chen 'thob par 'gyur/ /dgod dam smra'am 'dug pa'am/ /la lar rab tu gar byed par/ /ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur
bar/ /bsgom pa'i sems la zhen par bya/ /de lta'i dam tshig ldan gyur cig /rnam par mi rtog sngags pa yis/ /dus kyi nges pas yongs spangs nas/ /bla med byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /dpal
rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes byed kun tu spyod pa'i le'u snye bcu drug pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
'dzin pa la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin las/ /byung ba'i lha ste khyod mchog pas/ /sems dpa' kun gyi phyag rgya che/ /mkha' 'gro chen po phyag 'tshal lo/ /gti mug
thams cad 'od gsal ba/ /mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas chen po ste/ /gzugs snang chos ni rnam dag pa/ /bde gshegs mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal/ /nga rgyal thams
cad 'od gsal ba/ /mkha' 'gro re 'dod skong ba ste/ /thim sogs chos ni rnam dag pa/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'dod chags thams cad 'od gsal ba/ /skyon gyis gos
med mkha' 'gro che/ /mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnam dag pa/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phrag dog chos ni 'od gsal ba/ /mkha' 'gro sna tshogs las byed pa/ /mngon par 'du byed
chos kun dag /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mtshan mchog 'di yis khyod bstod pas/ /gang zag de yang bsod nams tshogs/ /ye shes tshogs chen yongs rdzogs
nas/ /sangs rgyas 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos kun tu bzang po'i bde ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen
pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po mi shigs pa'i zla ba skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi thugs ka'i mi shigs pa'i thig le las
shin tu dgyes pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i
dbyings thams cad du yang snang bar byas nas steng 'og tu yang bzhugs te/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i ri dang sems can thams cad la gsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bas
mnyes par byas te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po'i snying po'i mchog gi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus na bde bar zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde bar gyur pa'i snying po des bskul ba na gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das dpal
kun tu bzang po'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su gsang ba'i dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar gcig tu bsdus par gyur te/ rang rang gi sku bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
thugs ka nas mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs de dag thams cad rab tu dga' nas ca co'i sgra yang dag par 'byin cing dbyangs chen po brjod par gyur to/ /kye ma'o rdo
rje sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes chen po/ /kye ma'o sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che/ /sna tshogs ye shes bde ba che/ /kye ma'o kun tu bzang po yi/ /dge ba'i ye shes bde byed che/ /
gang bde'i phyir ni rig ma yi/ /pad+ma la ni gnas par mdzod/ /kye ma'o reg pa shin tu zab/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma 'di/ /sems can kun la shes rab kyi/ /mun pa thibs po sel bar mdzad/ /
kye ma'o thams cad ngo mtshar che/ /mkha' 'gro 'dra bar gar mdzad cing / /rnam par snang mdzad myang ba dang / /mnye ba dang ni 'phrog pa mchog /kye ma'o shin tu
rab tu dgyes/ /skal ldan skal spyod pa dang ni/ /sna tshogs skal bas bde byed che/ /sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen
pos ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /A li dang ni kA li dang / /de byung zla ba rnam pa gnyis/ /me long lta bu'i ye
shes te/ /gcig tu gyur pa mnyam nyid do/ /sa bon mtshan mar gyur pa ni/ /so sor rtog par ngas bshad do/ /de byung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /'gro don byed pa bya nan tan/ /
gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa chos dbyings te/ /lha yi dbang po sangs rgyas bskyed/ /de la bar mas khu bas bskyed/ /bskur bas rang gi lhar bskyed nas/ /byin gyis brlab pa bya ba ni/ /rgyud
rnams kyi ni thun mong ngo / /gsang dang gsang chen shin tu gsang / /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po dang / /rjes su rnal 'byor zhes bya dang / /stong ba dang ni shin tu stong / /chen po stong pa
zhes bya dang / /dga' dang dga' ba bar ma dang / /dga' bral gyi ni dga' ba rnams/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi bo'o/ /phyir bzlog gnyis kyi cho ga dang / /gsang dang shes rab ye shes dang / /
kha sbyor 'byed pa'i cho ga dang / /gtor ma rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / /drag shul sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / /rab tu gnas dang dkyil 'khor sgrub/ /gsang ba'i de nyid bcu yin na/ /dkyil 'khor ting
'dzin phyag rgya dang / /stang stabs 'dug stangs bzlas brjod dang / /sbyin sreg mchod pa las sbyor dang / /slar sdud pa yi rnam pa ni/ /phyi yi de nyid bcu yin no/ /yang dag de nyid dngos po mi shes
par/ /gsang sngags smra ba po yin zhes brjod pa/ /de dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal gsang sngags cho ga 'chad/ /de ni dam nyams 'di dang pha rol brlag /nyams pas bdud kyis bzung nas shi
nas dmyal bar 'gro/ /sems can rnams la rab brten to/ /byang chub dam pa thob 'gyur ba/ /sems can slu bar mi bya ste/ /bde gshegs las la sems can sbyar/ /gang zhig sbyor
'di mi brtson pas/ /rkang lag mig sogs sbyin pa dang / /dka' thub ci 'dra spyad byas kyang / /bdud rtsi ro thob mi nus so/ /rnal 'byor gcig cig shes byas nas/ /dben par song ste rab
'bad na/ /sdig dag tshe 'dir sangs rgyas 'grub/ /chos bdag med par rab bsgoms pas/ /thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud/ /thabs shes gnyis kyi 'jo sgeg gis/ /gsang ba lnga
yi bdag nyid mchod/ /dngos po thams cad dngos med par/ /bzhi bcu'i don ni rtogs pa dang / /rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur bas/ /bdud rtsi yis ni dga' bar byed/ /gsang bar bya ba'i chos
gsang bas/ /gsang zhing sbas te spyad par bya/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las ni/ /rnal 'byor sems pas spyad bya zhing / /de bzhin bza' dang btung byas
nas/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /'di la khrus dang gtsang sbra med de mchod phyir thogs pa'ang med/ /dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg med de dus dang gza' tshes med/ /gtor ma la
sogs bya bar bya ba med de mchog gi rab mchog dang po'o// //rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa yang dag 'di nyid yin te brtson bar bya/ de nas mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad rab tu
dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la legs so zhes gsol te/ legs so legs so bde byed che/ /legs so legs so ye shes che/ /legs so legs so bde ba che//
legs so legs so sna tshogs che/ /legs so legs so shes rab che/ /legs so legs so dgyes pa che/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ba chen pos/ thugs rje chen po'i
thugs rang gi thugs yang dag pa la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud rnal 'byor chen po'i de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba/ dpal au D+yAn
gyi gsang ba'i dgon pa nas byung ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis
bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dwa ya sa ma tA bi dza yA khyA bi kalba mahA rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gnyis su med pa
mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/ lha'i khang bzang na ri'i rgyal bo ri rab dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i rdul phra rab gyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs
dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob pa/ rdo rje'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba sha stag ste/ 'di ltar byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri rab dgu
bcu rtsa dgu'i rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa dang thabs cig go /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis lha'i rgyal ba'i khang bzang de ni/ nor bu rin po che'i
khang brtsegs dang / nor bu rin po che chen po'i tog dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba'i dar dpyangs dang / 'phan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bla bres dang /
rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan phreng dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / rnga yab dang / me tog gi chun po dang / dril bu dang / dar gyi lnga ldi rlung gis bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rgyan bkod
phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha shas yongs su rdzogs pa bzhin du kun nas mdzes par gyur to/ /ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa khyad par 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan
gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug
yongs su rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i phrin las sna
tshogs mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la dus gsum du
rtag par bzhugs pa/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lugs pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong bar mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags
pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab pa la bdag gir mdzad do/ /gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs cig ste/ dper na til gyi gang bus dzam+bu'i gling yongs su gang ba bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las
kyang gzhal du med cing grangs su ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing snang bar gyur cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na yang gnyis su med ba mnyam pa nyid rnam par
rgyal ba mchog tu gsang ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/ /yang de'i tshe na lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs la rab tu gnas
pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phrin las rjes su skyong ba/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa po ste/ de ltar rang gi rigs kyi chos la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor rjes su 'dzin par gnas pa las/
'dus pa chen po'i dbus su rang gi lus mi snang bar mdzad do/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis tshogs kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje mi
snang bar gyur pa gzigs nas gsungs dbyangs gcig gis ched du rjod pa 'dis ched du brjod do/ /e ma lag na rdo rje 'chang / /bdag cag yongs kyi byed pa po/ /'dus pa'i dbus
nas mi snang ba/ /mgon khyod da lta gang du bzhud/ /ces gsungs nas thams cad kyang so so'i mi shigs pa rdo rje rin po che mchog gi byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas su cang mi gsung
bar bzhugs so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang chen po des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas lnga las byung ste bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i skur
bzhengs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por snang ba de dpag tshad stong phrag gi tshad du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por byin gyis brlabs
nas/ de'i dbus su gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bo la gsol
ba btab bo/ /rdo rje chos phyir khyod legs so/ /rdo rje'i spyan phyed khyod legs so/ /rdo rje ye shes phyir khyod legs/ /sangs rgyas ye shes phyir khyod legs/ /gong bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas kun la phan par mdzad/ /sems
can mgon la gsol ba ni/ /khyab bdag theg pa chen po'i tshul/ /theg pa'i mchog ni bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams
cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad de skad ma zer cig /spro ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi tshul nges par bstan par de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu gsungs so/ /ci'i rgyus rdo rje 'dzin rab tu gsung / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis dgongs/ de nyid kyi tshe 'khor
chen po'i dkyil 'khor du byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams theg pa chen po mchog gi don gyi tshul chen po 'di thos nas/ rnam ba stong du rnam par bsnyil bar gyur to//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba/ khyod kyis zhi bar byin brlabs pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa can/ /khyab bdag de nyid rdo rje can/ /
byin rlabs mnyam par kun tu spyod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes spyan gdangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs so byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi 'khor lo chen po'i 'od zer gyis bgang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi rab tu byung bar gyur te/ shar gyi phyogs su mi zad pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to/ /lho phyogs su rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to/ /nub phyogs
su 'chi med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu shin tu byung bar gyur to/ /byang phyogs su don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu
shin tu byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba

zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po ston to/ /rdo rje'i spyod pa mngon par brtson pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi phyogs bcu rnams su
de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / de bzhin du yon tan dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang thabs cig tu phyogs bcur bzhugs so/ /'di lta ste/
yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams mkha' snang gi 'od zer gyis g.yogs par gyur to/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis lhan cig pa
dang mthun pa tsam du'ang mi bzod pa'i 'od zer du byas pa de lta kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od kyis mog mog por gyur nas kun tu gnas so/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag na rdo rje la byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i sprin rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de/
kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba bskyed de cang mi gsung ba'i rnam par gnas par gyur to/ /de nas kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rang gi thugs la bzhag
nas ye shes kyi rigs de bskyed pa gsang chen dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu rang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ye shes kyi rigs
rang gi ting nge 'dzin ston to/ /logs bzhi pa la zur bzhi pa/ /rin chen bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /'o ma zho ni kun bkram par/ /byas nas bsam gtan
yang dag brtsam/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma che/ /shel dang zla ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor rgyun du bsgom par bya/ /'bar ba 'dus pa de
rnams su/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /kun nas yongs su zlum po ni/ /khru ni nyi shu bsam par bya/ /cho ga shes pas de dbus su/ /rang gzugs dge ba bsgom par
bya/ /bdag dang bdag gir rnam rtog pa/ /dor ba'i bsam gtan yang dag brtsam/ /ye shes rigs kyi cho ga yis/ /gsang sngags sems la rjes dran bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na ku
la swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ 'dis phyag rgya mnyam par 'dus pas/ sdig pa thams cad yongs su dor bar bya'o/ /'od zer stong phrag bcu pa / /dang por bsam nas dri ma
dbyung / /ye shes rigs kyi cho ga yis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rnam par bsgom/ /'od dkar phra mo 'bar ba ni/ /deng ni kun tu rnam par dgod/ /thams cad de nyid du bya ste/ /
bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba 'di gsungs so/ /rang lus shin tu brten byas nas/ /'od kyi tshul gyi
cho ga rnams/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'dus pas ni/ /mtshon pas rdor sems bskyed pas so/ /cho ga shes pas rab brtsams na/ /de yi dngos grub rnyed mi dka'/ /rang gi gzugs ni mi
g.yo bar/ /byas nas rdor sems cho ga rnams/ /ji srid nam mkha' 'gongs gyur pa/ /cho ga shes pas spro bar bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs dang rang gzugs shing / /byas nas kun sbyor
mtshan nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan dus su ni/ /rdzogs bya de la rab tu gzhug /rang gi gzugs dang sangs rgyas gzugs/ /ji ltar gnas ltar blo dang ldan/ /ji ltar rigs
par sbyor ba ni/ /rdo rje sems dpar bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /rang lus bsgom
bya rnal 'byor pa/ /de nyid rdo rje'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje dbyer med de sgom mo/ 'od lnga shin tu phyung nas ni/ /byang chub sems ni rnam par bsgom/ /snying gar /sangs rgyas
kun ni mchod par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /dkyil 'khor lnga ni bsam par bya/ /sangs
rgyas gzugs ni 'dus pas ni/ /bkang ste sngags ni bsgoms pa las/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan ltar byas nas/ /sgom pa'i bdag nyid can bsgom bya/ /rang gi gzugs ni der bsam
bya/ /rtog pa bskyed pa'i cho ga las/ /thugs la byang chub sems kyang ni/ /bsgom bya de la rnal 'byor skyes/ /rdo rje sems dpas rnam par brgyan/ /cho ga shes
pas dbyung bar bya/ /der yang rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs/ /yi ge phra mo rnam par bsgom/ /yi ge rnams su'ang
thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /de rnams dang ni yi ge gnyis/ /rang gzugs rnam par mnyam bsgom la/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /mkhas
pas rang gzugs bsgom par bya/ /ji srid nam mkha' 'gongs gyur pa/ /zhing 'di khyab par g.yog par bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam bsgom bya/ /
sbyor rnams su/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya/ /ji srid nam mkha'
'gongs gyur ba'i/ /zhing 'di khyab par g.yog par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa las/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas
gzugs ni rnam bsgom pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms pas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam bsgom pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam
bsgom pa/ chos kyi rgyal/ /pad+ma'i rnal 'byor cho ga yis/ /sgom pa thams cad brtag par bya/ /sgom pa la sogs yongs 'dzin las/ /gzhan du mchod bya min pa nyid/ /
sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /shin tu brtan par brtan pa'i sems/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /rgyun du bdag nyid rnam bsgom bya/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul zhi ba/ /
rnon po gzhi dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas/ /cho ga shes pas dgang bar bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so/ /de nas kun tu bzang
po rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams nam mkha'i khams thams cad bkang ste/
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i sprin rnams kyis yang dag bar mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'dud pa dang ldan par kun tu gnas par gyur to/ /de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i sprin chen po rnams kyis
yang dag bar mchod de phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la rab tu zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer kun tu gang ste/ 'od zer de rnams de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yang dag par bskul bar gyur to/ /da nas kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
brtan par mdzad nas/ ye shes kyi rigs 'di rgyas par byed pa'i rgyu rang gi gzugs rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas/ rang gi gzugs kyi rnam pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis phyung
ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po ye shes rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u gsungs so/ /de nyid thams cad byed bzhin pa'i/ /bsam gtan kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyis/ /cho
ga shes pas rab tu brtsam/ /'di ni de nyid tshul dag pa'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa/ /khru ni stong phrag bsam par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /wa yig
de la bsgom par bya/ /kun nas yongs su zlum por ni/ /mthe chung mtho tsam bsam par bya/ /'bar ba de la cho ga shes/ /sna tshogs kha dog rnam par bsgom/ /der ni 'bar ba yang dag
skyes/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /phyogs rnams kun tu oM yig ni/ /kha dog sna tshogs rnam bsam bya/ /rnam snang la sogs rnam bsgoms pas/ /cho ga shes
pas bskyed par bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o/ /bdag nyid de la bsam pa ni/ /dga' ba bskyed pa'i cho ga las/ /snying gi dbus
son phra mo ni/ /dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sngags yig phra mo'i gzugs rnams kyis/ /de de sems la bsam par bya/ /oM yig 'od zer yang dag sbyor/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam
pa'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas gzugs sogs mtshan nyid kyis/ /cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs rnams thams cad du/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni/ /sangs rgyas
bskyed pa'i cho ga las/ /rang gi gzugs su de la bya'o/ /rdo rje thugs su cho ga las/ /nyi ma lnga ni dgod bya ba/ /sngags pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /dpral ba ru ni rnam par bsgom/ /'od zer
'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /'jig rten khams rnams rim par 'das/ /slar yang de la rab gzhug bya/ /khru yi tshad las 'das pa yis/ /zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed/ /rang gi gzugs nyid bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /ye shes kyi rigs
rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rang gi gzugs ni bsgom bya dge /zur du rnam snang gzhag bya ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom
bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /cho ga shes pas gzugs bcu drug /kha dog bzhir ni rnam bsam bya/ /snying ga rnams dang thams cad du/ /lha rnams de la bsgom
par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so/ /rang gi gzugs la bgegs 'joms par/ /sems la brtan par bsgom par bya/ /
hUM yig dbugs las phyung nas ni/ /'od zer rnam par rab tu gzhug /ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /rang gzugs la sogs mtshungs
pa'i 'od/ /lha ru skad cig de 'gyur ro/ /yi ge rnams kyi tshad kyis ni/ /wa yi gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /sngags pas dbus su yi ge nyid/ /byin nas las ni kun tu brtsam/ /sngags
pas dpral ba'i steng nas ni/ /ji srid lte ba zhes par dran/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po las rnam par 'god pa'i le'u dang po rdzogs so// //
shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad du ni/ /pad+ma chen po rnam bsgom bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma'i chu ba de rnam bsgom/ /las kyi rdo rje yang dag bskyed/ /rang gzugs de
la bsgom par bya/ /las kyi rdo rje rab bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /'o ma dang zho byas nas ni/ /
dbus su pad+ma rnam par bsgom/ /rang gzugs sangs rgyas ltar byas nas/ /mkhas pas rang gzugs rnam bsgom bya/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang ste/ /slar yang de nyid sbyar bya
ste/ /'o ma dang zho mnyam byas nas/ /sna tshogs kha dog mnyam pa'i 'od/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni/ /rang gzugs sangs rgyas mtshungs pa ni/ /
cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya/ /rang gi gzugs dang thams cad du/ /lha la sogs pa rnam sgom byed/ /khru gang tsam las 'das par ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni/ /bgegs rnams
'joms pa ltar byas nas/ /'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya/ /rang gi phyag rgya snying ga ru/ /bsams nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus/ /sangs rgyas rnam par cho ga shes/ /'od kyi dkyil
'khor bsgom par bya/ /de dbus yi ge byin nas ni/ /'jig rten khams ni 'dir spro bya/ /gdul ba la sogs can byas nas/ /slar yang de nyid la sbyar bya/ /khru gang tsam las 'das par ni/ /
bla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje ral gri yang dag bskyed/ /'jig rten khams ni yongs bgrod bya/ /pad+ma dkar po'i 'od 'bar te/ /byang chub sems kyis rnam par brgyan/ /dbus
su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /gzhogs su btsun mo dgod par bya/ /cho ga shes pas de ltar gzung / /rang gi rdo rje de la gzhug /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas de nyid kyis
mchod ba/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so/ /ji srid yang dag thob sbyor skyes/ /sngags pas slar ni bsdu bar bya/ /mtho gang tsam las 'das par ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor bsgom pa ni/ /rang gzugs shin tu brtan byas nas/ /lha la sogs pa rnam par bsgom/ /snying gar sngags kyi yig byin nas/ /sangs rgyas kun ni mchod
par bya/ /mtho bdun tsam las 'das par ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ni sgom par byed/ /lha yi gzugs kyi dbus gnas par/ /snying gar de la bsgom par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
dam tshig gis gsungs so/ /rang gzugs spyan zhes bya bar ni/ /byas nas sangs rgyas rnam par bsgom/ /thugs ka nyid dang thams cad du/ /mkhas pas rang gzugs bsgom par
bya/ /de ru snying po'i tshul gyis ni/ /sems dpa'i rnal 'byor rnam par bsgom/ /rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /gzugs kyis nam
mkha' 'gongs par ni/ /snying po rnams las yang dag bskyed/ /rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni/ /rang gi rnal 'byor legs brtan
byas/ /sangs rgyas yang dag rnal 'byor bsgom/ /rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni/ /byang chub sems ni rnam par bsgom/ /lha ni yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /sngags kyi yi ge rnam
par bsgom/ /mtho gang tsam las 'das par ni/ /pad+ma'i tshul du rnam par bsgom/ /rang lus dri ma med byas nas/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o/ /de dbus legs par brtan
byas nas/ /rang gzugs deng nas dang por bsgom/ /'od dkar 'bar ba'i phreng ba sogs/ /pad+ma lnga po rnam bsgom bya/ /de yi dbus su rang gzugs dang / /gzhogs su btsun mo dgod par bya/
rang gi khu ba deng sogs 'byung / /cho ga shes pas spro bar bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams/ /kun tu gang bar bsgom pa ni/ /rang gzugs ral gri ltar byas nas/ /kun gyi
snying gar dgod par bya/ /rang gzugs sangs rgyas yang dag sbyor/ /mtshan nyid la sogs chog rim gyis/ /byang chub sems dpas nam mkha'i khams/ /yang dag gang bar rnam bsgom bya/ /
rang gzugs zhags pa yang dag sbyor/ /khyab bdag sangs rgyas gzugs dgod bya/ /ji srid nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du/ /cho ga shes pas dgug par bya/ /rang gzugs sangs rgyas yang
dag sbyor/ /byang chub sems su rnam sgom mo/ /sngags kyi yi ge sogs sbyor gyis/ /de yi rnam par myur bsgom bya/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /'od zer 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/ /
rang gzugs sangs rgyas mtshungs par ni/ /cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya/ /rang gzugs de la gzugs gnas par/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /spyan zhes bya ba yid dga' ba/ /
cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /spyan ni snying gar rnam par dgod/ /cho ga shes pas 'od rnam par/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab gzhug bya/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rang gzugs myur ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed/ /lha yi rnam par yang dag
sbyor/ /bsgom bya brtson pa gzhan min no/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpar yang dag bskyed/ /lcags kyu'i rnam pa zhags pa sogs/ /byas nas slob ma rab
gzhug bya/ /rdo rje sems dpar yang dag bskyed/ /rang gzugs snying gar rnam dgod bya/ /dgod pa byas nas lag sogs kyis/ /de nas grangs ni yang dag brtsam/ /bzlas pa
sogs sam btung bya ba/ /blo ldan des ni de bya'o/ /sgrub po rnams kyi rnam bzlas bya/ /gzhan du yang dag grub min nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
tshig gis de skad ces gsungs so/ /rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /dbus su rang gi rigs sgom mo/ /mthar yang dgra dang bgegs 'joms par/ /snying po de ru bsgom par bya//
'di rnams kyi ni cho ga yis/ /sgom pa la sogs cho ga'i rim/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rnam bsgom bya/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs 'bar ba'i/ /khro bo'i
gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /kha dog gang de kho nar brjod/ /de nyid mthar thug de nyid brjod/ /de nyid de yis bsam par bya/ /gzhan du grub pa min pa nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /rang gzugs dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /dbus su 'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad
du/ /de nyid shes pas snying gar dgod/ /de la bdag nyid yang dag bskyed/ /de yi rang bzhin der brtsam bya/ /rang gzugs pad+ma'i dbus gnas par/ /snang byed la sogs mnyam pa'i
'od/ /snying gar yi ge byas nas kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dus pa la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya/ /rig pa'i tshul du yang dag bskyed//
dngos grub thams cad kun thob 'gyur/ /de phyir sngags pas khyad par gyi/ /rig pa'i tshul ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas
de skad ces gsungs so/ /thams cad de nyid bya ba ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /gzugs ni rnam snang mdzad bsams nas/ /snying gar sngags ni rnam bsgom bya/ /de nyid
sngags su rjes su dran/ /rig pa'i tshul gyi cho ga las/ /slob dpon yid ni dga' ba ru/ /cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya/ /snying ga rnams dang thams cad du/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
pa'o/ /rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /de la ral gri la sogs bsgom/ /cho ga shes pas yang dag bskyed/ /'bar ba lnga ni rnam bsgom bya/ /gzugs dang kha dog rnam par shes/ /
'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gyis de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam
pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa rnams su
rang gi gzugs su bzhag go /bsdus pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /le'u bka' rnams stsal bar mdzad/ /'o ma dang zhor bsams nas su/ /'phags pa'i dam tshig bzhi po dang / /
dbus su sngags pas ut+pa la/ /bsgom bya gzhan du mi bsam mo/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor/ /de yi steng du rnam bsgom bya/ /khro bo'i rnam pa yang dag bskyed/ /'od zer
yang dag sbyor ba bsgom/ /der ni 'od zer 'dus rnams su/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya/ /cho ga shes pas der rang gzugs/ /dbus su yang dag bzhag bsgom bya/ /bcom
ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /rang gi rnam rtog yongs dor bya/ /rang gzugs
hUM yig ces brjod pa/ /byas na kun tu rnam bsgom bya/ /cho ga shes pas de rnams su'ang / /ha yig mthar thug rnam bsam bya/ /rang gzugs la sogs mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /lha de skad
cig de la 'gyur/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor/ /snying gar de la rnam bsam bya/ /cho ga shes pas gsang sngags yig /cho ga mthong bas bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das
dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnas lngar yang dag sbyar bya ba/ /rtse mo lnga ru rnam bsgom bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge thams cad du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas
gzugs ni rnam bsgoms pas/ /cho ga shes pas spro bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi gtso bos de skad ces gsungs so/ /rang gzugs sems
dpa'i tshul gyis ni/ /sems dpa'i mtshan mar bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu ni/ /cho ga shes pas spro bar bya/ /rang gzugs sems dpa'i tshul gyis ni/ /lha yi snying gar
bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs de dbyung bar bya/ /'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya/ /rang gzugs ye shes zhes brjod pa/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /byang chub
sems su de phyur nas/ /'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya/ /rang gi gzugs zhes brjod pa ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rang gi gzugs kyi 'od zer gyis/ /zhing 'dir khyab
par rnam bsgom bya/ /rang gzugs lcags kyur bcas byas nas/ /rang gi gzugs kyi lag par dgod/ /cho ga shes pas bkug nas kyang / /sangs
rgyas gzugs la rab gzhug bya/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces gsungs so/ /rang gzugs gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni/ /gsang sngags
yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas/ /cho ga shes pas spro bar bya/ /byang chub sems su rang gzugs ni/ /de nyid sgom pas bsgom par bya/ /bgegs
ni sngags la yang dag bskyed/ /'jig rten khams su'ang spro bar bya/ /mi sdug gtsigs shing 'jigs pa ni/ /bgegs kyi dgra de dbyung bar bya/ /byang chub sems su de phyung
nas/ /'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya/ /rang gzugs nyi ma'i dbus gnas par/ /rnon po 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/ /las kyi rdo rje shin tu mdzes/ /cho ga shes pas
dbyung bar bya/ /dang po'i rnal 'byor yang dag bskyed/ /shin tu brtan pa brtan pa'i sems/ /cho ga nye bar mthong ba yis/ /dang po'i rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/ /rang gzugs
ut+pa lar bsams nas/ /sna tshogs 'od zer mnyam par ldan/ /lha yi gzugs su yang dag sbyor/ /de yi steng du rnam bsgom bya/ /ji srid nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sngags
pas 'jig rten gsum du spro/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yid dga' ba ni bsgom par bya/ /tho
ba'i rnam pa yang dag sbyor/ /cho gas rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gsungs pas/ /ji ltar rigs par bi Tu'i ta/ /rang gzugs gsal ba 'bar ba'i 'od/ /mA ma kI
sogs rnam brgyan pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed/ /'jig rten gsum du yang spro bya/ /rdo rje ye shes yang dag bskyed/ /khro bo yang dag sbyor bsgoms pas/ /rang gzugs
'bar ba mtshungs pa yis/ /cho ga shes pas spro bar bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /mkhas pas rang gi gzugs bsgom bya/ /rtse mo lnga yi rdo rje che/ /'jig rten khams su
yang spro bya/ /khro bo'i gzugs su yang dag bskyed/ /rang gi sngags kyi yi ges brgyan/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya/ /cho ga shes pas 'khor lo lha'i/ /'od zer tshul du
rnam bsgom bya/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis de skad ces gsungs so/ /rang gzugs 'khor lo'i tshul gyis ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rang gzugs
sangs rgyas dang mtshungs pa/ /cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya/ /rang gzugs 'khor lo'i tshul gyis ni/ /ral gri'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs gsal ba//
kun nas rnam par 'phro ba'o/ /pad+ma rang snying dbus gnas par/ /bram ze tshangs pa rnam par brgyan/ /byang chub sems su yang dag bskyed/ /de la sngags
yi ge dgod/ /snying po up+ta lar bsams nas/ /sna tshogs 'od zer rnam par brgyan/ /cho ga shes pas byang chub sems/ /bsams nas sngags gsum rnam bsgom bya/ /snying ga'i
dbus son phra mo ni/ /in+d+ra nI la mtshungs ba'i 'od/ /ye shes sbyor ba kun bskyed nas/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /rang gzugs phra mo'i dbus gnas par/ /sna tshogs
'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /snying por yi ge bsams nas ni/ /rang gzugs de la bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ye shes kyis de skad ces gsungs so/ /khru gang tsam las
'das pa yi/ /phra mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni/ /rang gzugs yi ger yang byas nas/ /rdo rje 'bar bar rnam bsgom bya/ /khru gang tsam las 'das pa ru/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor
bsgom pa ni/ /dbus su gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /bsams nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /khru gang tsam las 'das par ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' yang dag bskyed/ /bsams nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /khru gang tsam las 'das pa ru/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni/ /bgegs dgrar yang dag bskyed bsams nas//
bzlas pa kun tu brtsam par bya/ /mtho gang tsam las 'das pa ru/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni/ /rnam snang mdzad kyi gzugs bsams nas/ /'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya/ /
mtho gang tsam las 'das pa ru/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni/ /dbus su gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /gzhogs su sangs rgyas yang dag bsgom/ /rgyang grags tsam las 'das par
ni/ /phra mo'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni/ /dbus su gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis de skad ces gsungs so/ /rgyang
grags tsam las 'das par ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /gzhogs su btsun mo dgod par bya/ /btsun mo rnams ni thams cad du/ /
'od zer lnga ni rnam bsgom bya/ /me tog yid dga' 'di rnams kyis/ /cho ga shes pas mchod par bya/ /'phrog byed dri yi sprin la sogs/ /bsams nas sangs rgyas mchod par bya/ /bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje'i sbyan gyis de skad ces gsungs so/ /cho ga shes pas btsun mo ni/ /ser po lta bur bsams nas ni/ /sangs rgyas sras po 'dus pa ni/ /rnal 'byor bskyed de bsgom par bya//
de dbyung ji lta bar bkod la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed/ /rigs kyi dbye ba bsgom par bya/ /rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni/ /ye shes
phra mo rnam par bsgom/ /rang gzugs gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni/ /dbus su yang dag bzhag bsgom bya/ /cho ga shes pas rdo rje'i rtser/ /rnam pa lnga ru rnam
bsgom bya/ /dkar po ye shes rigs rab brjod/ /nag po bsdus pa'i rigs su dran/ /dmar po pad+ma'i rigs shes bya/ /ser po 'dod pa'i rigs su dran/ /mdzes pa'i gzugs ni
rab gsal bar/ /rig nas sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /pad+ma rab tu rgyas byas nas/ /rang gi rdo rje de la gzhug /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so/ /
de ltar byas pas gang ldan pa/ /de ldan ye shes rnyed par dka'/ /rang gzugs shin tu brtan byas nas/ /bsam gtan brtson par rab tu gzhug /mdzes ldan ma dga' lta ba
na/ /gzugs dang ldan par de 'gyur ro/ /btsun mo mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /'thung 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /rdo rje sems dpas zhing 'dir ni/ /yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom
bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni brtan byas nas/ /rdo rjes rnam par lhung bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum dbyer mi phyed pas de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam
pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rigs bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u gsum pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das
phyag na rdo rjes chos kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u bka' stsal to/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /thams cad du ni de nyid bya/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam bsgom pa/ /cho ga shes pas

rab tu brtsam/ /chos kyi kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyis/ /rnam par rtog pa yongs dor bya/ /gsang sngags dbye ba brjod nas ni/ /thams cad rnal 'byor rnam bsgom bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma dz+nyA na swa
b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor nyid/ /cho ga shes pas yang dag brjod/ /dngos po thams cad yang dag bskyed/ /dngos med bsgom bya min pa nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das
'jig rten dbang phyug gis de skad ces gsungs so/ /blo gros ldan pas pad+ma bsam/ /pad+ma rA ga'i dbang mtshungs pa/ /dkyil 'khor de la bsam bya ba/ /gzugs brnyan dbus su
rnam bsgom bya/ /rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag bskyed/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /'bar ba 'dus pa de rnams su/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rnam bsgom bya/ /bcom ldan 'das
'jig rten dbang phyug gis de skad ces gsungs so/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun tu dgang / /slar yang de nyid la bsdu bya/ /rang gi gzugs dang zla dbus gnas/ /sna tshogs kha dog
mtshungs ba'i 'di/ /snying ga ru ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /lce la gsang sngags bsgom pa'o/ /rang gzugs de yi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rnam par brgyan/ /'jig rten
dbang phyug yang dag bskyed/ /'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya/ /rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag bskyed/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /'jig rten dbang
phyug rab bsgoms nas/ /gzugs kyis nam mkha' 'gengs par byed/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang
dag bskyed/ /'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag
bskyed/ /ji ltar rigs par gnas lnga ru/ /khyab bdag 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gis de skad ces gsungs so/ /snying ga'i dbus son phra mo
ni/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa/ /chos der yang dag bskyed nas su/ /'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya/ /snying ga'i dbus son phra mo ni/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dri med
pa/ /pad+ma de la rnam bsgoms shing / /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas gzugs rnams thams cad du/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rnam bsgom pa'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das chos 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so/ /snying ga'i dbus son phra mo ni/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /der yang de bzhin
bsgom par bya/ /lte pa'i dbus son phra mo ni/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa/ /rang gzugs la sogs rnam bsgoms pas/ /cho ga shes pas bskyed par bya/ /mtho gang tsam las
'das par ni/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /cho ga shes pas rim pa bzhin/ /'jig rten khams su mchod par byed/ /bcom ldan 'das chos 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs
so/ /rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni/ /'jig rten dbang rab bsgoms pa yis/ /rang gi gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /rgyang grags tsam las
'das par ni/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni/ /gzhogs su btsun mo byas nas su/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni mchod par bya/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /chos kyi
dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni/ /'jig rten khams ni kun nas su/ /cho ga shes pas mchod par bya/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ste/ /
nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mchog byas nas/ /rang gi gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /sngags pas steng gi rim par ni/ /ji srid nam mkha' 'gengs pa zhes/ /pad+ma rA ga'i 'od mnyam pa'i/ /pad+ma
lnga ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /cho ga shes pas rang gzugs ni/ /dbus su yang dag gnas bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni kun 'byung ba/ /shar du rnam par bsgom par bya/ /lhor
ni bsdus pa zhes byas nas/ /rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam par bya/ /nub tu chos 'chang byas nas ni/ /byang du 'dod pa 'byung ba'o/ /'khor lo ye shes
rigs zhes brjod/ /ral gri chos kyi rigs zhes dgongs/ /rdo rje bsdus pa'i rigs su grags/ /rtse gsum 'dod pa'i rigs su bshad/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang bar/ /
byas nas khyab bdag chos 'chang ba/ /lag tu ral gri yang dag bskyed/ /rang gzugs kyis ni gzhom par bya/ /'dod mchod kyis ni 'joms byas nas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi cho ga
rig /lag tu mdung ni yang dag bskyed/ /rang gzugs kyis ni phye mar brlag /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /ye shes rigs ni zlog par byed/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor
tshul gyis ni/ /bsdus pa'i rigs ni rnam ltung byed/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /chos kyi rigs ni nges ltung byed/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /chen po'i rigs
ni nges ltung byed/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /rigs kun nges par ltung bar byed/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam
pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen por chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes
de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rang gi rdo rje chen po la bzhag nas ye shes kyi rigs la sogs pa can de la/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu bcug cing brtan
par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po de rnams su rang gi gzugs kyi rnam pas kun tu gnas pa dang / gzugs chen po lha chen po'i lha'i rnam par yang dag par sbyar nas/ 'dod pa'i rigs
kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul las ni/ /thams cad de bzhin kho nar bya/ /cho ga shes pas rab brtsam bya/ /gzhan du bsgom bya min pa nyid/ /'dod pa'i
rigs kyi cho ga yis/ /gsang sngags rig pa rjes dran bya/ /oM kA ma dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ ji ltar rigs par brjod nas ni/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni yang dag brtsam/ /kar ni kA ra mtshungs
pa'i 'od/ /pad+ma chen po yang dag bskyed/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /rang gi gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /'dod mchod gzugs ni kun bskyed nas/ /'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya/ /
rang gzugs 'dod mchod tshul gyis ni/ /gzugs kyis nam mkha' 'gengs par byed/ /sna tshogs 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa'i/ /tshangs pa'i gzugs ni yang dag mnan/ /'dod mchod
gzugs ni kun bskyed nas/ /'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya/ /cho ga shes pas re re bar/ /gzugs gsum rnam par bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pas de skad
ces gsungs so/ /khru gang tsam las 'das par ni/ /pad+ma chen po rnam bsgom pa/ /tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis srid pa 'dir/ /cho ga shes pas spro bar
bya/ /khru ni brgya phrag 'das par ni/ /pad+ma chen po rnam bsgom bya/ /'dod mchod gzugs ni yang dag dbyung / /sangs rgyas de nyid la bsgom bya/ /khru ni brgyad brgya 'das par ni/ /pad+ma
chen po rnam bsgom bya/ /khyab 'jug gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /sangs rgyas la sogs der bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis
'di spro bya/ /chos kyi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /khyab 'jug gzugs kyis 'di spro bya/ /sems dpa'i gzugs su brtan byas nas/ /'dod mchod mtshungs pa'i gzugs
rnams kyis/ /'jig rten khams ni kun tu yang / /cho ga shes pas spro bar bya/ /khru gang tsam las 'das par ni/ /tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis rnam bsgom pa/ /snying gar de rnams
yang dag bskyed/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom bya/ /cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs/ /gzugs la gzugs su rnam bsgom bya/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i
mchod pas de skad ces gsungs so/ /khru gang tsam las 'das par ni/ /khyab 'jug gzugs ni rnam sgom pa/ /snying gar de rnams kun bskyed nas/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su
rnam bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs rnams thams cad du/ /'dod pa'i mchod pa mtshungs ba'i gzugs/ /sgeg pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa/ /cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya/ /ji srid
gzugs su yang dag sbyor/ /de srid du ni btsun mor 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pas de skad ces gsungs so/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /gzugs su
bskyed nas bsgom par bya/ /cho ga shes pas dang po'i sbyor/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /nam mkha' khams ni kun bkang bar/ /mkhas pas de ltar bsams byas nas//
brjod pa'i rnam pas gsol ba btab/ /mnyam par bzhag pas de ltung bya/ /cho ga shes pas lha'i rnam pa/ /sangs rgyas 'od dang mnyam pa'i gzugs/ /ji ltar rigs par sngags
pas sbyin/ /gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /cho ga shes pas lha mo lha'i/ /rang gi gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /gzhan du rdo rje sems dpa' rnams/ /dkar sogs cho ga 'byung ba
yi/ /sgeg pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa'i/ /rang gzugs rnon po'i tshul gyis ni/ /cho ga shes pas lha mo der/ /byas nas mtshon bya rnam bsgom bya/ /cho ga shes pas rdor pad+ma/ /kun sbyor
cho ga 'byung ba yis/ /rigs kyi gzugs ni kun bskyed nas/ /rang gi khu bas de ni mchod/ /rgyal ba chu skyes rigs kyi lha/ /gzhan du grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rigs
brjod pa'i/ /lha nyid grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /dang po dang mthar thams cad du/ /'di ni thun mtshams bzhi ru bya/ /rgyal ba chu skyes rdo rje skyes/ /
gzhan du 'grub pa min pa nyid/ /ma mo'i gzugs ni kun bskyed nas/ /'od zer sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rang gzugs 'dod mchod tshul gyis ni/ /khams gsum par yang
spro bar bya/ /'dod pa'i mchod pa mtshungs pa'i gzugs/ /sring mo bzhir ni yang dag sbyor/ /gzugs kyi mtshan nyid tshul gyis ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas smra bar bya/ /ge sar ser
po dang mtshungs pa'i/ /tshangs pa'i gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs/ /byas nas de ni rab bsgom bya/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos 'chang bas
de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ 'dod pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi dkyil 'khor du bzhag nas rang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnyis su med pa
mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen por dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes mchog gi le'u 'di bka' stsal to/ /blo ldan 'dod pa thams cad la/ /rnam rtog
bya ba min pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'joms pa ni/ /sems la smad bya min pa nyid/ /dga' dang rtsod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bslu ba dang / /gzhan du nga la lha'o
zhes/ /sems ni brtan bya min pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzas gang yin/ /skye ba med pa'i yon tan 'byung / /sems ni shin tu brtan byas la/ /btsun mo la sogs rnam par bsgom/
'jig rten gsum pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /rig mchen mo sbyan mar grags/ /de yang btsun mor byas nas kyang / /kun tu nye bar longs spyad do/ /cho ga shes pas ye shes rigs/ /lhan cig
'joms par yang dag brtsam/ /srog chags rnams kyi dge 'joms pa/ /bsdu ba'i don ni rtag tu bya/ /chags la chags pas sbyor bya ba/ /chos kyi rigs la rtag tu bya/ /'dod mchod
rigs ni mtshungs pa la/ /rag tu brdzun yang smra bar bya/ /kun la rang de ltar 'di bya/ /gzhan du grub pa min pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /snying gar de ni rnam
bsgom bya/ /thams cad de bzhin kho nar bya/ /gzhan du de dag mi 'gyur ro/ /ye shes rigs ni rnam 'joms pas/ /dga' ldan rnams su nye bar skye/ /chos kyi rigs ni rnam bsgoms/
pas/ /bde ldan du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi rigs sogs dbye ba yis/ /bsdus pa zhes ni grags par 'gyur/ /'dod mchod rigs ni 'joms pa yis/ /khams gsum pa la
sogs par 'byung / /gnas med lus dang bral ba yi/ /lus dang ldan pas gnas par 'gyur/ /de yi gdong ni gzi rgyas par/ /chos rnams kun tu skye
bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces gsungs so/ /sems can khams kyi mthar thug par/ /bdag ni rdo rje lta bur brtan/ /srid pa
sgrol bar yang dag sbyor/ /sangs rgyas bka' yis dgod par bya/ /ye shes dge ba kun 'byung ba/ /sangs rgyas chos tshul 'di rnams kyis/ /sems dpa' bsdus pa yang dag
'byung / /gzhan du mchod bya min pa nyid/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs/ /ye shes chen po kun btus pas/ /sems la rtag tu'ang sbyar bar bya/ /chos bsdus pa ni thob par
'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni sems chen po/ /rdor sogs mtshan nyid min pa nyid/ /de bzhin du ni ye shes kun/ /snying po kun las btus pa 'di/ /pha rol phyin pa bsdus pa
'dir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi btsun mor bstan/ /de rnams sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/ /kun sbyor mtshan nyid de rnams kyis/ /sgra dri ro la sogs pa rnams/ /ji ltar nus par
'bul bar byed/ /rang gzugs sangs rgyas tshul gyis ni/ /de la dbus su rnam bsgom bya/ /'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs byas nas/ /snying gar de rnams rab gzhug bya/ /bcom
ldan 'das chos 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs so/ /bsdus pa zhes rigs su brjod pa'i/ /gar mkhan chen po yang dag 'byung / /de la ngo mtshar gsol btab pa/ /de la 'joms par
byed par dgongs/ /phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang brjod/ /mi rnams rigs ni bzhi po yang / /byas nas dam tshig tshul gyis ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /sems ni sems
can thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin phul byung chen po ste/ /rnam rtog dam tshig la gnas pa/ /skye ba rnams dang dman par smra/ /bsod nams bsod nams kyis de'i lus/ /gos pa'am yang
na de min nyid/ /de ltar shes nas ci rigs par/ /gzhan du bsgom bya min pa nyid/ /pad+ma ut+pal la sogs pa/ /'dam skyes yang dag byung ma skyes/ /sems la sogs pa'i mtshan
nyid kyang / /de nyid la kun shes par bya/ /byang chub sems ni brtan byas nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang yongs su gzungs /rdo rje de nyid las skyes te/ /gzhan du 'byung ba min pa nyid/ /
sems can gyi ni sa rnams kyis/ /'grub par 'gyur bar grags pa yin/ /de bzhin gang 'di dag pa che/ /ye shes lcags kyu'i tshul chen no/ /bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos
de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen bor dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes mchog gi le'u ste drug pa rdzogs
so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad nges par byung nas kyang sems dpa' chen po'i
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs par kun tu gnas par gyur rnal 'byor dam tshig thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'du rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes byin gyis rlob pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dang po'i rnal 'byor dam tshig thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'du bar byed bskyed pa dang bcas pa'i gsang chen bka' stsal to/ /
sangs rgyas gzugs su yang dag bskyed/ /'od zer sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /'od zer snying po sogs tshul gyis/ /'khor lo dkar po dang mtshungs pa/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tshad kyis//
kun nas yongs su zlum po ru/ /sngags pa'i dpral ba'i steng du ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /cho ga shes pas zla ba gcig /de yis de ltar 'di spro bya/ /nam mkha' la
sogs rab 'byam du/ /zla gnyis nang du rgyas par bya/ /dzA ti'i me tog sogs g.yogs par/ /dkyil 'khor de ru rnam bsgom bya/ /mtshan ma phul byung bcas mthong nas/ /mtshan nyid
brjod pas mtshon par bya/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam brgyan pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas/ /gang du dkyil 'khor sogs tshul gyis/ /nas tsam du ni bsgom par bya/ /rtse mo
lnga pa'i rdo rje che/ /sna yi rtser ni rnam bsgom bya/ /in+d+ra nI la sogs tshul gyis/ /de yi kha dog rnam sgom mo/ /ut+pal la sogs g.yogs pa la/ /dkyil 'khor de la bsgom par bya/ /kun tu de
nyid bya ba ni/ /ye shes rigs kyi cho ga las/ /cho ga shes bas chos sems dka'/ /bskyed nas bsgom par bya ba 'di/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar/ /byas nas 'od zer yang dag
bsdu/ /rgya shug tshi gu'i tshad kyis ni/ /pad+ma yang dag sbyar bsgom bya/ /pad+ma rA ga'i 'od mtshungs pa'i/ /'dab ma brgyad pa rnam bsgoms nas/ /ji ltar rigs par snying gar de/ /bsgom bya
gzhan du mi bsam mo/ /thog ma bar ni rnam spangs nas/ /sgom pa de yi dgongs pa'o/ /me tog pad+ma sogs g.yogs par/ /de phyogs su ni rnam bsgom bya/ /cho ga shes pas 'dod mchod
pa'i/ /sems dpa' 'od mtshungs bsgom par bya/ /'od zer 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa'i/ /rtse gsum shin tu brtan byas nas/ /cho ga shes pas nas tsam du/ /bsams nas lte bar bsgom
par bya/ /kar ni kar sogs me tog che/ /ser po 'bar ba bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /kun tu rnal 'byor bzhi rnams su/ /rnam pa bzhi
po rnam bsgom bya/ /ji srid nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du/ /cho ga shes pas spro bar bya/ /gang yang sngags pas zla gnyis su/ /thun bzhir rnam par bsgom par bya/ /rnam par dben dang yid
'ong dang / /skyo bo bral par bsgom par bya/ /nya dang sha sogs can bza' la/ /brtul zhugs can gyis mar sar btung / /bslus pa dang yang sa la 'jigs//
de ltar gang 'di btul zhugs can/ /cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs/ /dngos nyid du de lta bar byed/ /rang gzugs rnam shes bya min nyid/ /sgra ni nyan par byed min nyid/ /rnam pa
gnyis su de yi sems/ /skye ba min zhing yang yang min/ /gang zhig kho nar bsgom par bya/ /gzhan du de dag mi 'gyur nyid/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor sbyor la sogs/ /bskyed nas
de la bsgom par bya/ /bdag po'i rnal 'byor kun bskyed nas/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /'bras bu'i chos su skye 'gyur te/ /gzhan du bskyed par 'gyur min nyid/ /
bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyis de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dang po'i ye shes kun las
btus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rang gi ba spu'i khung bu rnams su rab tu
bcug nas dam tshig thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na
rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rang gi gzugs bud med kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs pa kho nar ba spu'i khung bu rnams nas mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /de nas btsun mo
de rnams thams cad kyis ye shes chen po'i rin po che de yi mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pas yang dag par mchod de/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad kun tu bkang zhing snang bar byas nas sku dang
gsung dang thugs rnams su gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje btsun mo thams cad kyi b+ha ga rnams su rang gi rdo rje yang dag par spyor ba'i rnam pas yang dag par
sbyar nas/ rang gi gzugs de'i tshad du byin gyis rlob par byed pas byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de'i tshe tshad de kho na bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis snga
ma ji lta ba'i phyag na rdo rje rigs thams cad dam tshig gi ye shes de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes chen po'i dam tshig bka' stsal to/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni/
dbus su sngags su rnam bsgom bya/ /snying gar dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces
gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni/ /rnam snang la sogs rnam bsgom pa/ /de nyid kyis ni kun bskyed nas/ /de nyid mchod par byed par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul
gyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /de yi mchod pa byed par bshad/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni/ /
rang rigs la sogs rnam par bsgom/ /dbus su gzugs ni brtan byas nas/ /de yi mchod pa byed par bshad/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /spyan ni yang dag bskyed nas su/ /
gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /dmangs rigs dkar mo rnam bsgom bya/ /kun sbyor la sogs mtshan nyid kyis/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /ut+pal sngon po dang
mtshungs pa'i/ /mA ma kI ni rtag bsgom bya/ /me tog chun sogs kyis don bzhin/ /ji ltar rigs par rnam brgyan pa/ /rig ma chen mo dkar mor grags/ /khrag dang mtshungs par
bsam par bya/ /yid kyi kun sbyor phun tshogs kyis/ /bsdus pa yis ni rnam par brgyan/ /ut+pal na mtshungs skal bzang mo/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsam par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das
kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /mar sar la sogs kun sbyor gyis/ /yid du 'ong ba de bsgom bya/ /chang nyid yid kyis sbyor byed pa/ /gang de nyid ni sgom bzhin du/ /zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rang gi sngags kyis yang dag bskyed/ /skrod par byed pas cho ga kun/ /'di ni bskyed cing bsgom par bya/ /lag pas mgrin pa la sogs bzung / /rkang pa
