dbus su rnam bsgom pa/ /thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /bsams nas sngags ni rnam bsgom bya/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga rdzogs
so// //cho ga shes pas gzugs byas nas/ /ngos su haM yig yang dag sbyar/ /dbus su rang gi rnam pa bsgom/ /'dzam bu nA da mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /'dod
mchod gzugs ni bskyed par bya/ /lag tu mdud rtse gsum bsgoms nas/ /de yi snying gar dkyil 'khor dgod/ /chos kyi dbang phyug gzugs bsgoms nas/ /phyi nas bya
pa yang dag brtsam/ /sgron ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// //yang na brtul zhugs can gyis ni//
bsdu bas sangs rgyas gzugs bsgom bya/ /gtsug tor sngags dang khro bo dang / /rig pa'i rgyal po rigs bcas pas/ /las rnams thams cad pa yi sngags/ /go rims bzhin
du de bzlas bya/ /dbus su bdag po bsgoms nas ni/ /ngos su lha rnams dgod par bya/ /snying po sbyor ba de rnams su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge
mchod bsgoms nas/ /de yis lha rnams rnam bsgom bya/ /thams cad kyi ni lag par ni/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma bsgom/ /mdung dang yid bzhin
nor bu yang / /bsgoms nas myur du sgrub par byed/ /sngags pas rang sngags bzlas bya ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa yis/ /ngos su zla ba yang dag sbyor/ /dbus
su ser po rnam bsgom bya/ /bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis ni/ /rang gi lus la dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas/ /'di ni rengs par byed pa'i mchog/
dus rnams kun du rnams bsgoms nas/ /nges par bskal par de gnas 'gyur/ /cho ga shes pas mi bskyod sogs/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dgod bya/ /rigs kyi
dbang phyug rnam bsgoms nas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dgong pa ni/ /thog ma tha mar bsam gtan 'di/ /bzhi yi dbus su bsam par bya/ /de yis sangs rgyas nyid bsgrubs
na/ /yun mi ring bar sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de yi rang gi sngags kyi mchog /phyag rgya shes nas sgrub pa po/ /cho ga shes pas bskyed par bya/ /myur du 'grub byed gzhan du min/
phyag rgya chen por rab bsgoms nas/ /nam mkha'i lam gyi dbus las ni/ /dbus su nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dge ba bsgom par bya/ /sngags pas dkyil
'khor las ngos su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /bdag po'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed/ /de yis mi g.yo bsgom par bya/ /rin chen bzhi byung sgo nga ru/ /sbrang rtsi mar
gyis rab tu dga'/ /sngags kyi yi ge rnam bsgoms nas/ /bsam pa de yis sbyin sreg bya/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi tshul gyis ni/ /dbus su hUM gi yi ge 'gengs/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba
'thibs pa ni/ /kun nas rnam par 'phro bar byed/ /de la gnas pas lha yi gzugs/ /tshim pa'i dam tshig gsum 'byung bas/ /cho ga shes pas gtsug tor gyis/ /gtsug
tor rnams ni bsgom par bya/ /bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /kun nas sor mo bcu gnyis pa'i/ /ut+pal chen po 'dab
brgyad pa/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /de nyid kyis ni bsgom par bshad/ /rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che/ /ut+pal sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /A li bcu drug yang dag
ldan/ /rtag tu bsgom bya 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags pas sor mo nyi shu pa'i/ /rtse gsum ser po dang mtshungs pa/ /cho ga nyid kyis bsgoms byas na/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir
ni the tshom med/ /pad+ma las kyi rdo rje dang / /yid bzhin nor bu gsum pa can/ /bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed/ /myur du sgrub byed gzhan du min/ /'khor lo de bzhin
pad rdo rje/ /bsams nas rdo rje'i cho ga las/ /sgom pa'i go 'phang gis bsgrub bya/ /gzhan du 'di ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje chen po mdung
sogs bcas/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /kun gyi las can gsang sngags kyi/ /rjod pa rnams kyis brjod byas nas/ /ral gri 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i
sems/ /'phro zhing 'thibs pa kun du 'khrugs/ /khru gang tsam du yang dag bskyed/ /khro bar byed pa'i khyad par bya/ /pho nya mngag gzhug sogs sngags rnams/ /rdo
rje'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las/ /sgom pas mchog tu mthong bar 'gyur/ /dbyug pa thob dgra sta dang / /zhags pa paT+Ti sa sgom pa'i/ /cho
gas bsgom par byas nas ni/ /rdo rje 'chang rnams mnyes par byed/ /'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sgom pa ste/ /rdo rje ye shes can gyis
gsang / /ye shes dngos grub can du brjod/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /cho ga shes
pas sbyin sreg bya/ /de nyid gsang ba'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin sreg brtsam/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi sbyor ba las/ /rigs kyi las ni sgrub par byed/ /
oM yig sngags kyi dbye ba yis/ /sgom pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhi ba can la dkyil 'khor zlum/ /rgyas pa can la zur bzhi pa/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mchog /dbang
bya gzhu yi rnam pa'o/ /zhi la me yi dbus so na par/ /bdud rtsi lta bur bsgom par bya/ /de nyid la ni lha yi gzugs/ /rang gi tshul gyis bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid bdag po'i tshul
gyis ni/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul las byung / /kha ni rab tu gdangs byas nas/ /me stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi/ /sngags pas lce yi dbus son par/ /hUM yig de yis bsam par bya//
bcom ldan 'das sbyin sreg rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /cho ga shes pas 'o ma sbrang / /mar ni zhi ba'i rigs la spyad/ /mar khu chen po'i bye brag las/ /ye shes rdo rje'i rigs
su brjod/ /zhi la rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /snying ga'i dbus son rnam bsgom bya/ /yid bzhin nor bu lag bsams nas/ /'di ni dag pa'i tshul mchog go /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs
brnyan che/ /pad+ma'i yon tan 'byung ba la/ /gzugs ni 'dod chags rigs mchog go /gzugs ni 'dod mchod rdo rje can/ /las bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba las/ /sngags kyi yi ge dgod
byas nas/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i sbyin sreg rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin nor bu'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi sngags kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen po/ /'dod pa'i dam tshig dgyes pa
po/ /sngags rnams thams cad yang dag dmigs/ /de yi bsam gtan rab bskul bya/ /dam tshig ye shes sangs rgyas kun/ /rigs dmigs dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /gzugs
ni sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /oM yig ye shes dbye ba yis/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /ral ba'i cod pan longs spyod pa/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ /phyag bzhi
pa la spyan yangs pa/ /me stag 'thibs bas kun du 'khrugs/ /rnal 'byor mchod phyir thogs la sogs/ /brgyan cing dkyil 'khor la sogs pa/ /cod pan du ni rdo rje sems//
mdzes pa'i gzugs ni rgyal ba'i gzhi/ /dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas/ /'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go /sku yi rdo rje'i sogs sbyor gyis/ /mngon shes lnga yi rab sbyor las//
rkang gnyis mchog de nyid shes pas/ /thod pa can gyi gtso bor brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'di ye shes/ /rigs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje

rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di
gsungs so/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /dbus su gzugs ni rab brtag bya/ /nag po shin tu rnam 'gyur khros/ /ma rungs zhal ni rnam par gdangs/ /me stag 'thibs po 'bar ba
sti/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed/ /phyag bzhi pa ste rab 'bad pas/ /dbang po gnyis kyis rab sbyor las/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /rdo rje thugs sogs yang dag grub/ /rab tu
gnas pas de bsgrub bya/ /'dod chags rdo rje rab bskul bas/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
chos thams cad 'chang ba'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos 'chang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba
las/ /dbus su gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /dmar po 'dod chags 'dzin pa 'bar/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /phyag bzhi pa la yid 'ong bar/ /dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas//
de yi cho ga bsgom pa ni/ /'di ni 'dod chags tshul bstan pa'o/ /gsung gi rdo rje gtso dngos grub/ /rdo rje chos rab sbyor sogs kyis/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis sgrub/ /sgom pa yang ni
myur 'grub byed/ /chos 'chang ba'i dam tshig gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig gi rdo rje'i rigs byin gyi
rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so/ /'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis
gzugs ni dbus su dgod par bya/ /khyab bdag zhi ba ser po'i mdog /spyan gsum brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom/ /kun du dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs/ /me stag tshogs ni
kun du 'khrugs/ /phyag bzhi par ni cho ga yis/ /bsgom bya myur du 'grub par byed/ /rdo rje'i mthar thug nor dngos grub/ /rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya/ /'di de sngags rnams
thams cad kyi/ /thar pa'i ting 'dzin snying po can/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sgom pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpas sprul pa yin/ /rdo rje mdung gi dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /ji srid
gzugs ni kun sbyor ba/ /de la lha nyid rab tu grags/ /slar yang 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /skyed par byed pa'i cho gar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs
so/ /rang gi sngags yig dbye bas sam/ /yang na rigs kyi rig pa yis/ /rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags kyis sam/ /brtul zhugs can gyi rig rgyal pos/ /thams cad las can
sngags kyis dang / /gtsug tor sngags kyis rnam bsgom bya/ /'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces
gsungs so/ /zhi ba'i las kyi rab dbye bas/ /rigs kyi sngags su rab tu grags/ /rgyas pa can la rigs kyi sngags/ /sgom pas nges par 'grub par byed/ /dbang du bya ba'i cho ga las/ /rig pa'i
rgyal pos bsgom par bya/ /thams cad las can sngags kyis ni/ /mngon spyod rnam par sgom par byed/ /skrod par byed pa'i cho ga las/ /gtsug tor du ni rnam bsgom bya/ /sngags shes pas ni
phur gdab sogs/ /pho nya pho nya mo bsam bya/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /'od zer lnga yi tshul gyis ni/ /rtog pas de la bsgom par bya/ /gzhan du dngos grub
med pa nyid/ /sgom pa rnams su shes par bya/ /rigs kyi las kyi rab dbye bas/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam sgom pa'o/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas/ /bsgom bya dngos grub thob par
'gyur/ /snying ga'i dbus son phra mo ni/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas/ /bsgoms pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /snying ga'i dbus son phra mo
ni/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgom pa/ /steng du bkod pa'i dbye ba yis/ /'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go /dkar nag dmar po'i sbyor ba las/ /bsam gtan thams cad du
brtag bya/ /gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid/ /sngags rnams kun du bzlas par bya/ /hUM yig oM yig dbye ba yis/ /swA hA hUM yig gzhan gyi gzugs/ /skyed pa'i cho ga
byas nas ni/ /bsnyen pa gang zhig nges bsgrub bya/ /rigs gsum la yang hUM yig dang / /oM yig ye shes rigs mchog yin/ /sngags kyi yi ge la sogs rnams/ /dpral bar bkod nas
rnam bsgom bya/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so/ /thun bzhi'i sbyor ba la sogs kyis/ /rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs/ /spro ba dang ni gnas par bya/ /'di ni
dngos grub tshul bstan pa'o/ /sgrub par rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs/ /nye bar sgrub pa 'dus pa la/ /'di ni dngos grub tshul mchog go /bdag gi sgrub pa'i
las can la/ /bdag po'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan/ /bsnyen pa'i dus su rab bsgrub pa/ /gtsug tor gzugs dang yang dag ldan/ /me stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi/ /rang lha'i
gzugs dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje phra rab dbye ba yis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'o/ /grags par ldan pa'i dngos grub kun/ /'di nyid kyis ni byang chub thob/ /de yi mchog
tu bsgrub bar bya/ /dngos grub chen po'i yon tan 'byung / /bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par
rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por sngags thams cad kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bkod pas yang dag par mchod nas gsung gi rdo rje chos kyi
gsung gi lam nges par bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i tshul 'di ston par mdzad do/ /gsang ba dag pa dmigs pa med/ /ye shes yon tan kun gyi gzhi/ /kun nas ye shes bdag med pa/ /gsang ba'i ye shes

phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gsang ba'i de nyid don dang ldan/ /mchog gi spyod pa rgya mtsho che/ /kun nas 'dod pa yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gtso bo'i ye shes ji ltar gnas/ /rdo rje
mi phyed gsum gnas pa/ /rigs kyi pha rol phyin pa thob/ /byang chub spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can kun skyes can gyi mchog /sangs rgyas byang chub rab gzhug mdzad/ /rang bzhin
dag pa dag pa'i mchog /sems can skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chos sku thar pa chen po ste/ /yid bzhin nor bu mthong ba che/ /sems can kun dgyes byed pa po/ /dag pa'i spyod la phyag
'tshal bstod/ /de nas yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
byang chub sems dpa' de'i mthong ba'i chos kyi yon tan gyi khyad par so sor 'dod par bya ba gang ci ltar lags/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /the tshom med par mnyam par shes/ /sangs rgyas chos su 'dod par bya/ /the
tshom med par 'du shes pa/ /chos rnams thams cad 'dod par bya/ /the tshom med par 'du shes pa/ /'dus byas thams cad 'dod par bya/ /'di lta ste/ rigs kyi
bu zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi sa la rab tu gnas pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams su rnam par rtog pa med cing the tshom med pa de bdag go zhes chos
thams cad kyang nam mkhar mthong bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ye shes zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyes bu'i mchog la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi spyad pa spyod par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di don dam pa'i gsang ba la dad par ci ltar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ yang bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su yang dag par byang chub
nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'chang bas gsol ba ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ /'di lta ste gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi cha shas su gyur pa gzhi'i sems can rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i tshul 'di blta bar bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la mtshan thob cing dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba thob nas de lta bu'i dbyangs
'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o ye shes ye shes che/ /rdo rje chen po rab tu mthong / /rmad du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyis/ /ye shes mig ni rnam sbyangs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung nas shar dang lho la sogs
pa'i phyogs mngon par brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sku gsum gyi ye shes kyi gang bar
mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub rang bzhin yang dag thob/ /byang chub sems dpas snying po byin/ /nam
mkha'i khams la longs spyod pa'i/ /rdo rje byang chub rab tu gnas/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la/ /spros pa dag ni yod ma yin/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin ye shes kyis/ /nam
mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas rdo rje chos la bos par gyur to/ /sems dpa' chen po dam tshig gang yin
pa de mthong ngam/ /bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje skyes bu chen po de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rin po che sgrom bu nges par rig
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi thugs su zhugs par mdzad do/ /de ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi bdag pos rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs nam mkha' lta bur sbyor bas yang dag par gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yongs
su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog
pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// //mkhan chen thar pa lo tsA ba'i phyag dpe'i gseb nas shog yar lnga byung ba sngar bsgyur ba las/ /phyis nyang stod smon 'gro'i gtsug
lag khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed nas bsgyur bar rtsom pa na/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nang gzhan gsum gyi tshul la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa thob pa'i bla ma yang dag pa'i
dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i tshul la blo gros shin tu byang ba'i 'jig rten gyi mig chos grags dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul zhing sbyin
bdag mdzad nas/ /bu ston gyis bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan pa'o// //rgyud min rgyud ltar bcos pa yi/ /chos min sun dbyung bya phyir
dang / /dam chos snang ba spel ba'i phyir/ /dam chos snang ba spel ba'i phyir/ /ji ltar nus bzhin bsgyur ba lags/ /'di don 'byed pa'i 'grel pa dang / /rgya dpe'i dpe dpang ma rnyed cing / /don
zab sgra ni rtogs dka' la/ /saMskr-ita la ma byang bas/ /sgra don ji bzhin ma 'byor pa'i/ /nongs de mkhas rnams bzod mdzad cing / /phyis 'byung skad gnyis smra rnams kyis/ /ma dag
shes na bcos par zhu/ /rgyud chen 'di nyid bsgyur ba las/ /dge ba dag gis gang thob pa/ /de yis mtha' yas 'gro ba kun/ /rdo rje 'chang chen nyid 'gyur cig/ //

bshad par bya'o// //'dir gleng ba/ mkhas grub thams cad mkhyen pas sdom gsum bslab bya thub bstan byi dor du/ des ni gsang 'dus gnyis med rnam rgyal gyi rgyud yang dag par rdzogs pa bod du ma 'gyur kyang thar lo nyi ma

rgyal mtsha gyi phyag dpe'i nang nas rgya dpe shog yar 'ga' zhig rnyed pa la brten nas bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas bsgyur ba le'u dang pa'i mgo nas cung zad tsam ma tshang ba'i le'u tha ma'i mjug cung zad yod de/ rgyud yang dag 'di la

le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis las med kyang sngar bod na yongs rdzogs grags pa'i gsang 'dus gnyis med rnam rgyal kyi rgyud le'u bdun cu don bdun yod pa dang / de'i rjes su 'brangs nas gsang 'dus mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la bskal bzang stong du bzhis ma tshang ba bkod pa'i

dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang dbang bskur dang rdzogs rim kyi rnam gzhag sogs thams cad rdzun ma yin par shes par bya'o/ /bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas kyang khong rang gi de'i 'gyur byang du/ /'di la dum bu las med kyang sngar gyi gnyis med rnam rgyal gyi rgyud du 'dod pa le'u

bdun cu don bdun yod pa de rdzun ma yang dag par rtogs pa'i dgos pa yod do/ /des na de dang de la brten pa'i dbang bka' thams cad rdzun ma yin pas rtogs ldan rnams kyis spang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs kyang / da dung 'ga' zhig de'i cho ga dang dbang bskur byed pa snang ba ni/ sangs

rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir du blun po nan gyis 'tshang bar byed pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar gnyis med rnam rgyal gyi rgyud che bar grags pa le'u don bdun yod pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po che dang / mkhas grub rin po che rnams gnyis kyis rgyud rdzun ma yin par gsungs la//

kun gzigs lnga pa chen po'i gsan yig gang+gA'i chu rgyun du'ang de dang mthun par gsungs pas/ mkhas pa mang du thos pa'i spyan dang ldan pa rnams kyis rgyud rdzun ma nyid du gsungs pa bzhin 'dir yang ma bcug la/ gnyis med rnam rgyal kyi rgyud le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa 'di ni rgyud yang dag pa nyid du bzhed cing /

bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas bsgyur bar le'u dang po'i dbu nas cung zad tsams 'gyur ba sde dge'i bar du/ yang gleng ba/ 'di la bu ston gyis/ dbu nas mtshang ba rnyed na bsgyur bar bya'o/ zhes gsungs pa la/ dus byis jing gir rigs kyi skad rigs smra ba'i lo tsA ba mgon po skyabs kyis/

rgya nag gong ma'i bka' bstan rin po che'i zhus dag byas pa'i tshe tshang bar rnyed pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por snang ba de dpag tshad stong phrag ces pa yan chad/ bod skad du bsgyur nas spyir bod kyi bka' 'gyur ro 'tshal thams cad dang bye brag tu sde

dge'i par la 'jug rgyur stsal ba'i tshe/ 'gyur byang la 'di ltar snang ste/ de ltar bu ston rin po ches bsab dgos par bka' chems su bzhag pa nas bzung ste lo lnga brgyar nye ba/ chen po ching gur gyi gnam sa'i dbang phyug rabs drug pa bdag nyid chen po gong ma lha skyong rgyal po'i gnam lo

dang por/ jing gir rigs las bka' 'gyur khang gi do dam pa bod kyi slob grwa'i ming bzang mgon po skyabs kyis/ rgya'i bka' 'gyur nang gi rgya gar paN chen dA na rak+Shi tas bsgyur ba'i rgyud dpe tshang ma las blangs te ji nus bzhin bod

skad du bsgyur nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa badzra d+ha ra ta la'i bla ma'i sku zhabs dang kwan ting kwan shin lcang skya'i zhal snga la sogs pa'i bla chen mang por gzigs su phul bar/ tshang mas dgyes pa chen pos legs so gnang ba la brten nas/ slar gnam lo gnyis pa'i zla12 tshes15 bzang

po'i nyin/ /dad stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa ho shos thob chin dbang dang ho shos hA l+ya kha chin dbang gnyis brgyud de gong du zhus pas/ gong nas kyang legs so stsal ba gus pas dang du blangs te bod kyi bka' 'gyur nang kha skongs su tshud par byas so/ /zhes pa'i khungs bkod nas

kha bskangs 'dug pa ltar 'dir yang brkos shing / yang sde dge bar ma'i bu ston rin po che'i 'gyur byang du mkhan chen thar pa lo tsA ba'i phyag dpe'i gseb nas rgya dpe shog yar 'ga' shas rnyed pa bsgyur ba las/ phyis nyang stod smon 'gro'i gtsug lag khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed de bsgyur

bar zhes sogs 'gyur byang dang bcas lhag mtshang bar 'dug pa ltar 'dir yang sde bar sor gzhag gis brkos yod kyang / /mkhas grub rin po che'i gsung gong du drangs pa ltar bu ston thams cad mkhyen pas bsgyur ba le'u dang po'i dbu nas cung zad tsam mtshang ba'i le'u bzhi pa'i mgo

yan chad dang / le'u tha ma'i mjug cung zad cig yod de zhes dang / bu ston rang gi 'gyur byang drangs par yang / 'di la dum bu las med kyang zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar na/ bar rnams bu ston rin po ches bsgyur bar ma mdzad pa lta bu zhig gsungs pa bcas 'gyur byang gnyis kyang mi mthun pas

zhib tu dpyad dgos par snang yod/ dpe dbang gzhan ma rnyed pas slad mkhas pa rnams kyis dpyad par mdzod cig/ //rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+ha pa Thi ta b+ha ga wa tI Ar+ya ang+ku li nA ma bid+yA rA dz+nyI/ bod skad
du/ bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de ltar dge slong rnams ri dri rgyal na gnas te de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang de na bzhugs te/ des bdag la smras pa/ bu sngags kyi tshig 'di nyon cig /klu'i dbang po
rnams kyi dug med par byed/ sbrul gyi dug med par byed/ /g.yog rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / sems can stobs po che rnams dang / grul
bum rnams dang / sems can phra mo rnams dang / phra men pha dang / phra men ma dang / chu srin dang / stag dang / grul bum dang / rwa can dang / mche ba can gyis de ltar sngags kyi tshig drag shul
chen po aM gu li yang dag par thos na sngags kyi gtso bo sems can gdug pa rab tu 'jil bar byed pa ste/ /sngags can gang gis de shes na lha rnams kyi bdug pa yang dag par med par
byed do/ /oM na mo d+ha ga wA te Ar+ya aM gu li/ tad+ya thA/ oM klu'am/ klu mo'am/ sbrul lam/ sbrul mo'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ 'byung po'am/ 'byung mo'am/ phra men pha'am/

phra men ma'am/ gdug pas zin pa'am/ gdug pas ma zin pa yang rung ste/ pha pha pha/ ha re ha re ha re/ ra dza ri/ be sha be/ nA ga re/ sarba re re/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi d+ha ra

bi d+ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/ la g+hu la g+hu/ A na ya A na ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ g+hur+N+Na g+hur+N+Na/ g+hur+N+NA pa ya
g+hur+N+NA pa ya/ dpag tshad stong brgyad cu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyi gdug pa med par mdzod cig /klu thams cad chings shig /sod cig /thar bar mdzod cig /oM hu lu hu lu/ ha la
ha la/ ha la bI shaM/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa'i rgyal mo aM gu lis bka' stsal pa/ tak+ka/ Tak+ke/ tak+ke ni/ Tak+ke ni/ shi ra shi ra/ tsan+d+ra ke sha ro hi Ni/ bgegs thams cad sel bar
mdzad pa can/ las stong can/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa aM ku li ta thA bi ga ta/ klu mo'i tshogs sum cus mchod pa/ dza ya dza ya sid+d+ha/ rgyal bar mdzad pa/ mi mgo'i thod gyi phreng ba can

hUM k+Sha skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyin par gyi bar du dug sel ba/ a su ra de bi ta dang / dan pa'i stobs 'joms par byed pa can/ bgegs 'joms par mdzad pa can/ lha'i yum khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod swAhA
sngags kyi tshig drag shul can sbrul gyi mdun du bklag par mi bya ste/ 'chi ba dang / klad pa 'gas shing tshal ba brgyar 'gyur ro/ /sngags kyi tshig drag shul can chen mo sbrul gyis thos
na thams cad tshig par byed do/ /oM ki li ki li/ mahA ki li/ kA la ru li ni/ bgegs thams cad zlog shig /pha pham pha rol pham par mdzod cig swAhA/ bklags pas grub pa aM

ku li'i snying po dang bcas pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM d+hu ne d+hu ne/ d+hu ni d+hu ni/ sat+ya/ tAT+Ta hA si ni d+hu d+hu ni/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ rdo rje'i gzungs mang pos bka' stsal pa/ 'jog po'i 'dug 'dor du 'jug la/ /dzA
ya dzA ya/ mu dza mu dza/ muny+dza muny+dza/ thong shig /glog dang rlung zhes bya ba mgyogs pa'i shugs can/ ro langs chen mo bcom ldan 'das ma shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'byung ba'o/ /mu ya muny+tsa
muny+tsa swAhA/ bklags pas 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ mahA sa mA dza sU tran
nA ma ma hA sU tra/ bod skad du/ mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya
rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par
kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las
'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/ de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas/ dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/ bcom
ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed do/ /de nas tshangs ris kyi lha tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa bzhi zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/
bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/ de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas dbang
che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed kyis bdag cag kyang song la/ bcom ldan 'das
la re re nas tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod par bya ba gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa
bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te phyogs gcig tu
'khod nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha gcig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ 'dus pa che la gzhol ba yi/ /lha tshogs kun nas lhags gyur pas/ /gzhan gyis mi thub dge 'dun la/ /blta
ba'i slad du bdag cag mchis/ /tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis pas tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ drang por gyur pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'di na dge sbyong rab brtson pa/ /kha lo ba ltar mig
blangs shing / /dbang po rnams ni legs sdom bgyid/ /tshangs ris kyi lha gsum pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dbang phur 'od pa 'obs 'dra ba'i/ /phur bu rab bcom bkrir mi
tshugs/ /de dag sred bral dag spyod cing / /'dren pas glang po gzhon ltar btul/ /tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchi ba/ /de
dag ngan 'gror mi mchi zhing / /mi lus spangs par gyur nas kyang / /lha yi lus ni thob bar 'gyur/ /tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag gis de skad ces gsol nas de nyid na bag bcum ste
'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni che ba
yin no/ /dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu che ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na
byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'dus
par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag lha rnams kyi ming dag brjod par byas/ lha rnams kyi
ming dag zung shig /gang dag sa la gnas pa dang / /gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams/ /seng ge bzhin du tha dad la/ /sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /kun nas 'dus
par gyur pa ni/ /spu dag zing zhes byed pa yin/ /gang dag sa la gnas pa dang / /gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams/ /seng ge bzhin du tha dad la/ /sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag
byas shing / /kun nas 'dus gyur spu zing zhes/ /byed pa bdag gis brjod par bya/ /yid byad dag cing rab dang la/ /rnyog med 'chi bdag spangs pa rnams/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar
thug pa'i/ /lha dang mi yi bar na 'khod/ /slob ma lnga brgya phrag gnyis dang / /gzhan yang brgya dang bcu dag dang / /stong phrag du ma rnams dag gi /lha rnams 'dus par gyur pa dag /
mtha' nas mtha' ma mi mthong zhing / /phyogs rnams thams cad khyab gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te/ /de nas ston pas bstan
dga' ba'i/ /nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag /lha tshogs mngon par lhags gyur gyis/ /nges par rtogs zhes bka' stsal ba/ /tshigs su bcad pas mthar cha gas kyis/ /de dag
rnams kyi ming brjod kyi/ /rtse gcig gyur pa'i yid kyis ni/ /nga yis bshad pa mnyan par gyis/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal gyi/ /gnod sbyin stong phrag bdun po dag /ser skya'i gnas
kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags
ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /gser can stong phrag drug po kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi
nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan
rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /shar phyogs rnam rgyal tshal gyi ni/ /ri mnyam stong phrag gsum po dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi
nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//
kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de ltar stong phrag bcu drug kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa
dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan
kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i khab/ /yangs pa la ni rtag
gnas shing / /brgya stong phrag ni mang po yi/ /gnod sbyin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od
dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /kun gyi bshes gnyen lnga brgya dang / /rdzu 'phrul
chen po kun gyi lha/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de gnyis kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong
rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /shar phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan ba ni/ /dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul
'khor srung zhes bya/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog
ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming
mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub par/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par
lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lho phyogs mngon
par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang
dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /
'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi
stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od
dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon bar zhugs/ /nub phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen
grags dang ldan pa ni/ /klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de
yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par
zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun tu
gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge
slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /byang phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming
ni lus ngan po zhes bya/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha
dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag
ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni
'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /shar
phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag /'jig rten skyod ba
grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od
dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de dag gi ni
khol po rnams/ /mchod rten mang la gnas bcas pa/ /slu byed g.yon can sgyu ma can/ /sgyu ma shes dang rnam shes dang / /ngan spong khro gnyer lhan cig tu/ /de tshe rdzu 'phrul ston
cing lhags/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams
la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /gnod sbyin dang / /gnod sbyin chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang / dmag dpon 'di dag kyang der kun nas
lhags te/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / /b+ha ra dwa rdza skye dgu'i bdag /dbang ldan tsan+dan 'dod gtso dang / /mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / /stobs ldan nor bu nor
spyod dang / /sgra rab dang ni nye rda dang / /ri mnyam gsor can gang po dang / /seng ldeng pa dang g.yon can dang / /gnod sbyin pa skyong 'brog gnas dang / /rgyal ba'i khyu mchog mi
rgyal po/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang / /tshigs lnga ser po yid dga' dang / /gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ /'bras bu gsum dang
mgul gsum pa/ /'gro gnas ji snyed yod pa yin/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags
ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lhan cig 'byung ba'i klu dang ni/ /'jog po dang ni yangs pa'ang 'ongs/ /la ba dang ni
mgyogs mchog dag /srung byed 'gro dang lhan cig lhags/ /klu bdag bran bzang bu dang ni/ /yul 'khor srung dang glang po che/ /'jigs byed che dang sa srung bu/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i
klu yang 'ongs/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams
la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /gang zhig klu rgyal zil mnan len/ /stobs ldan mig rnon 'dab chags bya/ /de ming 'dab bzang khra bo yang / /mkha' las
tshal du mngon par 'ongs/ /de tshe klu rgyal mi 'jigs byin/ /ston pas 'dab bzang bde mdzad cing / /gsung 'jam brjod pa de nyid la/ /sangs rgyas skyabs su nye bar song / /gang dag de yi
'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal
du mngon par zhugs/ /lag na rdo rjes pham byas shing / /rgya mtshor rten pa'i lha min rnams/ /thams cad nor lhas skrag gyur cing / /mtsho la skyabs su 'du
shes pa/ /thags bzangs ris dang rab bkra dang / /rab sim byed dang btang bzung dang / /stobs ldan bu ni brgyad po kun/ /rnam snang byed pa'i bu rnams dang / /stobs ldan sde dang sgra gcan
bzang / /dpa' chen khyod kyi dus lags shes/ /dge slong 'dus pa'i nags tshal du/ /go cha bgos te lhags pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /
rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /chu lha mo dang bu mo dang / /zla ba
mo yang phyi bzhin 'ongs/ /mdza' bshes ma dang chu lha can/ /lha mo grags ldan nyid kyang 'ongs/ /sa dang chu dang rlung gi dang / /me yi lha mo'ang 'ongs gyur te/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag
kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu
'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /khyab 'jug lha dang gshol can
lha/ /mtshe ma gnyis kyang lhags par gyur/ /zla la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /zla ba nyid ni mdun du bdar/ /nyi la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /nyi ma nyid kyang mdun bdar cing / /char pa 'bebs par
byed pa dag /rgyu skar rnams kyis mdun par lags/ /thams cad bzang po rdo rje can/ /brgya byin khyer 'jig 'ongs gyur te/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/
ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing
grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lha mo tshogs can ma dang ni/ /me lce'i rtse 'dra 'chi ltas can/ /zhi ba mo dang dka' zlog
ma/ /me tog gos can 'ongs gyur cing / /rgyu ba mo dang mtshan mchings bzang / /'chi med rnam pa du ma dang / /gang zhig phyogs su char 'babs pa/ /'dod lha'i dbyangs can ma yang 'ongs/ /
bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus
par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing drag ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /sngo bsangs sngo bsangs
chen mo dang / /mi 'dra mi 'dra dam pa dang / /rtsed mos myos dang de bzhin du/ /yid rab 'khrug ma'ang 'ongs gyur cing / /phag mo phag mo chen mo dang / /slong
ma nges ma lhan cig lhags/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de
yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /
'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /dkar mo rgyags byed snying rje dang / /gos sngon mo yang 'ongs gyur cing / /skra dkar mo la sogs pa dang / /gos ser mo yang 'ongs par gyur/ /
'phrog ma rtag tu myos pa dang / /spel ma rnam pa du ma dang / /dag pa dang ni 'od can ma/ /lha mo grags ldan rnams kyang lhags/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs
ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang
ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /bde byed dga' ldan 'thab bral dang / /nag po btab
bdu ma dang / /lum bi ni dang lum bi mchog /skar ma zhes bya legs smon dang / /'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin du/ /dbang sgyur rnams kyang lhags par gyur/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de
dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu
'phrul ldan zhing yod dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lha tshogs drug cu de dag kun/ /
kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul
ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong dag gi /
tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba/ /kun 'ged gzhon nu skar rgyal de/ /so sor dbang sgyur dbang phyug bcu/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de dag dang / /lhan cig 'grogs te der lhags pa/ /gang dag de
yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus
pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /dbang sgyur byed pa'i 'phrog ma mo/ /kha dog gzugs mchog ldan pa yang / /bu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing / /
de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'ongs/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /
dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /dbang por bcas dang dbang ldan bcas/ /skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas pa yi/ /lha rnams de dag
der lhags shing / /dge slong rnams kyang der lhags so/ /nag pos smras pa'i tshig la ltos/ /'dod chags kyis ni 'di bzung la/ /bcing ba gyis dang khyod la legs/ /'di
dag kun nas yongs bsdus la/ /'di dag gson por ma btang zhes/ /de na nag po sde bo che/ /sde rnams la ni skul byed cing / /khros shing rang dbang med gyur nas/ /rang yang
mngon par zhugs gyur te/ /lag pa sa la brdabs nas ni/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra phyung ste/ /de nas lha yis sprin phreng dang / /glog dang bcas pa'i char yang phab/ /sangs rgyas
kyis ni de mkhyen nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te/ /de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i/ /nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag /bdud ste mngon par lhags gyur
gyis/ /mngon par rtogs zhes bka' stsal pa/ /brtson par byed pa de dag gis/ /sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas ni/ /de dag spu yang mi g.yo bas/ /de dag chags bral yin par
rtogs/ /rgyal sras nyan thos de dag ni/ /slob ma rnams dang lhan cig dga'/ /de dag g.yul las rnams rgyal zhing / /'jigs bral grags dang ldan pa yin/ /bar gyi sdom ni/
bdun stong gser can ri mnyam dang / /de bzhin gnod sbyin chu srin dang / /kun gyi bshes dang rgyal po rnams/ /de bzhin khol po gnod sbyin dang / /klu dang 'dab bzang lha min
dang / /chu lha mo dang khyab 'jug dang / /tshogs can ma dang sngo bsangs dang / /dkar mo bde byed dbang phyug dang / /kun 'ged gzhon dang 'phrog ma dang / /dbang bcas bdud dang
dge slong ngo / /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha shin tu dbang che bar grags pa rnams mdo sde bstan pas yi rangs par gyur nas de'i tshe tshig 'di dag gis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo
bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang tshig 'di dag gis mdo sde 'di yang dag par bsnyad par bgyi zhing yang dag par brjod par bgyi lags so/ /de la gsang sngags

kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /ta d+ya thA/ te rdze te dza ba ti/ tsi tre tsi tra ba ti/ la te la ta ba ti/ kha me kha ma ba ti/ k+She me k+Sha ma ba ti/ b+ha dre b+ha dra ba ti/ ya she ya sha ba ti/ dU te dU ta ba ti/ rtsa ba
le tsa ba la ba ti/ kha tse kha tsa ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gnas gtsang ma pha rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams lags te/ bcom ldan
'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rmongs pa mchis par 'dzin par bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis
par 'gyur lags so/ /'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la bro nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/ /gang du klog pa der dge
bar 'gyur zhing de dag la dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so/ /ji tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de tsam gyis dgung char 'bab par yang 'gyur/ /'chad
par yang 'gyur/ /dgung ser 'beb par yang 'gyur/ /'chad par yang 'gyur lags so/ /pro nad thams cad la byab par bgyis sam/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te stsal
na/ des de'i bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma pa dag ma gtogs
pa gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris gong ma rnams kyi rig sngags kyang 'di dag lags la/ gsang sngags kyi tshig zhib mo yang 'di dag lags so/ /'di ni 'dir mdo sde yongs

su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ b+ha le b+ha la ma le/ dur du le/ hi me/ pu ba pi se/ kA tsA k+shi ku tse si/ ma mI ni She re tho ra nI/ pi bam bo Ti ste ke /ta ra ke /gu ru ga ro Te/ gug gu
mi ti/ tA re rak+Sha/ sU tra ma nu pA la ya thA/ 'di ni bdag cag gi rig sngags kyi chog zhi ba mo lags te/ gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur
par 'dzin tam/ klog par bgyid na de la mi dang / mi ma lags pa dag mchi bar mi 'gyur zhing gdug pa yang mi mchi/ /sbrul yang mi mchi/ dug kyang mi mchi la/ de'i lus la gnod pa
dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/ /'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur
lags so/ /gang klog par bgyid pa dang / gang nyan par bgyid pa de la dgung lo bdun du bsrung pa bgyis par 'gyur lags so/ /chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor tam/ 'tshal
du stsal na de'i bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa'i bdag po thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag
g.yul yang lags te/ mdo sde 'di yongs su gzung ba'i rig sngags ni 'di lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ len+te li be/ lo pe/ ba pe/ bad ke/ ka me/ kA tse kA tse k+Shi/ kA tsa bi ga le/ du me du me/ ta
Te tra Te/ tad tra/ Te tra TA k+Shi/ go lA/ ko li/ ki ka ko li ke sA d+hA/ sU tra ma nu pA la ya thA/ ud gra h+na ya tse ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gsang sngags kyi
tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang / ma nyams par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na de ni thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags
so/ /'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /ji tsam 'tshal bar de tsam gyi dgung char 'beb par yang 'gyur/ 'chad par yang 'gyur/ dgung ser 'bab par yang
'gyur/ 'chad par yang 'gyur lags so/ /'byung po dang gdon rnams las yongs su thar bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /dug 'byin par yang 'gyur lags so/ /chab la lan bdun
bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor tam 'tshal du stsal na des bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang de bzhin du mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid cing / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gong ma rnams kyis ni rjes su yi rang bar
bgyis la/ 'og ma rnams kyis kyang legs par rjes su yi rang bar bgyis pa lags so/ /ta d+ya thA/ bI re bI ra ba ti/ to Te to Ta ba ti/ b+ha dre b+ha dra ba ti/ go ne go na ba ti/ me g+he me g+ha ba ti/

dz+wa la ne dz+wa la na ba ti/ b+hu ti b+hu ta ba ti/ kho ra te kho ra ta ba ti/ i dan sU tra ma nu kr-i h+na Tha/ a nu pA la ya tha tsi ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di daN gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum
bur ma gyur par 'dzin par bgyid na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las srung bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /de la mi dang mi ma lags pa 'ga' yang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur
lags so/ /gang du klog pa der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /sems can thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la zil gyis gnon pa 'ga'
yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /de yi lus la bro nad rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/ /sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par yang 'gyur lags so/ /gang
du klog par 'gyur ba der dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang gdon rnams las thar bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /dug 'joms par yang 'gyur lags
so/ /bro nad thams cad sel bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /skud pa'am chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam gtor na bro nad thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rig sngags 'di yang mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin cing grub par bgyid
pa lags so/ /rnam thos kyi bus gsol ba/ tad+ya thA/ ku re ku ra nI/ mo re mo ra nI/ kA tse kA tsa nI/ kri mi kri mi nI/ yul 'khor srung gis gsol pa/
pu re po re/ pu ra tI/ ho re ho ra nI/ pra ho re pra ho ra nI/ 'phags skyes pos gsol pa/ ke she ke she ba ti/ ke sha na/ mi ke sha /The ti The ni ma ri ti/ mig mi bzang gis gsol pa/ tsa kre
tsa kri nI/ tsa kra ba gi ni/ b+hi ti ri rmi ni/ shi mi shi mi/ shA ma ne ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig rgyal po chen po bzhis brjod pa'i rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di bzhi dang / mdo
sde 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang / ma bkol bar legs par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/ /de la 'byung po thams
cad dang / bro nad thams cad kyang slar mi ldog par 'gyur lags so/ /gdug pas zin pa dang / dug thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur lags so/ /skud pa'am/ chab la
bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam/ gtor cing 'tshal du stsal na/ cho ga des de la 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha ma yin dang / rlung lhas
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so/ /ta d+ya thA/ ga le/ ga ga ga le/ ga le ga ni/ khi ni khi ni/ g+hu She g+hu She
g+hu g+hu Sh+ya/ kha na kha kha na/ kha na kha ni/ lu pi lu bi/ lu pa lu pi ti/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur cing / ma bkol bar bzung na ji srid 'tsho'i
bar du bsrung bar 'gyur lags so/ /de'i bro nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /lus la dug gis mi tshugs par yang 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i dgongs pa yongs su gzung ba'i slad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
nas lhags pa rnams kyis rig sngags dag smras pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing / kun tu gzung ba
dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag legs par bshad du gsol/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de dag gi sbyin par bgyi ba'i chos kyi mdo sde 'di 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur lags so/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis gsang sngags kun tu bzung ba 'di ni grub pa yin to/ nga nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang mdo sde 'di'i grub pa dang / bsrung
ba dang / bsgrub pa dag bshad par bya ste/ de nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
kyi tshogs dang bcas pas mdo sde chen po 'di grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo
sde 'di grub par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag bka' stsal pa/ de la rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /ta la ta la/ tan ta la/ ta to ta le me te/ lan cig
phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /sa le sa sa li ti/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /la ti la te lo la te/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /

d+hu bu d+hu pu/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ka tsi bi ka tsi/ ka tsa bi ka tse ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /d+ha me d+ha me/ d+ha me d+ha me/ d+ha se d+ha se/ d+ha re d+ha d+ha re/ d+ha ro d+hi d+hi ti/ de la srung ba

ni 'di yin no/ /ti na ti ri tsa ri Sha/ bing+ga la k+Shi ra k+Sha/ mtshams bcad pa ni 'di yin no/ /bad+d+ha bad+d+ho ti/ bad+d+ha si ri mi ti/ bad+d+ha ku She bad+d+ha/ g+hu g+hu She bad+d+ha g+hu She g+hu She ya ma bad+d+ha b+hi/ sgrub pa ni
'di yin no/ /be She sA d+ha ya/ tu tu le sA d+ha ye ti/ zhag gsum smyung ba byas pas tshes bco lnga'i nyin par gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'dis bcom ldan 'das la mchod
par byas te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la srung ba lan brgya brjod par bya zhing / bzlas brjod lan brgya byas la/ mdud pa re re la brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bsrung ba byas pa yin zhing / lan
gsum spu zing zhes byed bar yang 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la skud pa de lag tu
sbang sa te bzlas shing mtshams gcad par byas te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ mtshams gcod par byed na lan bdun spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur ro//
sto phyags nas ce spyang mos lan gsum sgra phyung ste 'dug par gyur na/ de nas mtshams bcad par shes par bya'o/ /des de bzhin du smyung ba byas te/ chos bco lnga'i nyin par khrus byas
la/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ skud pa blangs la/ nyan thos kyi tshig rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi cho ga zhib mos lan bdun bzlas te/ bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad
brjod cing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ skud pa lag tu blangs te/ rig sngags thams cad lan cig bzlas brjod byas shing sgrub pa byas na char pa chen po dang / rlung chen po yang
'byung ste/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu ldang zhing 'bab par 'gyur la/ skad cig gis 'chad par yang 'gyur te/ lan bdun gyi bar du yang brjod par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i bu sprin chen zhes bya
ba dang / sbrin bzang zhes bya ba gnyis 'ongs te/ de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing grub pa sbyin pa dang / rjes su yi rang bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de la grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ sprin ni
ku tsu ku tsa zhes bya'o/ /sprin bzang kyi ni 'di yin te/ ka ra ka ra kA ro ra zhes bya'o/ /tshig 'di dag dang skud pa lag tu blangs bas mdo sde dang / gsang sngags
rnams bsams na gang bya bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang / rig sngags 'di dag thams cad kyis chu'am skud pa la
bzlas na gang byed par mi 'gyur ba de med de las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag dang / gzhan dag bsrung ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di gzung bar bya'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'byung po gang dag 'dir
ni lhags gyur cing / /sa dang bar snang dag la 'khod pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byas cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /mdo chen po 'dus
pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / pradz+nyA ba rma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing
zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
